28b2(dkon brtsegs): pa ci 'drag// de 'dra'i chos nyid thib 'gyur bar// yon ni rnam par spyod kar rtse// migal kyi chen pos smras pa// gdan ni ster ba shams pa dang // de la gang dag zhugs pa rnams// ma mnyamam kyis
28b3(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs pa ste// mchod sbyin dag bad+man meng // shA ro'i bus smras pa/ mchu byed pa'i sems gang dang // yin par byed pa'i sems gang dang // sbyin par byed pa de lta bar// yin ni rjer du myong bar shog/ rab
28b4(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ gtong med sbyin pa 'di btang ba// len pa med rnams kyis blangs// gang dag 'dir ni gshegs pa rnams// de dag yon spyod byed pa yin// kun dka' bos smras pa/ 'di ni rnam mkha'i sbyin pa ste// bas
28b5(dkon brtsegs): sa mi bya ba rnams kyis spyad// gang dag sems lus grol ba de// 'jig rten dag na lon skyong mchog/ byang chub sems dpa' 'od te ga gis smras pa// ji lta bur na sgyu ma'i mkhan// bzang pos bkod pa sprul byas pa
28b6(dkon brtsegs): chos kun de dang 'drab ste// byis pas de martogs so// byang chub sems dpa'abad pagad pos smras pa/ ji ltar shad dang rjor shing // du ma mngon par sprul byas pa// leng kye snum lta bur stong / 'di'i khyad par
28b7(dkon brtsegs): 'ga' yang med// byang chub sems dpa' seng ge ke bzlas pas de'i smani mthos na// la ni na gas kyi lan na zhugs// de yis seng ge'i sgra thos nas// phyogs bcu dag tu 'brim par 'gyur// de bzhin d+ha mkhan
28b8(dkon brtsegs): 'a ma yang // de bzhin gshegs pa ma mtho na// su le grwa nang du rgyal ba zas// bdag nyi mag
29a1(dkon brtsegs): / nges 'ad kyi gcing med pogs// byang chub sems dpa' me'i bla gros kyis smras pa/ dal bas 'di ni sprul pa so// bsnyed bkur byed pa'ang sprul pa yin// sud pa byed shang sprul
29a2(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa dge bzhin med// byang chub sems dpa' byams pas smras/ yin pa da la ma sa// kye rkye ni zhe ga mched// de zhin bzang po'i skum yis// sangs rgyas sgyu mangs par
29a3(dkon brtsegs): sa dpalag na nur gyur pas smras pa/ de ltar 'din sngar gnas pa// thams cad byed pa med pa ltar// de bzhin chos rnams thams cad ne// sngon gyi mtha' das teg tu mnyam// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
29a4(dkon brtsegs): ma sa khan bzang po shin tu gdul ba'i dbang du 'dzad nas khyam bdag cig sprul te/ 'khor gyi khyams de'i nang du zhugs nas sna mamakha babang po la 'di skad ces smras so// bzang po ci ba/ smras pa/ 
29a5(dkon brtsegs): ko tam 'di gdugs tshod gsol bar byed de// nges smras pa/ bzang po thong de skad ma zer de bzhin gshegs pa de ni dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i khab na gdugs
29a6(dkon brtsegs): dgasal shing bzhugs so// sa ma maman bzang pos kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus nga bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'du dang thabs gcig tu rgal po ma skyes dgra'i khab na gdugs chod gsol ba rnam
29a7(dkon brtsegs): / de das yang bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gnyis pazhig mngon par sprul nas denang du zhugs te/ skum mkhan bzang pal 'di skad ces smras sa// bzang po na byed/ smras pa/ dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di gas
29a8(dkon brtsegs): tshod gsol 'byed do// des smras pa/ thong de skad ma mer de bzhin gshegs pa de ni dge slong gi dge 'dren dang thabs gcig tu kun du chu'i sringan pa sod snyoms kyi phyir spyi ning bzhugs so// sgyum ma
29b1(dkon brtsegs): dang thabs gag kun du 'i srang na bsad skams kyi phyir rta bar mthang // de nas yang bamam ldan 'das kyis khyam
29b2(dkon brtsegs): zhan zhig sprul te/ de dang du zhugs nas sam mkhan babang ba la 'di skad ces smras so// bzang po ci byed/ smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gdugs chod gsol bar byed do// des smras pa/ bzang po
29b3(dkon brtsegs): de sa ma mir dra ba zhin gshegs pa dan byed kyi skyed mos cal na 'khor bzhil chus ston cing bzhugs so// skam mkhan bzang pos kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa'i tsha byed kyi skyed
29b4(dkon brtsegs): mos tshal na 'khor bzhil chos sun par mthong ngo // de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin snyam mkhan pabang pog la po dang mangs phyid nas sgyum mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so// b.rang po na byed/ smos
29b5(dkon brtsegs): pa/ dge sbyong ga tam 'di gdugs me dgasol bar byed // des smras pa/ bzang gi tha~Mng de ska ma me de bzhin gshegs pa don sum nu cig sam pa'i gnas na shing yangs 'du drung na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i
29b6(dkon brtsegs): lha rnams la chos ston cing bzhugs so// bzang pos kyang de bzhin gshegs pa sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas na shing yangs 'du'i drung na chos ston par mthong ngo // de nas snyam mkhan bzang pos shing ljon paskum
29b7(dkon brtsegs): sbed pa de thams cad kyi lam thams cad dang / me tog thams cad ledade bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan gyis brdzun pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskur 'amathod ngo // snum mkhan bzang pos
29b8(dkon brtsegs): kye sprul ba gang dag yin pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhes seng ge'i khri sprul pa gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i skun tshan gyis brgyan pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun kyi ma yongs su bzhing
30a1(dkon brtsegs): bamathong // rgyal po la khab sa grong khyer chen pan theg pa'am/ khyi pa 'am/ 2nga bkangs sa/ srang ma/ lam pa che ji snyed med pa de dag thams cad na yang de bzhin gshegs
30a2(dkon brtsegs): sku mtshan gyis brgyan pa mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de ga thams cad kyi spyan ldan yang skum mkhan bzang po bdag nyid phya/ 'tshal nas nyes pa
30a3(dkon brtsegs): chags par mthong zhing / de nas sgyum ma 'an bzang po'i mig la sar gang cung bang ni snang ba de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa mag togs pa gnon cung ba kyang mamathong nas tsho ye mgul
30a4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dga' ni de dga' ba dang yid 'di bar gyur to// de dga' ba dang yid bde ba de nyid kyis dad pa rjes su dran pa'i ting nga 'dzin thob po// da ting nge 'dzin de las 'angs ma thag tu thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan
30a5(dkon brtsegs): ster sngar 'dug nas tshigs su bcad pa di dag gsol to// bzhin paHphrag stong las lhag sbyor ci// ye rag d+hA'i // sangs rgyas mang po sprul bar mdzo pa ma/ 
30a6(dkon brtsegs): shegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul de lams// bdag gis snga bslabs kyu bams ma lags// 'angs kyi skyed na bdag 'a med tsam// da rgyal ba la 'dul 'dam ma sa// 'di tha ya
30a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi sha ye mig gis gang mthong ba// thams cad rgyal ba'i mtshan gyis brtan pa'i sku// chos kyi rgyal po lan 'di dag zhus// rgyal ba yang dag gang lags bka' stsam ga/ ga sheg
30a8(dkon brtsegs): gas par mdzad pa lags/ gang la 'bras bu can por 'gyur ba lags// gang gi byang chub 'thun par gzung ba 'di// kun du skyon gyis bdag la bka' stsol cig/ de ring 'jig rten mgon par
30b1(dkon brtsegs): rnas shing gsud dang na du chags// gang dag sams can mchag la gus mi gnas// 'angs can dag ma pa'i bdams thams/ bdag la sna dang ba tu bye tshangs pa dang //  yi ra/ 
30b2(dkon brtsegs): na thams cad rgyad thams dang// byang chu'i sem ni padag gis bskye ba ci// bdag gisasam na thams cad dus// 'du kyi sa
30b3(dkon brtsegs): dag tshim par bgyi// gnyid kyis rab log sems can shes rab kyi// mthu dang sgrub pas rnam par sa par 'gyi// rnam par 'phrul pa 'di 'dra mthong gyur cing // bde bar gshegs bka' yid 'ong ye shes dang / 
30b4(dkon brtsegs): chags pa med pa'i spyod mchog thos nas ni// su shig dag pa'i rgyu sems bskyed mi bgyid// byang chub sems mkhas ji ltar spyod pa yi// byang chub lam ni bdag la bshad du gsol// gang la nyan thos rnam
30b5(dkon brtsegs): sa mi dpogs pa'o// de dag rnams kyi stong gi sgrub// mnyan par 'dod la gus pa ji lta'u// nges pa rnams kyi spyod lam ci 'dra ba// bdag la the tsom ma mchis de bzhin gsungs/ 
30b6(dkon brtsegs): / ma pa nyid khyod pa'i ga/ ga la hrI/  m+bus / mal sa//  sa
30b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i sems la ji ltar gnas// byas pa shes shing rab tu phan 'dags dang // sems can mi phyed gnas par ji ltar 'gyur// grogs po gang dag bsten bgyi ji lta bu// sdig pa'i grogs
30b8(dkon brtsegs): pa ltar rnam par spong // ji ltar sangs rgyas rnams dang phrad par 'gyur// de dag mthong nas ji Sh+Ta mchod par bgyi// ji ltar bslab pa dag la gus pa lags// de yi bslab pa bca' 'gang zhig
31a1(dkon brtsegs): te 'dzin dam par dag pa ji lur 'tha'// ji lta tshul ba'i rab tu sbyor ba ladas// tshul lda la lag
31a2(dkon brtsegs): pa lags// ji ltar shin tu nges par bsams med dang // nyon mangs bdud pa 'ching bas mi thub lags// de ltar dang ldan dan ni sems bgyid cig// sems kyis sems can rnams ni
31a3(dkon brtsegs): lags// ji ltar sems can yongs sa smin 'gyed cing // nang ma chog 'dzin pa mngal dpa' ba lags// ji ltar sems can 'ang la 'jug pa dang // thabs dang byams pa'i rnyeng rje gnas
31a4(dkon brtsegs): mdzan par shes pa de ltar yongs rdzogs 'gyur// drad dang bla gros gang gis rnam dag cing// sa so yang dag rig gzungs bzod par 'gyur// sran lam rnam dag smad las me ldeg cir/ 
31a5(dkon brtsegs): lda dan dam mkhas pa lags// snyan lam thams cad nga lar 'grub par 'gyur// de ltar de dag pa rol phyin 'phags shing // debani byang du 'arjes su 'thun par 'gyur// byang chub sems
31a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa kun shes shing // byang chub phyir de spyod pa mi ldog pa// kun ma khyen legs par don bsams shes rapa mtsha// ye shes 'bang gnas 'di ni bdag la gapungs/ bcom ldan par
31a7(dkon brtsegs): dag la bstan du gsal// bdag gis nan tan sing par bgyi bar 'tshal// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sna ma mkhan bzang pa la slang chags su bcad de bka' stsal pa// tshas
31a8(dkon brtsegs): byas bye ba phrag su sprul par byed// sprul pa de dag ni rnams bye bar carba// de dag sang nas sems
31b1(dkon brtsegs): yas sa snyam du dugs shing// sa sargyas gzugs sa sa can ni// nachang gas snam yini skad ce/ 'chang pa 'gyur bam min sems pa 'i// dam shes med kyisarab tu min/ sa nyid
31b2(dkon brtsegs): gang yin sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ dus gsum stong shing mtshan pang ma smras pa// rtag tu lnga ning nga bzhi dam par grol// de la ba grang bas pa 'a bye bang // sangs rgyas 'byung gang tsham nyid 'brang bamed
31b3(dkon brtsegs): de la phung po yod min khams mi 'byung // mas dganas pa mi gso snyan pa med// do ni mig lnga'i gnas kyang ma yin no// gang zhig bdag gis sangs rgyas blta snya ma sems// des ni gan pa yang sangs rgyas mam
31b4(dkon brtsegs): na pa mthong ba med pa song ba ste// ba narnamam pa ni byas pazhin// bzang po gang kyad chung bdas mam la// de kun den gcig yin pa shes par gyis// de dang gnan gang yin pa ku brgyangs/ 
31b5(dkon brtsegs): bar sdang mthong dang 'dra bar mnyam pa yin// de dag ting 'dzin mnyam zhing shes rab mnyam// de dag dam par grol bar mnyam pa yin// nam grol ye shes mthong dang stobs pa ri// rgyal ba'i yon tan kun gyis
32a1(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa yin// de dag sdang don ko 'phang gnas par mnyam// thams cad chags pa med pa'i chos nyid gnas// kun kyang sgyu ma'i rang bzhin rnam par grol// de dag 'byung ba med par
32a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba zhen// dbang po rgyal ba gcig la mchod byed na// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas lani mtshad 'gyur te// 'di ltar de dag nga mchis dbyings dang // bdang bya ba nam yang yang mayin// de dag tha
32a3(dkon brtsegs): cad yon pa zhes spyong bar mdzad// kun la phul ba'ang 'bras bu che bar 'gyur// de kun chos nyid dag pa mnyam pa brnyes// sangs rgyas rnams la tha dad bya ba'ang med// rgyal ba yang dag gang yin bshad bya yi/ 
32a4(dkon brtsegs): rtsa gcig sems dang dran pa nyer gzhag cing // chos tshul rtogs pa rnam par lta bsad // legs par nges bsams sems kyis nga las nyon// bzang po de kun ma bskyed yang dag min// phyin cig lan
32a5(dkon brtsegs): dedun mthong bar bang // gal te dngos pa tho ba yang dgran// dam po'am cad du ni zad mi 'gyur// de phyir shin tu ma skyes yang dag min// de dag skye med zang la gnas pa med// des na blta med pa
32a6(dkon brtsegs): / de dag sna // rnam par bltas na gnas pa yod ma yin// ji ltar bamang pos rgyal ba mthong ba dang // ji ltar phyogs su mngon par sprul mthong ba// gang dag phung po rgya chen rten spobs dang / 
32a7(dkon brtsegs): po lnga po'ang de dang 'dra bar ltog// chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin med pa ste// sems can dang ni sangs rgyas mtshan nyid med// mtshan nyid med la mtshan du 'dod pa de// sangs rgyas las ni shin tu
32a8(dkon brtsegs): reng bar 'gyur// chos long ba yin kun du rtog pas bslang// dngos po med par yang ni brten nas shes/ byed pa med cing byed pa po las 'das// ming du 'dzin pas stong pa rab tu ston/ 
32b1(dkon brtsegs): gas// oM kaus sa sa/ des yangag mganas sa marnas pas pa// la tshachags
32b2(dkon brtsegs): dag brjod de bsnyad pa na ska ba mkhan bzang ba tshas la nges par rtog pa dang 'thun pa'i bzod pa chung du skyes so// srig chags lnga stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems sngonam
32b3(dkon brtsegs): byed pa sngasas// byang du thasams dpa' nyis brgyan me skye ba'i tsham la bab pa thob par byu te/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rnal bas stsal pa dre gsal nas snam mkhyen pazang ba'i na
32b4(dkon brtsegs): bar gyiba'i phyid de'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag pa' yul to// nga zhes sbyin dang ga la sten// rnyen pa sa me rtog pa// sbyin 'am mo ba shad de/ ma ni song mardzogs
32b5(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsam / com ldan 'das la bar gyi byams 'di rkyen sdem brtson pa'in du dkrung bdun du gnas shing mi gang 'a bar mi 'gyur ba
32b6(dkon brtsegs): byin gyis 'drab tu gsol// de srid ces gsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor gyi khyams de'i ltar can gyis brtan bzhin du zha bdun du gnas shing ma snang bar mi 'gyur ba dbyin gyis 'am
32b7(dkon brtsegs): pa mang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas te gdan las bzhengs nas gshegs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jig las bzhengs nas chos bstan pa
32b8(dkon brtsegs): khye bzhugs sa// dge sdang dag dang / byang chub sem pa pa didag dang / wa dang / klu dang / gnad rgyun dang / dre ba dag kyang chom mnyan pa'i phyir btsam ldan 'as kyi bang nga // de nas rgyas
33a1(dkon brtsegs): pa 'das nga ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mag pos phyag 'tshal te ba
33a2(dkon brtsegs): ma gus pa dang bcas/ zhes dang bcas par rasam sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol
33a3(dkon brtsegs): ma ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' lam gang 'dzin gson byang chub kyi snying por mtsho bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi la mo bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
33a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis snyam mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bzang po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas pashad do// snyam mkhan babang pas bcom ldan 'a
33a5(dkon brtsegs): lagasol nas bcom ldan 'das la nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bzang po bzhi pa 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' lam par la zhugs na byang chub
33a6(dkon brtsegs): sbe par 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi la ma yin te/ bzhi gang nen/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sams mi 'dar ba dang / sems can yongs su mi gtong ba dang / 
33a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tshol ba la ngom sa mi shes pa nyid dang / ma pa'i chos yangs su bsrung ba'i phyir brtsod 'grus rtsom pas/ bzang po bzhi po dag ni byang chub sems dpa a gang na
33a8(dkon brtsegs): nga chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa yi
33b1(dkon brtsegs): / sngal pa gas pa yongs su dag pa dang / gnas yongs su dag pa dang / shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / skye ba yongs su dag paste/ ban po de dag yin no// bzang po bde pa 'di dag ni gang la
33b2(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gting mi dpogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos yin te/ bzhe ga zhen/ bsam gtan zlog pa dang / sems kyis rnam par 'byed pa dang / sems
33b3(dkon brtsegs): danams la snying rtsi ba dang / spabs pa dang / sa sna tshogs pa nyid / bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang ba bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'phags pa'i spyod pa yon te/ 'jig
33b4(dkon brtsegs): yod pa na gnas pa dang / 'du 'dzil mi dga' ba dang / den gnas na sems can rnams la byams pa dang / 'du byed rnams gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du yang mi 'gro bar shes pa ste ban po de dag yin no// 
33b5(dkon brtsegs): dab byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldanan sri nu che zheng gus pa la gnas pa shes brjod par byaste/ bzhig pa nan/ byang chub sems dpa' lus dang sreg la mi lta kha dang / sems
33b6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / ngaN+Dal dang / dregs pa stong pa dang / de 'a smras pa dbazhin du sgrub pa ste/ bsnyen dag yin/ dbang ba bung chu bsams dpa' chos pa zhi dang ldanan spyod lam byas mchog pa yin
33b7(dkon brtsegs): te/ bzhi gang zhe// dus shes pa dang / chod shes pa dang / rab tu dben pa dang / yang dag pa nyid de/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na
33b8(dkon brtsegs): bani gang ned/ 'gyod 'i kun das ldang ba rnam par gnon pa dang / mkhas pa dang shes rab chen po la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / thos pa'i do na sems pa dang / gzhan gyi nyes pa ma gleng zhing gleng ba ga
34a1(dkon brtsegs): yang byams pas slang gi skyon gtsang byed pa ma yin pa ste/ brda po dag yin no// bzang po byang chub sepas dpa' phan yin pan pa 'di dag mthong na thas pa tshol bar byed do// ba ni gang
34a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag dang gzhan gyi shes rab stod pa dang / phyogs bzhin sa lhaga' pa rnams kyi khritshom gcod pa dang / dam pa'i chos brten pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa zang mi shes pa ste/ bani bad
34a3(dkon brtsegs): yin no// bzang po bani po 'a ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mang du thos pa'i snying po len no// 'azhi gang zhe na/ thos nas chos bye brag tu shes pa 'di ni 'di'i zhing po yin no// thas nas bya 'am
34a4(dkon brtsegs): thos nas gzhan la smon par byed pa 'din 'di'i sring po lan mo// thos nas don de nyid rnam par thal pa 'di lta 'o/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
34a5(dkon brtsegs): la gtod par byed pa 'dini 'di'i sring pa yin te/ bzhi ba dadag yin no// bzang po bzhi pa 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' ches ston par dbyed pa'i phan yon yin te/ bzhi gang ne ne/ las byas nas kyang
34a6(dkon brtsegs): la yongs su spyod pa dang / chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / nang gsos dang / sman pong rnams rjod pa dang / gzhan gyi phyogs mthu chung bar byed pa dang / chos 'dod pa
34a7(dkon brtsegs): zhin 'brang zhing de dag gis bsungs pas bdud kyis glags mi rnyed pa ste/ bzang ba ba ni ba de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' chos ston par byed pa'i phan yon yon no// byang chub sems dpa' chos
34a8(dkon brtsegs): na dag la chos ston par byed cing 'di'i tshig gi lam gzung bar 'os par yang 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'dod pa chung ba dang / chog shes pa dang / ngang tshul bzang zhing mnyen pa dang / 2
34b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po dadag yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos pa ni dang ldan na shes kyi khe bal 'byol zhing zang zing med par chos ston pa yang yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'khor ba las
34b2(dkon brtsegs): paskyed pading / 'jig rten gyi bying dang 'du 'dzidzin du mi gnyer ba dang / phal rjes su srung ba dang / 'phags pa'i rigs la gnas pas/ ben po de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa'
34b3(dkon brtsegs): chos pa ni dang ldanan byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa tshar ba dang / byam pa la lan du can 'dags pa yin te/ bzhig shen/ gzhan byang chub yang dag par lan du 'jug pa dang / las byas pa chud mi gtsa pa
34b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dus byams pa sa na la ya byams / sa zung ma ga/ nabadu yin// ga ma bya ba mas ma da dun 'ams
34b5(dkon brtsegs): la ma sa shes me rnyed par 'a\u0f89\u0fa4 haM/ banag rtson/ 'azod pa'i skangs kyim gamagos pa dang / lan du ldan 'gas par ba reb ma pa dang /  can tsha dang pa dang / leg pa zugs
34b6(dkon brtsegs): / 9 na/ spyo na su tshas dang /  ma gas pa na mamams pa dang / ga byung smon pa na pa/ na pas
35a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / gang dag bstan na mi dge ba'i chos 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i chos rnams yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang
35a2(dkon brtsegs): / byang chub sems dpa' chos pa'i dang ldan nasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang phrad par 'gyur ro// mazhi ga den/ dran pa rtse gcig pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsngags pa
35a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dang yang du sgrogs pa dang / tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas smon lam 'debs pa ste/ bzhi bde dag yin no// bamang po byang chub sems dpa' phan yon bzhi po 'di dag mthong / 
35a4(dkon brtsegs): na de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya bar spro bar 'gyur te/ yon gnas mchog la mchod par 'gyur ba dang / bdag mthong nas sems can gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du mchod pa byed par 'gyur ba dang / 
35a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa legs par mchod na byang chub kyi sems brtan par 'gyur ba dang / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa mngon sum du mthong na dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs par 'gyur ba
35a6(dkon brtsegs): bzang po byang chub sems dpa sa phan son pa ni po dag mthong na de bzhin gshegs pa la mchor pa bya bang spro bar 'gyur ro// bzang po dbazhin du byang chub sems dpas don gyi dbang bani 'thong na
35a7(dkon brtsegs): bslab pa lhur len par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ ngan 'grelas yang dag par 'da' ba dang / bde 'gro 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la gus pa dang / sngon lam yongs su rdzogs pa
35a8(dkon brtsegs): ba ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dka ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa yin te/ bzhi ga zhe na/ byang chu
35b1(dkon brtsegs): da byan ma pamanyan pa ma mags/ nan da na chu ba sams dpa' rnams bya 'a srab sa sa dang/ 28 parang
35b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa yongs su dag pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhes bya ba ma yin pa mi spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid la mes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mi spong ba dang / lta ba bag la nyal dang / 
35b3(dkon brtsegs): bcas par yang dag par 'joms pa ste/ bzang po ban po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa yongs su dag pa yin no// bzang po bzhi tshe 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin
35b4(dkon brtsegs): / kyi rigs yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du 'dzimed pa dang / rab tu dben pa dang / sems kyi rnyog pa med pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar rton pa ste/ bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
35b5(dkon brtsegs): renge 'dzin gyi rigs yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa bskyes nas byang chub kyi sems mngon du byed pa dang / nang du yang dag
35b6(dkon brtsegs): / 'jog pa la sgrib pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgra dag la 'dris par byed pa dang / sa pa la mi 'jug pa ste/ bzang po ban po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor ba yin no/ 
35b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhi pa'adi dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul banin ma yin pa'i sems sgrub bzlog par bya ba yin te/ bani gang zhe na/ 'khor ba'i 'jigs pas skrag pa dang / rnal 'byor spyod pa dag lam mos pa dang
35b8(dkon brtsegs): dgongs pa dag la mi dga' ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mngon par 'du mi phye
36a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis 'ams pa sa pa bas pa yod / bzhi ga nin/ sems can ka 'a da kyi byer yang bskal pa phyi ma'i mthar thug par 'khor ba na mngar bar bya'o snyam pa
36a2(dkon brtsegs): smras sa pa la pa sa no// dag pa ma kyi da rnams shes pa don na sa N+Dan pa bya / shA
36a3(dkon brtsegs): mchog pa yid pa shes par bya ba'i phyir ches bstan par bya'o// snyam pa 'di ni sems kyis nges pa bsame pa gnyis bsngon no// bdag gis mi dge ba'i chos thams cad sbyangs shing dge ba'i rtsapo ma
36a4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan par byas nas byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug skye dung byed byung bam par byas nas blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar byar snyam pa 'di ni sems kyis
36a5(dkon brtsegs): nges par bsam pa gsum pa yin no// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams skad cig gis go bar byas te chos bstan par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni sems kyis nges par bsam pa bzhi pa yin te/ bzang
36a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems kyis nges par bsam pa yin no// babang po/ chos phan po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdu 'dul ba yin te/ bzhigang zhen// 
36a7(dkon brtsegs): chos pa snyam lta blang sa sor rtog pa dang / tshul bzhin du sbyong ba dang / chos thams cad 'arnam par mi rtog pa dang / mtshan ma thams cad la mo gnas pa ste/ bzang po tshos pon po dag ni 'dul ba na/ 
36a8(dkon brtsegs): bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don sems pa yin te/ 
36b1(dkon brtsegs): / nas rgyar mtshas gang yin panas na pa dang/ das pa med pa dang / byang chub ma chu nanas na/ yang ba chen pa dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi na sems pa yin no// babang po byang chub sems dpa'achos
36b2(dkon brtsegs): da 'dun mas rnapas mi gtong ba yin te/  sngon gyi do ma me do ba dang / yongasas smrab pa bdag smras dang gron pa mem pa dang / bsnga na so pos snang ba ste/ bani po dngag min
36b3(dkon brtsegs): bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su smin par byed pa yin te/ bzhi gang she na/ bajig rten gyi bang cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba dang / yongs su smin pa la chos ston pa yongs su
36b4(dkon brtsegs): gtong ba dang / dus du su sprul pas dran par byed pa yongs su gtong ba dang / bdag nyid kyi bde ba spangs nas gzhan gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ston pa dang / yongs su smin par byed pa ste/ bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sem/ 
36b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi yongs su sbyin par byed pa yin no// babang ba byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na ma bsdus pa sdud par byed pa la ma 'jigs pa yin te/ brdeg she na/ dge ba'i rtsa bachung ngul yang mos pad+ma/ 
36b6(dkon brtsegs): tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzhan gyi don byed par spro ba dang / sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / nges pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa thams cad la don du gnyer ba med pa ste/ bzhi
36b7(dkon brtsegs): dadag yin no// bang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bani dang ldan na sems can gyi spyod pa la 'jug pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mngon par shes pa thob pa dang / ye shes thob pa dang / ting nge 'dzin chen por gyur ba tshad
36b8(dkon brtsegs): mdapal 'jug pa dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchol dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid sgomade rnam par grol ba dag ma 'dres pa ste/ la pa dag yin no// babang po byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di dang ldanan thabs lam
37a1(dkon brtsegs): payin pa ga par bya'o/ na / sems paskyed pa thams cad 'byang chub kyi sems ldan du grongs/ bar mangs pa'i sems la yang dag 'a
37a2(dkon brtsegs): sa pa dang / sems can thams cad chas kyi snod nyid ya na pa dang / ngo bo nyid dang par khong nga chud pathams cad phog pa nyid du nges pa yin par lta ba dang / rnam par grol ba 'dad pas
37a3(dkon brtsegs): yas par 'dzag pa thams cad la mngon par zhan pa med pa' 'du shes sto par byed pa rje/ byang chub sems dpa' tshas ban po de dag dang ldanan thabs la mkhas pa yin par reg par bya'o// bzang po
37a4(dkon brtsegs): po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa skom pa yar te/ ngan na/ bdag gis sems can thams cad bsgrub par bya'o snyam du byams pa sgom pa dang / bdag gis
37a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bsgral bar bya'o snyam du byams pa sgom pa dang / bdag gis sems can thams cad bsas par bya'o snyam du byams pa sgom pa dang / bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su ma ngan
37a6(dkon brtsegs): larba bzla'o snyam du thams pa rlom pa s+ho/ babang po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams khyams pa com pa yin no// pobang po can pa 'a da ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje yin
37a7(dkon brtsegs): zhig pa de na/ ngan seng du skyes pa rnams bde 'gro'i lam la 'god pa'i snying rje dang / sdig pa'i las dang ldan pa rnams dge ba'i chos la sbyor ba'i snying rje dang / thag pa dman pa la mos pa rnams thag
37a8(dkon brtsegs): chen po yang dag par len du 'jug pa'i snying rje dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla' snyam pa'i snying rje ni bzhi pa yin te/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa'
37b1(dkon brtsegs): rjes pan dang ldanan mngon par shes pa'athob par 'gyur// bzhig zhen/ lus dang sems yang 'dang / skam rang bzhin du rnam par 'byed pa dang / sems can thams cad la gus pa dang / ma
37b2(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed pa dang / ni gnas la rtse gcig tu gyur pas rnam par ga zeng ba med pa yin no// bzang ba byang chub sems dpa' ches bzhi dang ldan na so so yang dag par rig pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ bzhig
37b3(dkon brtsegs): zhen/ don la rton pa yin gyi chog 'bru la ma rton pa dang / chos la rton pa yin gyi gang bgal mngon pa dang / chos thams cad bdag med pa'i nges pa'i tshig dang / yi ge ma zadapang shes nas chags pa med cing rdzag
37b4(dkon brtsegs): pa med par ston pas ston par byed pa ste bzhi po de dag yin no// babang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhidang ldanan gzungs 'thob par 'gyur te/ bani ga nan/ mang du thos pas ngoms mi shes pa dang / 
37b5(dkon brtsegs): mang du thos pa rnams la tshas bzhin du gum par bsnyen 'gur byed pa dang / rtag tu gzhan dag pa chos ston par badzin pa dang / tshig dang pe ga thams cad gtan la dba' pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas
37b6(dkon brtsegs): dgongos te gsungs pa la 'jug pa yin no// bzang pa byang chub sems dpa' chos brgya dang ldan na pa song ba 'thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi ga zhe na/ mos pa dang / phyir mo ldog pa dang / tshogs pang
37b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mi skyo ba ste/ bzhi po dag yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bani dang ldanan spobs pa dag pa 'thob par 'gyu te/ bzhig shen/ chos smrab gzhan dag gis bshad pa dang
37b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gal bar mi byed pa dang / chos smrab la gas pa dang bcas shing seMs dang bcas par chos nyan pa dang / bos pas 'angs pa med pa dang / thos panyung ngu rnams la'i rnas par mi byed pa ste bam
38a1(dkon brtsegs): yin no// 'arab lan po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyang ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'dod chags dang / 
38a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / rang sangs rgyas las sbyar ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos la 'du shes pa spar ba ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po chos bzhi pa 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams padon pa
38a3(dkon brtsegs): sbyin te/ brdeg pa ni/ rten ci 'brel pa 'byung bar rdzoms pa dang / dgos pa rtogs par byed pa dang / bdag gong na nyi rtogs par byud pa dang / na tu byung
38a4(dkon brtsegs): du chos de dag thams cad don gcig par rtogs par byed pa ste/ bzhi pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don zab mo stsos yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bani dang ldan
38a5(dkon brtsegs): 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'di ga rten/ tshul khrimapa dang bsgrub pa langs su dag pa dang / las kyi sding sa rnam par sbyong ba dang / g.yo snya mad pa dang / dge ba'i
38a6(dkon brtsegs): la sems dbang byed pa ste/ bzhi 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sden lam 'grub par 'gyur ba'o// babang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldanan
38a7(dkon brtsegs): dpathamagaca kyis 'phags shing phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can du 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas pha rol tu phyin pa gcig gnang du pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan tham
38a8(dkon brtsegs): ngas khyed pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas sems cad gcig gi rang bzhin rtogs pas de las gzhan pa'i sems can thams cad kyang shes pa dang / 
38b1(dkon brtsegs): brnan pas tshas rnam par dag pa gcig gi tshul rtags pas chos gzhan dag gi rnam par dag pa yang shes pa dang / chos nyid len pas sangs rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas gcig tu mos pa ste/ ba rang
38b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi sang pakas shing phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa sgrub pa 'di bshad pa na sgyu ma ma
38b3(dkon brtsegs): nga po mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob nas tshim zhing mgul yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde bar gyur nas dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga'i ba de nyid rjes shing ta la bdun
38b4(dkon brtsegs): de tsam gyi snying gi nam mkha' la 'phags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'jul pa mdzad do// 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i nal gyi sgo nas 'od zer grangs med dpag tu med pa bkye bas
38b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi shing thams cad 'od zer nges khyab par byas nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te chos gos phras
38b6(dkon brtsegs): ba gcig tu bgos nas pus mo galas pa'i lhangs la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba tunabacom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
38b7(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni rgya ma mchis pa dang / rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ 
38b8(dkon brtsegs): la to// ye shes 'byung gnas gzi brjid gzhal las shes rab grags
39a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig tan gsum du lan tan pa ro la phyin pa rnyes grags// rgyal bar bla gu shed du 'jam bstan pa/ ma yi dbang pos de ni bdag la bka' stsal gsal// phyogs rnams na
39a2(dkon brtsegs): bang sems can dri skad gnas// de dag kun rdzas mas kyi spyod pa rnams dang ni// dman chog dpa dzI par btu ldan mkhyen// ji skad 'dzum pa ra dad pa dag la bltar du 2/ lda
39a3(dkon brtsegs): gas dab gni ga lags dang // ma ma cing mi dang brgya shin lha min dang // mnga' phreng na gyi tshangs pa'i ska dang smrigazhan rnams// sangs rgyas rdul bral gsung sgra'i char ya dag ba tsu/ 
39a4(dkon brtsegs): brgya byin 'od dang tshangs pa'i 'od rnams ji snyed pa/ ji ltar sangs rgyas 'od kyis khyab par gang bltar// 'od rnams de dag thams cad dam bdags la ma lags
39a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas sring de bab mo'i mos ni rjes su tho'i// stong pa bdag med sems can gang bag med mkhyen nas// yod dang med pa'i mtha' gnyis rnam par spangs nas su// dus gsum muk+Sha 'dra bar rab tu mkhyen pa'o// 
39a6(dkon brtsegs): deng 'dir ru zhig theg pa'i mchog la sems btud de// su ni ga sangs rgyas rigs dang chos kyi rags la gnas// su zhi ga dkon mchog gsum po rgya cher skyed par bgyid// gang gi ched du la dzum pa mdzangs/ 
39a7(dkon brtsegs): legs par gsungs// gal te dz+wa la ba nyan thos rnams la don ldan gsung //  tshe bdag shags 'dzum pazhabs kyi bris mo drug/ gal ta rkyen kyi zag pa gsung na grag par nug// la nyim rgyas
39a8(dkon brtsegs): gsung da mo spyi bor nug/ ji ltar byed kyis 'od zer 'bum snyed rab btang ba// bang bar gshegs kyigatsug tu nub par gyur lags na// phan ma dang lha yi lha ste phan pa ma ngad pa po// 'di ni sangs rgyal rdzog pa
39b1(dkon brtsegs): nga ston dgos ma mchis// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' po la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis rigs kyi du ba rang po mdzong dzag/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthang lags sa/ 
39b2(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ kun dka' bo rags kyi bu bzang de 'di ni bskal pa buM na nyis stongan pazhal legs par sprul pal 'dzig rten mas bkod chen po bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i langs
39b3(dkon brtsegs): sa pa garten du byung ba la / seMn ga po bzhin gshegs pa shA com pa la dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po 'dzig rten gyi
39b4(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa chen po de ni 'byor par 'gyur/ rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / nyams dka' ba dang / mi dang skye bo mang pos gang bar 'gyur zhing lag mthil lar mnyam pa dang / ka tsa yi ni da ltar reg na 'jas
39b5(dkon brtsegs): padang / ma nye ge shing ston pas brgyan pa dang / mi tshogs smo pa dang / ma tshogs sa sa mi gas / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan snang ba
39b6(dkon brtsegs): theg pa chen pol 'a dag pa zhugs pa gtsug tu 'gyur ro// kun dgang bo bzhin gshegs pa nas par 'phrum pa'i rgyamatho ma che na mazong gyur ro// ngas su myong nalas 'das
40a1(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang dam pa'i chos lo bya bar gnas par 'gyur // kun dga' bo gang gi med bani gshags pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal ba yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bda'i tsheyang byang chub sems dpa'
40a2(dkon brtsegs): sgra rnam par grags pa 'di'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi khyab bdag ces bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'byung ngo // zhes byang chub sems dpal
40a3(dkon brtsegs): ra par grags pa lung bstan nas yongasasu mya ngan las 'da'o// de nas rigs kyi bu bzang po par snang de byas pabs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la la
40a4(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dang slan chad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba 'bum phrag du ma dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs
40a5(dkon brtsegs): che'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid gang gis de bzhin nyid las spang ma log pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / dbyer ma mchis pa'i 'di bzhin nyid dang/ mtshang ba ma mchis pa'i de bzhin
40a6(dkon brtsegs): dung rnam par rtog pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / skyab ma mchis pa 'i de bzhin nyid dang mngon par 'dub kyi bam mchis pa'i de ba ni nyi srin nyid gsung ba bzhin du bdag kyang nga slad mchi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos
40a7(dkon brtsegs): gas kyi bu bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so// bzang po sprod de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid rdzas su thob pas cin khyod ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa bzhin nyid gsung pa sar byed de gad ste/ b.rang mes smras pa
40a8(dkon brtsegs): dag sa thams sa ca zhinag shegs sa chos nyid kyi pa yid //  bye // kun dgam da pa badzin gnas pas da ni da kyang med da thugs su rjod / de bzhin
40b1(dkon brtsegs): dbyer med pa gang yin pa dang kho ba yang chud cang ji ltar kho ba chung pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang chud la/ ji ltar sems can thams cad chud pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang chud pa'i
40b2(dkon brtsegs): pa / na drug ba dri bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid ni gnyis kyis rib tu bye ba ma yin no// btsun bu kun dga' bo gnyis su dang ni gang na kun du shes pa med pa nyid dang / yongs su zhus
40b3(dkon brtsegs): dang//  kyi'i dir zhen/ 'du shes yongs su shes pa'i shes pa nis sa rgyas te sa ga pa yin pa'i // dre su man sa ra du ldan pa lan dag pa na cesag
40b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das rigs kyi bu bzang po ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten mag rmongs par babyed pa ste/ sngon la sgyumatshochos nyid kyis mag mongs par bgyis so// dri yang shes rab dang / ye shes kyis ma mangs
40b5(dkon brtsegs): ljid do// de ci'i slad du na na/ 'di'i shes rab dang / ye shes kyi spabyas pa ni de lta gu lags pa'i skad du'o// de nis bcom ldan 'das kyis snam mya khan bzang po 'di skad ces dka' stsal to// babang po khyod lha dang
40b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'jig rten mag rmongs par byed pa bden napa/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltang mag thongs par mdad pa de bzhin du bdag tu ga rmongs par bgyid lags so// de ci'i slad dukun/ bcom ldan 'das
40b7(dkon brtsegs): ste bdag med pa nyid kyis sems can du thaskad btags che chos ston pa dang / srog med pa dang / gang dag med pa nyid kyis gang bag tu chos ston pa 'di ni pagamongs par brjid pa chen po lags pa'i slad du'o// de pe'i nag
40b8(dkon brtsegs): pas ni byang chub kyi snying pe la bzhugs na mtshas 'ga' yang 'chi 'joba'am/ 'gro ba'am/ skyab ma gzigs mang kyi/ 'chi 'a bo ba dang / 'gro ba dang / skye ba'i chos ston par sa mang dade/ bcom ldan das desal
41a1(dkon brtsegs): las de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par gsang ba bka la sa nga bcas pa'i yul ga su chags/ danam bcom ldan 'das kyis gas mthun
41a2(dkon brtsegs): gas sogs pa khye/  bye lags su lags sa ma na zhin 'ag na da/ tha
41a3(dkon brtsegs): gang thug sang pa nyid kyis gang bag tu chos sngon pa 'di ni mag mongs pa chen po yin no// de bzhin gshegs pas ni byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs nas chos 'ga' yang 'che ba ba'am/ 'grub 'am/ 
41a4(dkon brtsegs): sa yod ci/ 'chi ma das pa bdan skye 'i chos ston pa sa mad da/ 'di yongs su mya ngan las 'ad pa'ang/ yongs su su na mas bzla' na byer chos ston pa'i chos ni 'gra' yang me // dan
41a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das yarab tu 'byung bar gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pad kyis rigs kyi bu babang por bgasung sheg/ de nas byams pas rigs kyi
41a6(dkon brtsegs): brten pa gas s+ho//  ng+gA rdzogs pa sa mags ma na das pa de da nasags/ nalas kyang chubasems pa mas ga pa/ gas dag
41a7(dkon brtsegs): byung ba mi migs so// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhigamatshan mnyams cad la mas pa rnamachis pa sems can sangs su sbyin par bkyi ba'i slad du mas gsu na
41b1(dkon brtsegs): man pa nga sa mas las yas ma/ na ldan das panas na can tu ngasanas/ maldan nanas pas ma gas pa
41b2(dkon brtsegs): gsung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkar stsal pa/ sgyum mkhan pabang po lung bstad pa zhes bya drung shig/ rim kyis byang chub yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya bar yang rung zhig/ kun dga' ba byang chub sems dang
41b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs de lte bar 'dod padang / sems can rnams sa sangs rgyas kyi ma da ba bya ba 'ad pa gyen ma grangs das rlung bar bya brgya pa byu bklag par bya gzhan dag la lang bstan par bya'o// detsa
41b4(dkon brtsegs): na/ kun dga' nga gang gis 'di bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / bklag pa dang / gzhan dgal yang rab tu bstan pa des ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba yin/ des ni sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yang
41b5(dkon brtsegs): sa pa yin no// kun dga' bdi lta ba ldan khyod kyis skye 'o mang pol bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying la ba dang / 'di lta ste/ sgra dang myi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig/ chongs
41b6(dkon brtsegs): shig/ rdzogs shig/ kun chub par rdzis shig/ kun dga' ba chos gang dag gis byang chub yang dag par 'byung ba dang / theg chen po 'di yang yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag ni rig pa chen po 'di las yang dag par
41b7(dkon brtsegs): /  ngos rdza sa cu pa shes pa sa gyi'o//  sa 'o//  rnaMs ni ma byas sa / lus pa
41b8(dkon brtsegs): na ga shegs pa 'ad pa yinan gag gis na ma de zhin nyid du la ma da pa/ nas pamam ldan namal sa kyi ba pa na mig sa / bcom ldan 'das chos mi ma 'a / 
42a1(dkon brtsegs): ma 'anas kyi shes/  nas sa na na da kyi mngon pa
42a2(dkon brtsegs): na/  ldanas ma ga la nas/ the pa su na gyu da na nga du
42a3(dkon brtsegs): 'de rten lengs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gdunas pa la mngoni par bstod // 'phags pa dkon mchog rtsegs chen po'i chos rnam grangs le nga drug brgya masarnamamaman pa nga po lung bcan
42a4(dkon brtsegs): gyu ste/ le ru na bun gcig sardzogs so// ga kye na mdzin pa nang / zang 'a dang / nachen gyi la drub brele shes sde la sogs pas 'gyur ze nas te gtan ga pab sa// kha shes pa non chog

42a7(dkon brtsegs): dbyas kyis kyi kun dag ban/ dge slong steng nyis brgya lnga cu'i dge slong gi da ke dun chen po dang / byang chub sams dpa' bad yod gas ga gas so// de na sa lha'i tshan zhes bya la
42a8(dkon brtsegs): dus so// 'jam dpal gzhon dur gyur ba ya bad de nyid du 'dus par gyur 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das paka'i bu dpon gyis 'di gad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de na gshegs
42b1(dkon brtsegs): zhes sams can rnams 'dul bar mang/ lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' phul pa/ lha'i thu ne tshe 'phrul rnam pa gsus gyis sems can rnams 'dul ba byed do// gsum sa na// 'di saste/ dun pa
42b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can mas ca kyi sems kyi spyo sa ldan cing gtsigs pa dang / dkon mchog gsum po rnams pa mad da parnams dpar mdad pa dang / las kyi rnam pa rten pal 'ad ga mkhyen pa dang / de zhin gshegs pa
42b3(dkon brtsegs): gags dang byung ban nyes pa smra naso sa/ da ya ca snrubang zur na gan len du zla rtseg dum yino//  kun pa mang me gang sngon
42b4(dkon brtsegs): bya dag par byangs pa'i rgyus ngan po rnams las pa nas smrang yi ga tu skye bar gyung / yig pa shes sa byung ba na bal na sa mag sa/  na ma chen pa na sa
42b5(dkon brtsegs): gyu ba gyur padang / de na / ga yang ba nga / sa padzin gi sa pa pa lta gyung das sa sa ngas
42b6(dkon brtsegs): nga shi mnyis pa byed par zu dag mas de bzhin ga shegs pas tumakhyen to// sbyin nas kya ni / na bzhin na kun na'o// nes 'on shin dam na rlod pa ma yang
42b7(dkon brtsegs): dgepa'i rnabaya da par grangs pa'i sa 'do sems rnams su skye ba bzung ba dang // rgya gyi ma nga / gzu sa med pa kyi che gyi rgya tsho ga sang sa byeb khyor di zhin ga shegs
43a1(dkon brtsegs): mkhyenaH// thegapa gang gis nges par 'byung bar gyur ba dang / ji snyed cig gis nges par brang bu kur ba dang / nga lta 'ang sangs rgyas pam ldan 'ad
43a2(dkon brtsegs): mnyes par byad pa 'gyur ba dadag thams sa kyi de bzhin ga gags sunanas kyi na bzhin da ci ston pa nga nga/ dag pa lam mi
43a3(dkon brtsegs): ba ma sa/ ma tshugags/ kun sems bskyed pa ga sa da nganapa shenas bya kun drod pa'i tshe phrul ldan mo// del de bzhin gshegs rnams byas na
43a4(dkon brtsegs): napa'o//  ni bsnyen par byabya'o// 'di ni bstan par bya ba ma yin pa'o//  mi 'o//  na

43a6(dkon brtsegs): 'an cigs chen po yongs su rdzogs par kur ba'o// gis rjes du ston pa gang yin pa ste/ de dag ji skang bstan pa bzhin du bsgrubs na gnas gang yin pa dengs su 'thob par m+bI tu dpe'i gnas
43a7(dkon brtsegs): yi /  ni gnas med do// las 'di me da par blang sa nanasams can dmyab rnams su'i par byed do// la pa 'di pa ga per ldang zhin du 'gro phyag das rnams su gyi / 
43b1(dkon brtsegs): drangs na ni gshin rdo rje 'jigarten rnams su srid byed do// las 'dis dag par blang san ni rnams su ni bang byed do// las 'dasang dag par blangs nani chernams su med par byed do// des gang dgam
43b2(dkon brtsegs): la 'a gyus gru /  rnams sa gyis mas rgyunas ba / ma
43b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba'i sems can rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pas pa ma pa rnams la rdu phrul 'phrul phun tumun par mdzad/ si~Mm+b+ha / cig tu gyur nas de mer 'gyur // dum dgyur nas ka
43b4(dkon brtsegs): gA cing me ldang ba ya zung mo// mig yu la yang dag 'tsha'o//  yang ga grol pa mi tshogs pa da/  la byung du 'byung ba dkyi thul gyi na
43b5(dkon brtsegs): rten kyi du la ldas ces pang gyur ro//  gsu da chen pa 'dzi rten gyi ma sa nas ra ra dod kyi sems can 'as su ldan par bya ba'i byed 'phrul gyi rnam pa 'i rgya byed da
44a1(dkon brtsegs): dadapas sul pa byung bdad /  ba sernam mngon pa par byed do// da ban gagags mdu yus kyitsho rdza yi no//  tsho rdzu gsus pa/ 
44a2(dkon brtsegs): sem rnams la pa shA /  sol sa sa/ batsham ldan nam tsha byu da pa zhin gyi ma
44a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems da rkyen 'arnams mad thob pa u shA dang/  phyogs kyang shin tsho sa bang byung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub di la badz+ra ni ring duganas par 'byor ba'i cha la
44a4(dkon brtsegs): spyan 'gas bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs la khyod spobs pa ky-i sa 'i/ de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhan nu gyur bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga shegs pa ni bzhid na
44a5(dkon brtsegs): gsum mi stong chen po'i jig rten gyi ma kyi mtshoche po ba 'i nga pog lags pa de thams cad byed gi phyo la ci ci kyi sems can rnamasal yang san pa shA te/ bcom ldan 'ame pani
44a6(dkon brtsegs): shegs pa la nI tshe 'phrul 'dim nga lags so// yang 'di ni cho 'phrul dam pa lags te/ gang bzhin ga shags pas brjod du ma mchis ba dang / yi gas mchis pa dang / bskad du ma mchis pa dang / skyeb ma mchis pa dang / 'byung
44a7(dkon brtsegs): sa pa dang / ming mamachis padas mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / snga ma mchis pa dang / dbyangs ma mchis pa dang / tshig gi lam mamachis pa dang /  mtshan ma mchis pa dang / mtshan nyidam mchis pa dang / spyod pas
44b1(dkon brtsegs): khris pa dang / ba ma mchis pa dang / kun tu 'thung 'am mchis pa dang / rnam par rig pa ma mchis pa dang / 'dus ma bgyes pa dang / sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang bral ba dang / tha skad thams cad yang dag par
44b2(dkon brtsegs): byung ba dag zab dang /  nga/ ba padapa s+ho/  sum lags pam chos ma bang rdzogs pangs sa ldanas ga / de she pa 'dadapa pa
44b3(dkon brtsegs): ya dang dag gis chos de dag gzhan dka' rnam par res par mdzad pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe 'phrul chen po lags so// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis de'i gting brtogs shing / dmigs pa dang / mtshan ma dang /
