44b6(dkon brtsegs): der de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe phrul ldan lags so// ridzin mo 'phru yin po dam pa lags te/ gang de bzhin gshegs pas brjod du ma mchis pa dang / yog ma mchis pa dang / bskad du ma mchis pa dang / mi
44b7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma mchis pa dag/ de ba zhi myung te/ sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa da bral ba dang / bska mas cad ya dag pa ca pa dang / ga dag/ byang bdang / tha da/ 'ang ba da 'ab
45a1(dkon brtsegs): tham mchis pa dang / rtog ga'i ga yul ma lags pa'i bar chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas pa ga nga/ ram 'i tshig pa bad da na/ 
45a2(dkon brtsegs): kes chos de bsan dad yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe 'phrul chen po lags so// bcom ldan 'dus gzhan yang gang dbang bzhin gshegs pa'i bla dang ldan pa'i tshe 'dul dag thams cad ni mtshan ma'ang
45a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dod bcas pa'i sems can rnams kun nas 'dren par mdad pa lags sa// 'de ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i mo 'gru na pa legs te/ 'dis ste/ de ma mchis pal bdag tu bsad 'gas pa pa
45a4(dkon brtsegs): can la mchis pa la sems can du tha skad 'dogs pa dang / srog ma mchis pa la srog tu ba smad 'dags pa dang / gso' ma mchis pa lags par baspyad 'dags pa dang / gang bag ma mchis pa la gang bag tu bskad
45a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dogs pa dang / shed las skyes mi mchis pal shid las skyesu tha skad 'dogs pa dang / shid bu ma mchis pa la shed bur ba skad 'dogs pa dang / ming ma mchis pa la ming du ba snyad 'don sa pa dang / gzugs ma mtshas
45a6(dkon brtsegs): zugs su ba rnyas rtogs pa dang / tshor 'bam ches pa 'tshar bar bsna dgas pa dang / 'dugs mchis dus 'dugasmras 'gas pa dang / 'a byed rnams mamachis ra byu rnams su/ 
45a7(dkon brtsegs): sang 'dogs pa dang / rnam par shes pas mchis pa la rnam par shes par tha ska 'dags pa dang / phung po ma mi ches pa la phung po ba snyed 'dogs pa dang / 'ams ma mchis pa la khams su tha skad 'dogs po dang / skye mtshad
45a8(dkon brtsegs): tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / mig stong mas bgyi bar tha skad 'dogs kyang mig ni 'di snyam du bdag stong ngo // snyam du mi sems pa dang / gzugs stong zhes brgya bar tha snyad 'dogs kyang ga ca
45b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di snyam du bdag stong ngo snyam du mi sems pa dang / mig ge rnam par shes pa stong zhes bkye bar tha skad 'dogs kyang mig ge rnam par shes pa 'di snyam du bdag stong ngo snyam du mi sems pa dang / de bzhin du rna ba dang / sprang
45b2(dkon brtsegs): 'i rnam ra shes pa dang / skye sa sa/ ste rnam par shes pa dang / spya ba swA/ rnam pa gas pa dang / zhus pa de b+ha ba kyis rje pa shes pa dang/ 'ad sa
45b3(dkon brtsegs): ni ma du ma mas mas dag tshamasas gas kyi sa gas cang rgyas rnam ni sem su /  kyi sems da/ y-i 'i ma la gas sa
45b4(dkon brtsegs): rabasad 'gas kyi yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni 'di snyam du bdag slong snyam du mi sems te/ 'di ltang bams po dang / sems pa mchis pa dang / dngos chom mchis pa dang / ming mamachis pa dang / mtshan mas
45b5(dkon brtsegs): chis pa'i chos 'dis bu de dag sems can gzhan dpa gsags cang dga'i ya das lar go ba ma pa gang lags pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'cho sngal chen po lags te/ cho 'phru la de mi gang ldan pa
45b6(dkon brtsegs): ma lags/ gzugs dang ldan pa 'ang ma lags mig gi rnam par gas pa dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ nabang ldan pa yangs lags/ snyi ldan pa yang ma ga/ nA ba'i rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa yang ma lags
45b7(dkon brtsegs): / dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ dring ldan pa yang ma lags/ snga'i rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ snyed ldan pa yang ma lags/ ridang ldan pa yang ma lags/ lce'i rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa yang ma lags
45b8(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ reg byedang ldan pa yang ma lags/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa lang ma lags/ yi dang ldan pa yang ma la ges/ chos rnams dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ yid kyi rnam par shes
46a1(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa yang ma lags te/ de lta bu'i mo 'phrul de ni yul ma mchis pa'i tsho 'gyur lags so// de ni yul dang bral ba'i tshu 'phrul lags te/ tshe phrul dani lus dang ldan pa
46a2(dkon brtsegs): 'am lags/ sems dang / yid dang/ rnam par shes bya dang ldan pa blta bam lags te/ de'i slad du tshu 'phrul de ni 'a ga rten thams cad slob ches par 'gyur ba lags po// de ci'i brang dunam
46a3(dkon brtsegs): ten zhes bgyi ba ni phung po lnga po dag lags te/ phung po lnga pa mi rtag pa de la byis pa rnams mngon par zhen cing / de dag gis phung po lnga po dag rtag par bzung ba'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du cho 'phrul de ni 'jig
46a4(dkon brtsegs): cad klob mi ches par 'gyur ba lags sa// 'jig rten ni phung po lnga po dag rtag rjes 'akye bar blo ba ches pas na de dag mi rtag sags shad na 'jig rten thams cad klob tshoches lags so// 'jig rten ni phung
46a5(dkon brtsegs): dga' shes pakyi bar slom ches pas na dgasug bsngal lo nas pa gang na 'jig rten pams cad slo kyis lags so// 'di rten ba dag padag ces gyi bar rlobacas pa na ga dag mamatsham
46a6(dkon brtsegs): sha na 'jig rten thams cad slob mi che lags so// 'jig rten ni phung po lnga po dag sdug ces bgyi bar grob ches pa san dag me sdug go zhes bshad na 'jig rten thams cad slob mi ches lags so// 'jig rten na
46a7(dkon brtsegs): lnga po dag bdag gagis bgyi bar slob ches pas na de dag bdag po ma mchis so zhes pa gad ni 'dreg rten thams cad grob mi ches lags so// 'jig rten ni phung ba lnga po dag yang dag zhes pakyi bar klob ches papa de ga
46a8(dkon brtsegs): ma lagalas zhes pa gdan 'jig rten thams cad slob mtshas lags te/ dpe slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe 'phrul de ni 'jig rten thams cad
46b1(dkon brtsegs): bang mi 'gyur 'gas te/ cho 'dul de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa chags so// tshe 'phrul da mig tu bgrang grags/ gzugs su grang ma lags// cho phrul dri ni migs gzugs kyi yul las yang dag pa
46b2(dkon brtsegs): lags so// khyo rdul nin par grang ba rgya gags/ skang yang 'amags te/ tsha'adra ladonan pa dang su'i tshul ldas pa dab dam lags so/  na du k+sha te/ tshe phrul ni yi du yang pa lags/ chos du
46b3(dkon brtsegs): tshe 'phrul de ni yid dang chos kyi yul las yang dag par 'angs pa lags so// tsha 'phrul de ni shes pa'i spyod yul ma lags/ rangs par brjid pa ma logs/ tsha 'phrul de ni rnam par rig par bgyi 'am lags sa
46b4(dkon brtsegs): nga ba nyid ni brjod mamachis pa lags na stong ba nyid rjod pa de ni tshe 'phrul lags so// mtshan ma ma mchis pa ni 'arjod du ma mchis pa lags namatshan mamachis pa rjorjod na 'phrul lags so// smon pam mchis pa nis
46b5(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa lagasan smon pa ma mchis pa brjod pa den myo 'phrul lags so// mngon par 'du kyi 'ang mchis ni rjod du ma mches pa lags na mngon par 'du kyi 'amamachis pa 'arjod di
46b6(dkon brtsegs): ni rjod dum mchis nga la gsan skye ba ma mchis pa brjod pa don no 'phrul lags so// 'byung ba ma mchis pani 'arjod du ma mchis pa lags na 'byung bam mchis brjod pa na cho 'phrul lags so// nga ma ngom mchi mngon
46b7(dkon brtsegs): mamachis pi lags na dngos po ma mchis brjod pa den no 'phrul lags so// mtshan nyid ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na mtshan nyid ma mchis brjod pa de ni che 'phrul lags so// 'gag pam mchis 'di 'arjod dumam
46b8(dkon brtsegs): cho 'phrul legs so// myang nams 'das pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na mya ngan las 'das parjo gyi 'phrul lags so// 'di lta ste/ bdag tu dmigs pa mamatsha
47a1(dkon brtsegs): sems kun tu 'khru ba ma mchim pa dang / byang chub la rlom semasamamachis pa'i 'kho gsum yongs sunapa bsnyen pa de ni cho gas lags so// 'di ltan/ lu
47a2(dkon brtsegs): mamatshal pa gsas yongs su ga la rgya na yulal /  mas
47a3(dkon brtsegs): lus da sems rnam par matog pa'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i ba 'dod dani tshe 'phrul lags so/ 'di lta la/ byang ba ma mchis pa dang / dang ba ma mchis pa dang / gnas pa ma mchis pa'i 'khor
47a4(dkon brtsegs): debartson 'grus de ni cho 'phrul lags so// 'di lta ste/ na nye bar ni ba dang / phyi rol tu chub ma mchis pa dang / sems bsags pa ma mchis pa'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan ni cho rdul lan
47a5(dkon brtsegs): yin pa rnam par spangs pa dang / nga yir 'dren pa par bdang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cid dang bral pa'i 'bar gsum yongs su dag 'i shes dbaden cha 'phrul lags sa/ chos thams cad ni rnam par bral
47a6(dkon brtsegs): dede na dang bral bar ba shad pani tshing rdul lags so// chos rnams cad ni dngos po ma mchis pa lagasan gong po bral ya ba ga ci 'dul legs so/ chos thams cad ni mchis
47a7(dkon brtsegs): 9/ bshAng pa co 'gas so// chos tham ldan ni 'ong bamamams pa dang / k+kol ma mchis pa lagasun 'a
47b1(dkon brtsegs): pag can po tshul dgasams par sa thams cad rnam par dag bgad pani tsho 'phrul lags so// sangs rgyas thams cad na mangs rgya gcas
47b2(dkon brtsegs): dasangs rgyas dpag tu la mchis pa ba shad pa ni tshe 'phrul lags sa// zhing thams cad dashing gcig pa lags pa zhing snga chags bshad pa ni tshe 'phrul lags so// sems can thams cad ni sems can ga she / 
47b3(dkon brtsegs): ma can ci rtso tshul lags // tshi ma chos ga pa gas na ma ma tshig dases gnan kyi gas go chom sa rnam pa rnangs pa sa
47b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par bsgrubs pa'i mtshan nyid pa shad pa ni tshe 'khyus lags so// chos thams cad ni rnam par rig pa ma mchis pa lags na gzhan la rnam par rig par bshad panaco 'phrul lags so// de nas lha'i badred yo
47b5(dkon brtsegs): la la zhon du gyu pa 'dim sa sa masas sapas dzis de gams yin/  kyi sbyis
47b6(dkon brtsegs): // des sa rjod la nga ga / A rgyad sa kyi po med ya
48a1(dkon brtsegs): bus smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra ta'i du chos thams cad ni 'phob med pa yin na de la dge dang med ge ba'i chos 'phob gang yin pa den cha 'bru
48a2(dkon brtsegs): las mngon par 'du bya ba gang gis kho bo lha rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ bdag nyid chen po 'di yang thob pa'i dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba gang yin pa ni sems par mi byed cing rnam par shes par mi byed do// da/ 
48a3(dkon brtsegs): 'asan sems can thams cad kyi 'chi'ab dang skye ba yang sems par mi byed cing rnam pa shes par ma byed de/ sems par mabyed ceng rnam par shes par mi byed pa gang len pa don tshe 'phrul chen po yin te/ bcom ldan
48a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis ji skad du las rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab po// klu rnams kyi klu'i yul yang bsam gyis me khyab 'o/ bsam gtan 'a rnams kyi samapa/  bye la yangs rgyas me bya sa
48a5(dkon brtsegs): sa bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul yang bsam gyis mi khyab thogs gsungs pa lta bu ste/ drasgribs ma chos thams cad ni bsam gyis mi khyal pa ste/ bsam gyis mi khyang pa gang yin pa de ni cho 'phrul chen po
48a6(dkon brtsegs): nga gnas ba sh+tha ti'i bus 'di skad du lta'i buni snod bcom ldan 'das kyis cho rtul bstan pa gang yin pa degos na skrag par mi 'byung rdzas shes zer ba ni btsun pa shAr ti'i cunang bzhin gshe sa mtsho
48a7(dkon brtsegs): bstan pag yin padis nam mkha'i 'ams skrag par kur byag/ smras pa/ lha'i bu de ma yin no// smras pa/ btsun pa shA da ti 'brugal te de bzhin gshegs pas tshe 'phrul bstan pa des nam mtshal khams skrag
48a8(dkon brtsegs): da na so po yang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// slas na/ lha'i chu khyod nam mi bayin na sa/ smras pa btsun pa shAg te'i gre bdan mamapa' dzin no// smras pa lta'i da sa 'amams da sras ga 'atsun pa shA
48b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams shes pa 'a dug su ga dgakA nam mal khams su ga sus ga yon sa ta la ma na ma sbas pa yul ldan yan mo// sapa btsu pa shA
48b2(dkon brtsegs): bas na masu can thams cad kyang rnam mapa le khams cad banan can yin no// smras pa lha'i bung ltar byed kyis bstan pa bzhin du khyod nyid kyang ring mamags par tsha phrul de dag nyid nye bar ston par gyur pa/ smras
48b3(dkon brtsegs): tsun pa shA dA ti'i bu cho 'phrul de dag ni nye bar bstan par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhen/ tshe 'phrul de dag ni yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa yin pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshadang ldan pa shAr d+ya te'i bus 'di skad
48b4(dkon brtsegs): sags te// bcom ldan 'dus dre 'di ste na pas yin 'a ni sngon ci rgyal ba la l+h+wag par brtseb bgyis shing 'ang ma dpal bzhon kur la yang bsnyen gyib pa lazhes zhebacom ldan 'a
48b5(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ shA ga ti'i bu de bzhin no/  rbad rgyas pa shini// shA 'i gA'i bad dpon 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon du gyurapas yongs su phyin par byis pa yin no// shA ny-i / sngon snang ba 'das pa'i dusan bskal barba
48b6(dkon brtsegs): da pa'i yang rjes phres med pa das par gyu sa ma na bsngal pa man pa ga na bya la las pra bdeng shes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dge bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag pa dpa nabs
48b7(dkon brtsegs): bde bad gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i lalo sgyur ba blan med pa/ lha dngas rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ri ba la ru zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung bar gyur to// shA ra da ti'i bu 'jig rten
48b8(dkon brtsegs): khams bde ba zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams don sems can rnams bdab thams cad dang ldan par gnas
49a1(dkon brtsegs): nang 'a pa me nga/ she pas gas sanya /  la mapa la / nas mas dang u pa
49a2(dkon brtsegs): ni na la thamams pa mthas rgya na mas 9//  ba gshegs sa na
49a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa'a' ba 'ashig ste/ brtson 'grung 'ab sa/ shes rab kyi snang bathob pa/ gzungs dang mad sde'i rjel po ba pa/ stobs pa mchod pa/ tshig thams cad rab tu byed ci spyod pan shes bral ma khamag/ mngon pa
49a4(dkon brtsegs): nyes pas rnam par shes pa khong du chud pa/ bdud dang phyir nil ba nges par btsam pa/ sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes kyi pa rang ba dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la dri ltar rigs pa bzhin
49a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyan sbyor ba la mkhas pa/ bsad nams dang/ ye shes kyi tshogs chen po bsags pa/ gsol bam btab par sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i ba shes gnyen byed pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyis sangs rgyas kyi ning thams cad du
49a6(dkon brtsegs): dal shin tu gnas ga tha sums ba'i pa yongs pa spyo mkhas pa/ bas pa mi 'gas pas
49a7(dkon brtsegs): ra' drug papa rnam par rtsi ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gastad go/ shwa ra dwe ti'i bu de'i che 'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs par tshwa'i tshim pa yang dag par rdzogs
49b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyasa'i nga ga buda'i gsung rabal 'khor los skar ba'i rgyal ba dag pa'i bkod pa zhes bya ba tsas dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po// gling zhi di b+hag/ ljin posngo bdun dang ldan pa/ ma'i dbang po thar pazhig bla
49b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur to// de'i ru snying du tshar bar gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa gastag go/ shwa ra da te'i bu rgyal po dge ba'i dkod pa de yang btsur ma 'tshogs rnams
49b3(dkon brtsegs): dang ldar reg tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de 'phen gshegs pa dgra btsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ring ba lta bu de'i sa ci'i tshad pa/ 
49b4(dkon brtsegs): mtshad na lo dung byur phrag bdun du gyur to// de nas rgyal po dge ba'i bag pa bu sto dang ldan cig/ btsun ma ma khor dang lhan cig tu chos dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / dad pa tha'i nas bcom
49b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs tus ri ba lta bu byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang sa ba de la lo'a'um tshang bar thugs la dgongs pa bzhin du na bza' dgas
49b6(dkon brtsegs): sa dang / ka'i mas tshwa dang / gdan dang / sman gyi gsas sman dang / yo da rnams dang / bde bar ba thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas sa// rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa la bar dang bcas pas rtag par byan / dag
49b7(dkon brtsegs): nami 'chad par chos nyan pa la yang 'jug par gyur to// dpung nga bcas/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pas le 'bu ma 'das nas
49b8(dkon brtsegs): zhigang zhe na/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge'adun rjes ma
50b1(dkon brtsegs): gsum du smos pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa gcig tu 'dus pa la banganapa san 'angs pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / rnam pa med pa dang / 'dus mags pa'i byang chub la yongs su kA
50b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / snyan pa med pa surnams bshad pa dang /  mangs pas rnams yangs su smin par byed pa / 
50b3(dkon brtsegs): 'amed pa'i chos rnams la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / byang sa med pa'i chos rnam pa la tshul sems kyi rol byon pa yod pa nga / 
50b4(dkon brtsegs): cing gang cig pa'i chos rnams pa pa'ad mtshan pa yod pa po sus dang sems dpan pa'i chos rnams la 'an 'gru kyi sa pong du phyin pa 'ad pa dang / bsdus pa dang rnam pa ga yengs pa med pa'i
50b5(dkon brtsegs): sa la bsam gtan gyi tshal du phyin pa 'ad pa dang / ba la dang durol me pa'i chos rnams pa gas sa kyi po rkyen 'ad ba dang / bdag pa gis la 'a med pa'i chos rnams sa
50b6(dkon brtsegs): yod pa dang / skyob med pa dang / rten pa med pa'i chos rnams la byams pasgom pa dang / khyab med pa dang / gcig pa med 'i chos rnams pa snyi rjes sbyor ba dang / dga' ba med pa chos rnam
50b7(dkon brtsegs): ka' ba mngon par sgrub pa dang / gnas pa med pa'i chos rnams la btang snyoms sgom pa dang / shes pa med pa dang / mthong ba med pa'i chos rnams la lha'i mig mngon par sgrub pa dang / thos pa med pa dang / 
50b8(dkon brtsegs): ririg pa med pa'i chos rnams la lnga zla ba mngon par sgrub pa dang / dmigs pa dang sems dang rnam par bral ba'i chos rnams la pha rol gyi sems shes pa med pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang bral ba'i
51a1(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa yod pa dang / sems dang lus dang / skra dang / brtson grus dang bral ba'i chos rnams mardzu 'phrul gyi dpal khong dang
51a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa med pa'i chos rnams madran pa nya ba gnag pasgon pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa mchos rnams lngayang dag pa'i slong bsgom pa dang / dbang po medapa' chos rnams 'du
51a3(dkon brtsegs): po bstan pa dang / stobs med pa dang / nyam chung ba med pa'i chos rnams la stobs yong su rjod pa dang / nye ba 'i ba'i chos rnams pa byang chub kyi yan lag pard pa dang / khyad par med pa'i chos
51a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams lalam smos pa dang / zhinga'i mthar song ba'i chos rnams la giganas skyed pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid kyi chos rnams la skrag mthong la mkhas 'dang / rang bzhin gyis longs
51a5(dkon brtsegs): su mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos rnams la mya ngan las 'das pa smos pa'o zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu des rgyal po dge ba'i
51a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di dang / bu stong po dad ga dang / btsun mo'i tshogs de dga'i tshe 'phrul bstan pa'i chos kyi rnamagrangs de nyid las brtsams te de lta ltar chos bstan pa dang / srog chags pa rgyad bri bzhi stong bras
51a7(dkon brtsegs): pad+ma dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems smras so// rgyal po dge ba'i bsad ba nga
51b1(dkon brtsegs): sa bus ga yang// sa nyid kyi sta na zlogs// mchisasamam sa da mches thams ca dang // mam ma pal sa ma
52a1(dkon brtsegs): lhadang dmigs pa gnas lags te// de dag gis ni 'jig rten 'jug/ chos rnams stong ba dang ba lagadag// nges pa dI'i sla zhes bci// 'jig rten mgon pos tshe 'phrul ni// dang ga
52a2(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa sa// de tham pa dpa ma mAM/ ris pa sa kyi// sems mnyam pa nyid rmad du// sa su mthun da rje thun pa/  kyim gyus/  'dun pa di krus
52a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rnams kyis bshad pa 'i// zab cing ni la 'thun bgyid cing // de la rtsod par mi bgyid pa// de ni rjes 'thun bzod pa lags// mi dge thams cad ma gtogs par// dge chos rnams la 'jug 'gyur zhing // de la
52a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas par mi bgyid ga/ doni rjem 'thun pa yod pa lags// spyong ba'i sgra dang sems can smra// de bzhin lta ba'i sgra dang ni// sgra rnams kun la mchags pa// de ni rjes bdun pazod pa lags// sangs sus smad
52a5(dkon brtsegs): swa// rnam mang chos kyi sman mas dang // gang gi sgra la'ang mi rtog pa// de ni rjes 'thun pa zod pa lags// sbyin dang tshul khrims thos pa dang // brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab dang // de bzhin
52a6(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa// de ni ngas 'thun pa pyod pa lagapa/ thams cad dag pa sems mnyam ning // byang chub sems ni mi spong la// byang chub la mni ston bgyid ga/ de ni rjes 'thun pamed pa lags/ dgas sa sa
52a7(dkon brtsegs): yadza de// de la som nyi ma mchis pa// de ni rjes 'thun pabod pa lags// bdag kyang byang chub sangs rgyas shing // se'i sgra skad bsgrags nas ni/ 
52b1(dkon brtsegs): dag 'i kyis pa stod rnams das mchi mang ngos su smin gyis lags de ga sas rnas kyi/ byang chub slad du ro/ dag gis dag shegs migs ma shing / tsas da migs par ma
53a1(dkon brtsegs): po chen po byang chub ni rang ba nan gyis yongs su dag pas gnyen pa med pa yin na/  can bya chupa na chos thams cad dang mnyam pas thams cad kyi rjes su pan/ 
53a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po byang chub ni mtshan ma thams cad dang bral bas gal ba med pa yin no// rgyal ba chen po byang chub ni rab tu ne ba'i mtshan nyid len pas zhi ba'o// rgyal pa chen po byang chub ni brtag par
53a3(dkon brtsegs): babal ba dang bral bas nya ba zhi ba'o// rgyal ba chen po byang chub ni mi mnan par med pas lhag par g.yo ba med pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni yongs su grub pa med pas sems mnyam pa'o// 
53a4(dkon brtsegs): dral po chen po byang chub ni gzod ma nas ma skyes pas sems can dang mtshungs pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni rnam par reg pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin pas skye ba med pas rab tu phye ba'o// rgyal po
53a5(dkon brtsegs): pa byang chub de sems dang / yid dang / rnam par zhes pa dang bral bas rnam par reg pa med pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni tshul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pas chub med pa'o// rgyal po chen pa
53a6(dkon brtsegs): durngubade rnam par rtog pa thabs cad dang bral bas spros pa med pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid len pas snang ba'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni mtshan ma thams cad
53a7(dkon brtsegs): sa bas mtshan ma med pa'o// rgyal po chen pa byang chub ni smon pa dang bral bas smon pa med pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang nab ni las kyi rnam par smin pa med pas mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'o// rgyal ba
53a8(dkon brtsegs): khabs 'das ma byas paste// chal pa chen po gang dag byang chub kyi mtshan nyid de// bu dang / ngo bo nyid / bu la skab par byed pa dang / gang dag smin papa 'dab
53b1(dkon brtsegs): par byed padang/ gang dag mngon par dga' bar byed pa dang / gang dag 'dod par byed pa de da thams cad ni log par rtsol ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhen/ rgyal po chen po byang chub ci 'dra bar byang chub sems dpa'
53b2(dkon brtsegs): pa yang de 'dru ba yin pas na gang dag de ltar spyod pa de dag ni yang dag par spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro// // bam po gnyis pa/ de nas rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pas chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan la 'dis
53b3(dkon brtsegs): ces smras // rigs kyi bu khyod byang chub sems da rnams kyi yang dgob nyid kyi spyod pa la spangs par gyi bshes// dend ces smras pa dang / chos smra ba'i dge slong ches kyi rgyal mtshan gyis rtul bye dge ba'i rgo
53b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po sems can thams cad la rlom sems med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// 
53b5(dkon brtsegs): khrims kyis rlom sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis tshul khrims dang / bslab pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan thams cad yang dag par len pa'i spyod po ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// bzod pa
53b6(dkon brtsegs): drob sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis thub pa dang / khro ba dang / gnod sems dang / 'cheb pa'i yongs su gdung ba dang / zhe sdang gi yongs su gdung ba thams cad 'byen par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rna
53b7(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa yin no// brtson 'grus kyis rlom sems su mi byed pa mnam pa nyid kyis brtson 'grus brtan zhing 'bar ba dang // zhum pa med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// bsam gtan gyis
53b8(dkon brtsegs): pasems su ma byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis bsam gtan dang / rnam par par pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa sgrub pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// shes rab kyis rnam ses
54a1(dkon brtsegs): sum byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mam pa'i shes rab kyi tshogs yong du tshul ba 'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// gnyis dang bral bar btang dulas mnyam pa dang kyis ngas/ 
54a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gnas pa skyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams te skrod pa yin no// mngon par shes pas bram sems su mi byed pa marnam pa nyid kyis mngon par dgas pa skyed par byang chum sa sa
54a3(dkon brtsegs): la pa la 'am kyi nga 'jug byan pa da' das pa man//  ma pa ya pa pa da kyi na
54a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// yang dag par skyo ba med pa'i sems kyis nges par sems pa mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par sdud pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod/ 
54a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no// de na 'thun pa mnyam pa nyid kyis bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi yang dag par 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// sems kyis rnam sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can
54a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la sems pa nyam pa nyid byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// nam papa 'a yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / shing yongs su dag pa ma nyam pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi ni/ 
54a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// mtshan nyid med pa'i ches la so sor rtog pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyi tshogs yang dag par sdud
54a8(dkon brtsegs): ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// lus dang / ngag dang / sems mnyam pa nyid kyis lus dang / ngag dang / sems brgyan pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// 
54b1(dkon brtsegs): ca thams cad sa bdag med par mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi ci smin bya snyam du sra bar byang rnamasasam dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// mas ca ba na bur mos par nyam nyid byas sa
54b2(dkon brtsegs): bas yongs su me skyo ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnangs kyi grod pa yin no/ las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa la mas pa med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis legs par spyod pa'i las byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byed
54b3(dkon brtsegs): yin no/  tho pa gas ma pa nyid /  sa kyis mtshanas pan ga pa mas kyi sa / 
54b4(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid kyis sreg bsngal thams cad bzod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// mdza' bshe dang mdza' ba shas ma yin pa la sems snyom pa mnyam pa
54b5(dkon brtsegs): sel pa 'a rnam snod pe yin no//  reb med pa rgyal nyid kyis lhag pa'i ba mal la blang ban byang chub mas pa rnams kyi stod pa yin no// kho le nga/ grub pa mnyam pa nyid kyi mtha pa
54b6(dkon brtsegs): ngochosapa ni byang chub sems dang 'a rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// thang byed med pa'i chos ston pa mnyas pa nyid kyis tsho la slob dpon gyi dpem krud med pa ni byang chub sems dpa 'arnams kyi spyod pa parang // chos dben
54b7(dkon brtsegs): [ред]sa yin pa na byu chub sus su 'du na// don dpa pa'i bde pa pa ma pad kyis da pa nas na
54b8(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi spyod payin no// sems can bzhin du 'dud pa mnyam pa nyid kyis rgyal nges par bcom pani byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// yon tan thams cad yang dag par blangs pas rlom
55a1(dkon brtsegs): med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis yon tan thams cad pang dag par 'du ba yongs su tshal ba ni byang chub samapa dbang rnams kyi srid pa yin no// de nas rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pas byang chub sems
55a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi bang dag pa zhed kyi ga pa da ga sa dgang ba dang / man pa dang / yengs pa dang / ri ng+gA dga' ba dang / dag 'azheng ma pa deb sres nas gas dang / can can pa rnams kyis rlos
55a3(dkon brtsegs): smra ba'i da de slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan la mngon par bkab bo// bra stsang ba de dag gis kyang rang rang gi rgyan dag gi chos ska la dge slong chos kyi rgyam mtshonam ldan 'am chen 'di skad du gang bdag cag gi
55a4(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu dam pa 'di lta bu la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bstan bkur bya ba dag rnyed pa ni bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// sems can thams cad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de lta bu
55a5(dkon brtsegs): / dang / spobs pa de lta bu dag zeb par gyur cig ces kyang smras so// de nas chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis rgyal medage ba'i bkod pa la sade skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po 'od lta
55a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / can nam byas mtshad ba de ni mchod 'chen po ma yin gyi// de bas gzhan pa'i mched pa khyad par du 'alags bdag kyang med kyis de dag khyod kyis sgrubs shi// de yang gang zhen/ de nas de'i
55a7(dkon brtsegs): zla ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi ma tshigs gru bcad pa 'di dgags so// gang dag stong chen sems can de dag na// byang chub kyir ni rab tu thugs gyur cing // marnam sems kyis bskal pa/ 
55a8(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par re// bud nga byung pa'i skyen pa byas pabs// gang gis byang chub phye ni sems bskyed nas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su bslab pa dang // rab 'byung sems kyis gom pa gcig parag
55b1(dkon brtsegs): nad pas bsod rnams kyad ra 'phags// gang sha sran chang gang ba'i sangs rgyas dang // gang dag ma byon byang dang bzhugs pa rnams// de dag skyon ma kha la ni ma spongs par// bla med byang chub zhi pa
55b2(dkon brtsegs): / shegs pa thams // ra tu bsad cing bsngagapas bku pa/ gang na na sangs kyis ldan pa dag/ rgyal pa'i bstan la rang 'byung gzung bar byas// 
55b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas na chem khyim na 'o// kang+gA byed rnyed byed nga// nang nag shin na ba
55b4(dkon brtsegs): / 'dud nyid kyil la zhin du ba la byas shing // dge ba'i phyogs kyang mya 'anapa 'phel ba 'in// rab 'byung de ni las ngan spangs pa dang // lom gyi
55b5(dkon brtsegs): na 'phags pa'i skye bos bstod// de ni dge ba chud za ma yin zhing // de ni yongs su 'dzin pa spangs pa yin// kye ma los grol ba nyon mongs mi 'phem ded // nyon mongs rnam grol bdud kyi 'ching ba med// 
55b6(dkon brtsegs): sems ni byang chub spyad pa spyod// spyad pa dag pas byang chung rnyed mi dka'// de nas rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pas tshigs su bcad pa de dag zos pa dang / 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang / mongs spyod dang / rgyal
55b7(dkon brtsegs): dbang phyug dag la mi lta bar gyur cing stsol// 'dod chags dang bral ba skyes par gyur te rab tu 'byung ba la sems gzhol bar gnas nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa re rab lta bu de la 'ang skad ce
55b8(dkon brtsegs): rnasal te// bcom ldan 'das bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba sa rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyed par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'pho lags pa ma// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
56a1(dkon brtsegs): ri rab lta bu des bka' stsal pa/ rgyal pa chen po rab tu 'byung ba ni dgag pa med pa ste/ sems canathams cad la yang bar du ma gcod cing thabs mdzan// khyim na gnas brnyan
56a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs pa'i nang na gnas pa lan gyis/ la 'dod na das khyod la ga dmas 'du ldan gyis byed kyis kyang gtams shi rjes su bstan pa bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das
56a3(dkon brtsegs): tu 'byung ba'i skabs phye ba dang / rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pas bu stong po de dag la sbas pa/ khyed cag las rgyal sred sgrub pa dang / sems can rnams chos yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par sleb su yod/ de dag
56a4(dkon brtsegs): tha ma cad kyis rnas pa/ lam bdag cag kyang dad pas kyim nas khyim ma mchis par rab tu 'byung lags kyis/ bdag cag ma dong ba ga sar// cham pos smras pa/ gas tu byed cigamams cad rab tu byu na
56a5(dkon brtsegs): phreng bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khangs thams cad kyi gyi zi mtshigs mas cad ras tu cad pos par 'gyur gyis cad cag gang se kun rnams la brtan pa'i rkyen po 'jug par 'thur ba das
56a6(dkon brtsegs): bsgrubs la sems can rnams tsham yang dag par 'dzin du drug sheg/ de nas rgyal bu gzhon du de dag gi nang nas rgyal zhu gnan nu byeng rje cher sems shes bya ba des rang gi pa de dang / rgan rabs de dgal tshig
56a7(dkon brtsegs): sru bcad de smras pa/ rab 'byung yon tan du ma bsag pa zhes// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs mod kyi/ de lta lags kyang snying rjer gyur pas na// 'gro la phan phyir rgyal srid bdag gis bsgrub// 
56a8(dkon brtsegs): phre 'tshe bar bdag ni char ba spyod cing // gas stsa yan lag sargyan pa blang bar brtse// meton rnams dang dri byug pa dang // de bzhin char yang myang bar mi bgyi'o// lus la rgyan rnams kyang ni ma zin
56b1(dkon brtsegs): shing // mchil lam me 'tshal rim chen gtsug phrad med// srenang gsang las pakres par me nyal zhing // rgyal thun rgya kyi gos cang ma 'tshal // sel sran klu dbyangs skal me dga' nang // mtha
56b2(dkon brtsegs): smra 'ang dga' mi babyed// skye bos mdun pa dung bud med gnas sa shing // gcig pu mal na mchis nyal rlung me g.yab// bdag ni gleng nas phreng du mche ba rje zhing // dge ba bcu rnams rab tu bshad par
56b3(dkon brtsegs): na gnas pa'i nongs pa bstan bgyi zhing // rab tu 'byung ba'i bsngags pa'ang brjod par bgyi// gzugs dang longs spyod dbang phyug drags pa yis// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun bgrod
56b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems ni bskyed par me brtse zhing // rtag tu yang byeng sred gsus spyad la ye// sbyin dang snyan sgra don spyod don 'thun pa// sems can bsdub la ni btsun bkye zheng/ 
56b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di yang // bad byam meng sa yongs yin / mad de da mnyan cing ba ga dbang bkyoslod du// na ga ma du gas/ sa ba'i rnams tshan/ 
56b6(dkon brtsegs): ni mchod pa'ang bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu des rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje cher sems la legs so shes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam po legs so lags so// bslab pa
56b7(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims pang dag par blangs pa'i chos kyi yon tan des na khyim par gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang rab tubyung ba dang / gan tan mtshungs pa yin no// khyod kyi snying rje chen po des na rab tu byung ba'i tshe
56b8(dkon brtsegs): na yang sgrub par byed pa yin mo// de nas tshal po dag pa'i bgad pas rgyal bu gzhon nu snyeng rje cher sems rgyal srid la bzhag nas bu stong du gcig gis mtshang ba dang / lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de'i
57a1(dkon brtsegs): pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur to// de dag rab tu byung nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ngas tshe 'phrul bstan pa 'di nyid kyis de lta de ltar gdams shing rjes su
57a2(dkon brtsegs): sade dag gis ring po mchags par bangon par shes pa lnga ba skyed pa gyur ni// gardza sa dang / dran padapa ma nyan pa'i shes pa yang bamed pa blang // rgyam thuganon phre rje cir sems kyad rgyas sred
57a3(dkon brtsegs): dbang bsrung nas zla bta' cogan gle chen po zin po dag kyi tsun par byed do/ sa kyang phran tshanas sdang brag dbur/ bye ba phragag sa ldan med pa yang dan pa rdzogs pa'i bya chub thamams
57a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba da gu da lur sems can rnams la cho bsnyen par gyur to// de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa re rab lta bu 'di'i bstan pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas the
57a5(dkon brtsegs): bachen po 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha sdug tu byer to// shAr dwa ti'i bu je tsam du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / yongs su spyad pa byas pa'i sems can rnam
57a6(dkon brtsegs): dad pa bskyed par gyur pa'i gsung rab de la ltos/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshad tsun par los sbyar ba'i rgyal po dge ba'i dkod pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du spyod pa
57a7(dkon brtsegs): dang 'dri gnyis za bar gyur na/ shA dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis de thar mi ban+d+ha ste/ lha'i bu ded dpon 'di nyid de tshe ngo'i dus na la tsar los sbyar ba'i rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa zhes bya bar gyur to// shAr dwa
57a8(dkon brtsegs): dargyas kyi rgyam mtshan zhes bya bar gyur ba de gzhan zhi ga yin pa snyam du khyod pa mnyi dang yid gnyis zabar gyur na/ shA ra dwa 'i bu khyod kyis de ltar mi
57b1(dkon brtsegs): pA la gzhon nar gyur pa 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na chos sba pa'i dge slong ches kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar gyur to// shAr dwa ti bu ba che de'i dus na rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa de'i bu stong zab par gyur pa de shu
57b2(dkon brtsegs): deg yin pa snyam du khyod som nye dang med nanyis za bar gyur na// shAr d+ha 'e bu kyad kyis de ltar mi nga sa / bskal pa ba'ang ba'i de nyid kyisangs rgyas stong po dag de'i tshe de 'dus na rgyal ba dge ba'i bkod pa da
57b3(dkon brtsegs): sto tha par thar to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i che de'i dras na rgyal bu snang chen sems shes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zheg yin pa nga du byed som nyid nga bede gnyis thabar gyur nu/ shAr dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis de
57b4(dkon brtsegs): bsdu ste/ ba nyid de'i tsha 'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje cher sems shes bya bar gyur to// shar dwa ti'i bu de ltar na sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' bag yod pa rnams ni lug pa'i bsam pa dang / shes pa
57b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi skyed pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung nga yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon gyi tshul dang ldan pa'i gtam 'di bshad pa na lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog cag
57b6(dkon brtsegs): mi gyinyis ste blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mas bya / da ba shA ti'i bus 'drem dpal gan gyur pa 'di da sa/ 'dang de mi byed ni/ 'i bu da
57b7(dkon brtsegs): dpon 'di dang lhan cig su yun ring po nas tshangs par spyod pa skud pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po labasnyen bkur byas shing dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti
57b8(dkon brtsegs): par spyod pa zhes bya ba da ni 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad pa'i tshig bla dgas yin la/ lam ni 'dus byas yin gyi/ kho bo ni 'dus ma byas su gtogs pa yin pas de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par skye
58a1(dkon brtsegs): pang yidan no// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti brutshangs par sad pa zhes bya ba de de spyod pa'i mtshan nyid ber gyi/ Na tshan spyod pa med pa dang / rab tu spyad pa med pa yin te/ de'i phyir
58a2(dkon brtsegs): nga ba nas tshangs par spyad pa la yin no// btsun pa shAr dwa ti'i burtsangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba nga ni gnyis su sbyor babyin gyi/ khatsan gnyis ma sbyong ba yang ma yin / nyis ma med par sbyor ba yang ma
58a3(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no// btsun pa shA ra dwe to'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni gzugs dang / b+ha dang / dri dang / re dang / reg bya dang / chos las
58a4(dkon brtsegs): na gyi// kho bo na gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / r-i dang / reg bya dang / chom las 'byol ba sa yin to// de'i po kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par smad pa ma yin no// btsun pa shA rang
58a5(dkon brtsegs): pa ma yin no// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chungs par spyod pa zhes bya ba don dge ban gas gnyen thams cad yin ci/ 'al ni dge ba dang sdig pa la nges par sbyor bar mi byed de/ de'i phyi
58a6(dkon brtsegs): phun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med pa thob pa yin gyi/ kha ba ni nyan thos dang / 
58b1(dkon brtsegs): nga na no//  rgyas par spyad pa nas byab namar thams 'a / na
58b2(dkon brtsegs): pa stan te/ de phyeb ba wA nga pon bcangs par spyod pam yod no//  meg te'i bu ngas par byed panas bye ba ni gang na las 'das pa'i lam du 'gro ba yin te/ kham nyid kyang
58b3(dkon brtsegs): yodon du gnyer ba 'ayin to//  bye bani ra nA~M/ rkyen pa shA bran nga byed 'di skad du 'dzis dpa byed ni mam kyi sa meng pa la bsnyen par
58b4(dkon brtsegs): shin gshegs pa la ni bsnyen po kur bya bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzugs med cing bstan du med pa yin pas de la bsnyen pa
58b5(dkon brtsegs): ba bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa cher ba med cing tshor ba thams cad rgyun bcad pa yin pas de la bsnyen pa par bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'du shes med cing 'dunas
58b6(dkon brtsegs): gam ya dang bral ba yin pas del bsnyen 'akur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'du byed rnams meng cing 'dus pa byas brnyes pa yin pas de la bdun bkur bya bar mernas pa dang / de bzhin gshes
58b7(dkon brtsegs): pani rnam par shes pa med cing ying gnas pa med pa yin pas de la bstan bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni mig dang gzugs kyi yul ma len zhing snang ba nyid kyi spyad yul med pas de sa
58b8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa ni rna ba dang sgra'i yul ma yin zhing mtshan ma med pa' yul yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi rus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni lda nga
59a1(dkon brtsegs): da gtas da pa na pas/ de sa na bzung bya ba mam pa dang / da pa ldan da mas pa
59a2(dkon brtsegs): 'a gyu /  ni /  sanas da sa sa na pang byab sa pa dang / de da
59a3(dkon brtsegs): mo chen dang chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'du ba yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa na de bzhin nyid la gnas pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar me
59a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni yang dag pa'i mtha' dang 'thun par zhugs pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyis rab tu phye ba yin pas de la bsnyen
59a5(dkon brtsegs): bzung bye bar ma nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni chen po stong pa nyid mthugs pa yin pas del bsnyen pakur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni dang 'irten mnyam pa nyid yin pas de la bsnyen pa
59a6(dkon brtsegs): bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni spros pa thams cad yang dag par chad pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mus pa dang / de bzhin gagags pa ni dmigs pa mdapa 'thugs pa yin pas
59a7(dkon brtsegs): bkur bya bar mi nub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam par shes pa la me gnas pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar me nul pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pani 'ams ga mig nas pa yi pas
59a8(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur bya bar minub pa dang / de badzin gshegs pa ni zag pa med pa yin pas des la snyen bzur bya ba rom du pa dang / de bzhin gshegs na 'jig rten 'de dang / 'angag tan par
59b1(dkon brtsegs): nas padas bstar bkur bya bar mengs pa dang / ngas na gshegs pa napa nye ba na yan pas des bsnyen bkur byabar sems pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems dang ga dang
59b2(dkon brtsegs): yin pas dpa bsnyen bkang bya bar minas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni kha dag dang / gzugs dang / dbyings dang bral ba yin pas del bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / 
59b3(dkon brtsegs): sa da skad rtse bar sa med pa me sa sa btsun papar bya bar minas pa sa dri yin dashegs pa ni da ma byags pa na 'im garnas pa men sa sa na par
59b4(dkon brtsegs): tsun pa shA ra da ti'i bu de banin gshegs pa ni thams cad du ltur ba gdab tu med cing nam mtha' la bris pa ste bu len pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa shA ra tu
59b5(dkon brtsegs): bu gang yang khyod 'di srid du 'jib depal khyod de dge na pa yin no zhes zer ba'i/ na pa nA ra d+ya ti'i bu dge ba'i che ba de ni 'jig tshogs kyi rtsab mngon pa dang / ma rig pa dang / phrad pa'i srid pa
59b6(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug ge rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / phyin ci reg na rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / phung po lnga rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / skye mched drug rtsub ma yin pa dang / rnam par
59b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas bdun rtsab pa yin pa dang / chog pa brgyad chu ba ma len pa dang / kun nas man sems kyi dngos po dgra rtsab ma yin pa dang / sems can gyi gnas dgu rtsa pa ma yin pa dang / mi dge
59b8(dkon brtsegs): de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam la mngon par zhen pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / rig pa dang rnam par grol ba la yongs su rtog
60a1(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa dang / lhag pa'i tshul khribs kyi bslab pa dang / lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa dang / lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pas rlom sems su byed pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / bden pa
60a2(dkon brtsegs): na po dag la yo 'a rtogapa pa mayin pa dang / dbang shes la mayin pa dang / mdzin pa nas drug pa dgas pa 'am len pa dang /  ga 'dun pa 'dog
60a3(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas rlom sems su byed pa rna ba ma yin pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgul lta bskyed pa rtsab ma yin pa dang / mi sro
60a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos bcul mngon par zhen pa kyang ba ben pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// phung po'i 'dud rtsab ma yin pa dang / nyin mongs pa'i bdud rtsab ma yin pa dang / 'che bdag gi bdud nab ma/ 
60a5(dkon brtsegs): yin pa dang / 'i bu'i bdud rtsub ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// sgrib pa rgyab ma yin pa dang / chod pa dang kun nas ldang ba rtsab ma yin pa dang / 'tshod pa rgyal ma yin pa gang
60a6(dkon brtsegs): na /  rje bstan no// bang/  ba sa mayin pa dang / sems 'dus parnapa len pa da/ ga yin pa da/ gsapad/ na bcwab ma ljin
60a7(dkon brtsegs): de ni dge ba na pa yin no// 'byung bar sna brgyapa ma yin pa dang / 'di pas cibamadzin pa dang / myed pa sgru brtsapa ma yin pa dang / nyeg pa ba sa ga ma na ga len par ni gepa'i
60a8(dkon brtsegs): yi no// rgyas bzhin pa pa sa kyab mayin pa dang / ma rin pakyil len pa dang / 'ang byed kyapas yin pa dang / rnam par zhes pa rgyab sa medan pa dang/  dang gzugs mayin pa dang / 
60b1(dkon brtsegs): ched drug rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / reg pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / tshor ba mab ma yin pa dang / sad pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / len pa rtsab ma yin pa dang / srid pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / skye ba rtsab ma yin pa dang / 
60b2(dkon brtsegs): rtse ba ma yin pa dang / nad dang / sdug bsngalapa dang / yid pe bde ba dang / 'khrug pas 'am yin pa gang len pa de ni dge baben pa yin no// 'dod pa'i khams rtsab ma yin pa dang / gzugs kyi 'ams rtsa
60b3(dkon brtsegs): ba yin pa dang / gzugs med pa'i khams rtsa be ma len pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// spen pas rlom sems su byed pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / 
60b4(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyis rlob sems bu byed pa khya ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i nga pa yin no// byams pa dang / gling rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyis rlom sems su byed pa rdzab ma yin
60b5(dkon brtsegs): pa gang len pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rna ba yin no// nyan thos dang / rang gang ba rgyas 'dod pa rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa dera'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge pa'i rtsa ba yin no// byams pa chen po dang / snying
60b6(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i rtsa ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems mi 'dor ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems can yongs su spen par byed pa'i rtsa ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i rtsa ba dang / bdog pa thams cad
60b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su gtong ba'i rtsa ba dang / rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa'i rtsa ba dang / tshul khrims dang / bslab pa thams cad yang dag par len pa'i rtsa ba dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten stong pa ma
60b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i rtsa ba dang / bzod pa dang / zhi ba dang / dul ba dang / nges pa'i rtsa ba dang / bdag dang / gzhan la yang mi gnod pa'i rtsa ba dang / brtan pa'i brtson 'grus chen po cos pa'i rtsa ba dang / des
61a1(dkon brtsegs): sa yang dag par mi sdud pa'i rtsa ba dang / bsam gtan gyi rtsu ba dang / bsam gtan byer myong bar mi byed pa'i bdad ra cu rtsa ba dang / btang snyoms kyang mayin pa/ 
61a2(dkon brtsegs): sa rdzun sa pa na na pa da sa chog kA ga r+b+ha d+hA
61a3(dkon brtsegs): sa brda dang / smre 'jigs pa'i rna ba dang /  sa rnams cad sa sa pag na pa na bya na nano/  de/ dA dang/ mas na
61a4(dkon brtsegs): su bgang men pa de ni byung chub sems dpa'i dge 'in pa yin no// gzu sob pa gang len pa deni byung chu ba sems dang ge ba'i rtsa bzhin no// bas pa mend pa'i rgya ba dang
61b1(dkon brtsegs): sa / dan sas can cung nga /  kun da byu ma la seMn dathun gagags pag tu blang badzin par rig par byam/ mtshan ga / 'a 'a
61b2(dkon brtsegs): sa nan med ba ba ga ba da dri na ma na// de na na sa du kyil rnams dpag pa me no// den
61b3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bugang dag 'a ma dpal gan du gyur pa bshad pa de nas na rgyas par 'thar ba de yang tshe 'phrul chen po yin te/ de dag no pas gnan pa'i tshe 'phrul rnams kyis skrag par ma gyu / 
61b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag med par bshad pa dang / sdug par 'du shes pa rnams la mi sdug par bshad pa dang / dngos par 'du shes pa rnams la dngos po med par bshad pa dang / lta bar 'du shes pa rnamam la stong par bshad pa
61b5(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes pa rnams pa maldan ma med par bshad pa dang sa garnam par 'du shes pa rnams pa smon pa med par bshad pa dang / nga 'dzin pa dang / ba'i 'dzin lams ba'i na
61b6(dkon brtsegs): cad dang bral bar bshad pa de de 'jig rten gyi 'jigs pa chen po yin te/ gang dag de la skrag par mi 'gyur ba deng
62a1(dkon brtsegs): 'byor ro// de na'i rnye nan/ de gang las skrag par 'gyur ba'i chos 'dus ste/ ngang 'dzin pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / nga bar 'dzin pa yongs su 'dzin pa de dag des yongs su
62a2(dkon brtsegs): bzung bas yongs su ma bzung ba la rten med pa dang / rkyen med pal g.yo ba med pa dang / gso pa med pal 'phrul ba med pa dang / 'dul ba med pa la blang ba med pa dang / thang ba zad pal dong ba medapa/ 
62a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / dor ba med pa la 'dzin pa med pa dang / 'dzin pa med pa la mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa dang / mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa ma phyen gyi mig med pa dang / byin ci log med pa la log pa nyid med pa dang / 
62a4(dkon brtsegs): ga pa nyid dang bral ba ni yang dag par sgrub pa yin pa dang / yang dag par sgrub pa ni yang dag par lta ba yin pa dang / yang dag par lta ba ni yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar dag yin pa dang / yang dag
62a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa la rnam par g.yeng ba med pa dang / sems rnam par mi g.yeng ba la gnas pa med pa dang / sems mi gnas pa la gnas med pa dang / sems kyi gnas med pa la rnam par
62a6(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i gnas med pa dang / rnam par rig pa med bral brtag cing bsal pa med pa dang / brtag cing bsal ba dang bral bas dmigs paspangs pa dang / dmigs pa med par gnas pa la sgrib pa med/ 
62a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sgrib pa med par gnas pa la rlom sems med pa dang / gang gis tshe rlom sems med pa de'i tshe lhag par drim pa med pa dang / gang gi tshe lhag par rlom pa med pa de'i tshe bdag dang gzhan du ma
62a8(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / med pa la yongs su gdung ba med pa dang / yongs su gdung ba med pa la skyed lug pa leng pa dang / sgyid lug pa med pa la nyon mongs par rgyu med pa dang / nyan mongs pa can ma yin pa'i sems
62b1(dkon brtsegs): gas cab snang ba dang / gsal bzhag pas segs mthong ba dang / ye shes mthong ba la gnas pa'i sems kyi shes che ba dang / sems kyi zhes pa rgya chen po gnas pa la bdud kyis grags ba rjed pa dang / 
62b2(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed na pal sgrib pa med pa ya dugyur padang gan pa mas cad du gyur byer ro//  rjeg byas pa
62b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jab dpal gnon nur gyur pa la ci dang ci 'dre ba de dang de nyid kyi rkyen zhes bas las sangs rgyas kyi rgyas thams cad kyang // 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shAr dwa ti'i bus chos thams cad ni bdag po me
62b4(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni de ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du sgrub par byed do// btsun pa shAng dwati'i bu ches thams cad ni mi zad pa ste/ de dag ni nga gur 'dod pa de bzhin du ston par byed do// btsun pa shar dra te'i bu chos thams cad ni
62b5(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du brjed par byed do// bcum shAr dwa de'i bu ches thams cad ni ther zug tu gnab pa ma yin pa ste/ de dag ning ltar 'dod pa de bozhin du rnam par 'jog par
62b6(dkon brtsegs): do// btsun pa shA dwa ba'i bu chos thams cad ni mthong ba med pa ste/ de dag ni jis de 'dod pa de bzhin du rnam par dgod par byed do// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni btang snyoms pa ste/ de dag
62b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa de bzhin du 'chad par byed do// btsun pa shAr da ti'i bu chos de dag ni gang nas kyang ma blangs/ gang du yang ma khrid pa ste/ de dag ni bsags pa yang ma yin/ srungs pa rang ma yin no// de dag dang
63a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang rung / ma bshad kyang rung ste/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid ma 'dor ba yin no// sems can thams cad kyil gi 'byung ba gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos thams ca
63a2(dkon brtsegs): rlom bstan pa'i yige 'byung ba gang yin pa'i yi ga dag thams cad ni lus las kyang ma byung / 
63a3(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad la yang bsags pa med do// ji ltar nyon mongs pa'i dmigs pa thams cad la bsags pa med pa de bzhin du shes pa gang gis nyon mongs pa rnams spangs pa'i shes pa de la yang bsags pa
63a4(dkon brtsegs): med de/ btsun pa bA ra dwa te'i bu gang mi gnas pa'i shes pas me gnas pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams spangs pa de lang che 'phrul chen po yin no// de nas lha'i tha ded dpon gyis 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa
63a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad kyis smras so// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpang rnams kyi shes pa gang lan 'jam dpal kyis smras pa/ skye bu sdug bsngas yongs sugs pa shes pa dang / phung po yongs su spangs
63a6(dkon brtsegs): yong su tho ba med pa'i shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba shes pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsdu ba shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / skye ba shes pa dang / 'byung ba shes pa dang / lam shes pa dang / 
63b1(dkon brtsegs): bden pa shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi la shes ma ldan kha ba ga bshes pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar shes pa dang / 'byung ba la mngon par zhen pa med pa shes pa dang / phung za shes pa dang / 
63b2(dkon brtsegs): 'i bdud sang pa shes pa dang / khams shes pa dang / chos kyi dbyangs dbyed medang shes pa dang / skye mched shes pa dang / grong stong pa lta bur ma mar rtog pa shes pa dang / sbyin pa shes pa dang / dus dang du
63b3(dkon brtsegs): yin pa las mi 'da' ba/ shes pa dang / tshul khrims shes pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal ba'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba shes pa dang / bzod pa shes pa dang / sems can rdzas su srung ba shes pa dang / @
63b4(dkon brtsegs): grub shes pa dang / legs pa'i las bya ba shes pa dang / bsam gtan shes pa dang / bsam gtan las ldog pa shes pa dang / shes rab shes pa dang / lta ba yongs su shes pa dang / thabs shes pa dang / sems
63b5(dkon brtsegs): yo su smin par bya ba shes pa dang / byams pa shes pa dang / sems can bsapa pa shes pa dang / snyid rje shes pa dang / yongs su ma sgo ba shes pa dang / dga' ba shes pa dang / chos la dpa' zheng rang tu dga'
63b6(dkon brtsegs): dka' ba shes pa dang / btang snyoms shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su sgrub pa shes pa dang / sems can gzhug pa shes pa dang / tha snyad shes pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa shes pa dang / gnas
63b7(dkon brtsegs): / pa la gnas pa shes pa dang / yang dag pa'i spong ba shes pa dang / mnyam pa nyid dang m-i rigal pa shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa shes pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med par so sor rtog pa shes pa dang / dad par
63b8(dkon brtsegs): yodang/ stong pa shes pa dang / chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba shes pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / stobs shes pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa shes pa dang / 
64a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dab ba dang / rnamags pad rgyathams cad ma 'a shes pa dang /  kyi da /  mas pa ma pa ma nyam da na la da / gas sa
64a2(dkon brtsegs): stobs shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa dang / byang chub kyi phan lag shes pa dang / rang byung gi re shes rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang / lam shes pa dang / 
64a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba shes pa dang / snying rje chen po la lhag par dmigs pa shes pa dang / zad pa shes pa dang / dge ba'i rtsib thams cad mi zad pa shes pa dang / 
64a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa shes pa dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su 'grub pa shes pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa shes pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu
64a5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa shes pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang dag par 'du ba shes pa dang / gteng ba rjes su dran pa shes pa dang / sems can thams
64a6(dkon brtsegs): cad yongs su mi gtong ba shes pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa shes pa dang / smon pam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba shes pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa shes pa dang / sdig pa rnams cad
64a7(dkon brtsegs): bya bar shes pa dang / sems can byed dbang po shes pa dang / rim rtogs pa shes pa dang / them pa'i chog pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba shes pa dang / tshigs thams cad rjes mi ses pa shes par
64a8(dkon brtsegs): na thams cad shes pa dang / rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du spyod pa shes pa dang / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes pa dang / gnas ma yin pa me bye bar shes pa dang / stobs bcu shes pa dang / nyan thos dang
64b1(dkon brtsegs): ya tsam rnams cad kyi theg pa dang rjes su 'thun pa shes pa dang / me 'jigs pa shes pa dang / bar du btsud pa dang / bang dugacod pa ma len pa'i chos rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang / 'das pa du
64b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i shes pa dang / rab par shes pa mi gnas par shes pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la mthogs pa'i shes pa dang / chos thams cad las yang dag par me 'dang ba shes pa dang / da byung ba'i
64b3(dkon brtsegs): 'thogs pa'i shes pa dang / gnas pa med pa dang / rab tu gnas pa med pa shes pa dang / lus sngon du 'gro ba shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi ras 'jug pa dang / ngag sngon du 'gro ba shes pa dang / 
64b4(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi ska rab tu dbye ba shes pa dang / yid sngon du 'gro ba shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rnam par g.yo ba rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa dang / 'khrul pa med pa'i shes pa dang / sems can
64b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi 'khrul pa rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mes pa dang / rtsod pa nye ba ni bar bya ba shes pa dang / mi brjed pa'i shes pa/ 
64b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / sems rnam par g.yengs pa'i sems can dran pa la 'jog pa shes pa dang / dgongs pa rab tu 'dzin pa shes pa dang / sems can le lo can yongs su gzung ba shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
64b7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / gdub pa'i sems can 'dul ba rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa dang / thabs shes pa dang / shes rab shes pa ste/ lha'i bu de ni bya
64b8(dkon brtsegs): ba sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chags pa med pa 'thob po// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpa' ji tsam du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dang / 'jig rten sa
65a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i shes pa den ngo mtshar ro// zhes pa de ni gomadan don dang ldan pas yang dag par bsdu bar minus so// 'jam dpal gang de lta bu'i zhes pa sna
65a2(dkon brtsegs): byed// de sang tshe 'jal chen po yin no// bam po gsums bas/ 'ja ba la /  na byang chub sems dpa' go cha legs par gagos pa yin/ 'jas dpas gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi
65a3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sems can rnams la skrag par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' ni go cha legs par bgos pa yin no// skas pa/ 
65a4(dkon brtsegs): dpal ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya/ smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub kyi gnas kyi rjes su 'jug pas byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir sems dpa' chen po zhes
65a5(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ lha'i bu brtsams pa chen po nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa dang / ye shes chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed pas sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir sems
65a6(dkon brtsegs): b+ha/ smras pa/ lha'i bu shes rab kyis gzung ba med pa'i chos la 'jug pa dang / thabs kyis chos thams cad yang dag par bsdus pas de'i phyir sems can mchog ces bya'o// smras pa/ 'jam pa
65a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can dag pa zhes bya/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang nyon mongs pa'i dri ma rnams dang lhan cig mi gnas shing sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom par yang med pa
65a8(dkon brtsegs): phyir sems can rnam par dag pa zhes bya/ smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ltar sems can thams cad nges par 'byung ba'i lam rnam par sbed par
65b1(dkon brtsegs): dpas de dasems can rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir 'dren pa zhes bya/ smras pa/ lha' bu 'di ltar la de la gnas nam sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag yongasas te
65b2(dkon brtsegs): byed pas de'i phyir 'dren pa zhes bya'o// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir rnam par 'dren pa zhes bya// smras pa/ lha'abre 'di sngar gdul ba'i sems can rnams shin du 'dul ba la rab tu 'god par byed pa 'ang
65b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'dren pa zhes bya'o// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dpa' ba yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu ji tsam gyis bdud dang phyir rgol ba nges par bcos zhing sems can yongs su
65b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' dpa' 'ayin no// smras pa/ 'jas de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa 'bul bar dka' ba yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ltar
65b5(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa dang / sngon gyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par gal 'dod par mi byed pa de lta bu ni thul bar dka' ba yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji lta na kyi
65b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi ra byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'phags pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar nabyang chub sems dpa' chos slab yin/ 
65b7(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi nyes par smrab brel gyis gnon par byed pa de lta bu de chos sra pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ltar na 'dul ba smra ba yin/ smras pa/ lha'i'e bu ga go cha bdag tshul khrim pa la
66a1(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi 'phong ba dang / kun nas ldang ba rnam par ngasal ba'i phyir chos ston par byed pa de lta bu ni 'dul ba slang yin no/ 
66a2(dkon brtsegs): mas da / da /  no// la/ la la na chu ba ma ma sa ca
66a3(dkon brtsegs): na napa rdzog dzin na ga mas mi skyengs par byed pa na na ma
66a4(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' du yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe bdag gi nyes pa'i 'chab pa de lta bu ni drang po yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal

67b1(dkon brtsegs): skab pa/ 'jam sa de ltar nan ba phen/ smras pa/ lha' bunan mongs pa yongs su gdung ba thams cad rjes gdung ba zad la sems can thams cad byanyon mongs pa srung pa'i phyir yang chos ston pa yin no// srung /

70a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni lce dang / ro dang / rnam par shes pa'i yul ma yin no// lus kyi rdul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul len te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni lus dang / reg bya dang / rnam

70b3(dkon brtsegs): rdul dang sangs rgyas kyis le shed deber ba'i yul du mngo par rdzogs par yongs sa chud do/  ga rnam pa dang me mnyam pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang mnyam pa nyid sa

71a1(dkon brtsegs): bcad dal 'i 'dagu pa de dag dom ma rnam par gnas pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag yongs su rmen par byed kyang mngon para'ang byed pa med pa'i mnyam pa nyid las kyang meg
71a2(dkon brtsegs): tshe mams cad skye med par mnyam pa nyid dang / 'byung ba med par mnyam pa nyid dang / 'gag pa med par mnyam pa nyid dang / 'dod chags dang bral bar mnam pa nyid dang / dben par mnyam pa nyid dang

71a8(dkon brtsegs): dpan pa me do// ni thong gi spyod pa 'asam kyis ma byab pa byed bye chu pa sems dang 'ams kyi stsas pa 'ams kyi mi byab te/ ni dang bral ba'i spyod pa ni mo yin no// gti mug gi skyed pa
71b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi khya 'a byer byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yang bsam gyis ma khyab ste/ shes rab kyi bya ba sgrub par bya pa'i smod pa ni ma yin no// se sa med pa the spyad pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams ca

71b4(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus kyis rlom sems su byed pa'i spyod pa nim yin no// rnam par gabang ba med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/ bangam gtad kyis rlob sems su byed pa'i spyod
71b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jal ba'i shes rab med pa'i spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/ shes rab kyi rlom sems su byed pa'i spyod pa ni mo yin no// nyon mongs pa med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'
