104a8(dkon brtsegs): chu ba sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa sun su mchags pa gang lags pa de dag kyang bdag nyid srung bar 'gyung ba'i sad du'o// de skad ces gsas pa dang / bcom ldan
104b1(dkon brtsegs): ma gnas brtan 'od srung chen po po 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srung bya ba tsha sa 'dus lnga brgya ba tha ma de la byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sdig pa'i grags pas yongs su can cing lhag
104b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bsam pa nyam chung ba de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / phye ma dang / spos dang / me tog phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / 
104b3(dkon brtsegs): mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan dang / mar me'i smin pa dag nas la brtson par 'gyur ro// 'od srung ngas na shes pa dang mi ldan pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rna ba yang dag par
104b4(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub pa'i phyir mchod pa bshad pa yin na mi blun po de dag ni de la brtson par 'gyur ro// 'od srung ngas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du dge slong dag khyed cag ni bdag nyid dul ba
104b5(dkon brtsegs): zhi bar sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson pas gnas par gyis shig/ bram ze dang khyim bdag pad ldan pa dag yod na de dag ni nga'i sku gdung rnams la sku gdung ga mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro/ 
104b6(dkon brtsegs): 'odi srud mi sbyin po de dag rnas 'byor ya gyungs/ snang ba yang gangs/ 'dund pa yang / ton gyi sa yang sring sa nas deng nag shegs pa'i rgyug du

105a2(dkon brtsegs): mkhan po'am/ slob dpon gyi drang nas tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig kyang mnus te ton byed cing gom pa bdun 'dor bar byed pa gang yin pa da pas ches bsod nams mang
105a3(dkon brtsegs): du byed par 'gyur ro// 'dis kyang chub sems dpa' gang zhes stong gsum chen po'i 'jig rten no/ mas 'di ma tog dang / bdug pa dang / phyi ma dang /  kyi rab tu bkang / de bzhin gsheg

105b4(dkon brtsegs): la gyi ste rab tu 'joms par byed pa stong yod par gyur to// 'od srung rgyal po ma rgyud de'i bu stong pod dag gi rjes la de'i bang bar chos shes bya ba dang / chos 'byung shes bya ba'i skye mnyas

105b6(dkon brtsegs): ba du las gzhan mi byed par khyim g+ni yid la byed pa thams cad stengs te/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gsems cha dang / gdan dang / spun gyi gsos sman dang / yo byed rnams

106a3(dkon brtsegs): yin par byas pa'i zla ba 'khor gyi sa dbus yongs pa snang ba byas pa das kyang byed du bcug ste/ gang gi che de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun da bcas po khang ba bangs de dag
106a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs pa de'i tshe 'khrul 'khor gyi srang bu de dag gi shugs kyis khang bzangs dadug gi steng nas me N+Daka la da ba rnam bduna'i char dag kyang 'bab po// me tog de dag gis khang bzangs de dag pus mo nub tsam du gang

106b1(dkon brtsegs): de la yid kyi 'u pa 'di skad ces yongs su zhus so// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po mu khyud 'dis yun ring po 'di srid du dge ba'i rtsa ba bstan pa rnam pa mang po 'di lta ba thams cad zil gyis gnon
106b2(dkon brtsegs): cang yongs su btugs te gnas par 'gyur ba'i sbyin pa dang / bsod nams dang / longs spyod dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan zhig mchis legs sam/ 'od srung de ltar khye'u de gnyis kyis nab
106b3(dkon brtsegs): gnyis la gtugs ma thag te de nas skad cig de la stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de rab tu g.yos shing 'jig rten tus g.yos pa chen po yang byung bar gyur to//

106b8(dkon brtsegs): gtam de ku bu yongs su gus pas khyod paci bya/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pas khye'u 'di gnyis kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa ji lta bu dang / zab mo la 'amed pa sgom pa 'i sa ba dang /

107a2(dkon brtsegs): gongs la khye'u 'di gnyis sreng sri rang gi rdzu 'phrul sem na ston cig/ 'ad srung de nas dge slong sred med kyi bu das de las kye'u gcig lag pa g.yas pas blangs la/ lharu cig shom la/

107b4(dkon brtsegs): nyan pos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rnam par dkrug pa'am/ bsam pa rnyasmra pa ma yin te/ sred med kyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can byung
107b5(dkon brtsegs): bde dag thams cad 'di lta ste dper na nga sa daltar khyod nyid nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang ldan par gyur cing de tsam du rdzu 'phrul che bar
107b6(dkon brtsegs): mdu mthu che la'i sems can de dag/ thams cad kyis bskal pa bye ba snyed du rdzu 'phrul kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis rnam par 'phrul pa byas kyang de dag gis kye

108a2(dkon brtsegs): bcwa rtsa gnyis kyis blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems paskyed cing de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma

108a6(dkon brtsegs): zhig yo nyid du 'dus 'dug par gyur ba sbyar sa sems te thogs rnag tugs nas bras ma selas pa'i gangasal bstanas te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin pa /

108a8(dkon brtsegs): spang bar medzad cing khye'u 'di gnyis kyis zhus pa rab tu rnam par dbye ba yang bstan du gsos/ 'od srung de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des de'i chos gol gyis

108b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis sgra thos nas de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhabs kyi drung nas langs par gyur te/ 'od srung khye'u de gnyis langs par gyur pa na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na lha dang

108b5(dkon brtsegs): gnyis langs nas kyang yang de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhabs ma phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bskor ba byas nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhal tu ldan
108b6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa gang lags pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / yongs su gtong ba gang lags pa de zil gyis gnon cing yongs su gtugal te gnas pa

109a2(dkon brtsegs): skad yongs sags nas da 'ben gshegs pa'i zhabs shes 'argyas// 'od kyang de nas bzhin gshegs 'am togs chogs des byang chub sems dpa' tha gros babang ba des/ 
109a3(dkon brtsegs): deskad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das skye bo mang po la ldan pa dang / skye ba mang pal bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / lha dang me rnams kyi skye bo phal

109a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyale sa gyud 'das pa med rnams kyi ston pa yongs su gtang ba gang yin pa de lta chub sems dpa' dben par gnas bzhig dusman pa dang / rab tu dgan bdag la gnas
109a7(dkon brtsegs): shing se gos gtogs pa tsam zhig chos thams cad na ma skyes pa'o zhes bzod pa thog pa gang yin pa de bsod nams kyi phung po ches che bar rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu rgyal po mu
109a8(dkon brtsegs): khyud 'di'i sbyin pa k+ta zhog gi/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'dig rte gyi khams na sems can de tsam pa sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pa'i sems can de dag thams cad las sems can re res kyang
109b1(dkon brtsegs): so so nas rgyas pa mu khyud 'dra'i sbyin pa de snyed pa de snyed cig byin par gyur na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gartogs pa mamasaca dag mas kyi bsod nams gang yin
109b2(dkon brtsegs): /  chub ses pa dzin pa nas na pa'i bskyes byas na pa dang/ yang dag pa mam zhugs pa / rdum pazhin sa na ga/ chos rnams na
109b3(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa zhes bya bar se gol gtogs pa tsam zhig pa zod cing gnas par gyur la/ sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma des
109b4(dkon brtsegs): gol gtogs pa tsam zhig bzod pa la gnas pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// stong gi cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba phrag
109b5(dkon brtsegs): t+ya'i cha dang / bye ba lkug song gi cha dang / bye 'phrug 'bum gyi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi bar gyi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / nye bar 'jal ba
109b6(dkon brtsegs): bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// rigs kyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po lha zhog gi 'a
109b7(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi ces sten namams da kyi na bkrubar bsdus pa'i sems can de dag thams cad las sems can re res kyang skad cig dang / thang cig dang / yud tsamachi
109b8(dkon brtsegs): la rgyal po mu khyud 'das sbyin pa byin pa dang / dge ba mngon par 'dus gyis pa ji snyed pa de snyed cig byas shing sems can de dag re res se ga la gtogs pa tsam gcig la yang
110a1(dkon brtsegs): shing dag 'a ma ngan par 'dus byas par grang la/ rnam grangs de lta bus sems can de dag thams cad kyis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sbyin pa gyur
110a2(dkon brtsegs): mngon pa das kyis kya na/ gas kyi 'ding snyam dumams/ dag 'a napa'am/ 'di sun/ rjes bka' lam pa dang/ de
110a3(dkon brtsegs): deba'am pa yang ba gags pasam skyes me khyab pa lags so// 'od srung na pa zhin da shegs pa sa ton chags des byang chu'i sems dpa'i cu gros bzang po la 'dis
110a4(dkon brtsegs): sa bka' stsal to// rigs kya bu khyod mos par bya/ khyod kyi khong du chu bang bya ste/ mkhas pa mngon par snang ba byas pa/ ba mo la bzod pa dang ldan pa gang dag 'thung bar 'gyur ba da/ 
110a5(dkon brtsegs): ba zos par 'gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyi dge ba ldan ring pa de srid du mngon par 'dus byas pa de tsam du dpag tu med cing de tsam du bsam kyis mo
110a6(dkon brtsegs): yin pas pas can thams da/  du man pa 'a bas pade sa /  bsas pag N+DI da nan shes sa na la
110a7(dkon brtsegs): ga' /  nan na / 'phrag dang/ bya dran song ga dang/ 
110b1(dkon brtsegs): ThA /  da / dadang / bkra pa dang / shA dang /  pa dang/ 'byung du yang nye bar po 'an// 'ad krung nas
110b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs da'i dge slong gi dag 'dun las dge slong brgyad khye bzhi stong gis bstan pa 'di thos nas chog 'thun par rjes su yi rang ba'i tshe
110b3(dkon brtsegs): drend ces 'dzid/  ldan 'das yi/  rkyen gang dag mas pa sa rnams la bzod par 'gyung ba dang / gang dag chos thams cad stong bar mos par bgyid pa dang / ga
110b4(dkon brtsegs): dben pa la dka' shing dgon pa la mngon par phyogs te gapa pa bdun 'dar bar bgyid pa dang / gang dag ye shes de lta bu yongs su bsgrub par bgyi ba'i slad du blan med pa yang dag
110b5(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed par bgyid pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la rjes su yi rang ngo zhes rjes su yi rang ba'i tshig brjod par gyur to// 'od srung de nas dpa
110b6(dkon brtsegs): shegs pa me tog sna tshogs des dge sadi dag la legs su shes bya ba byin te/ gas kyi bdaka da kyis lhag pa'i byas ma pa de lta byas rjes su me dang ba'i jig+h+rad
110b7(dkon brtsegs): ni legs so lags so// gal te nyid drug gi sems dag ras par dgrol ba mtha dang 'di ni khyed cig dge ba'i rtsa ba des 'khor lom sa rje rgyam srid gang gA'i rang gi byem da
110b8(dkon brtsegs): bcu kranas blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyab
111a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni sems can de dag gis sems bskyed pa de dag dang / gang dag la chos thams cad
111a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / dben pa dang / nye ba na pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / rang bzhin pa mchis pa dgro ba ches pa ma mtshas pa dang / bzon pa mchis pa dang / mos pa mchis pa de dag
111a3(dkon brtsegs): yang rjes su yi rang lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang gnas btan 'od srung chen po la bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ma
111a4(dkon brtsegs): tshogs de la khye'u chos dang / ches bdang ga nyis kyis 'di skad ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das snang chub sems dpa' chos du dang ldan na sbyin pa la dga' bar yang mi bgyid la ser sde
111a5(dkon brtsegs): ngan du yang mi 'gyur ba dang / kun 'dzin pa'o sems ma mchis pa dang / gzhan 'jig rten gyi zang ring stsol bar bgyid pa de dag mthong ni yang de la dga' ba bskyed par mi bgyid pa dang / 
111a6(dkon brtsegs): / de du yang 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi gnas pa bla na med pas gnas pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang khab mo la bzod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs
111a7(dkon brtsegs): par ying bgyid lags/ nad kyang du skad ces gsol ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa me tog tu tshogs des bye chos dang / ches bzang gnyis la 'dri skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi/ 
111a8(dkon brtsegs): kya rgya ma zhi nan byan na / su ma ba ma med padas na
111b1(dkon brtsegs): dacing byed par byed pa de bathong na yang de la dga' ba skyed par mi byed pa dang / gong du yang 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi gnas pa bla na med pas gnas pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / 
111b2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / ban 'dzin pa'i sems med pa dang / gnan 'ji thod sbyin par byed pa da mthang na yang de la dka' bskyed par mi byed pa dang / gang du lang 'di sa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi gnas
111b3(dkon brtsegs): ba blan med pas gnas pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / zab ma la 'bod pa dang ldan por 'gyur ba dang / blan med pa'i ye shes kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu
111b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sbyin pa la dga' bar yang mi byed la ser sna can du yang mi 'gyur ba dang / kun 'dzin pa'i sems med pa dang / gzhan 'jig
111b5(dkon brtsegs): yang 'di sbyin par byed pa de mthong na yang de ya dka' ba skyid par mi byed pa dang / gang du yang 'di ng+ge hUM/ sangs rgyas kyi gnas pa blan med pas gnas pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / 
111b6(dkon brtsegs): bang gyung ba dang / blad me ma tshol gas kyi yongs su rdzogs da / na nan/ rigs kyi bu dag 'das kyang chubasam
112a1(dkon brtsegs): mang du thos pa yongs su tshol bar byed pa dang / de mang du thos par gyur nas grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dang / yul 'khor dag tu zhugs
112a2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi sen basbyin par byed pa dang / gang las kyang tha na legs so zhes bya ba tsam du cung zad kyang ro ba med cing / dgos pa med pa'i sems kyis gzhan dag la chos
112a3(dkon brtsegs): du ba dang / dgos pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pas 'di lta ste/ chos kyi sbyin pa'i sbyin po 'don sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bsngags shing bsnyad pa yin pa
112a4(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni sbyin pa dam pa sbyin pa gtso bo 'di la gnas pa yin no zhes yang dag par mthong ba na dga' ba nyams su myong ba
112a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can 'ang/ na mongs po gta bas mdzin par 'tshar pa gzhan dgalan da sa byed/  byu ldan/ dwags kyi bdag kyang chub ma ska pa
112a6(dkon brtsegs): dgis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med/ dpag tu med pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ba ji skad
112a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs te 'tsho ga gnyis pa de dag thabs cad la che'i ma ma dang ba med pa'i sbyin pa phram par sbyar ba gang len pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bas pa
112a8(dkon brtsegs): ban sum chags pa rgyal khrims dang ldan pa/ dag pa chos dang ldan pa gzhan zhig nas nga can po kun tu bskyed de// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ngas
112b1(dkon brtsegs): dran pa'i byed pa nags pa med pa'i sebs pas rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / grags pa mi 'dod par sems can gcig la gcig hUMg bzhi pa'i tshigs pa brgyad pa gcig
112b2(dkon brtsegs): ga pa byed cing ma chags sa ba / ba shad nas kyang migs nyam pa rgyas 'disas/ dpar na min 'didag dang brgyad kyis stong ba de bzhin du thos thams
112b3(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin gyis stong pa yin no zhes rab tu rtogs par byed de/ rigs kyi bu dag bsod nams kyi phung ba de la bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// 
112b4(dkon brtsegs): nga sadang / 'bum gyis dang /  dang /  phran dang / bya bzhin slong gro dang / ts+tshab sdug ma mdang/  k+shi/ bla 'a
112b5(dkon brtsegs): da / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / nye bar 'jal ba dang / rgya'i bar du ya mi 'gyu phyir ro// 'od srung de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs
112b6(dkon brtsegs): bas la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyibu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi gnas pa rgya chen pos gnas
112b7(dkon brtsegs): rims kyi nga pang rgyab mam khyen pa dag dang ldaldan 'ad /  rgyas kyi gnas nams nas sa ma
113a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa ma tog sna tshogs das kye 'du gnyis la de lnga de ltar chos bstan pas kye'u deg nyis chos kyi mchog tunag nyid kyis nyal bdun pa tsam du mngon pa
113a2(dkon brtsegs): 'phags te/ de gnyes par snang la la bad nas de bzhin gshegs pa de la gnyags tshig 'thun par tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// thub pa spyod pa tham mchod mkhyen// snod bcud
113a3(dkon brtsegs): la bakhas pa lags// sems can rnams la gtong ba dang // de bzhin gtong la me gnas ston// 'di la bdag dang sems can dang // srag dang gang zagam mchis par// bzang ba bla med
113a4(dkon brtsegs): gang lags pa// sbyin pa de ni sbyin chen lags// bzod pa zab mo skam byas la// de la'ang rtog pa ma byed ces// bgyi ba 'di 'dra bka' stsal pa// dpa' chen khyod na ngo mtshar lags//

113a6(dkon brtsegs): la'ang num rtog ma byed ce/ dgon pa'i gnas rten byed pa// dben pa'i gnas kyis gsungs pa mad // rlom sems yongs sus sa pA ye// sbyin pa rtag tu sbyin pa / 
113a7(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes mi 'jug pa// de ni dul bral mtha' yin no// zhi ba'i gnas las mi gatsho ba'i// tshul khrims yongs su sbyang bar bya// bdag gigi tshul mdzes rtogs pa// de ni tshul
113b1(dkon brtsegs): brtan pa'ang brtsam pa thos// 'dus byas kun kyang spang ba gyis// dben par zla bang kang yin pa// de ni sangs rgyas brtson 'gras gsung // dngos po 'dams de med pas na// dang sa
113b2(dkon brtsegs): cad bsreg par bya// nyon mongs med pa gang ldan pa// na teg mad bsam gtan yin// tshul na pa rom min// dbus su'ang gnas par mi bya ste// dus gsums ma la gang yan
113b3(dkon brtsegs): bad da ni shes rab dam pa yin// dkon pa'i 'du shes pasnyam pa zhing // 'du shes de la'ang ba lta ma bya// 'du shes gang las skyes 'gyur te// des de 'du shes med ces bya// chos kyi spyan pan/ 
113b4(dkon brtsegs): yon tan dang // de bzhin phan yon rnams kyang bstan// de nyir rlom sems med pa yis// de ltar thos pa chos kyang shod// yi ge rnams ni byed med de// rang bzhin kyis na grub pa med// de phyi//

113b8(dkon brtsegs): bya/ dbyang chub dam pa don du gnyer/ gang zhig 'jig nyen mgon po'i sku// mtshan gyis brgyan pa ci 'dra ba// de 'dra 'dod pa de yis ni// byang chub mchog la gnas par gyis
114a1(dkon brtsegs): chos kun rgyu las 'byung ba ste// byed pa po ni dmigs su med// chos rnams brten nas byung ba ste// yang dag rang bzhin yod min zhes// bgyi ba 'di 'dra bka'
114a2(dkon brtsegs): da ni gas//  de 'ag nas kyis pa ya da la skye tshogs su da / smras sa ga du gyung ba dang / 
114a3(dkon brtsegs): 'ar dang / zha'a' 'bring gzugs marnams dang / steng ge bar snang la lha gang dag 'dus te 'khor ba gyur ba dag pas srog chags brgyad khri ba zhi steng gas blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs
114a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// sems can chad med/ grangs med bdag gis na dag pa'i rtsub sna tshogs yangs su sgrub pa'i rgyu bskyed pang gyur te/ 'di snang de nas khye'u chos
114a5(dkon brtsegs): chos bzang gnyis par snang de las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de'i zhabs la gtugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag
114a6(dkon brtsegs): nAg gnyis sangs rgyas com ldan 'das dang / dam ze'i chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun pa skabs su ma'o// bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung chub tu rnams
114a7(dkon brtsegs): desams kyi rang bzhin gyis byung chub kyi dang bzhan rjes su rtogabagyid lags te/ bcom 'phru las 'dir sems bskyed pa de ni 'dis ste/ chos thams cad skye bam mchis
114a8(dkon brtsegs): lags so// 'dir sems bskyed pa de ni 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa ma mchis pa kho na lags so// de ci'i slad du zhen/ gang la mngon par zhen pa mchis pa de la ni/ 
114b1(dkon brtsegs): bA ga' zhag mchis kada'/ gang la mngon par nan pa bumachis pa de lan rgya ba 'ga' ya gas pa'i slad dus/  ldan 'das de lta lags pa sa rnamaH ma
114b2(dkon brtsegs): ci'i slad du smra ba ma mchis pags pa ston/ dem skye ba'i/ ni 'dug pa ma mchis pas 'i byed du sna ma sa chos pags pagyi ste/ sgrub ma mchis pa des ni 'dzud pa de yang 'adz+ra
114b3(dkon brtsegs): par mi bgyiro// de ci'i slad du zhan/ de tsam du brjod pa mchis pa de tsam du skye ba dang 'gag pa mchis kyi/ de ltar la shes shin du rnam par dag pa gang lags bdab ni skye 'am mchis/ 
114b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gag pa yang ma mchis la/ gang la skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa mam ces pa de ni bsama' chal ba ste/ gtan du bas pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das da/ 
114b5(dkon brtsegs): lags pas bdag cag gnyis ni mnyam pa nyid kyi mtha' 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon las 'debs shing chos 'ga' la yang dmigs par ma 'gyid/ 
114b6(dkon brtsegs): sa 'ad yas tha ba mi bgyin nom 'gas sa mtha rnas pa ma me pa te ga lags pa khon rjes su rtogs par bgyi bar bas kyi chom 'ga' gang 'artogs par mi bgyid
114b7(dkon brtsegs): dang cib slad du nis chos thams cad ni gzod ma nas dam par dag pa'i slad du'o// 'od srung de ltar khye'u gnyis kyis de skad smras pa na byang chub sems dpa' khros ni mi skye ba'i chos
114b8(dkon brtsegs): ma ma byu// rgyal tha tha pa da da da bran mad kyi yang da par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tumams brjod / 
115a1(dkon brtsegs): 'ad srung danas dacan na gshegs pa ma tog sna chags das nam zas kA bya ba mang da pa lags nas spang ba med bzhag ste/ phyag bcabs nas rgyam po ru drud dpa/ 
115a2(dkon brtsegs): skya ba zal po che de dag la chos kyi gtam yang dag par bstan/ yingad dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzong stod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas rga
115a3(dkon brtsegs): pos bzhengs te gshegs so// 'od srung de nas kyi chos dang / chos ba'ang gnyis kyis pha mal gsol ba btab nas dad pas kyi mnas khyim med par legs pakhon
115a4(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba'i phyir mngon par byung ngo // de gnyis rang gi grong khyer chen po nas mngon par 'thung ba'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rab 'byung sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsnga
115a5(dkon brtsegs): ngas 'brung de bzhin gshegs pas bsngags// khyi ma gnas nyin mangs gnas pa ste// dka tshas rnam par 'jig par byed// ga nag dgar ba'i ngos rnams ni// nyams pa ma/

115a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis// ma mas bzhin du 'chi bar 'gyur// de ltar rgya mtsho rgya klu rnams// 'bab bas mas par mi 'thung ba// de bzhin gyis pa 'dod rnams la// btsun 'arnams
115a8(dkon brtsegs): ngoms mi 'gyung // dper nas ni sra dag dang // shing gi nams kyang ngoms pa med// de bzhin gyis pa 'dod rnamasas// 'dod pas rabs par 'gyur ba med// 'jig rten rnam
115b1(dkon brtsegs): ra// khyis kyi gnas na gnas mdzan nas// bram 'anas 'ayod//  ga sangs rgyas jig rten mgon// gang bram ngan 'das gyur pa// kun byed dgan par rab dgan du/ 
115b2(dkon brtsegs): da rgyab brnas // da sa sa mas // basbyin da masas// khyis gnas sa/  du'ar// sheg sa

116a1(dkon brtsegs): brtson pa// de dag dben pa stan byed cing // de dag dgon par dga' 'gyur shing // de dag khyim la dga' ma 'gyur // da ni sangs rgyas rnam dgaH// spyod yul gnas dang spyod pa/ 
116a2(dkon brtsegs): gang shig lam 'dir 'jug 'gyur ba// de la byang chub bdad dka' man// chags la sogs pag par ba yi// sems can bral byang su mdod pa/ don khyim na gnas pa las// skrag ci na

116a4(dkon brtsegs): chos bzang gnyis tshigs su bcad pa de dag sgra zhing grong khyer chen po de nas phyir blang nas bcom ldan 'das me tog sna tshogs ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de
116a5(dkon brtsegs): bas la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gnyis bcom ldan 'das las rab tu 'thung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzo
116a6(dkon brtsegs): sung shing bstan par rdzogs par mdzad do// 'od srung de nas rgyal bas gyu cad ga sung sa yinas buthu po rgyal srid la bzhag ste/ bu stong du gcig gis mtshang ba rnams dang yang
116a7(dkon brtsegs): lhan cig/ bud med brgyad kri ba ni stong dang yang lhan cag/ rgyal po lnga skyong tsam po de dag dang yang lhan cig/ skya bo phal pa che gzhan dag dang yang stan cig tu thams cad khyim gyi gnas
116b1(dkon brtsegs): lta bar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par legs pa kho nar rab tu 'thung ba'i phyir mngon par byung bar gyur to// de'i tshe na srog chags bye ba tham pa mngon par byung bar gyur ta/ 
116b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa me tog snga chags de gal ba der dang ste byin nas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs gnyis la mag khas rtag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces
116b3(dkon brtsegs): gsal to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cig bcom ldan 'das la pa rab tu 'byung ba dang bsten par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob par 'gyur lags sam/ 'od srung de nas
116b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des sems can de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su mud nas skye ba'i tshogs de dag thams cad rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa
116b5(dkon brtsegs): mdzad de/ dge slong gi dngos po la rab tu bkod do// 'od srung de nas rgyal po mu khAd kyis ngu thu bo rtsal srid la bzhag pa gang yin pa de yang zhag bdun 'das pa dang / gcig pu
116b6(dkon brtsegs): dben par ma nas 'du shes kyi rnam par rtog pa 'dis bu 'di smras te/ bdag la rgyal srid kyis tsaH/ dbang phyug gis kyang cig ste/ bdag 'ad pa myur ma du reng 'dod pa mi
116b7(dkon brtsegs): ces nas bran bde ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su spang bar ni ma bya'o snyam nas des de'i mdal rab tu 'byung ba'i sems chen po bskyed do/ des chos bcwo lnga zla ba nya
116b8(dkon brtsegs): tshe gling chen po bzhi po dag tu ma ba'i chen des tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// kha ba'i pha ma phu ru dang // rtsal ga rnams kyang rab 'thung phyir// nges par thung ste chos ngan par// 
117a1(dkon brtsegs): srog chags bye ba tham pa byung // nga la khyim gyis ci bya ste// bdag kyang dar ni 'gro bar bya// gal te byed cag 'dod gyur na// 
117a2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'thung ba byung// sems bskyed byed pade dgas// lam ldan shin na dka' bas// nga dang 'grogs te myur du 'dod//  dag kyi mnas kyim med par// b+hangasas
117a3(dkon brtsegs): byed pa// de dag bden chos gnas kyis la// khyim ni legs par bsrung gyis shig/ 'od srung da ltar rgyal bu gzhon du das tshigs su bcad pa de dag sbas par// gleng chen po ban pa
117a4(dkon brtsegs): khyim na gnas pa la sems dka' ba'i sems can na ga cig kyang thung bar ma gyur te/ thams cad rab tu byung ba'i sems dang ldan zhing rab tu 'byung ba la gzhol ba dang / mngon pa
117a5(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba'i bsam pa dang chas te gnas par gyur to// 'od srung danas de bzhin gshegs pa ma tog sna tshogs dam sems can de dag thams cad kyi lhag sdebasam pa zugs su spyad nas gling 'an
117a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gro dang / gro lta dang / klung dus dang / yul 'khor dang / dz+hali ba'i bzang thams ca du bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun kyi 'khor da banas pa
117a7(dkon brtsegs): dag sprul ba mdzad do// 'od srung de nas rmi chen po ban pa'i 'dog tan gyi khams de na sems can gcig kyang khyim nas gnas par ma gyur te/ de dag thams cad dad pas la ba nas kyis byed/ 
117a8(dkon brtsegs): de ltar rab tu blang ba da dag la mchis ma btab 'bras pa la' 'bru dag kyang thung bar byung / dpaga' sam gyi shing dag la ba da ga 'amam kyi po
117b1(dkon brtsegs): gam na pang dag kyang blang bar chung cing lha rnams kyang dedag gi g.yog dang bsnyen bkur byed par gyur te// 'di sa dge slong chos dang / chos bzang dganyis da lta ga bla nas kyang ban
117b2(dkon brtsegs): brtsams shang gnas par gyur te/ de gnyis la bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa gsum gyi bar du dam yang rmug pa dang gnyid kyis kun nas non par ma gyur cang rnam yang zas zab ma gtogs par 'dug par ma kur
117b3(dkon brtsegs): su song bkas bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje' gnas dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang bsgrubs par gyur to// deganyis nas gang dang gang du 'dug pa dang skyil
117b4(dkon brtsegs): byung ba'i sa 'phrogs de dang de dag thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin du kun du gnas par gyur to// phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas b+hA ba sdig lkun 'bum phrag dag gis chos ston pa rnams kyang thos
117b5(dkon brtsegs): bzung ngo // de ltar thos shing bzung nas kyang gzhan dgal rgya che yang dge par bstan par yang gyur to// 'ad srung gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag la nyan thos
117b6(dkon brtsegs): theg pa par gyur pa'i sems can gang dag yin pa de dag las sems can gcig 'ga' tsham yangs sa smra bar gyur pa bzhin 'chi ba'i dus byas par ma gyur te// gang dag thams cad kyi
117b7(dkon brtsegs): le khon du gyur ba de dag kyang phyir mi 'ong bar gyur cen/ de dag denas she 'thos nas kyang gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams dang skal bar mnyam par skyes par gyur to// gang dag rang sangs rgyas
118a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi zags par gyur bar dgan donam na'abs nas sangs rbAs ky-i ni snad pa sangs rgyas 'byung ba med pa gzhan dag/ smras par gyur cing / dang yang da dag b+haka

118a6(dkon brtsegs): byams pa ni rgyal bu gzhon nu thu bor gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung ni byang chub sems dpa' n+de gros pa'ang po da

118b1(dkon brtsegs): 'o// dma'i phyi nan/ 2 mdapal gzhan dur kur pa 'di na rnam chada'i dus na kye'u chos shes bya bar gyur te// kya rgyas pa'ang zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa dan byang chub sems da

119b1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid yin na// ting nge 'dzin dang / shes ba dang / rnam par bral ba dang / rnam par tham pa'i ye shes mthong ba dag kyang mngon par 'dubyed pa med pan mtshan nyid yin no/

120a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa yang mchad par 'gyur khyad cag nyid kyang mchod par 'as par 'gyur ro// da bzhan gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la mchad par 'ad pas na bdag nyi

123a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang la la la 'jug par bya ba phyir bstan par zad kyi de dag kyang shin tu mthar thug pa dang / shin tu mthar phyin pa ni ma yin no// cad srung las gang mas pad par bya ba'i phyir 'jug pa da ni dag sbyong ga

123a7(dkon brtsegs): sa dkar ba can rnams kyang re shig de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa ltar bcas pa rnams la slob par byed pa na phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur na/ mi thun pad dag ni bstan pa 'di
123a8(dkon brtsegs): la rab tu bla nas rnam par grol ba dang rjes su 'thud pa tsam yang sgom par mi byed na 'thob par lta ga la 'gyur te de ni gnas med do// 'od srung yang phyi ma'i ma phyi ma 'dus lnga brgyab ma na

129b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sku gzugs 'di g.yo ba med pa dang / stod pa med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang mtshan nyid de lta bu kho na yin no// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i skug
129b6(dkon brtsegs): ba sa kyis nyan pa ma byed/ bac+doMm par mi gra/ kyang bar mi byed / reg par mi byed sems par ma byed/  ra ma byas ldang ba ma byed/ dbugs 'byung bar mi byed/ thugs nubapa ba skyed/ 
129b7(dkon brtsegs): papar shes par mi byed pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ chos thams cad ji lta ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang mtshan nyid de lta bu yin no// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa
129b8(dkon brtsegs): / zugs 'de 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa yang ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams su gtogs pa yang ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa yang ma yin pa de bzhin du thos thams
130a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang dang 'draste/ de zhin gshegs pa'i sku yang mtshan nyid de lta bu yin no// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'dis tshu rol yang med/ pha rom yang med/ khar
130a2(dkon brtsegs): yang med/ thog ma yang med/ 'jig pa yang med/ drub yang med/ spyod pa yang med/ blang ba yang med/ dor ba yang med/ bya ba yang med/ byed pa yang med/ ltung ba yang med/ bden pa yang
130a3(dkon brtsegs): brdzun pa yang med/ bden pa mngon par rtogs pa yang med/ kun tu 'dod chags pa yang med/ yid 'byung ba yang med/ 'khor ba yang med/ mya ngan las 'das pa yang med pa de bzhin du
130a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ chos thams cad ji lta ba de bcan du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang mtshan nyid de lta bu yin no// 'od srung de ltar de de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la 'jug pa de
130a5(dkon brtsegs): des rab tu rtog par byed pa na nyon mtshan du skyil ma kru ba nag par mgur cing ngas nyin mtshan de la mngon par shes pa lnga dang / tshangs pa gnas pa bani dang / spobs pa thogs pa med
130a6(dkon brtsegs): ngabasgrubs par gyur// ting nge 'dzin kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba yang bslabs par gyur nas de la snang bar yang byung bar gyur te/ sdang 'ablang bar dgyur pa des lha'i mig rnam par dag pa ma
130a7(dkon brtsegs): sa shin tu 'das pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag kyang mthong ngo // lha'i rnab bslabs pa med pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
130a8(dkon brtsegs): sa bstan pa thams cad kyang thos te/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gis chos bstan pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis pas chos bstan pa la sgrib par bkur cing thams cad kyang
130b1(dkon brtsegs): mnyes par byas so// 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po de zla ba bdun gyi bar du 'chag cing 'dug par gyugyu te/ shes pa'abs ma gtogs par ras gzhan yang ma za zhing lha rnams
130b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa gnas 'i mas la mdangs brdeg par yang gyur te/ 'od srung byang chub sams dpa' brtson 'grus chen po des gos drangar sreg dag kyang ma bgos/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
130b3(dkon brtsegs): pang mngon sum du ma mthong / bslab pa'i gzhirnams kyang ma blangs med kyi/ 'on kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rjes su thob cing de ltar bslang ba 'dod pa 'gyur la ltos/ 'od srung byang chub sems
130b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rab tu rnam par 'byed de/ ci nas kyang 'phel bar mi byed pa dang / 'bri bar mi byed pa de de ltar rab tu rnam par 'byed do// 'od srung byang chub sems dang
130b5(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus chen po des de bzhin gshegs pa'i su de la bsnyen bkur byas pa de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i skul bsnyen bkur bya'o// 
130b6(dkon brtsegs): des de ltar bsnyen bkur byas shing yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog par byed pa na ye shes chen po'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dag kyang bskyed par gyur te/ ye shes kyi rnam pa des phyogs bcu'i sangs
130b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das chud med/ grangs med/ dpag tu med pa dag kyang mthong bar krung / de dag chos ston dag kyang thos par gyur to// 'od srung de nas byang chub sems dpa'
130b8(dkon brtsegs): grus chen po de na gas khrod de nas phyir bung ste/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal mo po brang 'khong dag tu shugs nas sems can rnams pa chos ston par bya
131a1(dkon brtsegs): phrag chags mkhrin phran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems sa bkod do// sems can chad med grangs med pa dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
131a2(dkon brtsegs): dmas dag la bkod par ga so// nga sa gnyis dang / btsun mo'i 'khor bdag dang / 'khor gzhan 'ams ma dathen med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa byang chub tunganges par byas so// 'od srung de
131a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dresun byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod nam nur dang / yeng gnyis dang / bcom pa bar kur na khyod kyis de ltar po blta
131a4(dkon brtsegs): cada'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po zhes bya ba der gyur pa'i phyir ro// 'od srung de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byang chub sems da
131a5(dkon brtsegs): 'o dzin pa bzhi 'bras chen pa dang / de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sem sadapa' sems An pa bsam pa ldan su ma tshogs pa rnams kyis rjes su bya
131a6(dkon brtsegs): 'od krung yang kyi gyi ma'i nas lnga brgya pa tha ma la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo thabs la mi mkhas pa/ brkam pa/ 'dod pa zil gyi mdon pa
131a7(dkon brtsegs): srung bar 'gyur te/ de dag ni ras bcos bu dang rtsig ngos la bris pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs gzhan dag la mchod pa byas pas dngos grub dang / rdzu 'phrul thob
131a8(dkon brtsegs): shing / de dag 'di snyam du bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byed pa yin gyi/ gzhan dag na mchod pa byed pa ma yin no snyam du rlom sems su yang 'gyur te/ de dag dge nu
131b1(dkon brtsegs): la po des bdag la bsod par byed/ gzhan la smod par byed cing gan des 'cha bang sems pa pa'ang 'od sru pa'i tshod gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed du bcug pa dang / 
131b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dus pa dang / gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa rnam pas tshogs dag pa gtags par de ltang lu ma 'i sangs su tshol bar mi 'gyur/ kha ton po byed/ bsam gtan ma sgom/ nang du
131b3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag 'dzag la gces par sems par mi 'gyur te/ de dag de'i chen khyim pa dang / rab byung bdag gis mchod dang / ri mo bya ba dang / shes pa dang / nan tu yongs su shes par yang
131b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gra dang/ gzhi des de dag gtso los gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / phan dang / na ba'i gsas ldan dang / yo byad dag kyang rnyed par 'gyur ro// 'od srung ngas ni byang chub sems dpa
131b5(dkon brtsegs): gsan mas kya las su 'a ste/ ma rnams kyi rung ba la gnas me pas pa sa su brgyas par byar zhes pacan / de dag pad rkyen du ma rnams 'tshal gan gnas mam
131b6(dkon brtsegs): bcal baspangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir btsun para'agyur zhing gzhi sa 'tsho bar 'gyur bar sems pa la ltos/ de nas bcom ldan
131b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dral gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa de dag gi sgra dang / g.yo dang / gya gru de dag ma
131b8(dkon brtsegs): ngomatshar lags so// bad bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa dag gis mdo sde 'di lta bu zos nasarba
132a1(dkon brtsegs): nag tum khrims kyi phung po yongs su sbyor bar me bgyid lags/ bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang 'di rje ste/ slad ma' tshe slad ma 'das na rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi rungag
132a2(dkon brtsegs): smog par 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'ang byin gyis brlab tu gsal// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brta
132a3(dkon brtsegs): na po la 'di gad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srung na bzhin gshegs pas gnas rnam pa 'di lta bug ci sbyin pa dang / yang dag par na pa ma med dag thams ca na rigs kya
132a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / rigs kyi bu ma dadag nyid kyi tshod duste/ 'di ltar de dag gis chos srin ma grangs 'di thos par dkrung zhing thos nas kyang spyan de dag yongs su spang bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// bcom ldan la
132a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ gnas brtan 'ad srung chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen po byams pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' das
132a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / ma dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkonas
132a7(dkon brtsegs): namoshes bri ba'i 'i rkyen shu gsus padzugs pa// lcags kyi mkhan po ma
132b1(dkon brtsegs): sa mang+gA nas na kyi d+ha pa banan ma gas su ma sags na phags pa don mchog gas na pa 'dos na sa grangasas rdzu dran
132b2(dkon brtsegs): nyi shurtsa bzhi pa ste 'dul ba rnam par gtan la dpa' pa nye' lakho tshomathus pa/ bam po dang pa// rgya ga skad du/ ar+yabi na ya yon shA pa u pA ShA
132b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam ma rnas suH/ ba shad du/ 'phags pa rnam par gtan la dpapa pa nye ba ma kyis rnas sa / sangs rgyas sa byang chu ba sem
132b4(dkon brtsegs): mas cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das pa nyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na/ dge slong lnga brgya/ 
132b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong rnam pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la glang
132b6(dkon brtsegs): sbyangs kyis gapags bka stsas pa/ rigs kyi budag myed pag kyimam ma'i san dam pa'i yingasas pabang kyi'i phyir de mam mams pas brnas pa skye la
132b7(dkon brtsegs): grangs med par yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di yang dag par gzung ba dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir thabs dang
132b8(dkon brtsegs): la dang / bsam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su sbyang bar su s+ho// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa stan las langs te/ bla kos zhag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus ma
133a1(dkon brtsegs): gapas pa'i langs la brtags// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs la mo skur pa btud nas bcom ldan 'dral 'das
133a2(dkon brtsegs): sna pa'i ngas na dpa pa'i chos yangs su bzung ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pas bsal bye khrag khrig 'jam phrag grangasemamachis pa yang dag par bslabs pa na
133a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dag pang rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di yang dag pa dzin par snre zhes so// rgyang chub sems dpa'i seng gis gsol pa/ com ldan 'das bdag ni thabs dang / rdza mi dang / bsam
133a4(dkon brtsegs): gas kyis rnams can rnams yongs su skyeng bar go legs sa// byad d+ha ba sems dpa' lagan rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams na ngong du
133a5(dkon brtsegs): drapar se lags so// 'dzem dpal gnod nu gyur pas gsol pa/  ldan 'das bdagan sems dadepas kyi gang rag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par
133a6(dkon brtsegs): raspro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' ye shes rtog gis gsol pa/ som ldan 'das bdag ni sems can ma 'tshal pa rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par stso lags sa
133a7(dkon brtsegs): ngachub sems dpa' chos kyi tog gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni chos kyi srid pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par sgrol gso// byang chub sa
133a8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tog gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdagan tas ma kyigasems can rnams yangs su smin par bgyid par sgrolags so// byangan pa sems dpa'anam ma
133a9(dkon brtsegs): la pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni theg pa pade bas sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' bag chub med phra gsol pa/ bcom ldan
133b1(dkon brtsegs): mas cad kyi khams mthar bas pa dag yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang / yongs su 'dzin par spro lags so// byang chupa sems dpa' bzang skyong gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag rna
133b2(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu mchis par sgrogs pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' thogros mi 'ang pas gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdagan smon lam rgya chen
133b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan gyi khams bsam 'tshal ba rnams yongs su thar bar bgyid par sprolags so// byang chub sems dpa' bla'od gan dur gyur pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag na bde ba'i yo byad thab
133b4(dkon brtsegs): dkyis sems can rnams rab tu dkod par sprolags so// byang chub sems dpa' meg bzang gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba'i rtsa ba nye ba
133b5(dkon brtsegs): srub par sgrol gas so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang chug gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni ngan song dang ngan 'gro dag las sems can rnams yongs su
133b6(dkon brtsegs): blo lags so// byang chub sems dpa mthu/ ni thog gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni ngan song dag las me rgal ba'i sems can rnams sgrol bar sgro lags so//  rgyab sems
133b7(dkon brtsegs): gas can gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems cad ma dul ba rnams 'dul ba'i shul nye bar ston par sgrolags so// byang chub sems dpa' yang bzangs kyis gsol pa/ 
133b8(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag ni sems can dman pa la mos pa rnams yongs su srin par bgyid par sgra lags so// byang chub sems dpa' des pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can shes
134a1(dkon brtsegs): so// byang chub sems dpa' nyan mo pa med pa rtogs par khang du chud pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag de shul yang dag par spyan pa sa rgyam rnamapa yong
134a2(dkon brtsegs): dper bgyid par bra lags so// byung chub sems dpa' ma bar dgas gsal pa/ 'tsham ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnamams cad pa ma byed tshams mchis padag nye'ang srung bar
134a3(dkon brtsegs): sa so// bya chub sems dpa' dbang po bzang gis gdol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sdug bsngal dran par bgyid pa la sems rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par stsolas s+ho// 
134a4(dkon brtsegs): mas da rnas par tha bas pa gyis mi khyab pa la yang dag par zhugs pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan nas bdag ni bsams pa tsam kyis yi ngogs kyi 'jig rte du skyes pa'i
134a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' la sas tha par bgyid par gro lags so// byang chubasam sa dpa' ni 'on gyis gsal pa/ ma ldan 'das bdag ni sems can yongs su masmin par rnam sa ngas su smin par
134a6(dkon brtsegs): myed pang spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' drim med par grags pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems ca rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi
134a7(dkon brtsegs): sme lags so// byang chub sems dpa' ga'i brjid spobs kyi mi gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams kyi ngan song gi shul 'gums par spolags so// nga
134b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' yi gnas srung gas gsas pa/ bcom ldan 'das sa da da rnams rnam par sprulags so// byang chub sems dpa' bgatsha ba med par gnas pas gsal pa/ @
134b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag nisems can rnams bsdu ba'i slad du legs sa zhes brgya ba sgom pa na lags so// byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal gyis gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag na sems can mas
134b3(dkon brtsegs): tshogs dang ldan pa rnams mas par yub bzhin du yongs su sred par bgyid par sgro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' gnas pa dpag med kyis gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems sa
134b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dus ma pa ces kyi shul nye bar ston par sgro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' phas thams cad la bag tshab med par gnas pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag rnams pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa
134b5(dkon brtsegs): mas can rnams la mos pa su ya bzhin yang dag par smin pa spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag de sems can rnams la rim
134b6(dkon brtsegs): kun tu sten par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gzugs sdug pa ston pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par 'gyid par spro
134b7(dkon brtsegs): lags so// byang chubs pas dpe'i 'dri me dgazi brjid kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag de gzugs pas sems can rnams yang dag par 'dzin cing yongs su smin par bgyid pa sgrol
134b8(dkon brtsegs): bsems dpa' no bu bzang gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dag ni sngon gyi skye ba rjes su dran par bgyid pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par sgro lags so// byang chub
135a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' bas nams 'damang kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni yang dag pa'i smod lam gyis semasmranas 'dun par sgro lags so// byang chub sems dpa
135a2(dkon brtsegs): dpal bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams sdug bsngal dag las gtan yongs su thar por bgyid par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' las
135a3(dkon brtsegs): na po ches gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams rin po che dag gis bde bar bkyed par sgo lags so// byang chub sems dpa' blo gros kyis gsol pa/ bcom
135a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag ni sems can dbul po rnams kyi dbul ba ma mchis par bgyid par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'a
135a5(dkon brtsegs): dag ni sems can rnams nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongs su thar par bgyid par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i 'od kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
135a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la shul bzang po/ bar ston par sgro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' yan tan gzugs sbyin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bsam pa thams cad
135a7(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar bgyid pas se ldanan rnams yongs su thar par bgyid par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' chos mngon par 'phags kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni lems
135a8(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi mig rnam par spyad pa ston par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams sgrib pa dag las yongs su
135b1(dkon brtsegs): bar bgyid par do lags so// byang chub sems dpa' tshal 'brang gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das pa dag na chos kyis sems can rnams yongs su thar bar bgyid par spro lags
135b2(dkon brtsegs): ba sems dpa' ci yang min gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i dug thams cad gzhil bar spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa
135b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jos ldan 'das bdagra rnasems can ma samachos kyi phyogs rab tu ston par grolags so// byang chub sems dpa' sang ge sa kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sa
135b4(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la chos kyi sbyin pa sgom bar spe lags so// byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nu 'od kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams dman pa'i gnas nas yongs su bar par bgyid / 
135b5(dkon brtsegs): legs so// bya drung ba sems dpa' sangs rgyas dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni shul bzang po ston pas ngoms can rnams kyi nganu seng gi shul 'gog par skalags sa/ 
135b6(dkon brtsegs): ba sems dpa' gser 'od kyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni lus ston par sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par sgrolags so// byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams
135b7(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dag ni sems can don bgyid pa rnams kyi don bgyid par sgrolags so// byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba 'dzin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'ad
136a1(dkon brtsegs): ba lagasas// byang chub sems dang 'dra ba can mya 'od gnon dur kur pas gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag na srad par srad ma 'dus na 'di bstan pas
136a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa rab tu rke bar bgyid par sgrolags so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ro'i bus byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i ga
136a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa bstan pa de lta'u 'di thos nas ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung bar 'dzin par gyur te bcom ldan 'das pa 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyi mdze tsam du byang chub sems dpa
136a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po 'di dag snying rje chen po dang thabs la mkhas pa bsam gyis mi khyab cing brtson 'grus brtan pa'i go cha chen po bgos pa dang / ji tsam du sems can thams cad kyis thul bar
136a5(dkon brtsegs): dka' ba dang / gting dpag par dka' ba dang / bsnyen par dka' ba dang / ji bar dka' ba dang / zil gyis mi non pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa ngo mtshar lags te/ bcom ldan 'das ga
136a6(dkon brtsegs): yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gze ba de zil gyis minon pa rnams kyi drung du mgo dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / mig slong bdag mchis te/ dngos po thams cad
136a7(dkon brtsegs): spong bar bgyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kun tu 'am par mi bgyid/ sgyid lug par mi bgyid cing rab tu spro bar bgyid pa ni bdag ngo mtshar du 'dzin las
136a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gzhan gang dag 'di snyam du sems lags te/ sems can gang su dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la gnod par bgyis te nang nga phyi'i
136b1(dkon brtsegs): dag sung bar bgyid pa de dag thams cad na rnam pa tha ba bsas kyis ma khyab pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa chen po na stag tu gyur blangasams lags so// deska cas dasum
136b2(dkon brtsegs): sa na las kyi ci na sa mA /  sa //  zhes/ !sa? ma 'arnam / 'bas dang / shes papa / 
136b3(dkon brtsegs): kye lul ni de lta bu len te/ shA ri'i bu byedran pa sems dpa' rnams kyi yul dan nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin no// shA ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che
136b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni sem sa rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kun du ston par byed kyang byang chub sems dpa' chos nyidade las mi g.yor/ 
136b5(dkon brtsegs): le'u de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni sems can khyim bdag gi rgyags pas myos pa rnams la dbang phrag gis rgyags pa bsal ba'i phyir khyim bdag gi gzugs
136b6(dkon brtsegs): ston par byed do// sems can spobs rgyags shing myos pas rnams la spro ba'i chags pa bsal ba'i phyir chen po che chen po'i stobs dang / sred med kyi bu'i spro ba'i stobs nye bar ston par byed do// 
136b7(dkon brtsegs): dmya ngan las 'das pa don du gnyer ba rnams la mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam sna tshogs nye bar smon par byed de/ nyan thos kyi theg pa don du gnyer ba'i sems can rnams la ni nyan thos kyi che
136b8(dkon brtsegs): ra nyan thos kyi gzugs nye bar ston par byed do// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa don du gnyer ba'i sems can rnams la ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'dras pa
137a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyag rmaldan par byed pa na dug rnams cananams lanasangs rgyas sa rnams can yang dga' la'i bar bye 'byung / 
137a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi gzugs nye bar ston par byed do/ rA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni thabs sna tshogs kyis sems can kyi khams yongs su smin par byas nas
137a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la rab tu 'gad par byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bud bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes shin tu mya ngan las 'das pa'i rnam par thar pa ma gtogs par sems
137a4(dkon brtsegs): can rnams kyi rnam par thar pa gzhan med de/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i phyir nga// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas ni de bzhin nyid ji lta ba bzhin 'di thugs su chud de/ de
137a5(dkon brtsegs): rede bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba dang / gdags pa sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams la rnab par rig par mdzad de/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba dang / dge ba'i chos
137a6(dkon brtsegs): da dang ldan pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba dang / sems can bcings pa rnams la thar pa nye bar ston par mdzad pas de'i phyir de ni
137a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa zhes bya ba dang / sems can lam ngan par zhugs pa rnams la las bzang po nye bar ston par mdzad pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba dang / stong pa nyid gsung ba dang / 
137a8(dkon brtsegs): nga da spa nges par kung bas de'i byar de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i phyir ro// shA ra'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni byis pas so'i skye ba rnams
137b1(dkon brtsegs): sram ya dag rjes su rtags par bya ba'i byor mos pa ji lta ba ban du rnam par dag pa rnam pa sna chags kyis rnam par ma ba nya bar ston par byed kyang byang chub sems dpa' chos shing sum
137b2(dkon brtsegs): snying po 'o ba bya phyir sems can ma thun bgadamapa chags kyang nye bar ston te// shA bo bu gzhan la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa khyaman gnas pasan
137b3(dkon brtsegs): pa gnyis la gnas par bya'o// gnyis gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ chos sbyin pa dang /  meng sbyin pa ste/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa khyim na gnas pas ni rjes su chags pa
137b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / khong khrob med pas smin pa de gnyis la gnas par bya'o// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu byung bar gtogs pas ni sman pa pani la gnas par bya'o// gzhi ga shen/ 
137b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ b+hag gu sbyin pa dang / sdug Na sbyid pa dang / glegs bam snyan pa dang / chos srid bste/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu blang bar gtogs pas na sbyin
137b6(dkon brtsegs): dedag la gnas pa bya'o// shA ri'i du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skye ba'i tshes li pazod pa thab bas ni gtong ba gsum la ga nas par bya'o// gsum gang rnyen/ 'di lta ste/

137b8(dkon brtsegs): rkang pa dang / mag dang / pags pa dang / rus pa dang / rkang yongs su gtong bste/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi
138a1(dkon brtsegs): dag pa gnas par bya'o// shA ra'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'ad man kyas ma 'jigs lags sam/ na sdang dang // te mug gas ma 'jags
138a2(dkon brtsegs): lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ro'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi khan ma thob can po dang bcas pa'i nyes pa ni gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhen/ 'dis ste/ na sdang dang ldan par
138a3(dkon brtsegs): gti mu ga dang ldan paskye/ shA cuganyis pa di dgan byeng chub sems dpa' dmas kyi khanam tho ba chen po dang bcas pa'i nyes pa menano// shA ri 'u la bad chagasas khanam tha be dang bcas
138a4(dkon brtsegs): hung la 'bral ba bul ba yin no// na sdasngang ni kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa cha la 'bral ba mur ba yin no// gti mug ni kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa che la 'bral pa bul yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA
138a5(dkon brtsegs): bu 'dod chags ni 'khor ba'i 'azhi shing kun tu 'dzin pa'i phyir nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i sa bon yin pa dang / na sngang ni myur du yongs su spong ba'i phyir ngan song du 'gro ba'i rlur gyur pa yin pa dang / 
138a6(dkon brtsegs): brag ni rnam par 'grol bar dka' ba'i phyir sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad du rab tu ltung ba'i rgyur gyur pa la na pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bu de la byangabachub sems dpas nyes pa dang po'i spyi boni tshogs
138a7(dkon brtsegs): bcu pa drang por bshags par bya'o// bud med kyi lag pa nas 'dzin pa'i lag pa'i nyes pa lci ba ni tshigs lalnga la bshags par bya'o// nyon mongs pa can gyi sems kyis mig gis bltas pa
138a8(dkon brtsegs): shes pa de gang bag gcig ga so/ gnyis kyi mdun du bshags par bya'o// byang chub sems dpas mtshams med pa lnga dang ldan pa'i nyes pa dang / bud med kyi zhes pa dang / khye'u'i nyes pa dang / 
138b1(dkon brtsegs): gas pa'anyas pa dang / mtshad can gyi nyes pa dang / dag 'dun gyi nyes pa dang / dpas gan nas 'arnams nasangs dun tha ma ldan 'das na cig sungs mtshan ci
138b2(dkon brtsegs): / de la bshags pa na 'ang yin te/ bdag me 'di zhes bgyi ba/ sangs has la skyabs su mchi'o// chos la skyabs yu mchi'o// dge 'dun la skyabs su mche ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dang
138b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo ji nyi pos rab tu 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// rin chen 'od 'phro la phyag 'tshal lo// klu dbang gi rgyal po la phyag
138b4(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal lo// dpa' bo'i sdel phyag 'tshal lo// dpel dgyes la phyag 'tshal mo// rin chen me la phyag 'tshal lo// rin chen zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// mthong ba don yid la phyag 'tshal lo// 
138b5(dkon brtsegs): na zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo// dri ma med pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dpas byin la phyag 'tshal lo// tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// tshangs pas byin la phyag 'tshal lo// chu lha la phyag 'tshal
138b6(dkon brtsegs): swab+ha'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal babangs la phyag 'tshal lo// tsan dan dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// gzi brjid mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo// 'od dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// mya ngan med pa
138b7(dkon brtsegs): dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// sred med kyi bu la phyag 'tshal lo// me tog dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i 'od zer rnam par rol pas mngon par mkhyen pa la phyag
138b8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i 'ad par rnam par rnam pas mngon par mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// nang dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// dran pa'i dpal sa phyag 'tshal lo// mtshan dpas
139a1(dkon brtsegs): tu yongs bklags la phyag/ 'tshal lo// dbang ba tog ga rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo// shan// rnam par gnon pa'o dbam la phyag 'a
139a2(dkon brtsegs): g.yul las shin tu rnam par rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam par gnon pas gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// kun nas snang ba bkod pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// rin chen pad+ma na
139a3(dkon brtsegs): don pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i bad+ma la rab tu zhugs par dbang gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de dgal
139a4(dkon brtsegs): sogs pa'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gshes pa'i sa
139a5(dkon brtsegs): tas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag gi skye ba 'di dang / skye ba thog ma dang / tha ma ma mchis pa nas 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i skye ba gzhan dag tu sdig pa
139a6(dkon brtsegs): las 'gyes pa dang / bgyid du stsal ba dang / bgyid pa la rjes su la rang ba'am/ mchod rten gyi dkor ngag/ dge 'dun gyi dkor ram/ phyogs pazhi'i dge 'dun gyi dkar thogs pa dang / madz+rag
139a7(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ 'phrogs pa la rjes su ye rang ba'am/ mtshams ma mchis pa lnga'i las bgyis pa dang / bgyid du stsal ba dang / bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba'am/ me dge ba bcu'i las kyi la
139a8(dkon brtsegs): par blang ba la zhugs pa dang / 'jug pa stsal ba dang / 'jug pa la rjes su yi rang la dam/ las kyi sgrub pa gang gis bslebs nas bdag sems can dmyal bar mchi ba'am/ dud
139b1(dkon brtsegs): nas su mche ba'am/ ye dwags kyi yu du mcha ba'am/ yul mtha' 'dzang tu skye ba'am/ zla klung skye ba'am/ lhaHrangs pa
139b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur 'am/ sangs rgyas 'thung ba la mnyes par ma 'gyed par 'gyur ba las kyi sgrib pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad sangs mas pacom ldan 'das ye shes sa srur ba/  du gyu ba/ 
139b3(dkon brtsegs): dgyur ba// tsha mar gyur pa/ mkhyen pa/ gzigs pa dag gisun sngar 'tsham mo// 'chags so// me 'dzub bo// sman chad kyang sdom par ba gyid lags so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bdag la
139b4(dkon brtsegs): su gsol/ bdag gi skye ba 'di dang / skye ba thog ma dang / tha ma ma mchis pa nas 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i skye ba gzhan dag tu sbyin pa than dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa labs kham gcig tsam stsal ba gang
139b5(dkon brtsegs): lags pa dang / bdag gis tshul khrims bsrung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / bdag gis tshangs par spyod pa lo gnas pa 'dag pa'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / bdag gis sems can yongs srin
139b6(dkon brtsegs): par bgyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / bdag gis byang chub kyi sems kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / bdag gi smon med pa'i ye shes kyi dge ba'i rtse ba gang lags pa de dag thams cad
139b7(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu bsdus shing bzlums te bsdoms nas bla na ma mchis pa dang / gong na ma mchis pa dang / gong ma'i yang gong mar yongs su bsngo bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs
139b8(dkon brtsegs): 'asngo bar bgyi'o// ji ltar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnapas kyis yongs su bsngos pa dang / de ltar ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yongs su bsngo ba
140a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / nga myur du su bcom ldan 'das rnams ltar yongs su bsngo bar mdzad pa de ltar bdag gis kyang yongs su bsngo bar bkye'o// sdig pa thams cad la
140a2(dkon brtsegs): sod dbasod nams thams cad kyi rjes su yi rang ngo // sangs rgyas thams cad la gsal ba 'debs so// bdag gi ye shes bla na med pa'i mchog tu gyur cig/ me mchog rgyal ba gang dag da ltar
140a3(dkon brtsegs): zugs pa dang / gang dag 'das pa dag dang bzhin gang ma byon// yon tan bsngags pa mtha' yas tha mchi ba dra kun la// thal mo sbyang ba bsdus te skyabs su nye bar mchi'o// shA ri'i bu thang / 
140a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sum curtsa lnga pa dadag la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i med la byed pa dag gis sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag par bya'o// 
140a5(dkon brtsegs): ra sdig pa thams cad rnam par dge ba de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag nyid kyang sems can rnam par dbang bar bya gzon de phyir gal nye bar ston par mang dudo// bzhin du byis pa mi ma'
140a6(dkon brtsegs): 'khrul pa rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir chog 'brurnam pa sna tshogs nye bar ston par 'ad dkyang chos kyi dbyings las kyang ma gsol sems can mos pa sna tshogs dang snyan po rnams ngos pa /

140a8(dkon brtsegs): sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro
140b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po bkod pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyirakhyab bdag gi gzugs nye bar ston par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

140b3(dkon brtsegs): ka'i brjid drag po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na sems can yongs su smid par bya ba'i phyir brgya byin dang / tshangs pa'i gzugs nye bar smon par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems

140b5(dkon brtsegs): nyes su med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs nye bar ston par byed de// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
140b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs nye bar ston par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' dzan
140b7(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir mos pa ji la ba bzhin du gzugs nye bar ston par byed de/ shA ri'i bu de ltar/ skyes
140b8(dkon brtsegs): budam pa rnams na sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir la lar ni brgya byin
141a1(dkon brtsegs): chos man //  shin/ 2rnas su chub sems dpa' na sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i byams pa cwa tshogs dang ldan pa'i bems nam
141a2(dkon brtsegs): par yang byed pa'i phyir ro// shA re'i bu 'ding snyam du sems/ ri dwags kyi rgyal po seng ge'i sra skad gang yin pa de byi las bzod par nus snyam 'am/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni me bzod

141a4(dkon brtsegs): ni me bsod lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ro bu 'di de snyam du sems/ brgya byed dang / tshangs pa dag gi gzi brjid kyi bdag po gang yin pa de mi dngul pos bzod par dus
141a5(dkon brtsegs): snyam 'am/ shA ri'i bus gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni me ba 'od lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ga/ shA ro du 'di snyam du sems/ bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lde ge pha rol gnon pa
141a6(dkon brtsegs): nga yin pa de bye rgod kyi klag kus 'bod 'ar dus snya ma 'am/ shA re'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mi ba'od lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sum pa/ shA ri re Te de bzhin du byang chub
141a7(dkon brtsegs): papa rnams kyi sems dpa' ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs bskyed pa las byung dang shes pa lasanges par nyung ba'i zhes pa gang yin pa dang / nyes pa'i 'gyod pa'i gnas/ sangs rgyas
141b1(dkon brtsegs): oM ting nge 'dzin pa rnams par 'jug pa zab pas rnam par srung ba gang ldan pa don salas can thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis rnam par sbyong bar mi nus so//
