166a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po byams pas 'di sad ces gsal te// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar dkar po'i chos yongs su spang ba'i slad du 'du 'dzinangs pa mang po'i skyon chags shing yon tan ma mches la gno
166a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ldan te/ 'du 'ji nyi mongs pa 'phel bar bgyid cing spyod pa bzang po ma lags pa ngo mtshar lags te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sem pa dpa' mkhas pa dge ba 'tshal ba su zhig sa/ 
166a5(dkon brtsegs): 'ung dga' ba la mngon par dga' bar mi bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas sla ba la dka' ba'i skyon rnams ji ltar brtag par bgyi// byang chub sems dpas gang rtogs na don rnam par nges pa
166a6(dkon brtsegs): da nas rtag papa 'angs su bad par yang mi 'gyung ba lags// de gad ces gas pa pa dang / 'amam ldan 'das kyis bya chu ba sems papa thams dang can sa byims par 'dzin ces
166b1(dkon brtsegs): bka stsal te// byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' phra ba la dga' ba'i nyes dmigs nyi shu yod par btag par bya'o// nyi shu gang she na/ byams pa 'dril dge slong smrab la dga' ba ni mang du thos pa
166b2(dkon brtsegs): mthong yongs su spangs pas sems kyi spyod dmu rgod du 'gyur ba dang / slu ba'i skrag pas spags pa pa dus ma yin par sla bar 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i shes pa ma thob pasam bsdams pa
166b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / lha dang klu rnams kyis mi bkur bar 'gyur ba dang / so sa yang dag par rig pa thob pa rnams kyis brnyas par 'gyur ba dang / lus mngon sum du gyur pa rnams kyis skyo bar 'dra
166b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / sgrub pa la mi gnas pas yid la gcugs par 'gyur ba dang / the tshom ma spangs pas rab tu mi brtan par 'gyur ba dang // sgra lhur len pas bos pa dang bye brag phyed pa nyams par
166b5(dkon brtsegs): 'bur ba dang / rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul can yin pas 'dod pa'i yon tan la chags par 'gyur ba dang / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog par mi byed pas myur du chos spong bar
166b6(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang / gzhan dang gzhan ces pas me brtan ning rten med par 'gyur ba dang / sems yongs su mdul bas bkur sti med pa thob par 'gyur bas/ chos kyi dbyings
167a1(dkon brtsegs): / de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// thos pas rgyags nas zhus par mi 'gyur te// rnam par 'gyed pa'i sla ba rnams la chags// brjod par 'gyur shing shes
167a2(dkon brtsegs): med par / sgra ma dga' ba nyes pa zhidan so//  ni sems las shin du bas gyur// lum dang sems kya brdzu sa mayin gyur// ma pa d+ma ni ma por 'gyur//  dga' ba'i nyes
167a3(dkon brtsegs): byes padam pa'i chos bsam rab tu nyams// sems ni mi mnyen shin du rtsub par 'gyur// zhi gnas lhag mthong dag dang rab tu ring // sprul dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go// rtag tu bla ma dag la gus pa med// spags pa'i
167a4(dkon brtsegs): ka zhi ga' bskyed// snying ba 'ad la gnas shing shesar nyams// sgra ba dga' ba nyes pa'i ga go//  ni chog rnams kyi mi kyi shing// da ci 'ang 'dapa mi skye la// tho mo yang garin lam nyams
167a5(dkon brtsegs): la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go// gang dag lus ni mngon sum mang yod pa// mkhas pa 'di dag gis ni bar 'gyur// de'i srog ni don med 'gyur ba ste// sbrul dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag do// bdag ni smra pa nyams dngon pa
167a6(dkon brtsegs): 'i dus tshe byis pa bya ngan byed// gaN+Di rnyed ma byur shin du sdug bsngal 'gyur// sbrul dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go// tra bskyod bzhin du 'gu shing g.yo ba ste// de ni de ltar ze chom 'gyur du sa// dononam yang blo brtan ma
167a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur te// sbrul dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go// gang la sti ba'i grod na 'dug pa zhig/ dpa' bo gzhan gyi yon tan brjod pa bzhin// bdag nyid nan tan nyams par 'byung ba ste// sbrul dga' ba'i rnas pa 'di dag go/ 
167b1(dkon brtsegs): mi sems ni dpa'i rnam shes la// rab tu chags shang sgras rgyags shes rab nyams// log par sems shing lam ngan 'gro bar 'gyur// skal dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go// de ni g.yo ldan yang shizhing bechad 'gyur// pri pri ting
167b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'byed bcos// 'phags pa'i dam pa'i chos las rab tu ring // skal dka' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag 'o// a ts+tsha d+hi sta kris ni dgar 'gyur te// mi sa ldan pan zhing 'gyur ba yin// gle slor de'i sems ni
167b3(dkon brtsegs): yo bar 'gyur// sma la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go// nga gi rnon shes pas dman pa'i phyir// rmongs pa de ni gdan kyi drib 'jog/ de ni nyon mongs phyogs kyi dbang du'agro// skul dga' ba'i nyas pa 'di dag go// sdig cang
167b4(dkon brtsegs): 'khrul cing de bzhin rnapa'ang 'khrul// sna la bar 'khrul cing de bzhin lce yang 'khrul// lus kyang 'phrul cing yid kyang 'khrul bar 'gyur// sprul dga' ba'i nyel pa 'di dag go// yun rong dus nas sprul dga' bas na/ 
167b5(dkon brtsegs): nyid dag pa mi 'thob po// tshig ga ga mtha' las 'thob pagyur ba/ tshigag cig tsam grig sasam pa ya mchog yin no// bu ma thun snying po tsha yang med// dka' bar bya ba'i dzini nang ni 'dug/ shun pa thos gas mis
167b6(dkon brtsegs): pa ma'o// nim po rnye par nus pa sa yin no// ji lta bathun pa da zhin sgrub ste// do / bani 'dri la don semam yin// de bas sbal dga' spongs te// rtag tum g.yong byo 'don soms shig/ swA ba'i nyes pa 'di cu
167b7(dkon brtsegs): rtogs gyur cing // don gyi yon tan mchog 'di shes nas ni// 'di na byang chub mkhas pa gang yin pa// des ni don bsam pal dga' bar gyis// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
167b8(dkon brtsegs): sa 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lnga smrab la dga' ba'i skyon rnams dang // don la sems pa'i yon tan rnalas de bzhin gshegs pas legs par gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar lags so// bco
168a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das byang chub sems dpa' snying po 'tshal ba rnams the ba don bsam pa btang ste snying po ma mchis pa'i slab la dga' bar bgyid pa'i rngo mi thog lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' bem
168a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa chen pos nyid kyi dga'abs dpa' ba'i rkyen deltar gag pas te/ bya chum se pa sa de ba zlas na dashes padang // nyad rjen pa migs yo nas con 'phru rgyamani yongasasu khyob sa
168a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur 'a lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa 'di la gnyid la dga' ba'i nyes dmigs ni rnam pa nyi shur brtag par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rtog na brtson 'grus rtsom pa la dga'
168a4(dkon brtsegs): nyi shug shen// byams pa 'dis bya bachub sems dpa' gnyid kyim ni rdugs pa dang / gnyid kyi zhon te lel che bar 'gyur ba dang lus sha/ che ba dang / mdog yongs su ma dag pa dang / de'i 'byung
168a5(dkon brtsegs): chen po rnams na bzhis non par 'gyur ba dang / de'i me'i khams chung bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i kha zas legs par 'ju bar mi 'gyur ba dang / de'i lus la 'bras dang po la mig 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / le lo can du la
168a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / de'i gti mug gi dra ba rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i shes rab nyams chung bar 'gyur ba dang / de la zas 'dod pa las mig rgyu bar 'gyur ba dang / de gti mug gi mun pa rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang
168a7(dkon brtsegs): del mi ma yin pa rnams bkur sti mi byed pa dang / sems rtul bar 'gyur ba dang / mi ldang ba mang bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i sems pagal nyal gyis kun nas dkris shing 'dug par 'gyur ba dang / de dge ba'i chos la
168a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dun par mi 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad khas nyams par 'gyur ba dang / spyod pa zhum par gyur nas brtson 'grus rtsom pa rnams kyi spyod pa la smod pa dang / 'khor gyi nang du song na brnyas par 'gyur ba/ 
168b1(dkon brtsegs): tshebacom ldan 'das kyi rigs su bcad pa 'di dag paga'adum te// gang gzugs dang she la dga' 'gyur ba// de'i lus ni ye ma thegs ma tshan//  ma de buM she lanan mi byed// de 'i mdon cang dag par 'gyur ro// 
168b2(dkon brtsegs): na 'gyu /  na she sa ma/  tsud pa la ma che // da'i rnamapa 'jug par byas// she grus/ 
168b3(dkon brtsegs): pas sto sa dag cing // lus kyang skyil po bdog pade ma yin// de'i tshig kyang gsal bar mi 'gyur ro// gang shigazugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba// de 'i lus la phol mig mang po 'byung // don nyin dang mtshan du bde bar nyal// de
168b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams meb par 'byung bar 'gyur// ka shig cugs dngaganyid dga'a'agyur ba// ces byan cing btsun 'grus pangs sunyams// da ni las nyams na nor rnams 'gribs// de'i rtagatanan cing sems kying mongs// kyi
168b5(dkon brtsegs): dag sa gyu/  yin pa ni// de pa pa/  la ba /  gsas sa gyu/ dmi sa na gyu/ 
168b6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su gams par 'gyur// ye shes las ni tag tud nyams gyur// gang shi lpags dang gnyid ladaga' gyu ba// mi shes le lo skem las shesar rab 'tshal// me mayin dag gam ga pa rnyed de// nabs na pa nas 'i tshe
168b7(dkon brtsegs): grug/  shi dugs dang na padag gyuras// sems ca ma na de ba na cangs// sunas rten byed pa dpe gnas// che brdzun pa nga ni ga tu sogs// gang sheg drugs dang gnyid lad 'gyur ba// dos ta
169a1(dkon brtsegs): ca pa rgya// zha' ba na mang das ga sa ma//  she shA pa ga da dag dkyi yang rnams se nag/ la kya gang kyi
169a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su gdu ka/ kal nyal ba 'phel ba des mi shes// gang she zugs dang gnyi la dga' 'gyur ba/  gesarabacwag tu mi 'dod// de chos la 'dudu pa byed byed/ mi shing chos ma yin pa de dag byas// gang ni gzugs da gnyen
169a3(dkon brtsegs): bdagar 'gyur // don mong sa zhing chos 'dun pa nyams// khyim ma yon tan kun las yongs sunyam sa// dgar po 'dos ke mun par 'grob gyur// ga shag zug pa dang gnyad pa dga' 'gar ba/ 'jigs par 'gyur ming se
169a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs tu rgyas// de rtag pa chog tam/ mi thu// gnyid ci no sus pa stod pa grus// ga shi drugs dang nyid bdag gyu //  nyid 'i nam ma tshon bya nas/ yo bung ba ldan ga sa kyis
169a5(dkon brtsegs): nas// babs pa yan tan ldanam sre gas// thugs sngal kun dang zla pa ses byed cing // ngan mong yongs su spong ba'i bzhi chung ga/ sang rgyam can gyis bsngags pa'i brtson 'grus 'alags// ga de ni rtag tu brten par kyil/ 
169a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten din pa pogang ci dang // 'jig rten 'das bcogang dan ci 'od sa// btsan 'thus partsam pa la rnyed pa mi ga // mkhas pa su dag brtson 'brum stobs kyis s+ho// gang dag sangs rgyas byang rgya jug 'gyur ba// de dag chub / 
169a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams mthong nas ni// rtag tu brtson 'phrus rtsom pa gnas par byed// 'di ni 'ayis de na gam phrul bya ba yin// de nas bcom ldan 'ad
169b1(dkon brtsegs): sa ngan das bya chub sems dpa' ga ga gzugs padang ga nyed 'i blon 'dis pa di dag sos nang grongs ma kyi me de ga dang na 'am cas pa skyed pade sha cam mangs 'ang rgya
169b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' skyel bar 'tshal ba dang // lhag pa'i ba'abapas blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu mngon par rdzogs par ci byab rgyal ba su sheg sang dag pa gnas 'din bu ri
169b3(dkon brtsegs): na pa chos rnams paseM pa mi baches na sa natan mngon di na ma nam rgyab kyi na pa g.yengs su rdzogs par 'gyi ba sang pa zhig yon pagru brtsom par mi byed
169b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas ga nyid la dga' pa'i nongs dmigs dang / brtson 'grus tsam pa'i phen mon 'di dag legs par bka'aphrul lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas las la dga' bang 'jig rten pa'i grag pas
169b5(dkon brtsegs): gsapa'i dadongos dang ga'ade ltar rtag par brtse/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag la brtags na 'dod 'chur zhing bkyi btung la/ dam pa'i chos btsal ba'i slad du rtag tu btson ge sbyor ba la gnas bar 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan
169b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das ses paka snyam pa/ mapa pa 'dis byang ma yim pa pa sems pa chen pos las la dga' ba'i nye sa menas nyi shu brtag pa sa/ byang chub sems dang 'di dag la togan 'dod bcur she bya ba zung sa dam pa'i/ 
169b7(dkon brtsegs): pa gsus dang / ma nod pa dang/ don la brtson pa dag gis zhes pa pa chu dang / nang du pa dag 'jog sa dga' 'arnams ces dang / 'khor yonas dpas med yosasu 'dzin pa'i las tsam pa
170a1(dkon brtsegs): tha dkyi ba sha rnam bya nga sa ma dang / de'i mam dmang 'dzin pa 'ja khaganyung bdag / chags pam par gyu dang /  rnams dus ba 'bya bang/ 
170a2(dkon brtsegs): dbang byed par me 'gyur ba dang / nag byed kying nga rgal can yod smon mang po nyan du gnas pa dang / kyes gyi bya ba dag la ba can nga dang / dar dag la shas cher 'dun cing chags pa sbed pa dang / len pa med par mi dga' ba dang / sa
170a3(dkon brtsegs): sa man sems mang ba mas kyi sreb brgyan du ngan par 'du byed pa dang / dag bzhin dang/ dag bsnyen pa ma rton par 'gyur ba dang / dpas kyinam par rtog pas nyin mtshan 'ad bar byed pa dang / 'jigarten pa'i bya bdag rgyan
170a4(dkon brtsegs): 'byed pa dang / mi rigs pa'i sgra bdag la man par dga' bar 'a ba dang / zhal dbyed pa'i rgyag pas tshams pa tshungs 'ar myo pa rnams dbang drug gis tshor gcod par byed pa dang / dngas kyi 'phrul bas rtog cing ba ga
170a5(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul ba la mi rtog par 'gyur ba dang / don dang ldan ging rnam par nges pa'i gtam dgas sbyin par brnam par 'gyur ba ste/ byams pa nyi sh+lo be de dag ni byang rgyal sems dpa' las la dga' ge shal ta byed pa'i'ajug pas spags pa'i
170a6(dkon brtsegs): dmigs yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' da ga la rtogan 'dod brgyang ning bya btung bar 'gyur la 'jig rten pa'i babasangs nas 'jig rten lam 'das pa'i bya ba la brtson par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe com ldan 'das kyis tshigs
170a7(dkon brtsegs): sus dpa 'didag paka gyus to// de ni la ba na gapa gnas 'byar zhing // las cog dag las de kyang yang rig// 'di ni pa tshal sa ris 'gyur// rnam par chags sems nyes pa 'di dag yin// dge slong chung nod pa rtson
170a8(dkon brtsegs): dag gams sa// del brnas ga 'ad par 'i srid pa/ khams gtan byed pa rnams kyis ldang bar 'gyur// dgatul la gnas skyon ni 'di ga yin// 'bang pa'i las la mngon par can pa dang / thar pa la min kyang mi sa
170b1(dkon brtsegs): bar gnas// de ni yul 'khor bas la mi rigs spyod// nyes pa 'di ga las la chags pa' yin// rtag tu dngos po dag na len par byeng // yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dag ma byed// na med nor ni don du gte ba kyang// nyes pa'ad galas pa
170b2(dkon brtsegs): chags pa'i len// khyim du smra ba dag la chags par 'gyur// 'dra' de dga' bsamams cad 'jig par byed// gze kyi nang da' thug bzhin du 'gyur// nyes pa 'ded ga las lachags pa'i yin// khyim pa'i las la de sdug kyang da byed/ 
170b3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su gdungs par gyur kyang yid mi 'byung // rnams kyang tshig ni btsun par mi 'gyur te// nyes pa 'di dag pasal dga' bal len// thams bskul na bka' blo me bde zhing // rjes su bstan pa 'thun par 'dzinu mi byed// de ni myur du
170b4(dkon brtsegs): sems nyams par 'gyur// nyes pa 'di dag las bdaga' ba'i yin// gyis na gnas pa'i las rnams rtag sems pas// de ni rtag tu 'dod par 'gyur ba ste// bsam gtan dang ni spong ba de mi byed// nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yir//

170b6(dkon brtsegs): na ro gyur// nyes pa 'di gams ga' ba'i yin// dpas nyan tan dmams dran pas phur// la ba rnams 'phel zhe dab 'byur te// sid pa'i ye gi gagisadam ngab//  pa de pas la
170b7(dkon brtsegs): /  mkhan pa byin/ khyon pa 'ad semapa rten pa byed// tshul ming gnas pa dag lta bag // nyes pa di shul pa la dga' pa'i yin// nyid can du sebs pashA da sa ni// yang shes rgyan du sems pang / 
170b8(dkon brtsegs): //  teg yon tan 'ded pa yin// nyes pa 'di dag pas la dga' ba'i yin// de ni 'jig rten pa'i bya ba 'dri// rigs pa yin pa'i smra ba rnams la dga'// rigs pa'i sgral de ni dga' mi 'gyur// nyes pa 'di dgalas la dga' ba'i se
171a1(dkon brtsegs): rdo rtson rnams pa deni rtagatug she/ dang gnyis pa pa de dag des rgya gcod// mi drug las rnams mngon par 'a byed de// shes pa ni dgapas la dka' ba'i ses//  ga taman tu na tan cig// ba ga
171a2(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba'i sgo rnams sem sa/ so tan zhu nams la 'phru 'chog// nyeb 'dod pas la shi' ba mes/ byis pa de ni garkan gyi 'byangs ma/ deni pa sa dag ma cho rten te/ thanyams pa san mngon pa shes
171a3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur// nyes pa 'di dgra las la dga' ba'i yin// gdo 'gyur shes pa 'di dgram thong nas ni// lus ngan dgal bu zhig dka' bar byed// dpa' bodag ni rtag tu las mchog byed// byal ba gang 'im rgyud ni gnon mi byed//

171a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang // thub dbang rnams kyis rtag tu bsngags pa yi// babang po'i la rnams gang yin de dag bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang/ 
171a6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa 'a ban ga chos kyi mtshig yongs su spang pa nas la sangan ba com pabaded ga ni shes rab shin tu rgyu shing shes ba gyi dman par 'gyur ba lags bo// de sad ces gzil ba dang / bcom ldan 'das cis byang chub sems
171a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'disad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// 'i skad smras pa zhin te/ byang rgyal sem sa dpa gang dag chos kyi mchog yongs su spangs nas las ngan pa com pa de
171a8(dkon brtsegs): da de la nga shi sa pa rgyas dang// byas pa ba gad sa kyang ma ba kyi ldan kya chud par byamo// bya tshul ma dpa ga zhus gyu med kyis tan me / 
171b1(dkon brtsegs): med cing 'don pa med pa dang / mang du thos pa yongs su tshol ba med pa da na na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba ma yin no// byams pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa ni bsam gtan dang spong bas bye ba dang / ye shes kyis 'dus byas

172b1(dkon brtsegs): ma can ma nas pa dang /  pa ma ma pas rgya dang/ 'ang na tshar ma dang / de na pas chubs gyur dang / de la ma dga' bar gyu ba nga/ de
172b2(dkon brtsegs): chos byas pa rnam pa byab mi 'byung bdag / phyes pa rnams med par 'gyur bdag ga tu da pa dang / tsed pa dang / 'cha mas patsu ba dag 'ja pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'ched ngan sor du 'grol 'gyung ba
172b3(dkon brtsegs): 'a byed pa byas /  byu ma 'an pa dang/  sa pa ga ma rgyas dang /  na nan na
172b4(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad kyis yongasas spangs par 'byung ba dang / sdig pa'i thogs po rnams dang nyur du zad par 'gyur ba dang / dgaka' ba'i lam gyis nges par 'byung bar 'byung ba dang / rgyun mi 'chad par mi
172b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dub tshig thas par 'gyur ba dang/ gas su skyes pad sa man du bya dang /  ma pa can po dag ra 'byung ba dang /  da ra phyopa sa brtson pa la ma char 'byung bar gyur / byas pa nyi tha pa / 
172b6(dkon brtsegs): de rno kha la dga' pa'i nye ba cig ba rnams 'dor brtsub pa yin te/ de dag pangs su nga bar bya'o// de de tshe com ldan 'das gyi mtshogs su bcang pa 'di dag pa ga sus to// den tshe 'dis de bar mi 'gyur te// babad 'i zhing gro nga
172b7(dkon brtsegs): / pa/ de ba mas ga' bas gyur bcwa/  tshwa mu da shes pa yin to//  kya de 'ang 'dis byas // spang kyiphyogs bya de bdaga' bar 'byung / da' ga ca chos rdzu cang 'bya// da pa nye pa'idi
172b8(dkon brtsegs): dgag/ da ni na las kyang dge ba mi byed de// 'tshig tha dang rgyal gnas pa dang // nganas 'gro ba'i pham ni byed par gyug/ spros spyod dag nyes pa 'di dag gon mi mdzes pa dang bstan mi lkug dang // de ni tag tu rus rigs dma' bar 'gyu
173a1(dkon brtsegs): rnamags nga na pa gyur te//  shad dmarnas pa 'dedag// lung mas rnams legs par miganas shis lung mnos pabyas pad sa pa par 'byab// na pa'i bshes gtanan mas cang rna ma
173a2(dkon brtsegs): dbyes ded// yin na ma yi mdud rten cing // rtag tu des ni the tsho mched par 'gyur// tshu spyod de 'i nyes pa 'di dag go/ don mi chom brgyad dang rir mi 'gyur// de ni dal bldan pa'i mchoga'i 'gyur// de la gnod pa di dag rtag
173a3(dkon brtsegs): sa spyod de yi nyes pa 'di dag go// de'i dge ba dag la bar chad mang // bgegs su 'gyur bas myur du 'thob mi 'gyur// brtson dang ldan lang de la dgra rnams 'byung // smes spyod de yi nyes pa 'di dag go/ mkhas pas nyes
173a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di yang dag rten sa de// spros pa thams cad yongs su spang bar bya// blos khyod dag ni gnod pa rnyed par sla// lta bas na smos la gnas mig// gang la spros pa'amartsod pa yod pa las// ngasag rab sa yi pa rol 'gro ba mchog/ gang / 
173a5(dkon brtsegs): tan yongs yod pa de ga rgya// bud sa zhig pa gnas shi 'du //  na 'dod na tan 'ad rnams// sngang ba'i sems kyis rtsod par mched ni// rkyed shing 'de shi sa mchod bya med// gang ma dod pyir 'did/ 
173a6(dkon brtsegs): byung ba sgol khye btur ma bu da po med// khyim dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyang med pa yin// dran po khrod rtse med cing dbang phyug med// rab tu byung nas rjod par ma byed cig/ ni ni rab tu zhi bas bsten pa'i// 
173a7(dkon brtsegs): da lagras na ni//  zhishis pa byas// smras nas par spong sa la ba da byed/ sa pa pad pepasan dug 'a ba sungs// slong sa spyod pa sems cand rgyal ba dang //  gron shin rje sa nga
173b1(dkon brtsegs): zu /  na na rgya khyad// chogs paganan bye rgom par byed na// ga snga la napa da 'a pa'i yang sa//  ba ga dang sdig pa med ni// 'dig rten 'dzin danas rnams la 'byung // tshogs par gyu
173b2(dkon brtsegs): 'phel ba med// tshogs kyar rnams pa dka' ba' lta gyur na// mkhas bsta tshogs bskyed mi byed// grags tshal dag gis skyon rnams ded mi 'gyur// nams kyang 'khor rnams byed
173b3(dkon brtsegs): che// 'atan pa gang yin de sa ni bzod pa byed// smos brgyas pa la ni byon dang chags// nyes pa de dgang sa ni bstan mi nug/ Tha tu smras med bsngags pa mthar yas 'gyur//  zhe ga don gnyer de ni bcod pa myed// den pa bcom
173b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das byang rgyab sem sa dpa' debs dang chen pabyasas pa 'di na ce namang ta/ bcom ldan 'das tu nam ta bangs pa de the nidang den gdegs pa sa legs par gzung sa ted pa char lags po// bcom ldan 'das kyi lnga brgya ba bam/ 
173b5(dkon brtsegs): la sa khyo na mos pa'i da pa par ga ga tham pa rgya pa'i sa pa
173b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa dang / gcig pa gci chos ba bsang ba dag ni pa cheste/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i na sdomapa mo bstan pa'i yon tan nang ba na yon pab bdag su nong par mi byed/ maton du'i byed/ 'chang bar ni rtse ba ca
174a1(dkon brtsegs): rnabapa med/ de gshes pa kyi thob pa ga ba matand dang / dang man da dag 'byung ba 'gyur ro// de dag dpa med pades pa nga dgas mtsham 'bar 'gyu te/ kyis lnga lu na sa maldan/ 'a
174a2(dkon brtsegs): //  rjegs ga na da na 'a zhe pa gshegs na ma
174a3(dkon brtsegs): ma tan dadu na man can pag yin pa de 'di las mi 'gyu ni med pa'i phyir na ma pa zlogs byed // de de la sos rlog pa mad rdzabab medag ci 'dod nga bcom du 'byur te/  da pa sa da
174a4(dkon brtsegs): byed de/ midran pa dag gi sa yon tan dang phan yin de dag thos na 'di ltar chas spang bar 'byung ba'i bas 'i rnam par smin pa ni spyad par mi nus po dmadus semasas// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpar sems da
174a5(dkon brtsegs): da 'an sa te// ma lda das shi gshegs pached gse kyi na tan de zhe na gshegs pas gsungs pa ga mags de dgal ba gang shes sems pa skyed pa ga ya nag med papa kyi cheng/ 
174a6(dkon brtsegs): de gshegs pa med gsod pas 'gyid pa des des rgyam kyi ga de skye ba sacwa pa/ bcom ngan 'das sems pargyad pa de gag gas/ des ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'ad kyis kyang rgya mas dpa' phes dpa
174a7(dkon brtsegs): sa par 'dis ces pa 'gyus to// byams pa sems bsrud pa ga dag gis de bzhin gshegs pace pagamed ci ya ba ma chog 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du rtse bar 'gyur bar byed pa de dag ni byis pa'i sems bstad pa
174a8(dkon brtsegs): phan pa'i sems bskyed pa ma yin/ kun nyen mangs pa'i sems paskyed pa yin te/ byangam pa sems bskyed pa ni 'acung 'di ga yin no cug shin/ byams pa 'di ste/ sems thams cad pa spyad pa
174b1(dkon brtsegs): zhin zhen/ gas me pa kyi rgya sa sa / na ra byams pa bamabapad pa dang / 'che nga sa te/ mas can ma zhed
174b2(dkon brtsegs): chos bsrung ba'i sems bshad pa dang / thab sgo'i bzod pa la nges par gyur pas dam pa'i chos la mngon par zhen pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / rnyed pa dang bkung stis mgos pas pa la
174b3(dkon brtsegs): khyed pa/ mas lams par byed pa ngan pan deg yi te/ semam paskyed pa lnga po dgalas sems nga yang pa'i semam bskyed pa na na ni sems bskyed pa de ldan
174b4(dkon brtsegs): ba mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas med do// de nas bcom ldan 'dasal chedang ldan pa kun dga' bas 'di skad nges gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lhag pa'i bsam pa bsdug pa'i tshe kyi na mthungs 'did cam dubasas cam mi
174b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzu ba ni mtshar lags so// beshad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyim tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' pa la legs pa nas bya ba byin te/ kun dga' jilegs pa lags po// kun dag ngada' byar byeng
174b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa bskul ba zhes bya pa'i chos kyi nas grangs 'di sa shig/ mo ldan 'das kyi des ces bka' bral nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams pa dang / 
175a1(dkon brtsegs): mas dpa gang / da ldan pa can dga' ba dang / lhadang / midang/ lum pan dang/ rjeb bcas pa'i 'dzirten me sa te/ bcos ldan 'ad kyis gsungs pa man par bdadan/ 
175a2(dkon brtsegs): dka' ba don mchog brtsegs brten can chos kyi rnam thangs le bskong zag rgyab las lhag pa'i bsam pa bskul pa'i se'u zhes pa 'i nyi shu lnga pa rdzogs so// / rgya shar gyi ma ngan po na mi ru dang / suras/ 
175a3(dkon brtsegs): na sa shes sa rgya ma tan pa // 'a na cag shegs min sa
175a4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs byas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di na da ba dag gis kyis bdus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal

175b1(dkon brtsegs): chen po las pa ngas kyis brtsam pan 'das gal ba de logs subalam sbyang bab tud de bcom ldan 'das la ba na ces gas sate// 'tham ldan 'das kyang bu ba mas dpa' sems dpa can ngacha ba dudang ldanan myur du

176a1(dkon brtsegs): /  // gapa byed ya na/ bsla mayin pa'o// byin gan sas/ sbyin gnas payin pa'am/ mngon par shes pam/ mngon

176a3(dkon brtsegs): blam byed/ rim thong byed/ mchod par byed cing 'dun pa drag po dang / dka' badrag pa dang / dang badrag pos de nyung du bdon na lang nyung du sbyin/ mang du bdog na yang mang du byin/ 
176a4(dkon brtsegs): du dgan ra yang du sbyin/ ngan pa padegan yang dran pa sbyin/ canam pa bdagan yang rgyanam pasbyin no// lag ngas des byung chub sems dpa' rgyan sbyin pa dang / rlangs batsho'i
176a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dang / rangs pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa de bzhin du bka ni tsam yang sbyin zhing rlabs pa che'i sems dang / rangs pa'i sems kyi bskyen no// nges pas 'dod pa rnams la sems can thams cad thams

176b5(dkon brtsegs): 'i bas thob par bya ba'i phyi ma sbyin no// ldan 'ad rnamam lan sem can thams cad kyi grub kyi snying po dun nga nyon mangs pa'i slobs pa dun ca ma cad kyi gyid pad 'i rnamam par bya
176b6(dkon brtsegs): tezhig blan meng ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa sems cad po par bya ma'i phyir sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la dka' bub kyi nags tshal gyi
177b1(dkon brtsegs): gdu yang gas pa bya chu thob pa bya bye basbyin kyi byung ba na ma na// sems parnamams cad kyi ben pa mas su mi ca pa thob par bya phyir yongs su mi gcod par byen

180a7(dkon brtsegs): ngas par byed pal dag de'i phyir ro// bdun du// bslangs pa'i tshul lasems can thams cad mes pa pa'i tshul khrims brdzun du smra ba lungs pa la dgod pa'i nga // 
180a8(dkon brtsegs): rung ba spangs po'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad ma snul pa'i tshul khrims chad 'thung ba spangs pa la dgod pa'i phyir ro// de'i shing med pa dang / shing med du 'jug ba spangs par tshul thams na/ 
180b1(dkon brtsegs): sa can thams cad rdo rje ltar me phyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de
180b2(dkon brtsegs): da pa'i phyir ro// de ga ra 'jog pa dang / kor 'jug tu 'jug pa songs pa tshul khrims na mas can thams cad kyi 'grob lnga dgag pa dang bsal pa'i byer ro// de'i dag pa dang / reg tu 'jug pa sngam pa
180b3(dkon brtsegs): khrims ni sems can thams cad bdud dang nyon mongs pa'i bsgrib pa bar du gcad pa thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa'i chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyirar// de'i gcod pa dang / gtsad du 'jug pa spangs pa'i tshul
180b4(dkon brtsegs): mas ni sems can thams cad lus dang ga dang yid kyi las kun du bzungs pa zab par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i bra ma'i tshig spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni g.yog tan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po mi byed pa thob pa bya ba'i phyir ro// 
180b5(dkon brtsegs): tshig rna ba po spangs pa'i rnal khrims ni yan 'ag la pa'i ngag gi la mdang ldan pa'i tshangs pa'i dbyangs thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i tshig thal ba spangs pa'i tshul khrim na tshigs gzung bar 'am brdzogs pa med pa
180b6(dkon brtsegs): / de'i 'chi bas 'jigs skrag pa yongs su sbyor pa'i tshul khrilas ni sems can thams cad kyi skye ba dang / rgab dang / na ba dang / 'che ba dang / myung dadang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sngags sngal ba
180b7(dkon brtsegs): mede mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i 'jigs pa rab tu zhi 'dug ba'i phyer ro// de'i gzhan gyi nor dang ye byad 'jig cing chud za ba yongs su sgrub pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
180b8(dkon brtsegs): blan me phes 'bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i gzhan gyi bung me la 'dzin pa gtang bar byed pa dang / gtong bar byed du 'jug pa'i tshul khrims ni 'khrul pa med pa'i chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// 'i 'gug
181a1(dkon brtsegs): gtong bar byed pa dang / gtong bar byed du 'jug pa'i tshul khrims ni rang gi sems la dbang thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i 'ching ba 'grol ba dang / 'grol du 'jug pa'i tshul khrims na
181a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' bo'i stan byang chub kyi snying por bdud kyi dmag dang nyon mongam pa'i 'ching ba thams cad gcig pa'i phyir ro// de'i khyim nas 'byung ba'i tshul khrims ni sems rnam par grol bsgrub pa med pa thob par bya
181a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir ro// de'i dag pa tshugs pa'i tshul khrims nim 'jigs pa rnam pa bzhis 'jigs pa yang dag par gzhom pa thob par bya ba'i phying ro// de'i rtsod pa zlog pa'i tshul khrims ni kun du snang ba'i chos
181a4(dkon brtsegs): 'tshig smra ba'i tshul khrims ni dpa' bo'i stan byang chub kyi snying por bdud dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa bar du gcod pa thams cad kyis mi slu ba'i chos nyid thob par
181a5(dkon brtsegs): byaba'i phyi'o// de'i bya ba rnams kyi sems byed cing meng 'ab btan par byed pa'i tshul khrims ni g.yog 'phags pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po mi byed pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// 'itshig stan pa dang / 
181a6(dkon brtsegs): das por smra ba'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad kyi nar bdagang sing du 'ong la bden pa'i ngag thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i kun du 'thun pa'i smra ba'i tshul khrims ni char mchod cing gzung ba
181a7(dkon brtsegs): 'os la 'bras bu yod pa'i chos ston pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod pa'i tshul khrims ni 'phags pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i dge 'dun gyi g.yog 'kho can
181a8(dkon brtsegs): pathob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / daltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du btogs pa grangs/ 
181b1(dkon brtsegs): med dpag tu med pa rnams la dus gsum du yan lag lngas gtugs te phyag 'tshal bar byed pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad dpa' bo'i stan byang chub kyi snying por mi phyed cing sral shin du ldan/ 
181b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dad pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang // re nge 'dzin dang / shes rab mchog gi chos nyid dam pa lnga thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten thams cad la ma byed
181b3(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bkang ba thob par bya ba'i phying ngo // de'i dus gsum du chos kyi yon ton la du bsgra ba'i tshul khrim pa ni chos kyi 'khor lo gnas med pa blan med pa
181b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir ro// de'i dus gzu' du dge 'dun gyi yon tan 'arjod pa smra ba'i tshul khrims ni 'phags pa'i dge 'dun mi byed pa'i g.yog la bor chen po thob par bya ba'i phying ngo // de'i dus gsum du danyen mchog
181b5(dkon brtsegs): gsum la skabs su la rno ba'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad la skyabs bla na med pasbyin pa'i phyir ro// de'i dus gsum du 'dzagra rten gyi kham sa thams cad dkon mchog gsum dang / bya chub sems
181b6(dkon brtsegs): pa' rnams kyis stongs par mi 'gyur bar gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshul khrims ni bde bar 'gyur bar gcig tu nges par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i dus gsum du sangs rgyas thams
181b7(dkon brtsegs): cad la bskal bar chos ston par gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshul khrims ni sa bcu pa chos kyi sprin thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i dus gsum du sdig pa thams cad so sor 'chags pa dang / sdig pa thams
181b8(dkon brtsegs): cad so sor 'dor ba dang / sdig pa thams cad la smod pa'i tshul khrims ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par gzhom pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i dus gsum du dge ba'i rtsa ba
182a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad lang dag par 'dzin pa'i tshul khrims ni pha rom dbyen pa thams cad yongs su bkad ba tob par bya ba'i byeng // de'i dus gsum du bangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 
182a2(dkon brtsegs): khams thams cad du gtags pa 'das pa dang / ma'ongs pa dang / daltar thung 'a thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa pa thams cad la ngas su yi ngang ba'i tshul khrims ni byang chub kyi chog sa mapa' yas shing dpag tu med pa
182a3(dkon brtsegs): pa phye ba togs par bya ba'i byed do// de'i sa gas rdzogs pa'i byang chub ston pa'i tshul khrims na rdzogs pa'i byang chubathob pa pas pa la 'jug par bya ba phyir ro// de'i das gsum dudage pa'i ma 'amams
182a4(dkon brtsegs): du rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob por yongams su pa'i tshul khrims n+de gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// 'i dzam dang / bla ma dang / rgan pa dang / slob dpon dang / man
182a5(dkon brtsegs): rol bsnyen bkur byed pa'i tshul khrims ni zil gyis mi nan pa'i chos nyid thob par bya ba phyir ro// de'i 'gas pa dang / sdug pa dang / nyam thag pa dang / mnyen med pa dbyugs 'byin pa'i tshul khrims ni
182a6(dkon brtsegs): dris pa thams cad la mi skyo bar lan 'dabs pa la lung snyan pa la mkhas pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i rgyal po dang/ mthun dang / ma dang / chu dang/ bzhig pa pa spyod pa'i sdig sa sngal gyinang du du
182a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams yongs su bskyab cing grogs bya ba'i tshul khrimal ni gnas dang / sa deng pha rol tu phyin pa chen po yongs su bskang ba thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyam dang / 'phags pa
182b1(dkon brtsegs): na rnams mas na/ nagashegs pa 'du 'phrul sa thun med pa thob pa
182b2(dkon brtsegs): bcu gang nga na 'i las kyi las che tshul/ mas dang / ba rim gyi sems mngon par dga' ba dang / yang dag par dka' bar 'gyur ba'i las gyi las kyi rdul khrims dang / pha rol gyi sems rjes su
182b3(dkon brtsegs): gag las kyi tshul khrims dang / b.rol gyi sems mngon par dga' ba dang / yang dag par dgam par 'gyu sa ga ge yas tshe tshul khrims na de bzhin gshegs pa'i pajam kyi semasas rkyen
182b4(dkon brtsegs): yas bkro' bar bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i tshe 'di'i don dang / tshe rabs gzhan gyi don dang / nyan rdzob kyi theg pa'i don dang / rang sa sa r+thas mthal pa'i don dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi theg pa'i don rnams la sa
182b5(dkon brtsegs): med 'dang / se ba rnams badron pa yang dag par byed pa'i tshul khrims dang / ngan pa 'ardung bar byed pa'i tshul la malan badzad pa med pa'i chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir ngo // de'i chos nyan pa'i rdul khrims dang / 
182b6(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims dang / chos goms par byed pa'i tshul khrims dang / chos nye bar ston pa'i tshul khrims ni so sa yang dag par rig pa dang / pha rol du phyin pa yongs su 'askang ba thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// 
182b7(dkon brtsegs): rdul sems yang dag par yin par 'dod pa dang / sdug par spyad par 'dod na yang lus dang / rag dang / sems kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dathams cad thams can thams cad bskal 'dang / sems can thams cad
182b8(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsdu
183a1(dkon brtsegs): lhag par 'od pa dang / yang dag par blangs pa dang / lhag par spyad nas kyang sems can thams cad bskal ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs
183a2(dkon brtsegs): dbyung ba dang / thams cad mngon pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sas rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba phyir sangs su bsngo bar byed do// gal te tshul khrim pa de mgag pa dang / mar ma pa dang / 
183a3(dkon brtsegs): l+r-i ma mayin par smram pa'i rnam pad mi ldan par byu na de 'di ltar yang dag par sgrub ste/ dus dus su / drang pod cung bang du yang med dge ba spang ba dang / dong ba dang / bsal bar rtsol lo// 'bad do// 
183a4(dkon brtsegs): dus dus su 'am/ cung bad rlung bad du yang dge ba la slob pa dang / mngon par 'phel bar bya ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya bar rol lo// 'bad do// sred pa gzhan du nu ngan yang bum pa ma 'gyur
183a5(dkon brtsegs): tid ga pa mi 'dzu // mig pas kya chub semam dpa' rnams kyi byang chu ba cu sems brjed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems ldan pa dang /  kyi mam grol pa dang / 
183a6(dkon brtsegs): na ba da/ byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa gang chen pa de nyid de dag ga den pa'i tshul khrims yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / dge ba'i tshul khrims la lhag par rjod pa zang med ci dag tu me pa man/ 
183a7(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la phag pa med pa'i tshul khrims bskyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i tshul khrims bskyed par 'dod pa dang / rag sa
183a8(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i tshul khrims yang dag par byed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i tshul khrims yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa de ni dge ba'i tshul khrims yang dag par 'dzi pa dang / dge ba'i tshul khrims la 'ar
183b1(dkon brtsegs): 'ad pa namachag panan// den dam panano// lag pab sa de ltar na byung chub sems dpa' bad pa dang ldan pa yang bde ba dang ldan 'ji tshogs chung du dang / sdug bsngal chung ngu byung du phyin par tshul khrims
183b2(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byedade// lag pa rangs byang chub sems dpa'i ji ltar bdod pa'i ga ral tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed cen/ lag bas pa 'dil byang chub sems dpa' nigs
183b3(dkon brtsegs): dag ging gi lus 'i srog gcod dam/ bdag pa thams cad gagagags/ rlung ma 'phrag gas/ ba nA k+kAHsa/ bra ma dang / deg zug ba dang / chag rgyal bsku'am/ gshilas/ gsod dam/ 'dzin
183b4(dkon brtsegs): d+hag/ degags/ gcod kyang ma nad par ma byed cing tha ma ze sdug nyi ga la na dzin pa mi da // de lta yang dag pa smrab ste/ bdag ces kyi 'ad bams su srid pa dal
183b5(dkon brtsegs): mi dge ba'i las 'di dag byas shing bsags pa dag gi 'bras bu ni 'di yin/ de dag gi rnam par smin pa ni me na te/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu dang / rang gi las kyi rnam par smin pa bdag gis myong ba la
183b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan la slar gnod par bya zhing sla khro ba dang / shar gnyer shing lakhon du 'dzin par bya snyam du sems so// lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par spo ste/ 
183b7(dkon brtsegs): srog gcod pa'am/ bdog pa thams cad 'phrog pa 'am/ chung ma 'phrog pa 'am/ brdzun du smra ba 'am/ phra ma 'am/ ngag rtsub po'am/ tshig kyal bzla ba 'am/ gage ba'am/ gsong pa 'a
183b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'am/ rdeg pa 'am/ gcod pa yang rung ste/ gzhan dgal sngar gnod pa byas sam/ sla khra ba 'am/ shar gnyer shing 'alen du bzung na slar gnod pa byas pa dang / blang khrol ba dang / shang gnye shing la khon
184a1(dkon brtsegs): rung ba'i sdig pa mi dge ba de'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi 'dod pa/ mi sdug pa yid du mi 'ong ba 'debs bdag la las kyi rnam par smin pa dang / las kyi rgyu 'thun pa
184a2(dkon brtsegs): krung tam/ stong kru tam/ de bas lhag par mi 'dod pa dang / mi jug pa dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i sdug bsngal gzhan yang byung ba ma mo// lag pa'angs gzhan yang byang chub sems
184a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ srog yod pas srog gcod par 'gyur/ rdzas yod pas rdzas 'phrog par 'gyur/ na ba'i dbang po yod pas rdzun du smra ba thos par 'bur shing / phra ma dang / ngag rtsub pa
184a4(dkon brtsegs): tshig kyal pa thos par 'gyur la/ lus yod pas lus 'dren pa dang / 'ching ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / rdeg pa dang / gcod par 'gyur te/ bdag nyid kyis sdug bsngal gyi dngos po// sdug bsngal
184a5(dkon brtsegs): ga pa dang /  me nga/ gzhas rdzun pa gan/ nga ga ga
184a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ dper na sa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid ni sra ba ste/ de ni ngobo nyid/ de ni chos nyid/ de ni rang bzhin no// chu'i khams kyi mtshan nyid ni gshe
184a7(dkon brtsegs): god pa'i chos can/ 'gog pa'i chos can no// dbang po sems cad kyang sdug bsngal gyi chos can/ sdug bsngal 'dus te ga pa'i chos can/ sdug bsngal myong ba'i chos can no// lus mas pa
184b1(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'asngal gyi sa/ sdug 'jal 'dus tu reg pa'i chos/ sdug bsngal mang ba'i chos te/ don zad/ de ni chos nyid/ de ni nga bzhin ldan no// srog gi dbang po 'od pa'i chos ca
184b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos can/ 'gog pa'i chos can/ med cing dngas la 'gog pa dang / dbang po drag po sdug bsngal gyi chos can/ sdug bsngal 'dus te reg pa'i chos can/ sdug bsngal myong ba'i chos can
184b3(dkon brtsegs): la sdug bsngal 'dus te reg pa'i ji ltar gzhan dag la spang gnod pa'am/ slar dra ba 'chi/ shang kanyi 'aldan du 'azung bar bya/ deci'i phyir she na/ 'di ni nga ba nyid/ 'dini chos nyi/ 
184b4(dkon brtsegs): dang yin yid no mo// lag pa ngas gzhan yang bya chub sems dpal di lta/ ba 'ang dag par bla ste/ bdag gi sa dang / nang dang / hA dang / sde dang / sa dang / med kyang bdag med ci
184b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag gi mig dang / rna ba dang / s+thA dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang bdag med cing bdag gi med pa yin na/ mkhas pa dag pa dag mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang
184b6(dkon brtsegs): lus dang / yid bdag med cing bdag gi med pa la/ mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lum dang / yid bdag med cing bdag gi med pa dang / ji ltar dga' ba 'am/ rjes su chags pa
184b7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par dka' bar 'gyur ba 'am/ rdeg pa 'am/ slar gnod par byed pa 'am/ slar khro ba 'am/ shang gnye shing 'khon du 'dzin par 'gyur snyam mo// lag bzangs gdan yang byang chub sa
184b8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ 'di lta ste mir skyes pa'i sdug bsngal ni nyung shing chung kai/ be dgas kyi sdug bsngal ni chos mi bzad la ches bzod par dka' ba yin/ dud 'gro'i skye gan
185a1(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal dang / sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal yang ches mi bzad cing bzod par dka' ba yin na/ bdag gis ji ltar sdug bsngal chung shing nyung ba tsam gyi phyir gzhan
185a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa dang / bdag gcig pu la phan par 'dod pas gzhan dgal phyir gnad pa
185a3(dkon brtsegs): de 'dod pa/ 'jig rten thams cad la phan par 'dad pa/ go cha chen po 'gos pa/ yi dam bcas pa chen pos yi dam bcas pa/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi
185a4(dkon brtsegs): na pa yongs su bskang bar 'dod pa lta la smos kyang ci dgas te/ mi bzod pa dang / phyir gnod pa byed pa dang / byer khro ba dang / shang gnyer shing 'khon du 'dzin pas ni sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag / 
185a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs pa'i sa 'thu / btsud pa dang / phyir gnod pa mi byed pa dang / phyir gyi khro bdang / sha gnyer cing la dzin du 'dzin pa mi byed pas sangs rgyas kyi chos na/ 
185a6(dkon brtsegs): sogs shing 'phel te/ yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro snyam mo// lag 'tshangs rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bskang bar 'dod pas mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal
185a7(dkon brtsegs): pas reg kyang gzhan dag la sgrar gnod par mi bya/ slad khro bar me bya/ shar gnye shing byakhon du gzung bar mi bya na/ mi'i sdug bsngal gyis reg pas lha smos kyang ni dgog/ das las/ 'atud das/ 
185b1(dkon brtsegs): da dam/ me snyan pa byab kyang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhra gan na dri ma med cing dag la dkar 'ba' 'a ba'i phyir babod cing dang du len to// de'i drung ba sha pa tam/ 
185b2(dkon brtsegs): sa/ zung sa rgyams pa'i sems dag khri sems dang /  / na pas na/ de' gas rnam ma
185b3(dkon brtsegs): rje'i sems dang / sems can thams cad kyi rdzas su chags pa dang khong khro'ab zlog pa'i phyir 'bod cing dang du len to// de dpa bcad kyang byams pa'i sems dang / hrI rje'i sems dang / sems can thams cad la
185b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dang / sems can thams cad tshul khrims kyi yon tanam ngas shing bla na med pa la
185b5(dkon brtsegs): da par bya ba'i phying ba 'od cing dang du lon to// de rkang pa bcad kyang byams pa'i sem pa dang / snying rje'i sems dang / sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul ci rkang pa bzhi thob par bya ba'i byang
185b6(dkon brtsegs): da cing dang du yin to// de lag pa bcad kyang byams pa'i sems dado/ snying rje'i sems dang / sems can thams cad la zla ba dang / nye bar zhi ba'i tshang gyi lag brkyang ba sbyin pa thob par bya ba'i phyir babad cing dang du
185b7(dkon brtsegs): to// de yan lag thams cad bcad pa dbyams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / pha rol tu phyin badrug gi yan lag dang / nying lag yongs su rdzogs pa dan pa'i phyir bzod tsong dang du len to// 
185b8(dkon brtsegs): dmig sung yang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / sems can thams cad shes bzhin gyi mig gzung drung tho bar bya ba'i phyir sa'od cing dang du len to// de lago gcod pa
186a1(dkon brtsegs): shing rje'i sems dang / sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos chenago zab par bya ba de nying bzod cing dang du med to// de bzod pa 'di dag dang / ngi mi pham pa 'did
186a2(dkon brtsegs): bya bar 'ad pa dang / med 'byu ba dang pan 'a mams can thams da sbrul 'dang / mas nan rnams da la nga / sems can thams cad nga ba dang / mas
186a3(dkon brtsegs): thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do// mngon sum du byed pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / mngon sum du byas pa dang / yid
186a4(dkon brtsegs): sa kyang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi
186a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed do// dal te bzod pa 'di dag dang / ji ci snyam pa 'di dag ma nyams// skyon med pa dang / 'dres ma ma yin par slob pa'i nus pa dang
186a6(dkon brtsegs): par spar na de 'di ltar yang dag par skor s+ho// dus dus su 'am/ cung bad cung bad du yang me bzod pa dang / de snyam par mi byed pa spang ba dang / dong ba dang / bsapa bar rtsol lo// 'bad do// dung dus su 'a
186a7(dkon brtsegs): ngarang cung bad du yang bzod pa dang / ji mi snyam pa la slob pa dang / mngon par 'phel bar bya ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya brtsol lo// 'bad do// srid pa gzhan du gyur pa na yang dus par mi 'gyur

186b1(dkon brtsegs): ba smon lam 'debs pa gang yin pa de nyid de dag gi bdod pa kun du r+m+ma pa dan pa dang / da pa pa da// yA smrab pa dag 'grangs med cing dpag tu med pa yin no// de ci'i phyir she na/ 'di

187b7(dkon brtsegs): mam lams shing stobs su med pa mam 'dus chub pa yongs su rdzogs par 'di pa dang / mos pa dang / than pa thos kya kyidags te/ phyag med pa shA has/ gnyid kyis lag kyang du bzhi dang /

188a1(dkon brtsegs): skad cig la 'phel zhid rgyas 'a lanyung ba ste/ sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i phung po mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa bzhi skye ba dang / rdzogs pa

188a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phung po mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa bzhi dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi tshogs kyi phung po mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa bzhi yang dag par rjes su mthong la/ gzhed las rdzogs
188a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub rnyed par mi dka' bar yang dag par rjes su mthong bzhin du rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob bar 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus sran gi phyir yang ci'i phyir nyams par bya snyam mo// rgya mtsho chen po

188a6(dkon brtsegs): sa su med pa san pa de dag la ni mtha' dang su yod pa ma yinan/ bdagra gas sems kyi byed cig sems kyi da cag la dge ba rtsab byang chub kyi tshogs kyi rgya mtshatshan pa bzhi yo dag 'dal
188a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas na rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ba la srog gi phyir yang ci'i phyir brtson 'grus nyams par bya skal mo// lag pa'angs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ 
188a8(dkon brtsegs): nga ge dang / stag dang / byed pa/ kye spyang dag / bya rgod dang / zung drung dang / bya ga dang / 'ug pa dang / yin pa dag / spang ma dang / klang bu dang / gzung du gyung pa dad/ gis kyang byang chub mngon par rdzams pa
188b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas par gyur na/ bdag mi gur bzhin du srog gi phyir lang ci'i phyir rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus nyams par bya snyam mo// lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dang
188b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar yang dag par smra ba ste/ mi 'argya'am/ mi steng gis kyang sangab rgyas nyin togs shing khre la na bdag gis kyang ning ci'i phyi sa rtogs shing thob par mi 'gyur/ gang gA'i klung gi bye ma skad kyi de bzhin gshegs

188b7(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thob par 'grung ba dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chubs 'i bar 'gyur ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'thung ba'i chos gang yin pa
188b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dag sag dang gsol ma 'bar 'a bzhin du dag par rgyun tu nyan to// nges par byed do// rtog go// mangs ma ma mo med 'ani shing bzhin du byed cing yidi la byed pas mdung thung dag gis bzlog kyang de bano na

189a3(dkon brtsegs): su gzung ba med pa bzhi po 'di dag ni sems can thams cad kyi nye bar spyad pa dang / yo byad du gyur pa rnams yin no// lag bzangs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang rang gi lus sems can
189a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi nye bar spyad pa dang / yo byad du gyung bar byed de/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma dang / rgan pa dang / nad pa dang / mgon med par

189a6(dkon brtsegs): su 'jud pa dang / 'thun par byed pa dang / yang dag par bkod pa dang / grogs byed pa dang / grogs su 'gyur ba dang / dge ba 'thun pa dang / dod 'thun pas rjes su zhugs nas mngon du dad par bya ba shing ba
189a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi theg pa la 'os pa rnams ni nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'dzud do// 'dul la// 'god do// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'os pa rnams ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la'o// rdzogs pa'i #

189b7(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa thob par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brten zhing rtul ba brtan to// de'i brtson 'grus 'di dang / rtul ba 'di mngon sum du bya bar 'dod pa dang / brtsam

191b8(dkon brtsegs): lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pabad pa la gnas pa btang snyoms pa 'ogs 'jodra ba ste/ bsam gtan gsum pa dzags par byas te gnas so// dbade ba yang spangs te/ 
192a1(dkon brtsegs): / swa nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba yang nub pas bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa/ btang stobs dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bas
192a2(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan bshe ba rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de sems can thams cad la bde ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas byams pa tshad med pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de sems can thams cad
192a3(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas snying rje tshad med pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de sems can rnams la dga' ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas dga' ba tshad med pa rdzogs par bya

192a7(dkon brtsegs): du shes yid la byed pas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de rang gi dbugs rdu ba dang 'byung ba ji ltar gnas shing ji lta 'jug pa bshin du rgyun dru
192a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams la yang rkun thung ba'i 'du shes dang / rkun ring ba rnams la yang rgyun ring ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas dbugs rngub pa dang / 'byung ba dran pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so// desems cad kyil
192b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams la mi sdug pa'i mtshan ma yid la byed pas mi sdug pa'i 'du shes rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de 'chi ba'i mtshan ma yid la byed pas 'chi ba'i 'du shes rdzogs par byas te gnas so// 
192b2(dkon brtsegs): ded pa dang rga ba'i mtshan ma yid la byed pas nyes dmigs kyi 'du shes rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de kha zas yongs su tshol ba dang 'gyung ba la nad kyi rgyu dang / gnod pa'i rgyur yid la byed pas
192b3(dkon brtsegs): de khyi ma dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / ljongs kyi 'jig rten thams cad la 'byor pa dang bral ba'i mtshan mar yid la byed pa dang / nags
192b4(dkon brtsegs): pad du nyung ba dang / kun dga'i rab rmad du byung ba dang bral ba'i mtshan mar yid la byed pas 'jig rten thams cad la mngon par mi dga' ba'i 'du shes rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de nang gzugs su
192b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dushes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chung ngu kha dog babang po dang / 'dog ngan pa rnams so mtshan mang med la byed pas rol gyis gnond pa'i skye mtsho dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de na gzugs su
192b6(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes pas byo rol gyi gzugs chad med pa kha dog bzang po dang kha dag ngan pa rnams la mtshan mar yid la byed pas zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gnyis pa rdzogs par byas te gnas pa/ 
192b7(dkon brtsegs): 'i lus bsregs pa de la rlung ngab chus thal ba yang med par byed pa'i 'du shes dang / shegs pa la phye ma yang meng pa dang / rdul du gyur pa la rdul kyang med pa'i 'du shes su rnam par 'jigs pa pa rnam pan
192b8(dkon brtsegs): bsgrubs te nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chung du la dog babang po dang kha dogo ngan pa rnams la mtshan mar yid la byed pas bil gyis gnon pa'i mched gsum 'jogs
193a1(dkon brtsegs): par byas te gnams// da pagan dunang gzugs med par 'dugs pas byu pa gzugs chad med pa la dag babang po dang / kha dog ngan pa rnams la mtshan mang yid la byed pas
193a2(dkon brtsegs): la gyis nadang sha ste mchid ba'i pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol kyi gzugs ston pa chad med pa yid du 'ong ba rnams la mtshan
193a3(dkon brtsegs): la gyi na pa rdzogs pa byas / na bang 'a gas pas kyig mas da /  nga/ 
193a4(dkon brtsegs): med pa yid du 'ong ba rnams la mtshan mar yid la byed pas ril gyis gnod pa'i skye mched drug pa dang / bdun pa dang / brgyad pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so// des 'di mtha' las so zhes mtshan ma
193a5(dkon brtsegs): de la byed pas bde bar sar rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de chu dang / ma dang / rlung dang / sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar pa dang / dkar po dang / nam mkha' dang / rnam par shes
193a6(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas so zhes mtshan mar yid la byas pas zadabang chu dang / zad par ma dang / bde bar rlung dang/ zad par rnon po dang / bad par ser po dang / zad par dmar po dang / bad par dkang po nga/ 
193a7(dkon brtsegs): par dam mkha' dang / bad par rnam par shes par rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de snyoms par 'jug pa na dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la dmigs pa la sems nye bar 'dogs te/ snying rje chen
193a8(dkon brtsegs): la dmigs pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzungs pa la dmigs pa dang / dkon ma chag gsus kyi rigs mi 'chad bar bya ba la dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku dang rgyan la dmigs pa dag
193b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi gsung tshangs pa'i dbyangs la dmigs pa dang / sngon
193b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / byangasaba'i nying po'i dzig pa la sngags pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo ba skor ba la dmigs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyin mangs pa gzhom pa la dmigs pa la sems nye bar 'dogs so// 
193b3(dkon brtsegs): gtan byed pa na rnam par shes pa'i gnas bzhi dang gal bar bsam gtan byed do// sa'i khams la mi gnas/ chu'i khams la mi gnas/ me'i khams la mi gnas/ rlung gi khams la mi gnas/ nam mkha'
193b4(dkon brtsegs): mi gnas/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi gnas/ 'jig rten 'angal me gnas/ 'jig rten pa rol la mi gnas par bsam gtan byed do// ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa bla na med pa thams cad por
193b5(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan la gnas shing bsam gtan la dga'o// de bsam gtan de dang / ting nge 'dzin de la bsam gtan byed par 'dod pa dang / spobs par 'jug par 'dod pa na yang sems can thams cad ba
193b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dkrung ba dang / thabs cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa
193b7(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed do// bsam gtan byed pa dang / bsam gtan byas pa dang / langs nas kyang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad
193b8(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad dbugs dpung ba dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo
194a1(dkon brtsegs): par byed do// gal ta bsam gtan da dang / ting nge 'dzin de la slob pa'i nus pa dang mi ldan par gyur na de 'di ltar yang dag par slab ste/ dus dus su 'am/ cung bad cung bad du yang
194a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par g.yeng ba dang / ting ngange 'dzin ma yin pa spang ba dang / dong ba dang / bsal bar rtsol lo// 'bad do// dus dus su 'am/ cung zad cung zad du yang sems rtse gcig tu bya ba dang / sems mnyam
194a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhag par slob pa dang / mngon par 'phel bar bya ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya ba rtsol lo// 'bad// srid pa gzhan du gyung pa na bum par mi 'gyur shing skying lug par mi 'gyur ro// 
194a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dra byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bya chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa dang / bya chub tu smon pa dang / byang chub tu smon la
194a5(dkon brtsegs): 'debs pa gang yin pa de nyid de dag gi sems mnyam par bzhag pa dge ba dang / sems rtse gcig tu bya ba dge ba grangs med cing dpag tu med pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi
194a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad du sems can thams cad la zag pa med pa'i sems mnyam par bzhag pa bskyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i sems mnyam par bzhag pa bskyed par 'dod pa dang / zag pa med pa'i
194a7(dkon brtsegs): mnyam par bzhag pa yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i sems mnyam par bkag pa yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa de ni/ sems mnyam par bzhag pa dge ba dang / sems rtse
194a8(dkon brtsegs): bya ba dge ba mtha' yas mu med pa yin no// lag bzangs de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bde ba dang ldan la yid bde ba dag zur shing tshogs chung ngu dang / 
194b1(dkon brtsegs): byin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' ji ltang shes rab kyi pha rol
194b2(dkon brtsegs): dag thos pa mang la thos pa 'dzin pa/ thos pa bsags pa/ de rnams pa/ bshad pa shes pa/ dpyod pa cas dzak+ta thos pa'i don yongs su rtog pa de dag la
194b3(dkon brtsegs): da te bsen bkur byed do// dmas pa'i chad dang / bshad pa'i ched dang / don gyi ched dang / don la yongs su brtag pa'i ched dang / slob dpon dang mkhan po la bsnyed bkur bya ba'i tshod la grang 'alang
194b4(dkon brtsegs): gsod/ cha ba dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sdig sbrul gyis reg pa dang / gzhan gyis ngan du smras shing ngan du brjod pa'i tshig gi lam dang / lus kyi cho
194b5(dkon brtsegs): kug nub pa/ me bdag/ ga 'chad par da dru gas dang// chos rnams len rin pa cher 'a shes nye bar gnas/ chos zla 'a rnams la rin po che'i gter du 'du shes/ chos nyan pa
194b6(dkon brtsegs): dkon pa ded par 'du shes/ chos 'dzin pa la ni don yod par srog sogs par 'du shes/ chos kyi yon tan mang du byed pa la ni srog don yod par 'du shes/ chos la yongs su rtog pa la ni cha rabs brgya
194b7(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes nye bar gnas pa yin te/ deng chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin la mang du byed cing yongs su tog na khams rnams kyang ba tu shes/ drang po rnam pa dang / bye mched rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bdan pa
194b8(dkon brtsegs): dang/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / dus dang / theg pa rnams dang / dge ba bsags pa yang rab tu shes so// khams rnams de ltang rab tu shes she na// khams ni gnyis te/ 'du byas dang / 'dung ma byas zhes bya
195a1(dkon brtsegs): dmas gnyis pa dag so// 'das byas kyi khams nags/ 'dasas byas kyi khams na gang nan/ gang ci yang rgya ste/ sgyu ba dang / gnas pa dang / 'azhag pa 'di ni 'dus byas kyi khams gas
195a2(dkon brtsegs): ci yang rung ste/ skye ba med pa dang / gnas pa med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa don 'dus ma byas kyi khams shes bya ste/ de ltar 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams rab tu shes so// gzhan yang 'ams
195a3(dkon brtsegs): sum pa gtugs te/ dge ba'i khams dang / me dge ba'i khams dang / lung dum bstan pa'i khams te gsum pa de dag go/ dge ba'i khams ni gang / me dge ba'i khams ni gang / lung dus bstan pa'i
195a4(dkon brtsegs): yas ni gang sha na/ gang ci yang rung ste/ chags pa med pa dang / chags pa med pa dang ldan pa dang / gang ci yang ru ste/ ge sung med pa dang / zhe sdang med pa dang ldan pa dang / gang ci yang rung ste/ gte mug med pa dang / 
195a5(dkon brtsegs): mug med pa dang ldan pa de ni dge ba'i khams shes bya'o// gang ci yang rung ste/ chags pa dang / chags pa dang ldan pa dang / gang ci yang rung ste/ zhe sdang dang / zhe sdang dang ldan pa dang / gang ci yang rung ste/ gti mug dang / 
195a6(dkon brtsegs): yug dang ldan pa don mi dge ba'i khams shes bya'o// de gnyis la ma gtogs pa na lung du ma bstan pa nyid de/ de ltar khams gsum rab tu shes so// gzhan yang khams gsum rab tu shes te
195a7(dkon brtsegs): sum gang zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams so// 'dod pa'i khams gang zhe na/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yi dgas dang / 
195a8(dkon brtsegs): ma yin dang / mi dang / rgyal chen bgol lha rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dka' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kye lha rnams te/ gang de dag la la
195b1(dkon brtsegs): / rung ba ga/ gamajug pa dang / yid kyis sman pa dang / sman lam 'debs pa dang / mngon pa 'du byad pa ni 'dod pa'i khams shes bya'o// gzugs kyi khams gang sa
195b2(dkon brtsegs): sa kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs pa mdun na 'don rnams dang / tshangs chen dang / 'ad chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsapa dang / dge chung dang / chad med dag dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod
195b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams skye ba dang / 'bras bu che dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems can dang / me che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / shin du mthong ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams te/ gang de dag la 'dun pa dang / 
195b4(dkon brtsegs): chags pa dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / yid kyis smon pa dang / sman lam 'debs pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa de ni gzugs kyi khams shes bya'o// gzugs med pa'i khams gang she na/ rnams
195b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba'i lha rnams dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i wa rnams dang / ci yang med pa'i skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams dang / 'du shes
195b6(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams te/ gang de dag la 'dun pa dang / chags pa dang / zhe sdang ba dang / gti mug pa dang / yid kyis smon pa dang / smon lam 'debs pa dang / mngon par
195b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa gang yin pa de ni gzugs med pa'i khams shes bya ste/ de ltar khams gsum rab tu shes so// gzhan yang khams bzhi rab tu shes te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams
195b8(dkon brtsegs): gzugs med pa'i khams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams shes bya ba khams bzhi po de dag ste/ de ltar khams bzhi rab tu shes so// gzhan yang khams drug rab tu shes te/ drug gang she na/ 'dod pa'i
196a1(dkon brtsegs): khams dang / gdod sems kyi khab padag / nam par 'tsho ba'i khams dag mdzad par 'azlang da'i khams dang / gdan sems med pa khams dang / rnam par 'tshe ba med pa'i khams te/ 
196a2(dkon brtsegs): drug ba dad ga rabatugs so// gzhan yang kham dgas tugs te/ ga ga gas/ sa'i khams dang / rgyu khams dang / po'i kham pa dang / rang 'i khams dang / namasakyi khams dang / rnam par shes
196a3(dkon brtsegs): po'i khams te/ khams drug pa de dag rab tu shes so// de la sa'i khams ni mi rtag pa/ mi brtan pa/ 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal ba'o// sdug bsngal ba gang yin pa
196a4(dkon brtsegs): chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang mi rtag pa/ mi brtan pa 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ mi rtag
196a5(dkon brtsegs): ba gang yin pa de sdug bsngal ba'o// sdug bsngal ba gang yin pa de bdag med pa ste/ de ltar khams drug rab tu shes so// de chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin pa dang / mang du byed cing yongs su rtog pa na ga
196a6(dkon brtsegs): kye phung po dang / tshar ba'i phung po dang / 'du shes kyi phung po dang / 'du byed kyi phung po dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung po ste/ phung po lnga ran tu shes so// gzugs la da cu 'jom pa lta bu dang / ngan pa dang / 
196a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig pa dang / ring du mi gnas pa dang / tshor ba la ni rwa'i chu bung lta bu dang / ngan pa dang / 'jig pa dang / ring du mi gnas pa dang / 'du shes la ni smig du lta bu dang / ngan pa dang / 'jig pa dang / da
196a8(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa dang / 'du byed rnams la ni chu shing lta bu dang / ngan pa dang / 'jig pa dang / ring du mi gnas pa dang / rnam
196b1(dkon brtsegs): phung po lnga rab tu shes so// de chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin pa dang / mang du byed cing yongs su rtog pa na nang gi skye mched drug rab tu shes te/ mig nang gi skye mched dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lha dang / lus dang
196b2(dkon brtsegs): dang gi skye mched ces bya ba nang gi skye mched dragra bo de dag go// de la mig nang gi skye mched rten pa'i chos can dang / zla ba'i chos can dang / tsho ba'i chos can dang / bdag dang 'dag pas snang ba
196b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags kyi me dang // zhe sdang gimi dang / gti mug gis kun du 'bar ba dang / skye ba dang / rma ba dang / na ba dang / 'che ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid kyi
196b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / thug pa rnams kyis kun du 'bar ba dang / sdug bsngal gyis kun du 'bang ba rab tu shes so// de bzhin du na pa dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid nang gi skye mched la yangan pa'i chos can pa
196b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos can dang / 'chi ba'i chos can dang / bdag dang bdag gis stong pa dang / 'dod chags kyi me dang / she sdang gi mi dang / gti mug gi me kun du 'bar ba dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 
196b6(dkon brtsegs): chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrugs pa rnams kyis kun du 'bar ba dang / sdug bsngal gyis kun du 'bar bar ba tu shes te
196b7(dkon brtsegs): nang gi skye mched drug po dag rab tu shes so// gzhan yang phyi'i skye mched drug rab tu shes te/ mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba gzugs rnams phyo'i skye mched dang / rna bas rnam par shes pa
196b8(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / snas rnam par shes par bya ba dri rnams dang / lces rnam par shes par bya ba ro rnams dang / lus kyis rnam par shes par bye ba reg bya rnams dang / yid
197a1(dkon brtsegs): chos phyi'i se mched nams shes bya ba ste/ skye mched drug pa de dag go// de la mig gi rnam par shes par bya ba gzugs phyir bye mched la skabs med pa dang / mgon med padas
197a2(dkon brtsegs): med / mas bste/ de la rtag pa ma/ rtan pa / debazhin nyid na/ man da da // gzhanas tshon pa bzhin nyid ga pa yang / rnas na A
197a3(dkon brtsegs): 'o rnams dang / lam gyis rnam pa shes par bya ba ga byarnams dang / yid kyis rnam pa gas par bya 'chos bya'i sgomached la yang rgyab mi med pa dang / mgon med pa dpe snangs med pa dang / nyam chung ba ste/ 
197a4(dkon brtsegs): tag pa 'ag / brtan pa 'am/ ther thug pa 'am/ de bzhin nyid dag/ mnor pa de bzhin nyid dam/ gzhanam yin pa de bzhin nyid ni gang yang med kyi/ sra ma doni yod/ sgyu ma byas pa de ni yod/ ma'atsha pa
197a5(dkon brtsegs): don yod de/ gang ci yang yod par bya'i phye mched drug pod ltar ra tu shes so// de chos dadag nyan cing 'dzin pa dang / mang du byed cing yongs su rtog po na 'phags paci'i bden pa bzhis tu shis so// sheg
197a6(dkon brtsegs): kra bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba 'phags pa'i bden pa/ 
197a7(dkon brtsegs): ga go/ phung po ldan mas dang /  mi drun po da na gi rgya mched dru pa dag de/ phyi'i skyemached dug po dag gang yin pa don sdug bsngal gas bya ste/ sdug bsngal doni mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba
197b1(dkon brtsegs): da dang / 'bras dang / zug rngu dang / sdig pa dang / bdag med pa dang / rab tu 'jig pa'i chos nyid du blta'o// 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / nga'o snyam du mngon par zin pa dang / 
197b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni 'di yin no sum du bdag tu mngon par zhen pa dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ngo snyam pa dang / 'thung bar mi 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / gzugs can du 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / gzugs can ma yin par 'gyur
197b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa dang / 'du shes can du 'gyung ngo snyam pa dang / 'du shes can ma yin par 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / 'du shes can ma yin la/ 'du shes can ma yin pa yang ma yin par 'gyur ngo snyam pa dang / phung po rnam
197b4(dkon brtsegs): dag go snyam pa dang / phung po rnams las bdag gzhan no snyam pa dang / phung po rnams la bdage snyam pa dang / bdag la phung po rnams so snyam pa dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams bdag gosas pa
197b5(dkon brtsegs): mched rnams las bdag gzhan no snyam pa dang / skye mched rnams la bdag go snyam pa dang / bdag la skye mched rnams so snyam pa dang / tshong ba bdag go snyam pa dang / tshor bar byed pa bdag go snyam pa dang / 
197b6(dkon brtsegs): gzugs can chung du bdag ko sum pa dang / gzugs can ma yin pa chung ngu bdag go snyam pa dang / gzugs can mtha' yas pa bdag go snyam pa dang / gzugs can ma yin pa mtha' yas pa bdag
197b7(dkon brtsegs): ma pa dang / bdag rtag go snyam pa dang / bdag mi rtag go snyas pa dang / rtag kyang rtag la mi rtag kyang mi rtag go snyang pa dang / rtag par yang ma yin pa rtag pa yang ma yin na byam pa dang / bdag
197b8(dkon brtsegs): / dodado snyam pa dang / bdag mtha' yod pa ma yin no snyam pa dang / mtha' yod kyang yod la mtha' med kyang med do snyam pa dang / mtha' yod pa yang ma yin mtha' med pa yang yin no snyal ba dang / de bzhin
198a1(dkon brtsegs): shan pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / 'byung yang 'thung la ma 'byung yang mi 'byung ngo snyam pa dang / de bzhin song ba shi nas 'byung ba la
198a2(dkon brtsegs): yin mi 'byung ba yang ma yin no// rnam pa dang / srog de lus de yin snyam pa dang / srog kyang gzhan lus kyang gzhan no// snyam pa dang / sems can 'di gang nas 'om/ de 'di nas shi 'phos
198a3(dkon brtsegs): nas gang du 'gro bar 'gyur snyam pa dang / sems can yod pa las chad de 'jig cing med par 'gyur de bum pa dang / byed pa de myong ba de can no snyam pa dang / byed pa yang gzhan/ myong ba yang gzhanan
198a4(dkon brtsegs): sgrub pa dang / bdag yod pas bdag gi yod par 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / bdag gi yod pas bdag yod par 'gyur ngo snyam pa dang / 'di na bdag de lta bu 'am/ bdag gzhan du 'gung shig gas
198a5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du 'gyur ba mig gam/ gzhan du 'gyur ba zhig gam/ 'dir 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ de ltar 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gzhan du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ 'dir bdag sngon byung ngam/ 2
198a6(dkon brtsegs): dkang byung ngam/ bdag gzhan du blang ngam/ skam du de dag la bdag tu mngon par non te/ 'dzin tshogs la nya ba dang / nga 'ogs pa'i rgyal dang / sems kyi gnas dang / mngon pa 'i

204a4(dkon brtsegs): par yang // 'jig rten khams rnams kun gyi bde gshegs la// mgo bos gsol ba mtha' yas rab tu 'debs// sngon dang 'di dang skad cig tsam yang rung // bdag gis sdig pa gang dang / 
204a5(dkon brtsegs): gang bgyis pa// sdig pa de dag thams cad smad par bgyi// sdig pa thams cad bdag gis spang bar bgyi// skad cig tsam yang bdag gis dge ba 'di// ma lus par ni yang dge gzung bar
204a6(dkon brtsegs): bgyi// tshe yis ji khyim thub kyi bar du ni// dge ba kun la gnas par 'gyur bar 'tshal// sangs rgyas ngag dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams// byang chub chas kyi 'khor lho rab bskor ba/ 
204a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten 'dir ni bung dang bung gyur dang // 'byung 'gyur rnams kyi dge ba thams cad dang // rgyal ba rnams dang 'phags pa thams cad kyi// tshul khrims dang ni ye shes ting 'dzin dang / 
204a8(dkon brtsegs): rnam grol tshe dang chos rnams gang yin pa// de dag 'jig rten rnams la phan gyur cig/ 'grib lnga yi sems can thams cad dag/ byung dang byung gyur 'byung bar 'gyur rnams kyi// dge/ 
204b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag la bdag ni bya phyar zhing // mag bas mtha' yas rjes su ya rang // yon tan yang dag dgeb mtha' yas pa// de dag thams cad 'grob ma lus pas// sems can re re dang ni bdag
204b2(dkon brtsegs): nyid la'ang // yod par bdag ni smon lam mtha' yas 'dabs// bdag gi dge bdag ni 'das pa dang // ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar thams cad kyis// 'jig rten dag gi khams ni thams cad du/ 
204b3(dkon brtsegs): dkon mchog gsum po rtag tu 'byung bar shong // dkon mchog gsum nga byang chub sems dpa' rnams// bskal par bzhugs pas phongs par mgyur cig/ bar du gcod pa med par
204b4(dkon brtsegs): nga chub dang // pha rol phyin pa rnams ni rdzogs par shog/ sems can dag na thams cad bde ba dang // 'jigs pa med cing ngan 'gro 'das pa dang // mi dge thams cad dang ni bral ba dang / 
204b5(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rdzogs gyur cig/ theg pa gsum po dag la ci rigs par// de dag la ni smon lam mthar phyin cing // tshe ring ba dang rnam par grol ba dang // khyad par can gyi don
204b6(dkon brtsegs): kun rdzogs par shog// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sngon lam 'debs pa na// mtha' yas dpag tu med par rab tu 'debs// sems can thams cad dag gi sdug bsngal dang // nyon mongs dag ni
204b7(dkon brtsegs): nyebar ni gyur cig/ chos dang ldan pa'i byab rnams kyi phyir// 'jig rten dag gi khams rnams thams cad kyi// rgyal ba kun dang byang chub sems dpa' la// rang gi lus ni nges par
204b8(dkon brtsegs): bul bar bgyi// rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur bar du// ma 'ongs pa na smon lam mtha' yas gdapa// skye dang skye bar dkon mchol gsum po la// bdag ni yongs su spyad par 'chi
205a1(dkon brtsegs): bar shog/ 'jig rten dag gi khams rnams thams cad kye// dkon mchog gsum dang byang chub sems dpa' la// nam mkha' mnyam pa'i lha yi spos mchog dang / 
205a2(dkon brtsegs): phreng ba ma tog chun pos mchod byed shog// lhun po mnyam pa'i gser dang dngul dag dang // gos dang rin po che yi phung po dang // gzhal med khang bcas bzhon dang mal cha dang // bza'/ 
205a3(dkon brtsegs): ba mtha' yas dag ni sbyin par shog/ 'gro ba'i bsam pa lam gyis rdzogs byed cing // skyabs dang lus dang pha 'drar gyur par shog// bzod la dga' zhing tshul khrims gtsang ba dang
205a4(dkon brtsegs): 'grol chos ni rab tu ston gyur cig/ byang chub theg pa mchog ni rnyed pa dang // dkon mchog gsum phyir go cha srab bgo/ pha rol phyin pa yongs su rdzogs byed cing // sangs rgyas
205a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams yongs su rdzogs byed shog/ sdig pa kun dang bral zhing lus dag dang // yid kyi las mtha' dge ba mchog gyur cig/ byang chub las ni mi ldeg bdag gyur cing // byang chub dga'
205a6(dkon brtsegs): dang byang chub sems dpar gyur // srid dang srid par byang chub sems dpa' dang // sangs rgyas rnams kyi dge ba kun la slob// bdag gis chos rnams de dag kun la yang // 'jig rten
205a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rab tu dgod par bgyid// de de ltar bdag dang gzhan dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa rab tu shes so// de shes rab de dang ye shes de mngon sum du bya bar 'dod pa dang // ying
205a8(dkon brtsegs): byabar 'dod pa na yang sems can thams cad bsgral pa dang // sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang // sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang // thams cad la mkhyen pa nyid
205b1(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed do// mngon sum du byed pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / mngon sum du byas pa dang / yid la byas nas
205b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dpung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas
205b3(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed do// gal te shes rab de dang / ye shes de la slob pa'i nus pa dang mi ldan par gyur na de 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ 
205b4(dkon brtsegs): dus dus pa ma/ cung zad cung zad du yang 'chal ba'i shes rab dang / mi shes pa spang ba dang / dir ba dang khas lnga bar col lo 'bad do// dus dus su 'am/ cung zad cung zad du yang se ba dang / 
205b5(dkon brtsegs): ye shes la slob pa dang / mngon par 'phel bar bya ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya bar col lo// 'bad do// srid pa gzhan du gyur pa na yang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing sgyid lug par mi 'gyura'o// 
205b6(dkon brtsegs): lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran pa dang // byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa dang / byang chub tu smon pa dang / 
205b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub du smin lam 'debs pa gang yin pa de nyid de dag gi shes rab dge ba dang / ye shes dge ba grangs med cing dpag du med pa yin no// de ci'i phyir nan/ 'd-i lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi
205b8(dkon brtsegs): khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la zag pa med pa'i shes rab bskyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i shes rab bskyed par 'dod pa dang / zag pa med pa'i
206a1(dkon brtsegs): bstong papa sa ya na yang pa dang /  gas saman ga yon na/ 
206a2(dkon brtsegs): ngas pa yin na// lag ban yang /  byang chubamams dpa' ba ba dang ldan la med ba ba dang ldam mang tshogs cang du dang / snug bsngal gang dus spyar du sbyin par bas
206a3(dkon brtsegs): dadu ldan pa yongs sa rdzogs par bad do// byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ni phur du ldan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
206a4(dkon brtsegs): gas par 'chang sa'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na lha dang mi'i skye dgu'i sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag theg pa gsum dang / mtho ris su skye ba'i don byas par/ 
206a5(dkon brtsegs): to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag bzangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan
206a6(dkon brtsegs): dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten sti rang pa te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / 'phags pa dkon mchog
206a7(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las lag bzangs kyis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po dAn shIl dang /

206b2(dkon brtsegs): nges pas zhus pa zhes bra ba thag pa chen pa'i mang// sangs rgyas de byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di song bdag gis nus pa dus gzugs
206b3(dkon brtsegs): gan sa pa skyed / du la gnas sa na gA'i mdun na sa / tanan rna 'a 'du sdug bsngal mas sa babyung pa/
