207a1(dkon brtsegs): chags pa zhig gnas te/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas/ grong khyer gyi dbu po ngas pa shin tu 'dod
207a2(dkon brtsegs): chung ba/ chog shis pa/ tshul khrims dang brdul zhugs dang ldan pa/ yid 'khrugs pa med pa/ rtag tu bzhin 'dzum pa gzhan gyi 'khrul pa dag la skyon du mi lta ba
207a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi sems srung ba/ brkam pa med pa/ shes bzhin du stod pa/ chog shes shing dgang skal gso slab/ bsas pa phun sum chags pa/ 
207a4(dkon brtsegs): med pa/ nga rgyal med pa/ bka' blo bde ba/ 'thun par 'dzin pa/ rtag tu gso sbyong gi yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa/ lag na shing la'i snod thogs pa/ rtswa gting ba la
207a5(dkon brtsegs): nyal ba/ gos ngan pa gyon pa/ rnyed kyang mi len pa/ bzang yang rung ngan kyang rung bgo bsha' byas nas za ba/ dus gsum du de bzhin gshegs pa la lta ba/ 
207a6(dkon brtsegs): can par 'dod pa/ gtam sna tshogs 'byung ba la spobs pa dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba de mthong ngo // mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ ci gang
207a7(dkon brtsegs): dbul po 'di yid sa la ba rtan nam mi btan bdag gis bdag go snyam mo// de nus lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis mi mang po mngon par sprul nas grong khyer gyi dbul po nges pa la
207a8(dkon brtsegs): gangan pa dag gis gshe zhing skyo bar byed do// bod pa dang / dbyug pa dang / mtshon cha dag kyang bstan na nges pa de bzod pa'i stobs kyis dang du len par byed de/ mi 'khrug cing
207b1(dkon brtsegs): gnod sems ste bsred do// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis me gzhan dgacig sAl nas nges pa'am dun du bzhags/ nges pa de la dga' ba 'a chug gis ma cag na rgya
207b2(dkon brtsegs): don byed par 'dod pa yin gyis/ ci ste khyod 'dod pa ldan khyod la sdigs pa'i dgra gang yin pa dang ga kho bo cag gis tshar pa cad par bya'o zhes smras so// nges pas smras pa/ grogs po
207b3(dkon brtsegs): dag zong de skad mazer cig/ gal te mi 'di dag gis kho ba'i lus dum bu brgyar dum 'a dus bur gtubs su zin kyang kho bo ni mi 'di dag la sdig pa'i sems mi sbed do// grogs po dag
207b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten dag ni dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i phyogs gnyis la gnas la de'i 'gro ba ni gnyis kho na ste/ dge ba'i phyogs kyi ni bde 'gro'o// mi dge ba'i phyogs kyi ni ngan 'gro'o// de bas na
207b5(dkon brtsegs): ba ni sems can pha rol tshig pa zla bar byed par dmi 'dod na gtseb lta ci smos// de nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sa bon tsha ba rnams kyi ni// 'bras bu tshab sdeb
207b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// sa bon mngar ba rnams kyi ni// 'bras bu mang rabaskye par 'gyur// dpe bA ra ba pa 'di yis na// sdig pa'i rnam smin cha ba dang // dkar po'i 'bras bu sang rab dag/ mkhas pa'i
207b7(dkon brtsegs): nI shes par 'gyur// rtag tu lus dang ngag yid kyis// sdig pa rnam gsum mi bzhed // gzhan dag bed kyang mkhas pa yas// rjes su dga' bar mi bya'o// lus dang ngag dang yid rnams
207b8(dkon brtsegs): kyis// dkar po rnam gsum rtag tu bya// gang dag dge ba slong byed pa// gzhan dag la yang yi rang bya// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dus gzhan zhig na nges pa la dbyig dang / 
208a1(dkon brtsegs): gser mang po bstan nas 'di skad ces smras so// des pa'o ni las khyer la sten bdag byin cig/ bsod nams dag gyis shig/ gos dang rgyan dag kyang
208a2(dkon brtsegs): thogs shig/ khyod ngan cing dbul bas ci zhig bya// nges pas smras pa/ grags pa dag snga nasams can rnams la lus kyis nyes par snang ba dang / ngag dung / yid kyis

208a4(dkon brtsegs): shig/ 'jig rten pha rol bsam pos khyod la ci zhig bya/ nges pas smras pa/ grogs po gang tshe 'di ched cher 'dzin pa 'di ni byis pa'i chos yin gyis mkhas pa rnams ni cho
208a5(dkon brtsegs): mched cher 'dzin to// 'dod pas zil gyis non pa dang / zhe sdang gis zil gyis non pa dang / gti mug gis zil gyis non pa dang / 'dod chags kyis zil gyis non pa dag ni
208a6(dkon brtsegs): byin par len par byed kyis mkhas pa dag ni brkus pa ma yin no// sogs 'jog chang ma dang dzin pa dag ni mabyin par len par byed kyi mkhas pa dag ni sogs 'jog myi byed du/ 
208a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag gir 'dzin pa dang bcas shing yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi mkhas pa dag ni bdag tu mi 'dzin cing yongs su 'dzin par mi byed
208a8(dkon brtsegs): lus dang srog la lta bdag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi mkhas pa dag ni lus dang srog la mi lta'o// ngosas
208b1(dkon brtsegs): shes shing chog shes pa yin no// 'tsho ba yongs sa ma ga ga nes byin par len par byed kyi sa bsna pa dag na tsho ba yongs su dag pa yin no// las ma mthong ba dag nim byin par
208b2(dkon brtsegs): par byed kyi mkhas pa dag ni las mthong ba yin no// rnam par 'tsho bo ched par 'dzin po dag ni mabyin par len par byed kyi mkhas pa dag ni rnam par mi 'tshe ba ched cher 'dzin to// 
208b3(dkon brtsegs): byams pa'i sems med pa dag ni mabyin par len par byed kyi mkhas pa dag ni byams pa'i sems dang ldan no// phyin ci log bzhis sems bslad pa dag ni ma byin par len par
208b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi mkhas pa dag ni sems phyin ci ma log pa yin no// gzhan yang sems can dbul po gang yin pa de dgra kho bos tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bshad kyis nyon cig/ bye ba phrag
208b5(dkon brtsegs): gter yod kyang // gang dag la ni gtong sbed pa// de dag 'jig rten 'dir dbul zhes/ sa mang rnams kyis de skad bshad// gang la zan cig med bzhin du// de ni gtong la rab gnas na// 
208b6(dkon brtsegs): ni 'jig rten nor che zhes// yang dag gzigs pa rnams kyis bshad// pang la sdig med 'phags pa ni// rnam pa kun gyis mdzes pa yin// byis pa sdug pa byed pa ni// shin tu
208b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang mdzes ma yin// mkhas pa dag gis spos smra yi// byis pas bsngags pa de lta min// byis pa sdig pa bsngags par byed// mkhas pa dag ni sdig la spyod// de nas lha'i
208b8(dkon brtsegs): brgya byin gyis dus gzhan zhig na mi gzhan zhig sprul te// de nas mi des gser mang po khyer te nges pa la 'di skad cis smras so// kye nges pa gser khyer la kho'i mi gzhan zhig
209a1(dkon brtsegs): ngal bdag ca 'grub bsams kya cha ni gyis shig/ nges pas sbas pa/ grogs yang khang nga ska sa zung cag/ khazhin brdzun nga

209a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'das par byed pa dang / sems yongs su gdung ba byed pa yin no// kye grogs po brdzun du slab ni kha mnam par byed pa dang / lus smad par byed pa dang / lha'i yang du mi

210a1(dkon brtsegs): mthong ngo // khyed tsan dan gyi med gus lus byugs pa ni pags pa rlon pa shas log pa lta bur mthong ngo // khyed kyi rgyan dang lha ba sgrub ni mi slu ba'i skus byas pa lta ba

210b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dor ba la stenu pa'o// 'dod pa la sten pa ni brtul zhugs dang / dka' thul 'dor ba'o// 'dod pa la sten pa ni shin du bag med pa'o// 'dod pa la sten pa ni nyon mongs pa shin du 'phel bar

211b3(dkon brtsegs): ltar byang chub thob gyur cig/ de nas grong khyer gyi dbul lo ngas pas dus gzhan zhig na nor bu rin po che rin thang med pa zhig rnyed nas de 'di snyam du sams te/ nor bu rin po che 'dzam bu'i gling na

216b6(dkon brtsegs): lag// rgyal po chen po sems can ser sna can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i sbyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po sems can tshul khrims
216b7(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i tshul khrims ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po sems can gnod sems can yongs su phyin par bgyid par 'gyur bal
216b8(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po sems can la po can yongs su smim par 'grid par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus ni byang chub sems dpa' 'khor lags pa/ 
217a1(dkon brtsegs): na thamams can mams rnas pa gsal pa yangs sa ston par med par 'gyu ba'i thams gtanan byung chubamams du gas so/ 
217a2(dkon brtsegs): na rnal pa'i gas rab can yangasas sbyin par bgyid pa byud pa'i gas ba ni byung chub sems dang bye' khor lags so// rgyal ba can thathams can thams ca ma thams/ 
217a3(dkon brtsegs): byams pa ni bya chubasas snang pa'i 'gyur lags // rgyam brgyan pal la sa g+sa su mama' yang rjen byang chub skyes na gas// 
217a4(dkon brtsegs): sa kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing mos pa'i dga' ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba spong ba'i btang snyoms na byang chub
217a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag ni byang chub sems pa'i 'khor lag so// 
217a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs sogs pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po bdud kyi
217a7(dkon brtsegs): las thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / ston pa med pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po tshig btsun
217a8(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang me rtsub pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po skabs pa phun sum chags par 'gyur ba'i mi 'phrab dang bathing slad mi bgyid pa ni tha
217b1(dkon brtsegs): nas // bcas ba pa pa 'gyur ba ma pa'i mabyung sa ga byang chub sams dpa' 'a bar lags so// ma ba can
217b2(dkon brtsegs): rna ba byung du thobang pa na dang ma khan pal gyu pa na byang chub sams dpa'i 'ab lags so// rgyal ba can padas pa 'ams yangs mdzin par 'gyur ba'i thas pa 'dzin pa na bang
217b3(dkon brtsegs): ga ga/ N+Dan pa bzhin gagags pa thams cad kyi bstan pa yang dag par 'dzim pa pa gyu pa mas su 'dzin pa ni byang chuthasems
217b4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po dge ba'i rtsab thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i dgon pa la gnas pa ni byang chub sems dpa' 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po sems can
217b5(dkon brtsegs): mngadadabang par 'gyur ba'i 'tsho ba yongs su ga pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa'i sgrub par 'gyur ba'i bag yod pa ni byang chub sems
217b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' 'khor lags so// de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal dga' zhing mgul yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nam rgyal po la 'os pa'i ras bcos bu zung spong chos la
217b7(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba'i phyir nges pa la byin no// nges pas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag la bkur sti dang mchod pa mdzad pas 'tshal to// gang gis bdag la 'tshal bar 'gyur ba'i gos ras rul ba'i
217b8(dkon brtsegs): sa kyis bdag ni bdag gis 'dzin pa dang bcas shing yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i gos rnams mi 'tshal lo// rgyal po chen po dpyid kyi dus mangs rul pa
218a1(dkon brtsegs): dum bu'i gos 'di shing gis yal gal bkab te da lung gcig gam/ dgung gnyis sam/ dpung bcu 'a5/ dbang brgyar mchis kyang de la su yang len pa ma mchis
218a2(dkon brtsegs): zhing de la su yang chags pa'i sems sred pa ma mchis te/ bdag kyang de bor nas mi lta bar mchi ba'i dus de mchis so// rgyal po chen po bdag ni bdag gir 'dzin pa dang / yongs su
218a3(dkon brtsegs): dzin pa dang bcas pa'i gos rnams mi 'tshal lo// rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' ni gang la bdag nyid kyang 'dod pa spong bar 'gyur zhing gzhan yang 'dod pa skyed par mi
218a4(dkon brtsegs): bde lta bu'i gos bcad par bgyi'o// rgyal pos smras pa/ des pa gal te da ltar ras bcos bu zung 'dir la khyod mi len nakho bo la snying brtse ba'i phyir rkang pas rjes shig/ nges pas lhang
218a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du bgyi'o zhes smras nasa'as cos bu zung de dag la rkang pas brdzis te song ngo // rgyal pos smras pa/ nges par sa bcos bzung khyod kyi rkang po'i dman mar gyur pa 'di rnams ji ltar
218a6(dkon brtsegs): des pas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po sems can dbul po gcer bu gas ma mchis pa gang lags pa de dag la stsol cig rgyas tho sangs pa de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas rgyal po'i mi rnams
218a7(dkon brtsegs): bcwolta/ de dag gis kyang ji skad bsgo ba bzhin du byas so// ras bcos bu zung de dag dbu ba de dag gis bgos ma thag tu 'di snyam du sems bskyed de/ bdag gis nges pa la ji
218a8(dkon brtsegs): na glan par bsnyam pa las sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs dang / nges pa'i smon lam gyi stobs kyis de dag gis par snang las tshags su bcad pa 'di dag thos so// 'dod pa
218b1(dkon brtsegs): lan ni glan bya ba// me tog dang ni spos dang thug pa dang // zas skom nor rnams kyis kyang mi nus te// byang chub sems kyis nges pa dga' bar 'gyur// des pa zas dang pos 'dod ma yin te/ 
218b2(dkon brtsegs): rnyed dang bkur ste grags pa 'dod ma yin// nges pa byang chub sems las chos 'dod de// byang chub sems kyis nges pa dga' ba phye// de nas dus gzhan zhig ga rigs kyi bu nges pa dang // rgyal po
218b3(dkon brtsegs): gsal rgyal btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas// blon po dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pa dang / mnyan yod kyi skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu ro dang / srog chags brgya phrag mang pod

218b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dus bcol gyi drung du yang bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan sa khri bklub bltan sdug cing chu zheng gab pa la lnga'i ras bcos bub rgya stong dus bting ba mngon par stsal te// byang chub sems dpa'
218b7(dkon brtsegs): rnas kyi stan+da drag thang ga kyang mngon par sprul to// lha ma yin gyi bus pad sogs dang / lha'i bu mo khri nyis stong yang me tAM ga dang / bdag pa dang / spos dang / ma te 'phreng dang / thug pa dang / 
218b8(dkon brtsegs): lha'i can ma gyi phye ma dag khye na pa si la snyan dang / phe ga dzab bdag byed cing nges pa'i g.yog bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khre brgyan par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das
219a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis sre bo'i tshogs chen po de dag 'ong bar thugs su chud nas gtsug lag khang nas byung ste byang chub sems dpa' ngar nyan thos rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing gdan
219a2(dkon brtsegs): bA shams pa la bzhugs so// de nas dri za'i bu gtsug phung lnga pas lha'i bu ma nya 'od la smras pa/ bzang mtshung yos// nges pa'i g.yog bya ba'i phyir slad kyi sgra dang / glu'i sgra dbyangs
219a3(dkon brtsegs): sa de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bya'o// de nas lha'i bu mo nyi 'od kyis lha'i bu mo lnga brgya tsam dang thabs gcig tu chud kyi sgrar sbyar pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bstod pa
219a4(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis bskal pa brgyar ni sngan chad dka' thub spyad// khyod ni bsdu ba dag dang dul dang sprin la dgyes// khyod kyi skug sung thugs rnams yongs su dag pa ste// srid gsum 'jig rten pa
219a5(dkon brtsegs): ma la ni bdag phyag 'tshal// khyod ni thab mi mnga' bzod dang byams la dgyes// khyod ni brtson 'grus brtan dang stobs kyi pha rol gshegs// khyod ni bsam gtan blo dang tshul rnams snang la
219a6(dkon brtsegs): gyis// dri sa gsum gyi nyes pa sel la bdag phyag 'tshal// khyod ni 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mugasel la dgyes// khyod kyi thugs ni zhi zhing snyoms la thugs rje ldan// khyed ni yang dang / 
219a7(dkon brtsegs): gsung zhing ngas pa'i don yang mkhyen// srid pa gsum po thar bar mdzad la bdag phyag 'tshal// khyod ni mthong ba rnams kyi rna tsham sel ba mdzad// khyod ni mthong ba rnams kyi skyon rnams
219a8(dkon brtsegs): mtha' dag sal// khyod ni mthong ba rnams la mchog tu dga' bar mdzad// bdag ni yul la srog gis skyabs sus che bar bgyi// lha'i bu mo mchog ni 'dod chags chags gyur pa/ 
219b1(dkon brtsegs): glings / ya ma mas la dug par 'gyur// dga' bsargyun pa kon nam // da ltan dod pa da 'ang bral ba ra gyur// mtshan sa rtags

219b3(dkon brtsegs): khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal// 'phag pa 'dzam bu chub gsar mdog phyags zil stag/ thub pa'i sku sto sang ge'i 'dra zhing ljang chen stabs// smin tshugs legs shing shangs legs choms
219b4(dkon brtsegs): snyoms thags bzang mdzes// dpal gyi snying po shAkya thub mchog khyed la 'dud// rgyal ba yon tan brgya phrag dag gis rgyas gyur pa// bde gshegs shin tu dga' ba skyed mdzad bstod pa yi/

219b6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bskor nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas rgyal po gsal
219b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal gyis rigs kyi bu des pa la khri'u stan bzang po bdag nyid kyis byin te 'di la 'dug gcig ces byas nas rigs kyi bu des pa khri'u stan bzang po de la 'dug go// rgyal po gsal
219b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal 'khor dang bcas pa yang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgebs phyag 'tshal nas rang rang gi stan la 'khod do// de nas lha'i bu gang dag gis rigs kyi bungs pa sngon ma mthong ba de
220a1(dkon brtsegs): dge 'duska du dbul ba gas ngan pa glan pa 'di la 'di lta ba mchad pa byed do zhes 'jed te// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byan gyis lha yi dag la 'di skad ces smras pa/ 
220a2(dkon brtsegs): grogs po dag 'di la brnyas par ma byed cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di yon tan gyi che ba nyid je skad pa dang ldan pa dan kho bo'i mngon sum du gyur to// grogs pa dag khyed re sheka sdod cig
220a3(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'di'i yon tan gyi bkod pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// de nas rigs kyi bu des pas lce'i bu de dge ge bsam pa tog nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
220a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i bkod pa'i thabs dang / ye shes kyi bkod pa'i thabs bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// de ni
220a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis sku las 'od phyung ste/ 'od de nges pa'i lus la reg nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi gzugs kyi lus yongs su grub paci 'dra ba de las 'bum gyur pas kyang

220a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje lta ba'i ma rdul gnas pa'i tshe yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir dman par ston cing dman pa'i mthu la gnas kyang sems can yongs su
220a8(dkon brtsegs): ston par byed pa 'di ni nga'i bkod pa yin no// ye shes la gnas kyang mi shes par ston cing mi shes par ston kyang shes par snang ba 'di ni nga'i bkod pa yod do// 
220b1(dkon brtsegs): thob pa rnams la yang lus kyi spyod pa dang / spyod lam gyis dad pa skyed par byed cing ye shes thob pa rnams la lang skud pa thams cad yang dag par snyan pas rdzu 'phral ston par byed pa 'di ni de'i ba/ 
220b2(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no// rtag tu sems la dbang byed pas ngan cing dbul bar spyodan kyang tshangs pas kyang mchod pa dang / mchog ga bkod pa la gnas kyang sra bo phal gyis kyang mchod pa 'di ni de'i bkod pa yi
220b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can bsdu ba'i phyir ngan cing dbul bar yang nye bar ston pa sems can rnams la mngon par 'byung ba bskyed pa'i phyir longs spyod rgya chen po dang ldan yang mngon par 'byung bar ston pa

220b6(dkon brtsegs): bas pa thob pa/ mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse bar byas pa/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la mkhas pa ste/ ngan cing dbul pas sems can rnams 'dul bar byed do// gsol pa/ bco
220b7(dkon brtsegs): na'adas 'dis ngad cing dbul ba 'dis sems can ji snyed cag btul lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo lha'i bu 'bum phrag mang po dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
220b8(dkon brtsegs): bachug pa yongs su smin par byas te/ mi rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o// kun dga' bos gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ji srid cig na ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
221a1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyung / 'das sangs rgyas kyi nang gi bkod pa rnams na ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur/ med de je skad ces bgyi ba zhig tu 'gyur lags/ de nas bcom ldan
221a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das ces tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la chags su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ sems can don la brtson dang brtul zhugs brtan pa dang / grags pa rgya chen dag gis bsam pa khyab byas dang / 
221a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub yon tan gnas pa sod pa ce 'dra ba// ngas ni khyod la bshad kyis kun dga' khyod nyin cig/ 'din rgyal la 'tshod ma tshig phyer ni gus byed cing // dam pa'i chos ni bsrung phyir rab tu
221a4(dkon brtsegs): tshod byed pa// nges pa yin spyad pa'i rnam pa gang yin pa// de dag 'dir ni bgrang bar nus par mi 'gyur ro// pha rol phyin pa 'di dang la ni lags par bslabs// mngon par shes bdag gis
221a5(dkon brtsegs): sngan chad rtse bar byas// tshangs pa'i gnas rnams kyis ni mtha' mar phyin par song // thabs la mkhas pa'i spyod pa dag la legs par nga sgrubs// 'dir ni de yis 'dus byas skyon rnams
221a6(dkon brtsegs): legs par mthong // sangs rgyas byang chub kyang ni mngon sum gyur par byas// 'des na sems can jis ji ltar por 'gyur ba'o// rnam par smin pa'i mtshan nyid la yang legs par bslabs/ 
221a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa med cing blo dang rtogs dang dran dang ldan// spobs pa dang ni gzungs rnams dang yang ldan pa ste// bdud kyi lcags kyu nyon mongs rdzab las nges phyung zhing // sangs rgyas spyod yul don
221a8(dkon brtsegs): chen la ni rab tu gnas// 'jig rten chos rnams mang ba dag gis mgos la// chags pa la sogs rnams kyis brag ltar yang mi g.yos// mu yi drung du mi gro dra bar byed pa'ang men// na
221b1(dkon brtsegs): mkha' lta bur bcingasu dang grol ba med pa yin// snying rjer gnas shing sems kyang yongs su skyo ba med// shin tu bsdams shing nam nur can la rnams sems ldan// sems can kun la bdag dang

221b3(dkon brtsegs): par bslabs// stong po nyid la mos shing gnyis las rnam par grol// bzod pa gsum thab skye bo'i spyod yul ma yin te// sangs rgyas tshul dang yan tan dag la rab tu gnas// 'di ni 'jig rten gang du
221b4(dkon brtsegs): byed par// de ni skye bo mang po rnam par grol bar byed// sangs rgyas kyi ni sras 'di gang du gnas pa dar// de bzhin gshegs pas yum ni stongs pa ma yin te// de la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten ma lus
221b5(dkon brtsegs): pas// de skar sangs rgyas bzhin du 'dil gus par gyis// nga ni mya ngan 'das nas nyams pa'i dus pa rtse// des pa pad sangs rgyas spyod pa spyad nas kyang // tsan chad gnas pa mngon par dga' ba'i la ga den/

222a4(dkon brtsegs): loni brgyad cu dag las cazhi lhag rnams su yang // de yi dam pa'i chos ni rab tu smod par 'gyur// de tshe de yi chos kyi tshul ni 'khrugs pa med// nges pa de yis gang dag yongs su sred byas pa
222a5(dkon brtsegs): de dag dang chung bla na med pa'i don du spyod// zhing der sems can gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnams// de dag thams cad sngon rnams dang ni bral ba yir// bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu des
222a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lung bstan pa bshad ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtedan kyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yas te/ lha'i me tog dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / rgyan gyi char yang
222a7(dkon brtsegs): / bab bo// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis kyang rang ra ga~M gos rnams rigs kyi bu nges pa la ba ka'i bo// tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / bram ze brgya phrag mang po dag kyar rab tu
222a8(dkon brtsegs): byung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la nges pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu dbyung bar gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs/ 
222b1(dkon brtsegs): budus pa'i mag sol phrag gi blags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi 'das pa'i mag po la reg ma thag tu gas ngur sreg pa gas shing dge slong du snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das
222b2(dkon brtsegs): chi dang ldan pa kun dga' ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' ba skegs lnga bodas kyi snyigs pa dang / sems can gyi stegs ma dang // dgi stegs pa dang / 'i stegs ma dang / 
222b3(dkon brtsegs): don mongs pa'i skegs ma'i dus su dbyang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas der nges pas ji ltar 'dul ba las rnam pa gzhan gyis gdul bar me bya'o// kun dga' bo ni
222b4(dkon brtsegs): me mjed du sangs rgyas kyi 'dul bas sems can rnams 'dul bar me byed kyi/ kun dga' bo nga ni ngan cing dngul ba dang / ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pas bsdigs pas sems can rnams 'dul bar byed do// 
222b5(dkon brtsegs): kun dka' bo gal te 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ngas sangs rgyas kyi yul gyis chos bstan cing sangs rgyas kyis yul nye bar bstan du zin na sems cad gcig kyang 'dul bar mi 'gyung la chos
222b6(dkon brtsegs): gas par mi 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de smra bas na dang das pa ji ltar 'dal bar byed par bzhin du khyed kyis kyang sems dar 'dul bar gyis shig/ kun dga' bo sems can dang sa can dang / 
222b7(dkon brtsegs): pa mang ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'ang thos nas dge sa rnyed cing de bzhin du sgrub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun
222b8(dkon brtsegs): dka' bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' nges pa dang / byang chub sems dang de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin
223a1(dkon brtsegs): rnaMH mam pa'i 'jig rten ya ngas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bskyed do// 'phags pa dkan mchog 'jigs pa chen pa chos kya rnam grangs la
223a2(dkon brtsegs): sngo phrag brgya pa lasadas pa mnus pa'i la' zhes bya ste ni shu rtsa bdun pa rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan pa dzin me tra dang / su rin dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen kye la ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes la sogs pas
223a3(dkon brtsegs): zhus te gtan la phab pa// 'phags pa dkan mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong
223a4(dkon brtsegs): cig la/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya prir dang ta gr-iha ba pr-i n+d+ha rA ma ma hA yAn su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa khyim bdag dpas byin gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mang// sangs rgyas dang byang chub
223a5(dkon brtsegs): bebeb dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge
223a6(dkon brtsegs): nga stong zhes bcwa lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen pa thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zag pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin du rnam par grol ba/ shes rab
223a7(dkon brtsegs): shin du ram par grol pa/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po// bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun du sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas
223a8(dkon brtsegs): seses shin du rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa/ mngon par shes pa mngon par shes pa sha stag ste/ gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan
223b1(dkon brtsegs): dag9/ byang chub sems snga mams kyang / gzungs /  la pa pa shi ga dang thabs gnag tu ba zugs/ rar cha grang byang chen pa mnyan la dang
223b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag dpas byin zhes bya ba phyug gnor che ba/ bdag dbang ba mang pa/ nor dang yo byad mang gnod dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang pa'i tshogs mang ba/ glang po che dang / rta dang / rnga ma dang / ra lug dang / 
223b3(dkon brtsegs): bdab/ bran pa dang / brad mo dang / las byed pa dang / no shas 'tsho ba mang ba/ dbyig dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / baidUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / bye ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul ma
223b4(dkon brtsegs): ba zhig gnas pa de khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig tu 'dus te 'dug par gyur to// de dag 'dus te 'khod pa'i tshe bar skabs su 'di lta bu'i gtamarjod de/ kye grogs po dag sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed
223b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dka'/ mir skye ba rnyed par dka'/ ngal ba phun sum tshogs pa rnyed par dka'/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la dad pa rnyed par dka'/ rag byung ba rnyed par dka'/ dge slong gi dngas po rnyed
223b6(dkon brtsegs): dga' dun byed pa rnyed par dka'/ sems can ga nag byas pa gcond byas pa shes la gang nag byas pa nang du yang nad mig can na mang bas cesas nyid dag ces drang par dka'/ de bas kyang
223b7(dkon brtsegs): gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la yid ches pa dag ches rnyed pa dadaka'/ debs kyang sems can gang dag bzhin gagags pa'i bstan pa la yad ces na sanan tan byes kha pa de dag ces
223b8(dkon brtsegs): la/ dgas kya sems can gang dag de bzhin ga shegs par bdun pa la mangs pa dag chebarnyed pa dka'/ mam sa las grol brnyed par dga'an/ ci bdag cag tan pas kyi lagapas pa
224a1(dkon brtsegs): // rnams dang bshA ya na rang sangs rgyas thag pas sam/ na bad pa cad pa bran mdapapa pa sa su myang na las ba 'a bar bya nas 'thun par 'dus ta 'khod pa dag thams car
224a2(dkon brtsegs): lta bu'ang bod pa skyes nas bdag cag theg pa chen pa blan med pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba ni mchog yin gyi/ nyan thos kyi theg pa san ma yis rang sangs rgyas kyi zag pas nis yin no/ 
224a3(dkon brtsegs): mo// de nas khyim bdag dpas byin khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te ldan cig tu grong khyer chen po mnyan yod nas byung ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon mad
224a4(dkon brtsegs): sa sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba gal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyen nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas
224a5(dkon brtsegs): phyog sa gcig du 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du khyim bdag dpas byin dang / khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag la bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag khyed don gang gi phyir de bzhin
224a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 'ang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yang du lhag sa/ rinas khyim bdag pas byin dang / khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag stan las langs te bla gos pag pa gcig

224b2(dkon brtsegs): dge slong gi dngam po rnyed par bkag nan tan byed pa rnyed par bka'/ sems can gang dag khyab pa gatsho med byas pa shes pa gang dag byas pa chung sa su gapon na mang po la ci sros te de dag ches nang

224b6(dkon brtsegs): gyis so// bcam ldan 'das de'i tshe bdag cag thams cad 'ad pa dag pa skyes te/ bdag cag theg pa chen pa blar med pas yangs su su ngan las 'da' bar bya ba ni mchog lags kyi/ nyan kyi
224b7(dkon brtsegs): ga pas ni cha lags/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas ni ma lags bskam bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag chos kyi skyes pa de dang chas de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
224b8(dkon brtsegs): ngas rgyas kyi zad du mchi ban/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po klum med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas ji ltar bslas
225a1(dkon brtsegs): / bkye/ bde bar gshegs pa ji ltar bslab par brtsa/ ltar gnas par bgyi/ ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag dpas byin dang / khyim bdag lnga ba

226b3(dkon brtsegs): can dang / dbu brdos pa skar rang bzhin gyis nyam chung ba dang / chu'i chu bur ltar byung nas 'jig cing 'dru ba dang / smig rgyu lhor sbu ba'i bdag nyid can dang / chu shing ldar bshig na skeng ba med pa dang / smam ltar spu ba

226b8(dkon brtsegs): nadadan gyis pag bya dgos pa dang / grogs pa ma srun pa lngar dag tu rjes bu bsrung dgos pa dang / chu 'gram gyi shing stang g.yo zhing 'gul ba dang / cha glang chen po'i rgyun ltar mthar mche ba'i rgya mtshol thug
227a1(dkon brtsegs): / glong pa'i khyim ltar sdug bsngal thams cad kyi gnasas gyur pa dang / mgon med pa'i gnas khang ltar yangs su gzung ba med pa dang / btsan srungs ltar gsug gis bsgrub par bya ba dang
227a2(dkon brtsegs): mama' 'khob kyi grong khyer ltar rtag tu gnod pa 'byung ba dang / byem 'grong khyer ltarang rtag tu 'jig pa'i bdag nad can dang / me ltar tshag me shes pa dang / rgya mtsho skar dgang dka' ba dang / sbrul gyi gco
227a3(dkon brtsegs): nan dan gyis bag bya ba dang / byis pa chung ngu ltar rtag tu yongs su bskyang dgos pa dang / snod chag pa ltar rtag tu bag bya dgos pa dang / yul ngan pa ltar rtag tu gnod pa 'byung ba dang / zas dug can ltar
227a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su spyad par bya ba dang / re shig dgos pa'i phyer snasnod brnyan ma sa bu dang / lur bkur zen phyir shing rtas bu yin pa 'ba' sheg gros gzung bar bya'o// khyim bdag rnam pa gnan yang byang chub sems da
227a5(dkon brtsegs): lus 'di thog ma dang tha ma'i chul so sor brtag par bya'o// pha ma'i khu chu dang khrag 'dus pa las 'byung ste/ 'di la khu chu dang khrag ni lus kyi thog pa'i rgyu yin no// tha ma'i d+ha ni zas 'jub la sogs pa ste/

227a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gnas su phyin nas bu zhing skyur por gyur te/ rlung gi gnas su 'gro'o// zhu ste rlung gi gnas su phyin nas rlung gis tshigs ma logs shig/ dngas ma logs shig tu rnam par 'byed de/ tshigasam pas gcing
227a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / ngan sngags la sogs ni dris rnams 'thung / dang sa mal pa ni khrag tu 'gyur te/ gragasas gag sha la mtshol lo// tshil las rus pa'o// dus pa las rkang ngo // nang las burgyag// du rgya 'di sa
227b1(dkon brtsegs): thogs dang tha ma'i na mi gtsang ba'i phyir lus mi gtsang bar bang chub sems dpas bsam par bya'o// lus lam gtsang bar ka ban byang chub sems dpas 'ad snyam du bsam par byaste/ mus gas bya ba 'din dus pa/ 
227b2(dkon brtsegs): ma brgya drug nus khog pa bsrung ba/ shing ngan pa'i khyim snar tshigs sam bcas sa gza'adra ba pa'i brgyas grags pa/ shAsra batshad lha brgyas gsags pa/ sdos pa drug gis thabs pa/ rtsa bdun brgyas
227b3(dkon brtsegs): gang ga rgyus pa bdun brgyas 'bral ba/ chu ba bcu drug gis brten pa/ chub gnyis kyis khyab par dkris pa/ rnam mdom phyed dang pa nis nang khrol byas pa/ long ka dang po ba dang / 'brel ba'i gcel rim pa bcu drug
227b4(dkon brtsegs): ka 'khyil ba/ ma phran zhes stong lnga brgyas skar lung byas ga gshes brgya rtsa bad bye sa sdod chag pa ltar shigasheg par byung ba/ sru khung bu bye ba brgya snang phrag brgyad bcus rtsa ltar khebs pa/ dbang po lnga'i bug dgu med/ 
227b5(dkon brtsegs): ga gnas bdun dang ldan pa/ me gtsang bas yongs su gang ba/ klad bsnyem pa gang dang / tshol snyem pa gang dang zhag skem pa gsum dang / bad kan skem pa drug dang / mkhris pa sim pa drug dang / rlung gis mtha' dag dang
227b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / khrag bre gang dang / ngan sngags phul gang dang / de dag thams cad kyis bang ba bar chad can ltar so sor yongs su gang ba/ pags pa rim pa bdun gyis kun das bskor ba/ ro bro ba drug gis g.yog lus
227b7(dkon brtsegs): la ngan sngags kyi sbyin sreg byed pa/ rtag tu mthar 'dzag pa/ lus kyi yan lag de dag thams cad kyis bltan mi sdug pa/ dring ba/ rtag gi rang bzhin yin na 'di la su zhig gus par byed de/ skad cig dgos pa'i
227b8(dkon brtsegs): phyid snod ba rnyan ma tsam du zad pa dang / khung bskur ba'i phyir shing da lta bu 'ba' shig yin par chos kyi blos gzung bar bya'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ 'di ltang sa sal phung po'i lus la ni// gzugs mdad par
228a1(dkon brtsegs): 6// rgyal tsab gang gus byed pa// byis pa'i blo can de ni mngon bzhin du// mi shes ngan lkugs bum pa thogs shing 'gro// de li snanas nag gi rnam pa ma ngag/ kha nas dri mi zhim pa rtag tu 'byung
228a2(dkon brtsegs): gas she matsun pa // sa su gachags shing sas par bya//  na gyis brims bzag gsas// ded dka dper byin pa 'di byeng cag/ gang mamed ma po ma
228a3(dkon brtsegs): kur// byis blo phyin ci log ging rgyal can// de ltar mi gang gtsang spa'i blo gros can// nga yi sa lus 'di gtsang mar bya zhes te// bskus phyis 'bab stegs brgyar ni khrus byas kyang // 'chi bdag dbang gis zad
228a4(dkon brtsegs): nga mi 'khrur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang khyim bdag dpas byin dang // khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag la bka' stsal pa// khyim bdag rnams 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
228a5(dkon brtsegs): da pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas rnam pa bzhi bcun ba zhes lus la bdag par bya ste/ rnam pa bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/ de lnga ste/ khyim bdag rnam
228a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dis byang chu ba sems dpa' mams dpa' chen pa sus med du ma'adab dpa rang bden gyis mimathun pa te/ smad par btag par bya/ byang chub sems dpa' lub nag zag pa ni/ dri sa nem par bdag pa
228a7(dkon brtsegs): bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus mthar 'dzig pa ste// snying po med par bdag pa bya// byang chub sems dpas lus chub pa'i thog sa spel ba ste/ nam chung bar bdag par bya// byang chub sems dpas su mig
228a8(dkon brtsegs): bzag pa ste/ mi gtsang bar btag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus yang dag pa ma yin pa ste/ snam lta bur brtag par byabya chu mas las lus sgrib ma mkhas pa byis pam tha 'asmra ba rnams la dag
228b1(dkon brtsegs): par bdag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus 'jig pa dang / bug dgu'i sgo nas 'dzag par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus 'dod chags kyi sems kun tu 'bar bar brtag par bya/ bya
228b2(dkon brtsegs): trab sems dpal lus ni sdug gi mes chag par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus gti mug gams me sde gcig tu gyur par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus 'dod chags dang
228b3(dkon brtsegs): / sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyis ldongs par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpag lus 'dod chags kyi drabs labs shing sred pa'i dra bar rung bar btag par bya/ byang chub sems dbas sus kun nas
228b4(dkon brtsegs): zhes yongs su gang bas du ka'i gnas su bdag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus nad pa'i brgya rtsa bzhis gcos par btag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus srin bu'i regs bcang de ba'i
228b5(dkon brtsegs): nas su bdag par bya/ byang chub sams dpas lus 'otsho ba'i ma na pa med pa ba na byung chub samasangasas las tshas la rmongs pas bams pa yin par ba ga shA/ shA tugamasapa
228b6(dkon brtsegs): ma b.rang bye 'gyu ci byasar 'jig pas bram pa lta bung bdag par bya/ byung nabams dpas sus sungan gyi gnod payang bas ga yas nyam thag par bdag par bye/ kyang dul 'amams la
228b7(dkon brtsegs): ra 'thung bas don pamed par bdag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus g.yodang sgra'i de bar spyod pa dgagis grags par bdag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas las dkyang dgal la
228b8(dkon brtsegs): drab/ byang chub sems dpas lus dga' ba'i gzugs dang / bde ba'i gzugs la zhen pas ma lta bung brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus 'ad pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis chog ye shes par 'ata
229a1(dkon brtsegs): bar bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus rdzas su chags pa dang / khang khri bdag gis 'joms par bdag par bya/ byang du ba sems dpas lus ste stang dang gnod pa skyong bas me btan par brtag par bya/ 
229a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang chub sems dpas lus tu klung gargyun bzhin du gzhan dang gzhan 'byung bas rkyen gzhan dang gzhan du brtag khang bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus tshul bzhin ma len pa rnam pa sna tshogs yid la byed pa'in pal
229a3(dkon brtsegs): rtag pa dag gis yid kyi sems palen par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus tha mang dur khrod mjug pas byas pa me gzo bar brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus sbyang gi dang / lce spyang dang / 
229a4(dkon brtsegs): sha za ba dag gi zas su brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus rus pa dang / rkus pa'i bog ris spel bas 'khrul 'khor lta bur brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus pashong ba dang / gtse ba dang
229a5(dkon brtsegs): chel ba dang / snabs dang / nag dang / khrag gis yongs su gang ba ste/ blta ba'i 'os ma yin par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus zas dang skom las byung ba ste/ rang gi kha na las pa ma yin par
229a6(dkon brtsegs): 'artag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus me dag pa ste/ shin tu zad pa'i chos nyid yin pas don med pa'i grags pas blags par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus phyir rgol ba mang po 'byung bas dgra/ 
229a7(dkon brtsegs): khur brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus yang dang yang du sdug bsngal myong bas gsod pa lta bur brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus sdug bsngal gsum gyis gtses te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 
229a8(dkon brtsegs): des ste/ 'du byed kyi sdug pasnga ba zhid dang / 'gyur ba'i sdug bsdem gnang sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal zhed byas te sdug bsngal gyi snod yin par btig par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus srung ba lngam na/ 
229b1(dkon brtsegs): par grub pas sdug bsngam gyi gong bu yin par bdag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas las rkyen tha dad pa las byung bas bdag med pa dang / bdag po med par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus skyes
229b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bud med dang bral bas srog med par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lum phung ba dang / khams dang / sgyu mched rnams kyis stong par brtag par bya/ byang chub sa pas dpas lus mel ba lta ru
229b3(dkon brtsegs): g.yog tu brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus sgyu ma lta bu ste/ yang dag pa ma yin par bdag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus smig rgyu lta bu ste/ 'khrul par byed par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems
229b4(dkon brtsegs): sas sus brag na sa 'o ste/ slu bar bdag par bya/ byangan bsams dpas lus mig yongs bus/ sra ba'i bdag nyid du brtag par bya ste/ khyim bdag rnams byeng su sem pa dpa' sems dpa chen po nam/ 
229b5(dkon brtsegs): pa pa ni 'dum bzhi pa de dag gis lus la brtag par bya'o// de ltar rtog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chan pa lus la lus su 'dun pa dang / lus la dga' ba dang / lus bdag gir byed pa dang / lus la
229b6(dkon brtsegs): sred pa dang / lus la gnas pa dang / lus la zhan pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad spong ngo // sreg la sreg tu 'dun pa dang / srog la dga' ba dang / sreg bdag gir byed pa dang / srog la srad pa dang / srog la gnas/ 
229b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / srog la zhen pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin du nor dang / 'bru dang / khyim dang / chung ma dang / bu dang / bu ma dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bgo ba dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / me tog dang / bdug
229b8(dkon brtsegs): padang / seMs dang / phreng ba dang / thug pa rnams dang / ma byang mams ca kyib dgal 'dran pa dang / dga' ba dang / bdag gi byed pa dang / sred pa dang / gnas pa dang / rgan pa gang yin pa dadag thams cad lda / 
230a1(dkon brtsegs): / de lus dang srag lam ltal// da bzhin nar dang / 'bru dang / kum dang / chung sa dang / pra dang / bum dang / bza' ba dang / btang ba dang / bag pa dang / bzhan pa dang / mas cha dang / ma tag dang / bdun
230a2(dkon brtsegs): dang gros dang / ze dang / thug pa rnamam lams pa pa ni byin pa dag/ sa du masas rdzogs par byed// khrem bdag rnams byang chu bsams dpa' sem pa dpa tshan pa pa na na pa
230a3(dkon brtsegs): su rdzogs nas myur du bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lus rgya cher yongs su bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'ang/ 
230a4(dkon brtsegs): dag 'aka' stsal to// mi nang shin tu nad dka' rnyed pa la// lus kyi phyed ni sdig pa ma byed cig/ di ni dung khrod pa ste ste sbyang bas// lus sa phyir de la da ma 'a ga cig/ g.yo ldan lus la sred pa bskyed napa na
230a5(dkon brtsegs): byis pa dag tu rnam par chongs te 'khyam// lus 'di byas pa mi gzo dang pa yin pas// nyen dang mtshan du sdug bsngal tshor ba myong // rtag tu nang 'dra sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor te// lus 'di ngan sngags rnam
230a6(dkon brtsegs): dang mchi la mas gang // bkres dang skem pas rtag tu mngon par gtses// mkhas pa su zhig lus la srod pi skyed// lus ni sa gting 'dra ste chog mi shes// gshed ma mi mdza' 'dra yang byis pas gos// lus
230a7(dkon brtsegs): ched sdig pa'i las kyang byad// de phyir de dag sdug bsngal tshor ba kyang // lus 'di rdo rje la bung sram yin// lus kyi ched du sdig pa ma byed cig/ 'chi bar rtogs nas bsod nams myang du thos// de bzhin
230b1(dkon brtsegs): skal pa bcang yang shin tu dra da dka' ba// zab pa'i 'brang 'di kyad kyis dad pa la// sangs rgyas bstan la de bzhin dang pasred// shis tu 'jigs pa'i ngan 'grang ma 'gro shes/ so slong bye bar sunag
230b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa// des kyang chags pa yongs sa spang byan// su zhig lo brgya thub par mi 'gyur ba// de phyir dka' ba me rnyed smos ci dgas// ma bsdams me rnams kha cig 'di skad du// mer dred shin tu dka' ba rnyed pa la/ 
230b3(dkon brtsegs): non tshe rtsed mo dag dang dga' bya zhing // nor btsal bde ba myong bar bya zhes zer// nor tshal ba la bde ba gal yang // bsang pa'i phyir yang sdug bsngal myong bar bgyur// de phyir mkhas pa chags pa yongs
230b4(dkon brtsegs): spangs la// ngan don tsam gyis chog shes thob par byos// longs spyod sbram 'dra zhing rmi lam mtshungs// 'di dag byis pa'i skye bo 'dred pa yin// skad cig 'byung zhing skad cig 'jig par 'gyur// mkhas pa su
230b5(dkon brtsegs): ge longs spyod srid pa skyed// snam 'dra zhing gar mkhan ka dang mchung sa// dri zab grong khyer sna tshogs ci 'dra ba// langs spyod de dga' de 'ang byis pa 'drad// de ltar log pa tshol ned byis pa 'asnam// sdug bsngal
230b6(dkon brtsegs): rgya yis longs spyod btsal btsal ba// lus la gnod pa mtshungs med bskyed byas nas// rgyal po'i mthu yis de dag phrogs gyur pa// de dag la ni mkhas gang dga' ba skyed// bu dang chung ma'i dbang du la 'gyur ba
230b7(dkon brtsegs): d+hal pos nyes pa byung ba'i nor phrogs pa// nyes pa de dag 'di 'dra rig nas su// mags pa rnams ni khyim la srid mi smad// rtag tu ban bcang longs spyod tshol byed pa// den pa dang ma lam gus shing // bu dang chung pa
230b8(dkon brtsegs): rnams pa mi byams par// de dag nag tu chags la 'jug par byed// bdag gis longs spyod 'grib par 'gyur 'a shes// brdab mo byas gnon mas kyang rnyed mi 'gyur// ga po dang smas ni nor rnams tshol byed pa/ 
231a1(dkon brtsegs): / banabapa mdag la mkhas pa med medon// sems can brnab mo g.yo ldan 'dred pa nyid// yid gnan sems mchog zhes dga' bar byed// ling bdan kyang ni de la med mi rton// 'on kyang du 'drang
231a2(dkon brtsegs): ldag par ston par byed// sems can brdab mo 'jig rten gang rgyu ba// sman dang bstan btsas dag la mkhas snyad cing // smad 'tshong lta bur tshig gis 'drid byed la// khor nas me bde shin tu rtsub pa yin/ 
231a3(dkon brtsegs): rdeb mo dag la mnga' bo rnams kyang med// nye du med cing sring slebs grags kyang med// 'on kyang de dag dor phyir sten par byed// skye bo brnab la mkhas pa yang mi rton// banab mo phongs spyod ched du bya men
231a4(dkon brtsegs): na du me bzad sems ni kun tu byed// dpying ma khas pas yang dag rtogs byas la// ngan den ca yang rung bas chog shes kyis// gser dang mu ti gnor bu bye ru dang / las dgas de dag lnga ba las kyang 'byung / 
231a5(dkon brtsegs): / dag sgyu ma'i rang bzhin ma rtogs nas// de dag phyir ni 'thab cing rtsod pa byed// byams pa zhes bya gang zhig 'dir 'byung ste// de bzhin gshegs pa de ni 'byung ba'i tshe// sa bdi gser gyis rab tu gang bar
231a6(dkon brtsegs): byu// de yi tshen de ni galas 'byung // 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dag 'byung ba ste// brdzun pa'i chos can 'khrul bying rmongs par byed// dper na sos ka'i nyi ma gung dus na// smig cu chur snang 'dod par
231a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin no// bskal pa gcig loni nas ni 'jig rten 'di// nam me kha'i rang bzhin nam mkhar 'gyur bar 'di// lhun po dag kyang 'chog cing rnam par 'jig/ de dag gang nas 'ongs shing gang du 'gro// 
231a8(dkon brtsegs): batsho'u da rjed dang rgya mtsho rnams/ de dag med 'gyur skams 'gyur 'byung bar 'gyur// da bzhin 'dod pa gsog ste snang la na sa khal ba su ni gnas
231b1(dkon brtsegs): dadag dag tu khyim cu spyan lartog/ 'dis myong byed pa su yod na/ 'di dag sa phyir khyim na spong ma byed// 'dran ma'i las kyis yong pa spyod chol byed cing // bu dang de bzhin chungs gso bar byed// shin du sdug bsngam
231b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dus na// bu dang chung ma skabs su 'gyur ma len// de ltar sna tshogs las byas blangs pa bzhin// bu dang chung ma dag kyang 'dor bar 'gyur// bdag nyid gcig pus sdug bsngal myong bar 'ong // de dag de cha
231b3(dkon brtsegs): giskal mi len// mya ngan rnams kyis bde khyed de dag blangs// 'den de dag sdug bsngal mya ngan 'gyur// srad gsum 'jigs pa 'di na pa shes kyang med// de bzhin bu dang chur ma rtsa lags med// pha ma sngan dang bu dang chung
231b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang // bran dang nor dang rtsalag tshogs kyi rnams// shi ba'i gshen phyed de dag 'gro ba med// lal rnams rjes su 'brang nang byis pa 'gro// sa ma ni rjes phu babrang meng mi kun 'dod// las kyis gnas pa 'jig rten
231b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rgya// skye 'di las kyi bdag nyid dag gyur nas// mkhas pa dag ni dge ba'i las rnams byed// man med mo tshad dag srabs min pas// pa ma sman dang snyed sdug bu rnams dang // dz+wa la ka na du sdug zhi garten
231b6(dkon brtsegs): mtshams dang // de dag ched du mkhas pa sdig mi byed// las de yongs su zad pa ma gtogs par// rab tu mi bzad 'jigs las mi mi 'grol// de phyir sdig pas 'jigs pa'i mi rnams kyis// bsgoms te sngon pa
231b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su spang bar bya// ji ltar las rnams byas pa ma gtogs par// gshin rje dang dag shin rje'i rang dang // mdza' pa shes dag dang rtsal ga chag sa dang spun// pam bu dang cung ma srung mi byed// khyod kyis mi ma lus ni
231b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur la// thob nas sdig pa spang bam byas pas/ kyes daltar sdug bsngal mi bzad myong // 'di ni mi dge' lar byin ma smin yin / la sa gyi rnamapa smin pa yidam ches// khyod ni rang zhesems kyis mi dge byas// 
232a1(dkon brtsegs): 'ad langs na ci yang ma ldananas// ma brtul gzhan dza da srad sa// rang gis las pas rang rnam par smin// rang galas kyis khyod ni 'dir 'ongs kyi la// ji ltang sngon chad mi 'dod las ma
232a2(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal don nyid kyis myong bar byas// decha pa ma dang gi chung ma rnams// sdug bsngal nyan pa yongs su thar mi byed// legs pa'i las byas pas na bral bar 'gyur// da ltar khyim ni yongs su spang bar bya/ 
232a3(dkon brtsegs): sgo dbyug pa lcang gi chad pa rnams// su zhig spong 'dod ni ba don gnyer bas// khyim la 'jigs par gyis te srong byos la// 'jigs rten mkhas pa'i brtan la chos spyod cig/ khrem ni rab 'bar sdug bsngal
232a4(dkon brtsegs): bang po'i rtse// sems las byung ba rnams kyis rtag tu 'bar// ma mur 'bas 'dra 'jigs par byed pa la// mkhas pa su nig de la sred pa skyed// khyim gnas bu dang chung ma'i mya ngan byed// khyim gnas de bzhen
232a5(dkon brtsegs): longs spyod mya ngar byed// nyes pa 'di dang gzhan yang dpag med de// de las khyim ni yongs su spang bar bya// 'dren pa rnams kyi bstan la dga' byed pa// ma btab ma mos pa de dang yid bde'i chu// sdug bsngal mang
232a6(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba bye 'di la// blung po dga' ye mkhas pa gzhar me dga'// sngags pa cu rmus sha dang rus pa'i lus// 'di ni nga'i rlung ma 'du shes bskyed// byas pa rmongs pa 'dod chags sbed par byed// 'ad med snga
232a7(dkon brtsegs): A zung mong ba shes/ gas ba ldan pas rgyam byinas gnas// dbyer da 'dag rab ma / chos la smin gyi 'dug pa gsas byas nas/ mtshogs kyiman myu
232a8(dkon brtsegs): byung bar byed/ de nas khyim bdag dbas byin dang / khyim bdag lnga brgyanam de dag gis tshas kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de dag bzod pa'ib nas
232b1(dkon brtsegs): chag tu dga' ba dang mag par grwar ta dang ma tshag su bcad pa'ang dag gas to// sangs rgyas chos la 'dod gyur nas// gang dag gis nams bskyed pa// kye ma nad pa rnyed pa cha// 'dan rnyed pa kun
232b2(dkon brtsegs): mchog/ byang chub sems na dga' ba ste// sems can thams cad bar babyed pa'o// sems bder su ga dad ba snyed pa// de dag 'a tshab legs par 'tsho// sems can rkun ma phan bskyed pa'o// sems pan
232b3(dkon brtsegs): gang dag bskyed gyur pa// de dag sems can thams cad dga'// de dag mthong na dga' bar 'gyur// byang chub sems la su dga' ba// de dag lus ni gser 'dra zhing // mtshan gyis shin tu smras pa dang / 
232b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten ldang bar byed par 'gyur// byang chub sems ni sems che ste// sems kun dang na dge ba mchog/ yon tan thams cad phun sum chags// nad kan rab tu zhi bar bgyid// sems can bsod nam
232b5(dkon brtsegs): chung ngun pas// byang chub sems ni 'dod mi bgyid// 'khor ba la ni mi rtog pa// byang chub sems kyis skyo bar 'gyur// byang chub sems kyi bsod nams gang // de la gal te gzugs mchis na// nam mkha
232b6(dkon brtsegs): na //  ng+gA / ga mam med // pa sa rgyam na pam gas//  can dag shA // dug tad pa ldanas rnas pa pas
232b7(dkon brtsegs): /  chug tu ni thams brjod// mchod pa 'din kyang bar 'phags// dam mtsham mchi la pa// byang chub thams na 'khrag/ drang gro tshog gis sa
232b8(dkon brtsegs): padzad pa'o// de 'dral chod pa gzhanas mchis// dpal yang gzhan ni mchis ma lags// sran gyi dam pa nad ma mchis// byang chub sems ni yon tan ldan// nang can rab tuni par bgyi
233a1(dkon brtsegs): // sems can thams cad bde bar bgyid// me gsum dag gis gdungs pa ye// sems can sdug bsngal mthong nas ni// bskal pa dpag du med par spyod// mkhas rnams skyo bar yod
233a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyub// gang dag byang chub smad spyod pa// dpa' ba stan pa'i rgyal po 'dra// de dag sems can sngags kyi yul skyob// slob dag tu rnam par spangs// dpa' bo sangs rgyas chos 'tshal pa// 'gro ba
233a3(dkon brtsegs): sre ba thams cad du// sems de 'dir bar mi bgyid cing // de dag brtul zhugs de yang ston// sems 'di la ni gang dga' ba// shAkya seng ge maM yi mchog/ sangs rgyas ci 'dra de 'drar 'gyur// bdag ca
233a4(dkon brtsegs): da pa legs par rnyed// da nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nam gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chom
233a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od 'phro ba kha dog sna tshogs kha dog du ma byung ba 'di lnga ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar bo dag ma nan dang / ges dbang dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag ste
233a6(dkon brtsegs): 'ad des 'jig den gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag khyab par byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par byung ste nyi zla rnams kyi gzi brjid zad par byas nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das
233a7(dkon brtsegs): na gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzang nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lhangs la btu
233a8(dkon brtsegs): / bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba bdud nas bcom ldan 'das pa 'dinadu ce la gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyu ma mchis/ rkyen ma mchis par ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
233b1(dkon brtsegs): ma papa' dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jam pa sa n+ta dan/ 'du ba bad panan sa rkyen gang zags/ de'i cha chags pa da dag kyang gsob to// dum ma
233b2(dkon brtsegs): dum 'dren rgyal ba mchog/ sangs las sko la 'jam pa ma gnon// skad bcom ldanabyed kyis bdum ma dupa// 'jig rten pa dang shing martags brtse bdag pa gsungs/ khyod kyis
233b3(dkon brtsegs): dorang 'dzum bstan gsungs// bka' mches che ldan nor mchog rkyen mdzad pa// dbul por gyur pa nar dang ldan par mdzod// 'jig rten ljongs la myur du mig kyang stsol// de skad cel gsol pa dang / @
233b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// kun dga' ba khyod kyi gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyeng nas de bzhin gshegs pa ga
233b5(dkon brtsegs): dulhags pa'i khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam 'di dag mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dgal
233b6(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam 'di dag gis chos se rnam grangs 'di thos nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste/ kun dga' ba khyim bdag 'di dag thams cad ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'o/ 
233b7(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa dag ste/ khyim bdag 'di dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas nam du yang ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing phyes
233b8(dkon brtsegs): nas mthar gyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa mnyes par byed cing thugs byung bar me byed de kyi bya nga
234a1(dkon brtsegs): zug btsun par byed par 'grub rim gro byed par 'gyur/ mchod pa byeng par 'gyur ro// brnas pa sa sa rnaMm bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyang mnas pa shA
234a2(dkon brtsegs): thugs byung ba 'i byed de ste snang byed par 'gyur/ btsun par byed par 'gyur/ rem 'gro byed par 'gyur mchod pa byed par 'gyur ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos kyang nyan par
234a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ thos nas kyang 'dzin par chug/ kun chub par byed par 'byur/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston par 'gyu'o// de'i lag tu bskal pa nya shu rtsa ldan/ sangs rgyas kyi nang tha dad padag
234a4(dkon brtsegs): ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma' dpal gyi snying pa
234a5(dkon brtsegs): bar mtshan 'thun par 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la cha dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'don ces gso to// kye ma chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'di ltar rgya che ba ni ba
234a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mang ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
234a7(dkon brtsegs): dga' bda'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa'i rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa bstan pa zhes bya bar zang shig/ dpas byin gyis zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das
234a8(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / khyim bdag sna brgya tsam de dag dang / lha dang med pa/ snga ma yer dang // 
234b1(dkon brtsegs): na pa ma / bamam ldan 'das kyis gzungs pa la mngon par bab nga // kha khrus pa nas chog bachags pacanan chos ze 'azungs san stong phrag brgya ba las khyim pa
234b2(dkon brtsegs): pa sa brgyad pa rdzogasaso/ rgyan pa la 'an pa na dang / da ba dang / rgacan gyilo rna na mi shes rjes pasgyur na na ga
234b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le ru stong phrag brgya pa las le'u nyi bu dgu pa lte bang po'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis rgas
234b4(dkon brtsegs): pa/ bam po gcig pa/ @#// rgya gang skad du/ Ar+ya ud yan 'das rA dA pa ri prats+tsha nAm pa'i ba ga pad skad du/ 'phags pa dang sa'i rgyal po 'tshar byed kyis nus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u sangs
234b5(dkon brtsegs): drus dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la pag 'tshal lo// 'di skang bdag gis thos pa dus gcigs/ btsod ldan 'das go ga m+b+hin dbyang sa can gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong su brgya ces
234b6(dkon brtsegs): dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang tu mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe na mdu'i bum btsun mod pe med phrag dog dang / ser snas zin pa sa bcu
234b7(dkon brtsegs): po sngo pangs can la ldag par dmig nas pad sa 'i rgyal po 'char byed la lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol// badren mo snga sangs can la sogs pa bud med lnga brgya ni dge sbyong gau ta ma dang ldan cig
234b8(dkon brtsegs): rab tu skyon chags par bgyid de/ de'i srad du bdag gis lngal gsol ba lags kyis ji ltar mkhyen pa de bzhin du mang du gsol ces brdzun gyi tshig gis dbyen byas par gyur to// de nas pa pa'i
235a1(dkon brtsegs): // rgyal po 'char byed mdu'i bu mo btsun mo dpe med kyis dbyed byas pas bcom ldan 'das dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnams la thab dang / 'khrug pa dang / khro ba skyes par gyur to// de tshe
235a2(dkon brtsegs): rangs shing khro ba dang / rngam pas zil gyis non pas btsun mo sngo sangs can gsad pa'i phyir gzhu bdungs nas mda' ste'u ka na rnga ma blangs te 'phangs so// de nas de'i mod pa btsun mo sngo sangs
235a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal la nas bcom ldan 'dal la phyag byas shing bcom ldan 'das kyi bsngags pa
235a4(dkon brtsegs): nas byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthus mda' sde'u ka nya rnga ba de de dpa phyir log ste/ pad sa'o rgyal po 'char byed de nyid kyi mgo'i drang zad kyi/ 
235a5(dkon brtsegs): khar snang la 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched de 'bar zhing me lde gcig tu gyur te phar 'gro tshur 'gro zhing 'dug 'dug nas pad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed ga la ba der song nas bad sa'i rgya
235a6(dkon brtsegs): char byed kyi g.yon rol legs su 'dug par gyur te/ de lus la ni ma phog go// lan gnyis lan gsum du de ltar gyur pa dang / de nas btsud mo sde sangs can gyis pad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed
235a7(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po de lta lags pas gal te khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal na khyod la yang bde legs su 'gyur lags so// de nas bad sa'i rgyal po 'chang byed 'jigs
235a8(dkon brtsegs): nga dang sa mi snyed lug cing sru zing nas byed par gyur tes la brgyal nas btsun ma sdes sangs can la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ sred ni lu mo 'am dri ba 'o// sha 'am 'am srin mo'am/ 
235b1(dkon brtsegs): skar gzung bar bya/  yes dris pa smos shig/ gang la mtshon gyis me gnod pa'o// bud med 'ga' yang long min te// ngas ni 'ad la gang du yang // zas sam mthang ngam shes pa'ang med// nga ni skabs
235b2(dkon brtsegs): bsed 'khrus can// 'phong gi shes pa legs bslabs pas// nga le mnga'i ni gdon me ba// nam yang me phag yad mad te// spre'u'am yang na bya dang ne// ma'am yang na 'ben kyang drang // gang yang ya
235b3(dkon brtsegs): mda' 'phangs pa// nam yang me log yod min na// de reng mnga' 'di 'phangs pa ni// bzlog pa'i tshul du phyed 'angs te// lus la gnod pa med par me// nga ye mdun du bdug par 'gyur// gnan gyi tshig ni
235b4(dkon brtsegs): mazhan nas kyang // nga ni khyod la bsod 'dod pa// nga ni khyod la srabs su 'gro// sdug bsngal gyur par la skyobs// phyen cad 'di 'dra ma byed kyis// sdug bsngal ba yi dang bzod kyis/ khrod ston dga' ba dran
235b5(dkon brtsegs): byos pa// dang bar gyis shig kro bral cig/ de nas btsun ma sngo sangs can gyis bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed la tshogs su bcad de ska ba ga/ bdag ni lha men dre ba men// nab ma na sren pa man
235b6(dkon brtsegs): bdaga'i bdun po sngo sangs cad// 'jig rten mgon po'i nyan thos ma// lha khyod la ni snying brtse bas// bdag gi sems ni mnyam bzhag gis// khyab ba dag 'jig rten mgon po la// zhugs
235b7(dkon brtsegs): dadang bar mdzod// bskal pa bya ba stong rnams su// gang gis byams pa legs bsgobs te// byams la gnas pa'i skyes bu dang // bung ma dag ni mi sod gsungs// ga cig sa tog smin pa la// sams
235b8(dkon brtsegs): yang dka de bzhin ma khyen// bud med rnams kyis gnod med pa// de yi bstan la bdag dga' lags// 'jig rten ma gan sathams cad kyis// bud med rnams ni smad par gsungs// bud me nam
236a1(dkon brtsegs): // ba// 'jig rten mgon po rnams kyis bsngags// sangs rgyas rnams dang rang sangs rgyas// byang chub sems dpa' nan thos rnapas// bud med bsnyen par mi mdzod / da ni shes pa'i spyod yul
236a2(dkon brtsegs): lags// bud med rnams la bstan pa de// kun nas pa dad kyi zhags par gsungs// sdigs pa rnams la chags pa ni// kun 'joms dkrugs pa'i shul dang 'dra// re la khas zud med chags pa dang
236a3(dkon brtsegs): las ni banyes pa dang // ba shes spong bar batshal ba yis// sems can rnams ni ngan 'gror khrid// mkhas pa zang bar 'tshal ba yis// bud med bsten par me babye ste// zhugs gtams
236a4(dkon brtsegs): sa mngongasapas/ ma bya lags sa pa na /  san//  la mang gas
236a5(dkon brtsegs): sa ra// bdag ni khro ba ma mchis te// bdag gi yid ni rab tu dang // khab bdag 'jig rten mgon po la// thugs ni rab tu dang par // rgyal po chen po bsud mdzod de// khyod
236a6(dkon brtsegs): cho ga gzigs la// de yis chos ni gang bstan pa// g.yel ma mchis par khyad kyi gson// de nas pad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed bcud mo snga sangs can gyis bskul bas rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang
236a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba'i 'byor pa chen po dang / chu rtsa ma tshogs pal pa ches yongs su bskod cing mdud du bdang nas pa dang cing krur ba myung bas bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar song ba dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das mangs
236a8(dkon brtsegs): zugs ni ga/ dus bdag gi gnas kyi mchog dam pa'i pha rol du byen pa/ pasam gtan dam pa rnams kyi pha rol tu gshegs pa/ gser gyi mchod sdod ltar mngon
236b1(dkon brtsegs): pa 'phags pa/ dpal bas mdzes shing / lham me ldan de spang de ste/ skyes bu chen po man sum bcu rtsa gnyi gyis ga lags par btsun pa/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen pa
236b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / byang chub sems dpa dge 'dun gyis yongs su bka ba/  nga sgra dang gnad srid dang / dre ba dang /  ma yed dang / nam mkha' ldeng dang / ma'am \u0f7f dang / lho phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa
236b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis mdun gyis bskas pa masong bar thar to// mthong nas kyang brtsam na 'das gal ba der song ste phyedan nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs pa zhes la gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces

236b6(dkon brtsegs): po 'phar byed kyis 'didad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'dod pa'i rgyu dang / 'dod pa'i gzi dang / 'dod pa la sdug par zhed pas deng mdung bu po dang med kyi tshig gis zos gang rngam pas pa
236b7(dkon brtsegs): gyis nod nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyang dge 'dun dang bcas pa las pa dang ni phreng gi sems cang bskyed/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mche saphreng sde sangs can dgum pa'i slad du mang bste ru kaka
236b8(dkon brtsegs): zhig 'phangs na/ de bar spang la 'bang / rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab du mched de 'bar zhing me lce gcig tu gar nas bzlog pa'i tshul du slar log ste bdag gi g.yon rol logs su mchis par gyur
237a1(dkon brtsegs): 9/ cing lus lan ma phoganas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mchis brang spo sangs cad kyi sug pa rkang pa gnas la gtugs te/ mchis brang spo sangs can la 'di skad du khyod lhas shegags ran
237a2(dkon brtsegs): klu mom/ dri ba mo'am/ gal so'am/ srin mo 'am/ su sheg lags shes pa gyes pa dang / de bdag la 'di skad du rgyal po chen po bdag ni lha mo yang ma lags/ klu ma yang ma lags/ drib mo yang
237a3(dkon brtsegs): ma lags/ sha ba mo yang pa lags/ srin po yang ma lags kyi/ bdag ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i nyan thos ma lags te/ khyod

237a7(dkon brtsegs): smos kyang mi 'tshal snyam du sems par gyur lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag 'di ltar byis pa lta bu dang / 'di ltar rmongs pa dang / 'di ltar mi gsal ba dang / 'di ltar mi mkhas pas de bzhin gshes
237a8(dkon brtsegs): zhan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bdag gis tha ba dang zhe nga sa sems bskyed pa de bcom ldan 'das la bzod par gsol zhing nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi mdun du yang nong pa 'chag sa gang
237b1(dkon brtsegs): cha 'thud pa sa la rang gi stan gang min pa la 'dug shig ce 'a bad pa'i rgyal po 'chang byed kyis nyes pa bshags pa rjes su gzung bar gnang de// denas padas brgyam po 'chang kyi

237b5(dkon brtsegs): nga zhing / sems can dmyal bar mi ltung ba dang / bdag dang sems can thams can la yur rang ba'i din dang sra pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ba'i srid du bco ldan 'das kyis bung med kyi skyon da dag legs pa
237b6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rab tu bshad cing bud med kyi spyod pa rnams dang / bud med kyi mtshan ma rnams dang / bud med kyi sgra rnams dang / bud med kyagayo rnams dang / bud med kyi gya glarna pas dang / bud med kyis

238a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'ad ma dang ni 'dag sems can dmyal bar mche ber bskyed 'tshal ba lags pas bcom ldan 'das las bdag don de nyid nyan par 'tshal lags sa// da skad ces gsol

238a6(dkon brtsegs): ji lta bu dag dang ldan na zhes pa bud med kyi dbang du mchi bar 'gyur ba'i skyes pa'i skyon rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la yang dag par rab tu be shad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / 
238a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bang se rgyal po 'char byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po de'i phyir khyod legs par nyon la rab tu yid la rung shig dang ngas khyod sa bshad par bya'o// 
238a8(dkon brtsegs): la po 'char byed kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyi lhar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po phan pa
238b1(dkon brtsegs): gang dag dang ldanan smras pa zang sang kya bang 'phru ya zhes pa'i skyes pa'i skyon ne bzhi po 'di dag yin no// na ma gang nem 'di snyas/ rgyal ba chen po 'di la skyes pa 'dod pa na

238b3(dkon brtsegs): des tshul khribs dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa/ shes rab dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong dang bram ze dag 'thong na bsnyen par mi byed/ bsten par mi byed/ bstan bkung ma byed pas de tshul khrims dang
238b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa/ shes rab dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis yongs su spangs pas dad pa la pa yongs su nyams/ tshul khrims las yongs su rnams/ gtom las yos
238b5(dkon brtsegs): shes rab las yongs su nyams shing dad pa dang bral ba/ tshul khrims 'chal ba/ zos pa rung ba/ sar sna can du gyur pa/ ye dgas kyi yon tan gyi chos la kun tu smod pa/ shes rab 'amal pa/ rma la chags pa
238b6(dkon brtsegs): bcog pa'i spyod yul can/ bshul bar mnam pa la mngon par dga' ba/ mi gtsang ba la dga' ba/ bud med la dang rtseg ge ba yongs su mtshal ba chags pa'i srod yul can/ 'gro bar bya ba ma yin par
238b7(dkon brtsegs): song ga spyad par 'os pa/ me gtsang ba'i srid bu dang 'dra ba/ snyigs ma len pa/ 'dod pa la brkas pa/ khrel dang ngatsha bor ga/ lha dang ma'i chos las nyams pa/ ngan par smad pa'i 'tsho bas 'pho gas

239a1(dkon brtsegs): / bud med kyi dbang du mang bzud med la gsos pa/ zud med dang gnas pa/ ma'i ske'i spyod yul can/ ma'i sgol sten pa/ ma'i sgol gnas pa/ larbu dang / sngangs dang / makyim mdang /

239a3(dkon brtsegs): ngami 'dzin pa/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / sbyin gnas la phangs par mi 'dzin pa/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la dad pa yongs su nyams pa/ mya ngan las 'da' ba la yongs su nya
239a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can dmyal ba dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rdo'i 'jig rten 'azhugs shing gzhol ba seng ge dang / nam mkha' lding gi lus la yang dag par zhugs pa/ lugs kyi shing gas ma
239a5(dkon brtsegs): thon po dang / mel su la gzhol ba/ sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / pheg nag dang / bsdus 'jom dang / ngu 'bod dang / du 'bod chen po dang / che ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / ma dang med pa'i
239a6(dkon brtsegs): can dmyal ba chen por zhugs pa na bud med kyi skyon 'di lta bu de dag ngos kyang bud med pa tshogs zung che dang rten pas bkad pa dang / tshe 'din 'dod pa dang / bro bdungs pa dang / klu dngas par
239a7(dkon brtsegs): rol mo byas pa dag rdul su dran par byed cing skyeb sa skyed yad byung bar mi byed de/ rgyal po chen po byes pa'i chos la kun tu spyod pa de dag dang ldan pa'i skyes pa ni ngan song na las su skye bar 'gyu
239a8(dkon brtsegs): rdul po chen po bud med kyi dbang du sa panas 'dod pa la ldan cing / ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'jug pa dor rgyas pa'i skyes bu'i skyon dang po yin do// de nas de tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi sa tshogs su yang
239b1(dkon brtsegs): da/ bka' stsas to// 'dod pa dring mega' smad par ngarab dang / ngam na dzegs pa medagasas dang mug pasal da/ dodam zung ba byed cing ldan pa yin pas na// 'kha' par shegs
239b2(dkon brtsegs): gom la sbyin par byu/ btsag pas gang ma 'ang bye na bad/ man pa pa bad dang/ ge bdud grad san shin tu skad pa lta // de bzhin 'dod pa
239b3(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu smad pa yin// sbrang bu ma zhig mthong nas rgyug pa ci 'dra dang // pag/ ne na smugs mthong na rtug pa ce 'dra dang // byen na ya don du shan sar 'gro bltar// de bzhin mi mkhas bud med dag la dga'
