245b1(dkon brtsegs): rje byed pa/ myal ba drag pa chan par de// lku ban sa dbang gnyen yod min ne // lcags kyi su grul pa par 'gyur// me rnams sdig pa byed pa dag/ ljags las grub pa'i grag chen dang // me sdug re ba rnams kyis ni// / 
245b2(dkon brtsegs): 'angs myeng// da de gsasas byas // 'bras bu ma ma rgyur rgya// de mi tshor 'byu me// del skye ba ga ma med// de skyed rten pamam sad / dag gi bdu dang 'gal pa ma // 
245b3(dkon brtsegs): de zhin med bdag gcig sa// sdug pasngal tshor bapyong bar byed// gang dag pa dpyir don min par// sngan chad nyes par skyed byas kyang // pa la de dag do ring ni// rnam par grol ba'i mthu yang med// gang dag par byed don/ 
245b4(dkon brtsegs): med par// sngan chad nyes par spyad byas kyang // bu dang bum chung ma rnams// da ring bdag la 'grel mi rug// gang dag bde byor don med par// sngan chad nyes par spad byas kyang // mdza' ba shes nye du de dag kun// rnam par
245b5(dkon brtsegs): krol bar yod mi nus// gang dag 'di phyer don min par// sngan chad nyes pa srung byas kyang // bdag gi rgya la ga de dag kun// de ring 'grol bar mi nus so// 'dod pa dman pa rnams sten cing // dman pa'i chos rnams bsten
245b6(dkon brtsegs): nas de// nyes pa'i las rnams byed pa dag/ de les ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur// shes rab 'chal bar ba nang med par// song nas sdug bsngal tshar bskyod// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bud med dag/ bye ba'i dri ltar dben/ 
245b7(dkon brtsegs): / dman pa'i bud med rnams sten pa/ byeb 'de ni phye sa yi/ rgyal pa bzung nas gnas pa yin/ ci 'dra'i las ni byed pa ltar// de 'dra'i 'bras bu thob 'gyur te// rgyal po yi ga cad
245b8(dkon brtsegs): bdang // ga sngal pa bam myongs pa rgyag/ su bad gzhis ba skyes pa yang // gsad dang bcid bskyong 'gyu shing / nga rgyal thungs rnapa kyis sreg pa dang // de yar 'bye pa'ang myong bar 'gyur// 
246a1(dkon brtsegs): / med rnams la brnam pa la// grong na da dag pa demi 'gyu// gsam shi 'dzin po rnaMms bu de/ bcugs shing chur yang bcug par 'gyur// pa ye bar kar bcug nas // da bzhin ngas gres gdab por 'gyur/ 
246a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ba dag thos nas te// de dag yi ched 'dam 'gyur// ngas pa dud mad ldan ceg// yang dang yang du 'du' byed// sdug bsngal 'dod pa rnams sbyin ci // smad pa rnams kyi smra bar byed// mongs pa rnams kyi
246a3(dkon brtsegs): chos sosanapa/ dge bar gsungs shes dzad byed kyang // dasams bud med bye bzhin song // byeb la ni byel bzhin// rgyal ba ma ga sungs pa gros gyur nas// sred tsam nag de yid byung yang // la la'i dag 'dra ba'o// 'dod
246a4(dkon brtsegs): chags kyis ni de yang 'khrugs// de ltar bag ni yud tsam zhig/ dang ngas shing skrag par zung gyur kyang // des na byis mthong na yang // chags pa spyod par byed pa ltar// de bzhin byis pa bde 'dod nams// rgyal ba'i
246a5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa spangs nas ni// 'dod pa dman pa rnams bsten pas// des ni ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur// 'dod pa rnams la chags myos nas// shin tu ldeg/ pa'i las byas shing // tshul khrims can dag bsdus byas
246a6(dkon brtsegs): sa// phyes ni ngan 'grur 'gro bar 'gyur// shes rab can gyis dal rnyed cing // de 'dra' chos ni thos gyur nas// 'dod kun spangs nas 'di la ni// mkhas pa mngon par rab nyung shig/ rgyal po chen po skyem pa 'dod
246a7(dkon brtsegs): sten pa rnams kyi skyon ni de dag yin te/ 'dod pa'i gzhi dang / 'dod pa'i ma dang / 'dod pa la lhag par zhan pa rnams de sems can dpral ba pa rnams kyi tshor ba byeng bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po de lta
246a8(dkon brtsegs): kyis rtag par rgyun tu sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o// khyod kyis lus su gtogs pa'i sems rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o// de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bad sa'i rgyal po 'chang byed la
246b1(dkon brtsegs): dkar \u0f7fsa bstan par mdzad de/ chos bstan pa des bdas rgyal po 'char byed de bzhin gshegs pa la dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / mchag tugs cad par gyur to// de nas @
246b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das padas rgyal po'i char byed kyis 'diska ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de tsam cu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi skyes pa dang / 
246b3(dkon brtsegs): de rnams kyi skyon bsam gyis mi khyad pa'i bar de dag bka' stsal cing legs par gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bdag ni bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang dge slong gi dge'
246b4(dkon brtsegs): la skyabs sum chi ste/ mtshon cha spangs shing dbyug pa spangs la ngo mchis shing srog chags 'byung po thams cad la snying brtse bar zhugs pa lags kyi sa/  cho na 'das kyis bdag dge bskye du
246b5(dkon brtsegs): du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'dasa'i rgya po 'char byed dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri bar bcas/ 
246b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las pad sa'i rgyal po
246b7(dkon brtsegs): 'char byed kyis thus pa'i len zhes bya ste te bucu dbupa rdzogs po// rgyug gyi mkhan po rin merba dang / su ren du po ni dang / zhu chen gyi sa ts+tshab ben de ye shes sde la sogs 'as bsgyud cing du
246b8(dkon brtsegs): te gtan la phab pa/ 6'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos byen pa grangs la'u stong phrag brgya ba las le'u lung cu pa ste bu mi bA kras pazang mos sul pa lung bstan pa/ 'am thi phred pa/ 
247a1(dkon brtsegs): snyed bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal ba'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i rel dge slong stong nyes brgya lnga 'acu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa 'dre byed
247a2(dkon brtsegs): 'a sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs sa// de'i ro rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na khyim bdag drag shul can gyi bu ma blo gros pa'ang mo zhes bya ba bcang nas ma brgyad yon pa 'drab
247a3(dkon brtsegs): zugs pa rang ba/ mdzes pa/ bstan sdug pa// kha dog bzang po rgyab pa mchog dang ldan pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong / 
247a4(dkon brtsegs): la bsnyen pa cur byas pa/ sangs rgyas 'bum drag bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa zhig 'dug pa de 'khor dang bcas pa bya rgod kyi phung po'i dga' ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la de
247a5(dkon brtsegs): byed nal 'acod ldan 'das kyi gapas la ma no bas phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsul bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sman sngar 'dug ste bcom ldan 'das la tshigs bu bcad de gsol ga ga
247a6(dkon brtsegs): sa skye bdag gis ni// rngog pI sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog/ 'jig rten snang bar mdzad pa la// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod gang zhu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// yid la ci 'dod thams cad ni// bu
247a7(dkon brtsegs): dro ba kyi/ byang chub se bas dpa'i spyod pa sum/  'du khyod la bsnyen par bya// de nas btsam ldan 'das la du po tho bras pa ma ma chegs sus de gsol pa// gang da lasun mangs par nga sa shin na
247b1(dkon brtsegs): da pa yo ldan par 'gyug/ myur bas 'din bdag la gsungs// ma kyil ba'i stu pA // nga ga jug tu blang zhig na ma na
247b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgya phyag 'gyir mchim ye/ 'phrul khyen gyur ba ge/ khyod brgyal pas lung bstan ga 'o// ma mchis dnganapa 'gyur ba dang /  kyi rnamapas mchis dang / bdud
247b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis kun ma ma chis dang // 'chi ba'i dus ni brjod pa na// mngon sung sangs rgyas mthong ba dang // dems chos kyang nyan pa dang // sdug pasnga la tshor bgying mi 'thung // gad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo zla
247b4(dkon brtsegs): gros bzang mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// du mo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la dod 'di drebar sems pa legs mo legs so// du ma de'i phyir legs par ra 'du la med la zung shi ga dang ngas bshad do// du co rtse bros
247b5(dkon brtsegs): gang pos bcom ldan 'dam chags sa ni gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di na cas bka' stsal to// bu mo byung mams dpa' rjes bzhidang ldanan mangs pa du
247b6(dkon brtsegs): she gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ ban dgral yang kra bar mi byed pa dang / byangs pa la gnas pa dang / chos 'di pa dang / de bzhid gshegs pa'i mu gzugs byed du 'jug pa ste/ du mo byang nub med pa 'a tsho pa// de dag dang / 
247b7(dkon brtsegs): mdzes par 'gyu ro// de la 'did/ ces bya ste/ gnad pa'i rtsab khro ba 'phel mi byed// blams la gnas par byed dang chos 'dod dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i sdug 'gas byasad de// mdzad par 'gyur rje ba lta bar 'as
247b8(dkon brtsegs): yin/ du ma byang chub sems dpa' tsham po ni dang 'dun nor che bar 'gyur to// ngazhi gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ dus su sbyin pa dang / 'gyod pa med par sbyin pa dang / yid du 'ong ba skyed pa dag
248a1(dkon brtsegs): na pa// bug bya chub sems dpa' chos man po de dag dang ldanan nama'ang byu // del 'di skad ma bya ste// dus su byad dang bgyod pa med pa dang / bad 'ang sbyin dang nas smin mengs
248a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' bo rnam pa ni las 'di byas pas na// rtag tu longs spyod chen po thob pa len// gul byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhid nga ldan ni 'khor me phyed par 'gyur te/ bzhi ga pa zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phra ma'i tshe gsungs
248a3(dkon brtsegs): dag sems can lag par lhob rnams yang dag pa'i lta ba yang dag par 'dzid du 'jug cing 'dzeg par byed pa dang / dmam cheches 'deg pa'i tshod ma pa'i chos srung ba dang / sems can rnams sangs rgyas kyi byang / 
248a4(dkon brtsegs): chu ba yang dag par 'dzid du 'jug cing 'jog par byed pa ste/ dus byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po gag ldan na 'khor mi byed par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad cis bya ste/ phra ma de bzhin log par lta bstod/ 
248a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa chos 'jig pa'i tshen srung ba byed// sems can byang chub yang dag 'dren 'jugs// 'khor rnams mi byed phun su mchogs par 'gyur// dus byang chub sems dpa' tshem bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas bcwam
248a6(dkon brtsegs): 'apas kyis na dzin pas sku ya sa rgya ste/ bzhen /  sa lan ga / la /  / 
248a7(dkon brtsegs): shegs pa'i sdugazugasas pa/ nga bzhin gshegs pa'i brjod rtad pa 'bum pa dang / gzhan dgal yang gnod sams me skyed pa dag / de bzhin ni shegs pa'i khru gzugs pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa byed du
248a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dug pa dang 'a rgyal kyi byang chub la nges brgya cher mos pas/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chom can ma dadag dang ldan na 'das rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi zad du rin pa che chen pa'i 'acwa ma d+ha ga byas
248b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur ro// de la de skad ces byas/ phye la me tog 'akang sti 'phru la dang / gdod par ba zhing klu gzugs byed pa dang // los pa rgya chen la ni gnas byed na// rgyal bdag gi thad du rdzus te skye// bu mo byang chub
248b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chos bzhi dang ldanan rdzu 'phrul gyis sangs rgyas kyi ning nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzhan dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar chad me byed pa dang / gzhan dag chos
248b3(dkon brtsegs): nyan pa la bar chad mi byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag ma mar po 'bul ba dang / ting nge 'dzin sdom pa ste/ dum byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na rdzu 'brus kyis sangs
248b4(dkon brtsegs): byas kyi zhing nang sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces paste/ dge ba dag gi bar chad mi byed dang // gzhan gyi chos gdam dag la mi spyod dang // rgyal ba'i mchod rten dag la mar me 'bul// ting 'jen
248b5(dkon brtsegs): bsgoms pas doni zhidang du 'gro// bu sa byang chulasam pa dpa mchos pan dang ldanan dgra bla med par 'gyur te/ ban gang zhe na/ di lta ste/ gas med par dge ba'i bshas gnyen dgal ston pa dang / dge ba
248b6(dkon brtsegs): ser sna mi byed pa dang / gzhan gyi rnyed pa la dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bya ba dang gnas pa thams cad la khong khrol ma mi byed cing me snyan pa mi sgrogs pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chosapa
248b7(dkon brtsegs): / de dag dang ldan nadagra zla med par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la de g.yo med// gnad kye rnyed la dga' zhing ser sna med// byang chub sems pa'i spyod la mi smod na// 
248b8(dkon brtsegs): dbu zlamed par spyad par 'byung/ thub byang chub sems dpa chom bzhi dang ldanan cheg bdun par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang san/ 'de lta gang gad sbal pa de bzhin byed pa dang mngang po dag pa med pa'i dang bzhin me
249a1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / klan ka ma tshal bar tsham can pa dang / gzhan chas smra ba dag lang bya skur ma byed pa ste/ bum byang chub sems dpa' tshas ngan pa de dag dang ldanan tshig btsun par 'gyur ro// dal 'di gad ces byan
249a2(dkon brtsegs): nad slab pa dang shen byed pa dang // yang 'al yod pa'i rang bzhin mi 'chab cag/ bran ga mi chos chas ni nyan byed / 'dzegs pa med cing tshig kyang btsun par 'gyur// bum byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhed pa
249a3(dkon brtsegs): de las kyi skyeb pa med par 'gyur zhing // yongs su dag pa yang byung du rtogs par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di ska / lhag pa'i bsam pa bsgrubs pas sdom gangam yang dag par len pa dang / mad lda / 
249a4(dkon brtsegs): dmas mi spyong ba dang / sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'du shes skyed pa dang / sems can thams cad la byams pa sgom pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa'
249a5(dkon brtsegs): chos bzhi po do dag dang ldan na las kyi sgrib pa med par 'gyur zhing yongs su dag pa yang myur du rtogs par 'gyur ro// de 'i 'di skad ces bya ste/ skrag pa'i bam pa po sdom pa gsum la gnas// mde sdeb ba po rnams
249a6(dkon brtsegs): drug tu mog// sangs kyis sras pa thams cad ma khyen blar sa// sems can rnams la byims pas la sa dag 'thung // bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na bdud kyilas med par 'gyur te/ bzhig pad/ 
249a7(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du sgom pa dang / brtson 'bras brtsams pa dang / sangs rgyas deb su dran pa sgom pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzob ste/ du ma byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po dag dang ldan na bad
249a8(dkon brtsegs): kyilas med par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ chos rnams la ni chos kyi tshul rtogs la// brtson 'grus brtsams shing sangs rgyas rjes su dran// yongs su bsngo zhing bshags dang phyag
249b1(dkon brtsegs): ces klags ni rnyed mi 'gyur// dum byang chub sems dpa' tshas bzhidang ldan na 'che ma'i dus kyi tshe bdun du sangs rgyas dgas las chos kyang nyan la sdug bsngal yang myong bar ye 'gyuraH/ brde ga / 
249b2(dkon brtsegs): ste/ gzhan dag ge bsam pa mongs sa rdzogs par byed pa dang / mas pa mang ba dang / byang chub sems pa'i sbyin pa bzhad pa sna tshogs nye bar bab pa dang / dkon mchog gsum mchod pa la brtson pa ste/ bu mo
249b3(dkon brtsegs): 'a sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe mdun du sangs rgyas bzhugs shing de las chos kyang nyan la sdug bsngal yang myong bar mi 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ deni gzhan gyi bsam pa
249b4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs byed cing // mos pa dang ni sbyin pa rgya che ba// mkhas pa de ni rtag tu sbyin par byed// de phyir de bdun de bzhin ga shes pa bzhugs// de skad ces bka' stsal nas bcom ldan 'das la bu mo blo gros bzang mos 'di
249b5(dkon brtsegs): da ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa de skad bcas pa 'ang dag la bdag gis bslab par 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis bzhi pa bcu po ji skad du bka'
249b6(dkon brtsegs): sbal ba 'di dag las chos gcig ceg ma spyad na yang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsdus par gyur cika/ da nas gnas brtan padagal bye bu chen pos bu mo blo gros bzang me la 'di skad cam smras so// / 
249b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ni nyams 'og tu chud par dka' na khyod 'di lta bu yang dag par len par byed na// ci khyod kyis sems la dbang thob bam/ de skad ces smras nas bu mo
249b8(dkon brtsegs): ldanapa yong gas kyi bu chen pa'o// 'degad ces smras so// bdun pa jig sa kyi thu bden pa dang der pa'i cheg gang gis bdag gis chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ba'i bdan pa dang den pa/ 
250a1(dkon brtsegs): cigadas snang gsum tha spang can pa'i 'jig rten bya thams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yas ta lha'i me tog gi chang 'phru pa byung cig/ dkral bar yangs la snyan gyis / 'brar bar gyur cag
250a2(dkon brtsegs): denas bu mo blo gros bzang mos de ltar bden pa'i byin brlabs byas ma thag tu da'i mod la stong gsum gyi stong chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bde rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ lha'i me tog gi char 'bab par gyur ci/ 
250a3(dkon brtsegs): dkrol bar lha'i se la snyan gyi sgra yang byung bar gyur to// btsun pa maud gal kye bu bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis/ da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya ba shA
250a4(dkon brtsegs): d+hab de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bdag de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bdag la bdud kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / ngan song nams kyi med yang med pa dang / bud med sde
250a5(dkon brtsegs): nams med par 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang 'den pa'i tshig des/ 'khor 'di gser gyi kha dog can du gyur cig/ bu mo blo gros bzang mos cheg de skad ces smras ma thag tu de'i mod la thams cad dang ldan pa'i
250a6(dkon brtsegs): khor de gser gyi kha dog can du gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po stan las langs te chos gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga
250a7(dkon brtsegs): la de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 
250a8(dkon brtsegs): de das dang sa dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bu mo zla gram bzang mo la 'di skad ces smras so// blo gros bzang mo khyod chos gang la gnas te bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs 'di byas/ blo gros bzang mos smras pa/ 'phar
250b1(dkon brtsegs): la chos kyi dbying sa na gnas pa ma mchis pas de la gnas par yi nus te 'di la dri ba ma mchis so// 'jab dpal byas smras pa/ blo gros bzang ma byang chub cas bya ba 'di gang gi tshig bla dgas yin/ blo gros 'a
250b2(dkon brtsegs): dz+wa la/ 'jam pal byang chub ces bkye ba ni rnam par me rtog pa mchos kyi tshig bla dgas so// 'jam dpal byeb smras pa/ blo gros bzang po 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di gang gi tshig bla dgas la// 
250b3(dkon brtsegs): grol pa'ang mol snu la/ 'ja ma dpal byang chub sebs dpa' zhes pa gyi ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi chos kyi cheg bladags so// 'ang ma dpal gyis smras pa/ blo gros bzang mo cad bzhin gshegs pa ya/ 
250b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa mdzad dam/ blo gros pa'ang mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal dper na smig rgyu dang brag chas byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa de bzhin du de bzhin du de bge sre bas kyang byang chub kyi phyir spyod do// 'jam dpal ces/ 
250b5(dkon brtsegs): sgrub pa/ blo gros bzang po khyed kyis ce las bsams te de skad ces spras/ blo gros bzang mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'di la chos 'ga' la yang bsam pa'am/ bsam pa ma lags pa mchis so// 'jam dpal
250b6(dkon brtsegs): kyikyi smras pa/ blo gros bzang mo 'asam pa de lta bu yin du zin na byis pa thams cad kyang byang chub tu 'gyur ro// blo gros bzang mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'di snyam du dgongs/ byis pa rnams kyang gzhan la
250b7(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyang gzhan te bya ba chub kyang gzhan par de ltar gzigs sam/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul du 'di ni dbyings gcig pa lags te/ blang ba ma mchis shing dor ba ma mchis la snro
250b8(dkon brtsegs): tags pa ma mchis so// 'jab dpal gyes smras pa/ blo gros bzang mo bshad pa 'di'i don shes pa ji snyed cig yod/ blo gros pa zang mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal bshad pa 'di'i don 'tshal ba ni sgyu ma sprul pa'i/ 
251a1(dkon brtsegs): dpal chos kyi dbyis nas ches pa yang ma lags/ ma mchis pa lang ba lags pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa nga dang 'drag// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'ja ma dpal gzhon du dag pas 'di ltan ces gsol
251a2(dkon brtsegs): com ldan 'das 'di steng du thos parang po 'di bam ma'i bcod pa dang ldan pan mtsha la// bcom na 'as kyis bka' le/ 'ang ma dpa na //  da smras pa da na te/ dum
251a3(dkon brtsegs): zang po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs nas bskal pa dum cu yon pa'i 'og tu gdod des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// byed
251a4(dkon brtsegs): bzang mo 'di nyid kyis mi skye ba'i chos la zhugs par byas so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhan nur gyur pa stan las langs te bu mo bro gros bzang mo la phyag byas nas chog 'di skad du bdag gis slob dpon yun ring
251a5(dkon brtsegs): dgan mthong zhes kyang smras so// bro gros bza pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal ma rtog shig/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ me skye ba'i chos ma bzod pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ ci phyir sgo
251a6(dkon brtsegs): dan gyis dun med kyi lus la sa dung ma bskur/ blo kris bzang mos smras pa/ 'ang mdapa pa 'di na bud med do// 'did skyes pa nas bya ba de ni dmigs pa ste/ 'on kyang khyod kyis tshom med par bya'o// bdon pa
251a7(dkon brtsegs): gang gis bdag pa 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gagags pa dgra btsal pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i bden pa des bdag skyes par gyur cig/ bum blo grom par tha ma cheg dad
251b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzid 'ang 'a kya san rgyam par da ma na / na pa 'a ga zhes 'das dag pa

251b3(dkon brtsegs): tshig des bdag dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas la sum cu lon par spyod lamache 'dra ba de lta bur gyur cig cas byas so// byang chub sems dpa' bla gros bzang thom tshig 'di skad smras ma thag tu de'i tha
251b4(dkon brtsegs): dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo sum cu lon pa'i spyod la maci 'dra ba da lta bur gyur to// 'ang ma da la bden pa dang 'dzin pa'i tshig gang gis bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi shing du sems can rnangs kyi lus
251b5(dkon brtsegs): gser rje 'dog lta bur 'gyur ba dang / bsam pas bza' ba dang btung ba 'grub par 'gyur te/ gzhan dul dbang byed kyi snyarnams kyi longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa de lta ba bzhin du 'byung ba dang / sangs
251b6(dkon brtsegs): sa kyi zhing de nangan song gsum yongs su spangs par 'gyur ba dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ldan pa dang / rin po che 'dra bas yongs su bskor cing rin po che sna bdun gyi mad+ma dag gis rgyas mi steng chen po
251b7(dkon brtsegs): te/ 'ang bdapal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ci 'dra ba khon dang mnam ning 'i b+hag de lta bur 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshe gdas 'khor 'de gser gyi 'dig can du gyur cig ces byas po// 
251b8(dkon brtsegs): dab dru thob par bamatshig dag gas ma dun ma la mams cad dang ldan pa'i nga ba dgapar dag can gyur te// de nas pa tha ldan mas kyi kyi'i lus kyis gciganas sa
252a1(dkon brtsegs): gi ska sdig par byas te/ rjes byang chun sems da' sam ba dang tshan nan nga byang pa sangs rgyas kyi dang na yod nan pa kod pa na tshu 'byu
252a2(dkon brtsegs): nes ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sa'ang ma dpal gzhon dur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpas byang chub sems dpa' bla gros bzang chen
252a3(dkon brtsegs): de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gsheg pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i khal
252a4(dkon brtsegs): rab bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yan tan rin chen dpal kye snying po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das
252a5(dkon brtsegs): sa chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsas pa na/ grog chags bye ba phrag pu ma cu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa nyid la yang dag par gnas par rgyu
252a6(dkon brtsegs): kye 'a brag brgyad rkyen chos rnams la chos kyi yig dus mod cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ srog chags pa rgya stong gis ni ma shas mngon par rtogs par gyur to// byang chu
252a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge slong byang chub kyi sems las phyir mi ldog par 'dod pa lnga stong tsam yang byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rtags shing dge ba
252a8(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba'i che banyin mthong nas de dag rang ring gi blags bcom ldan 'das kyi skul gsol to// lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos nas
252b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur cig ces smras so// dge slong de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bla med par
252b2(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos ma thag tu bskal par dgu bcu'i 'khor ba bsnyil te bor nas bla na yod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nab las byer mi ldog par gnas
252b3(dkon brtsegs): blad to// de dag thabs cad kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan te/ 'jam dpal dge slong 'di dag ni bskal pa bcu gnyis na bskal pa dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba la de bzhin gshegs pa
252b4(dkon brtsegs): bzod par dka' ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can du bskal pa dached la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzordzon pa pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de nga/ 
252b5(dkon brtsegs): shegs pa spobs pa'i rgyan ces bya bar thams cad med 'thun par 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bajam dpa pa de ltar na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa

257b7(dkon brtsegs): bkur byas pa 'di ni ngo mtshar to zhes smras so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de de bzhin te/ la ni sngon
258a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa can pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs sa du stong phrag brgya pa las gang gA'i mchog gis zhus par
258a2(dkon brtsegs): les shesum cu rtsa gcig brdzog pa so// phya gang gyi mkhan pa dzi na mi hA dang/ pAd shI la dang / nu rkyen gyi po ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur ci zhus te srang gsang chad kyis kyang
258a3(dkon brtsegs): nas gta pab ga/ 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pargyan pa mtshal gyinapa grangs 'i myong phrag brgyab la sa le sub cu rtsa gnyis pa ste 'phagasa~M pa mya ngan sa dgyes byin pa lung bstan pa
258a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyag skad du/ Ar+ya a sho kad ha b+ha ka ra Na nA ma ma hA yAn sAtra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mya ngan med kyis byin pa lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// 
258a5(dkon brtsegs): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong
258a6(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems depar brgyad stong thams cad kyang gzungs thob pa/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa/ mngon par shes pa sgrub pa la mkhas pa/ tshes zab ma'i tshul la gnas
258a7(dkon brtsegs): pastong pa nyid la gnas pa/ mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa/ smon pa med pa la gnas pa/ mi dmigs pa'i chos la gnas pa/ mi gnas par cho sa ston pa/  bye ba'i cho la bzod pa dang ldan pa
258a8(dkon brtsegs): stags 'diste ste/ byang chub sems dpa' kun pa dang / byang tshus sems dpa' spyan pa chen pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa ldan po dang / byang chub sebs dpa' dzin chen se ged/ 
258b1(dkon brtsegs): sadapa' bang gang kyi thob da/ byang chub sems ga ga tu lagabargya dang / byang chub mam dab can mas byang chub sems dpa' dgas brtson dang / byang chub sam sa ba cag
258b2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa 'a dbang po las 'as pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga tu gdung dang / byang chub sems dpa' don chen sems dang / byangs ba ma me par la gan don den da
258b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin chen thogs dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen bkra ldan dang / byang chub sems dpal ba le sbyar dang / byang chub sems dpa' ba la sbyar chen po dang / byang chub sems

258b8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / na blon gyi bu cha dang / zhabs du ma yong pa dang / pho grang ma kyi me nga/ zab ze dang/ rgyam legs dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis mi gang kyag/ thabar byas/

259a3(dkon brtsegs): po dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / mad ldan maphrul dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'bar dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan rin

259b6(dkon brtsegs): ko// 'dzi da byu sa/ mas byu bu'i rgyam pa rgya ma phran la ldang ba 'am/ bsum napa langags tam/ gzigasasas/ rgyal pas sla pa/ mung pa yi to/ 
260a1(dkon brtsegs): sbas pa/ yab tsa la'i dbang po brgya byin lha gzhan dag la ldang ba'as/ bas 'am/ rgyal pasasmras pa/  nam yin no// bu mos smras pa/ lab kyi ma mjed kyi bdag
260a2(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa lha gzhan dag la ldang ngam/ bsung che'am/ rgyal pos sbas pa/ bu sa don pa yin no// bu mos smras pa/ phab kyi rgya mtsho chen po mtsho dang / mtshe'u dang / chu mig dang / mtsha bran dang / lteng
260a3(dkon brtsegs): ka dang / khron pa la phyag 'tshal pa gsan tam/ gzegs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no// bu mos smras pa/ yab ci ri'i rgyal ba rI pa nag pa gzhan dgal 'dud pa 'am/ phyag
260a4(dkon brtsegs): tshal ba gsan tam/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no// bu mos smras pa/ la ba ci nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / skad ma'i tshogs srin bu me khyed kyi 'od 'dod pa gas na tam/ gzugs

260a6(dkon brtsegs): de g.yin no// bu mes smras pa/ ya bde bzhin du mu zhig blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen par yang ge'i sgra bsngags pa dman pa
260a7(dkon brtsegs): thos pa'i nyan thos wa lta bur gyur pa byams pachen po dang / snying rje chen po dang bral ba dag la dga' zhing ldang ba 'am/ bsur mchi ba 'am/ phyag 'tshal ba 'am/ bkur lta bgyid/ 
260a8(dkon brtsegs): napo su dge chos kyi 'khar lo bran med pa bskor tam/ skong bar bgyid pa na nyan thos dman pa/ zhan pa zhum pa/ nyi tshe ba'i shes pa dang ldan pa rnams la dga' ba sa phyag
260b1(dkon brtsegs): lab gcig pu lha'i bdag pa lha'i dbang po lta bu su zhig rnam par dag pa'i lha'i bdag po don du gnyer ba na dge bachung ba'i lha lta bu'i nyan thos dag la 'dod pa'am/ phyag 'tshal ba 'am/ ldang ba 'am/ bsur mtsha
260b2(dkon brtsegs): bgyid/ ya' mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa lta bu su zhig 'jig rten natshangs pa'i snga khang bla na med pa don du gnyer ba na dge bya'i rtsa ba rung ba'i tshangs pa lta bu'i nyan thos dag la 'dod pa'am/ sdang ba 'am 'thub
260b3(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal bar bgyid/ bab su nig pa shes tu mtsho dpag tu med pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos rtogs pa tshol ba dpa la gi mig rjes kyi chu lta bu'i tshul khrims kyi rjes su song ba'i nyan thos dag pa
260b4(dkon brtsegs): ldang pa 'gru bskur ba'i ba'am/ phyag 'tshal bar bgyid/ yab su zhig ri rab lta bu'i bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku don du gnyer ba rnas
260b5(dkon brtsegs): 'bru lnga bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang ldan pa'i nyan thos dag la sdang ba'am/ bsung 'chi ba 'am/ phyag 'tshal ba 'am/ bdud pa 'am/ 'dod pa skyed par bgyid/ yab su zhig sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
260b6(dkon brtsegs): dmas kyi che ba nyid shes rab dang / bsod napas dang / ye shes dang / yon tan nyi ma dang zla ba'i snang ba dpag tu med pa lta bu thos nas srin bu ma khyer gyi 'od lta bu rang gi chu sa snang ba gnas pa gzhan gyi sgra'i
260b7(dkon brtsegs): su song 'di nyan thos dag ga rnam par grol ba la 'dod pa skyed par bgyid/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dmas yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang nyan thos rnams la phyag mi the tshel na bzhugs bzhin du
260b8(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i slad dun na/ bu shig zla ba dang nye ma'i dkyil 'khor ba tang te srin bum khyer la phyag 'tshal bar bgyid/ lab gang nyan thos pa sted pa ni nyan thos kyi sems dang gnas pa gtung // yang dag
261a1(dkon brtsegs): / 'a dzugs pa ma rgya snyen ma macan 'a na gyi'i khri sa brgyad pa ga 'gyu du bya ste thar byo pe khyen pa bden de la slas pa 'di spyod na tho 'dag
261a2(dkon brtsegs): du lde shing bzung me 'grol lcag mi 'tsham zhing bzhin bsu ma byed de/ de dag sta / badzad snyoms sa sa sa ni bus khyod rtag pa'i rgyal chen nigago de na ces skas pa drang /  rgya
261a3(dkon brtsegs): pos bya dpel 'ad ces gas solapa dag rtseg pa'i 'i da de/ da kyi cid byed pa rnam ba na me pa la can gyid nyid stug pa'i
261a4(dkon brtsegs): lags pa snyam bgyid do// rgyal pos sbas pa/ bu ma de dag ni dang tshungs pa ma yin no// mu sa smrab pa/ la bde shen du kyang chub sem pa dang 'a sems da po skyed pa ni nan thos dang nga sangs nas mams cad dang mtshungs pa ma lags so// 
261a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal pos skyes gsu byang chub sems dpa' ma da rgyas dang dregs pa sdang ba semasas na tham padal 'dud ci phyag 'tshal ba 'i byed dag lumos smras gal pa byang chub sems dpa' ni 'ayon du 'dzin pa dang / bab dang / 
261a6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / gnod sems dang / nyes baspangs pa dang / dge ba pa yongs su smin par babyed pa'i spang du ma tshan thams cad la 'ad cing phyag 'tshal lo// de ba rtan thos chen po dgas gi la 'an du 'dzin pa dang / shA la dang / lo
261a7(dkon brtsegs): dang/ gdod sems dang / shes pa bsal ba bkyi la chis/ spang b.rabakyi dang / dge pa 'phel bar bgyi ba ra ci te/ lab nyan pomamam ni sangs rgyas 'am kyis nan chos kyi tshum rnams
261a8(dkon brtsegs): ji snyed pa dang / ti nge ngo// de snyed pa dang / shes pa ji rnyed pa'i cho ma bstan du lags kyang / ya ba de dag la ni tshul khrims kyang galas mchi/ 
261b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang ga las mche/ rnam par grol ba yang g.yas mche/ rnam par grol ba'i ye sheb mthong ba yang ga las mchi/ lab 'di lta ste dper na dum pa chab kyis gtams pa'i nang du char bab na der chab kyi thigs pa
261b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang mi len la/ der gnas par yang mi 'gyur ro// yang de bzhin du nyan thos rnams la gal te sangs rgyas 'bul kyis chos bshad du lags kyang de dag 'dzin par lung mi 'gyur la tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzi
261b3(dkon brtsegs): shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba yang de dag la gnas par ma 'gyu shing rnam par 'phel bar yang mi 'gyur ro// yab 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni mu klung thams cad
261b4(dkon brtsegs): chang kyi rgyun thams cad 'din cing deng gnas par 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni ched ma 'chis pa'i du du'o// la'abyang chub sems dpa' mams dpa' chen po rgya mtsho lta bu de dag kyang de

262a1(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang // na chen grub zung nas ni mched bu blangs// de 'azhin bdag ni nyan thos thams cad kyang // ye shes dbyings nas nyan thos blangs sum bgyid// dpe na rgyal po na
262a2(dkon brtsegs): phyug po// sa bdag 'khor los sbyar ba mnyes bgyis nas// kAdaSh+Ta pA tA gcig tsam gsolan ni// de las rgyal po bsten pa don ma mchis// gang gis 'khor los sgyur ba mnyes bgyis nas
262a3(dkon brtsegs): gsal pa ni// de ni dbyams ni ma pa bci gas pa /  zhi du// gang shesas sa rgyas pa

262b3(dkon brtsegs): ra nas// bdag nyid grol bar bgyid kyi sems can gzhan ma lags// de ni sman pa bdag nyid grol bar bgyi
262b4(dkon brtsegs): gas gyur nas// sems can grangs med sdug bsngal dag pas grol bgyid pa/ de dag byang chub mchog la 'dun pa skyed pa ste/ de ni 'jig rten kun gyis bsngags par bkye ba lags/ e ran du yi shing
262b5(dkon brtsegs): dzes phram lags pa// de dag dmas kyi grib ma langs pa ma lags te// me na da la shing 'dranyan thos thams cad kyi// rnam par grol pa'i grib ma nye bar bsnyen ma lags// tsAn dan mchog gi sdod chen
262b6(dkon brtsegs): rdzob ses// gsus pa'i bo rnams kyin par bsnyen pa lags// de bad dag byeng chub sgrims dpa rnams lal ba/ dang bcas pa'i 'jig na dag gi don parjid snrum/ khal ga
262b7(dkon brtsegs): d+ha ni yang ma lags// tshabs gdungs bzhi ba mi bgyid la// gang gA'i klung ni sems can bye bstod// tshim par bgyis nas rgya mtsho chen por ma 'i// ba lang tshig rjes chu 'dra'i nyan thos kun// sems
262b8(dkon brtsegs): bran gyi che ba'i mi bgyid// gang gA'i klung ba dra byang chub sems dpa'i rnams// sems can mtha' las chos kyis tshim par ba gyid// ji ltar rin chen char ni 'bab pa na// dbul po dag
263a1(dkon brtsegs): mgron bu len par bgyid// gang zhig nor mang de dag blangs das ni// sems can dbul po nar dang ldan par bgyid// de ltar sangs rgyas rin chen chos char 'bebs// nyan thos rnams ni dam chos rin chen
263a2(dkon brtsegs): las// chung ngu dzin te byang chub sems dpa' rnams// sems can don srad mang du len par bgyid// de ltar sems can dag ni re rab che// drung du mchis na gseng gyi mdog tu 'gyur// ri bo gzhan la sems
263a3(dkon brtsegs): can rnams mchis na// gser gyi kha dog can du yongs mi 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ri rab bzhin// gang dag mthus ni lhar bcas skye dgu rnams// rnam grol mdog tu kha dog gcig tu 'gyur/ 
263a4(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos rnams kyi ye shes 'dod mi bgyid// yab cig ji ltar du zan rtse mo yi// zil pa'i theg pas lo tog rgyas mi bgyid// rab tu khebs pa'i sprin gyis sa steng 'di// tshim par bgyid cing la tog/ 
263a5(dkon brtsegs): 'phel bar bgyid// nyan thos thams cad zil ba'i thigs pa bzhin// byang chub sems dpa' rab khabs sprin dang 'dra// snying rje mngon byas gang dag pastanan ni// stong gsum dam chos chu yisachig par
263a6(dkon brtsegs): bgyid// kar bi ra'i me tog dri mchog min// des ni skyes pa bud med dga' mi 'gyur// tsam pa ka yi me tog dril dga'// ud ngal bal shi ka yang de bzhin no// nyan thos ka ra bi ra'i dri bzhin te// de dag shes/ 
263a7(dkon brtsegs): pas skye dgra dga' mi 'gyur// kun mkhyen drinan byang chub sems dpa' la// lha dang mi rnams rab tu dga' bar 'gyur // gcig pu mche ba de la mtshar che mchi// gang zhig sems can mtha' yas khrid pa
263a8(dkon brtsegs): rang // nyan thos mi reng gcig du mchi ba bzhin// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ded dpon 'dra// 'gron zhig gzhan gyis stsal pa 'tshal ba dang // skye bo kun la stsol bgyid kun 'gron bzhin/ 
263b1(dkon brtsegs): sba 'brang nyan pas kun ni 'dzin dang dra// byang chub sems dpa' dun la 'gron bgyid pa nan/ gzengs la brtan pas chu 'chan pa las/ gnan dag bskyal ba das par ma 'byur // brtan bac+doMs gu ma nang
263b2(dkon brtsegs): zhugs nas ne// sems can bye ba mang bsgral bar 'gyid// nyan thos gabangs la brted pa lta bu ste// sems can gzhan dag spol bar de ltar dus// rdzogs pa'i byang chub grur zhugs byang chub sems/ 
263b3(dkon brtsegs): bsngal mtsho las sems can sgrol bar bgyid// ji ltar g.yul ngong bong bu'o nan ni// dgralas rgyal bar nus par me 'thar gyi// glang chen rje dang shing rta zhon na ni// g.yul du lhags pa'i dgra rnams choms pa
263b4(dkon brtsegs): nus// nyan thos rnams ni bong bu zhon pa bzhin// byang chub sems dpa' ba chen zhen 'draste// sems can kun la phan dang bde skad du// de dag shing dbang drung du bdud kyang 'joms// ji ltar bar snang ska mas
263b5(dkon brtsegs): sa gyur kyang // de dag gis ni mtshan mo mdzes mi 'gyur// zla ba rab tu rgyas pa shar bas ni// mtshan mo mkha' la theg la bzhin du mdzes// yab cig nyan thos 'di dag skar ma 'dra// rgyal po bya bcus sems dpa'
263b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin// gang dag sems can kun la sman skad du// ba shes shang bas skye bo snang ba bgyid// lab cig srin bu me khyer tshigs 'od kyis// las rnams lan 'dug par nus kyi//  ma gying 'din
263b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'od rnabs kyis// bya ba sna tshogs brgya dag brgya dpar 'gyur// nyan thos 'di dag sbyin bu ma kyang 'dra// de dag shes 'od yang dag mthor me 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnam grol nyi man+ta bu 'i// shes rab sa shes
263b8(dkon brtsegs): kyis ni sems can 'grel// li bcig la brgya dag gis skad pyang yang // ri dgas tshigs rnams 'phrog par mi 'gyur ci// seng ge'i nad kyis glang chen ri dgas dang // phyar bcas rnams kyang phyogs pa
264a1(dkon brtsegs): 'byed par 'gyur// yab gcig de ltar gan thos lnga 'dra gzegs// de dag skad kyis bdud dpas spags 'a gyur// rgyal po byed tu ba sems dpa 'a spyod spyad pas/  da du bzhid dud de ba stug pa gzub la
264a2(dkon brtsegs): ceshe du de bdag gis mthong // theg pa dpan bdag 'dod mi snyed// su nege med nga chub pa ga de// rmeg pa dmanam 'dod paskyed pa brtsed/  sheg kyang chu dam pa yongs lnga can pa// gas
264a3(dkon brtsegs): bcas 'jig rten sman slad du// byang chub mchog la 'dun pa skyed par bgyid// de dag legs patsho rnyed pa legs par med// de dag mi lus thob pa legs
264a4(dkon brtsegs): / ga dag kya pag dang med kyis kyang // ji lda pas che ba na// gang dag tan tu sems can sna bad rtsin//  dag sungam pa ma tog bzhin// de/ sa rgyal ma rgyas dgra sus myo med kyi / 
264a5(dkon brtsegs): pas tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa 'di dag thos nas cang me skye bar byur ho// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ kye mdzub 'di spobs pa thogs pa med pa zhen na/ ci bzod pa thob pa 'a mthob pa bdag zhes
264a6(dkon brtsegs): de lag par byang ma sonapa 'o// nam chem ldan pa shA'i thub dus byangan med byes byin pa la 'dren dasmram 'o// mi khyod 'an bram gyi theg pa la yang dag par zug sasas/ smras pa pa yin to// rang
264a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan /  mo//  zhe/ na ga nye ni/ sa she gags pa byed/  sa rnas pa/ na pa ma swA/ 5ga ga / 
264a8(dkon brtsegs): //  lce ga pa she// nga / badzin la med to/  ba sa rgyas so// san mam na
264b1(dkon brtsegs): ca nams gyi rdzogs la ga zugs na de tsun pa shA 'i dus chom gang man du byas pa com la can po shes bya ma sa rgyas shes pa bag/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang rgya
264b2(dkon brtsegs): gra na nyid me pa tshas mdon du gnyer ba tsanag yod/ shA'i dus snyan pa/ bu tshan med la na don du gnyer ba ces med // gnas parten shA de'i thus bu ma myong na med kyis byin pa la gzhan yang 'di
264b3(dkon brtsegs): smras s+ho// bu bo sangs rgyas kyi tshos rnams dang /  mo'i bo'i chos rnams la bye brag ni ni yod/ tha dad du dbye ba ni ci yong/ bum ma smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu stong pa nyid dang / 
264b4(dkon brtsegs): ni ci yod// tha da du dbye ba ni ni yod/ shA r-i'i nus smras pa/ bye brag med cing tha dad du dbye bci lang med de// bums smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu stong pa nyid dang / dben pa nyid la ji ltang bye brag mo
264b5(dkon brtsegs): bad du dbye ba ci yang med pa de bzhin du btsun pa shA de'i thusangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /  mcho rnams la yang bye brag med cing tha da du bya ba ci yang med do// btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dpe rnanams
264b6(dkon brtsegs): dang blag ba med pa la yang bye brag med cing tha dad du dbye ba ci yang med do// btsun pa shor bu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi tes rnams dang / so so'i skye ba'i chom rnams la yang bye brag med cing tha dad
264b7(dkon brtsegs): dbye ba che yang med do// gnas brtan shA ri'i bu cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa myo gal kyi bu chen pos bu mo mya ngan med kyis phyi
265a1(dkon brtsegs): pa la 'di ska ce bzlas so// bu mo tsi kyad de skad ces zer ba las na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni shin tu ches lhag pa zhig tu mthong la/ nyan thos kyi
265a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni shin tu dman par mthong ngam chen khyod nyan mo chen po rnams mthang na ldang bya yang m-i byed/ phyag kyang me tshal/ bsung yang me 'gro/ gtam yang mi zer/ stan dang bsod snyoms la yang na
265a3(dkon brtsegs): par ma byed da skad ces smras pa dang / bu ma mya med kyis byedan pas gnas brtan 'dagapa gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa yod gal gyi bu chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten kyi
265a4(dkon brtsegs): khams na ska ma'i gzugs su gtogs pa de snyed cig ya pa shes sa pa/ maudagal gyi bu chen pos sras ga/ bum snyoms pa zhugs nani/  dzam grab/ shes kyi snyoms pa ma zhugs dzin/ 
265a5(dkon brtsegs): bu mos smras pa/ 'dzin pa mdogs kyi bu chen po de bzhin gshegs pa pani lan cig mnyam par bzhag pa nyid kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi phyis med
265a6(dkon brtsegs): can 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / du lta byung ba thams cad kyi sems kyi byed pa yang rab du ste na/ stong gsapa da pa 'dag na gyi gtu gtogs pa'i sems can ni
265a7(dkon brtsegs): btsun mau dgal kyi bu chen po 'di ni dedaba'i na ga shegs pa dang / nyan thos rnams kyi khya pa yin te/ 'din bdang du dasde ba rkyen no// btsun pa ma dgal gyi ba rkyen po phrogs bcu 'jig rten nas man sa che
265a8(dkon brtsegs): rigs pa ni de pyid g.yod/ 'chags pani byed gi sad shes pa/ yod gapa kyi thab rna pa/ thu ci shes go//  la/ bdun pam-idags kyi rkyen
265b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das nang byed yod// mabyon pa ni byed cig yod/ dasnang bzhugs pa ni med cug yo shes pas/ bdag pa sa bu smras pa/ zlas dan mi shes so// mos snyam pa/ bdun pa dag na
265b2(dkon brtsegs): gas paspod zhing nyid kyi yo/  sa ma spyod pang cig tshig pa smod na nad kyi yo/ mnyam pa la yod ni na ci yod shes stsag/ maungag sa kyi thas rnas pa/ khyam pa mi shes
265b3(dkon brtsegs): pos smrab pa/ brjod pa maud gal kye bu chen po nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i sems can ni ji snyed cig bod dang sangs rgyas sde theg pa pa ning snyed cig 'od theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa ni ji snyed cig yod shes sam/ mod
265b4(dkon brtsegs): kye bus smras pa/ bla ma de ni mi shes so// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po nyan thos kyis 'dul ba'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod/ rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod/ sangs
265b5(dkon brtsegs): tas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod shes sam/ modagal gyi thus smras pa/ bu mau deni mi shes so// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa maud dgal kyi bu chen po yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i sems can ni rje
265b6(dkon brtsegs): log pa nyid du nges pa'i sems can ni ji skad cig yod/ ma nges pa'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod shes sa pa/ maud gal gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo na mi shes so// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa mdogal gyi na
265b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas ni de dag dang gzhan yang de'i gong du gang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin bdag kyang rab tu mkhyen na/ sems can gzhan dag gi lta ni smos te/ btsun pa yid gal gyi bu chen po 'di ni
265b8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i phra ba'i khyad par yin no// bdun pa yod gal gyi bu chen po gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas khyong rdzu 'phrul chen po rnapas kyi mchog tu bstan gyis/ btsun pa maud gal kyi bu chen po'ong kyi
266a1(dkon brtsegs): thos bya'od ces bya ba gang na de 'dzin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa gang dag par rdzogs pa sas rgyam thos rab babyed pa'i 'od zer zhes bya bar gang bzhugs te tsho zhing gzhes la 'phru
266a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing den shing sngon pa thams cad las can dan yul gyi snying po'i spos gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de khyab par 'gyur ba'i spos kyi dang ldang ba yod pa deng song shig/ gnas/ 
266a3(dkon brtsegs): brtan po dgas kyi bu chen pas smras pa/ bu mosangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i snying lang 'bos dag da tho na sangs rgyas la balnga ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir je ster 'gro bar bya// da nas bu mo bya na med kyis byin pas
266a4(dkon brtsegs): delas ma langs bzhin du tshig 'di skad ces smras te / bde pa dang / de ma'i tshigs shin bangan pa sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems bskyed ma thag tu nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil rjes gnonapa
266a5(dkon brtsegs): badren pa dang bden pa'i tshig des de bzhin gshegs pa spos rab tu bkyed pa'i 'od zer des bdag nyid dang / rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyan thos chen po 'di dag la ston par gyur cig/ tsan dan gyi dri de dag kya
266a6(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos chen po'idi dag gis tshor bar gyur cig ces byas so// de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
266a7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer gyis de nyid kyi tshe 'od gang gis nyan thos chen po de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos
266a8(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer de chos snyan cing bzhugs par mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'od sku las bkye'o// chos bstan pa de yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir thos so// 
266b1(dkon brtsegs): dan sbrul gyi snying po'i nings kyang 'jig rten gyi mas mi brjed 'dir ldang bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa smos rab tu gyed pa'i 'od par des kyang gsung gi yan lagadug bcu dang ldan pa'i tshig gas 'a
266b2(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal to// bu ma mya ngan med kyis byin pas ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed pa thag tu nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon to// 
266b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen po byams pa byind kyi phung po la gnas pas can dadayul gyi snying zon dro coM nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das can dan sprul gyi zhing po dri 'dag
266b4(dkon brtsegs): las byung lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'deskad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa bu mo myang na med kyis byin pa 'dis nyan pas chen po rnams kyi
266b5(dkon brtsegs): du seng ge'i sgra bsngags te// des nyan thos chen po de dag la bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od ces zla ba na de bzhin gshegs pa smos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer byang chub sems da
266b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa chen po rnams la chos ston cing bzhugs pa yang bstan/ 'jig rten gyi 'phyas spos kyi 'od de'i tsan dan stsal gyi snying po'i drangs kyang 'jig rten gyi 'ams 'di khyab par byas so// de nas bu mo rtsa
266b7(dkon brtsegs): rjes byin pas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po mkhas pa su zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gi cho 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa
266b8(dkon brtsegs): kyes sa khyab pa rmad du byung ba 'di lta la dag mthong ngam thosan nyan gyis dman pa/ zhan ga/ zhub pa/ nyi che ba'i shes pa dang ldan pa rnams la ldang ba'am/ bsung 'gro ba'am/ phyag 'tshal bar byed/ btsun pa
267a1(dkon brtsegs): 'chen po 'jig rten gyims ma kyi ma dri na mang zug ring ba shesas pa/ mdo gral gyi tham skas pa/ mamadun gsas// bams smras pa/ btsun pa ma dgas
267a2(dkon brtsegs): mams med par gang bar gyung napang dag thams cad kyis bskal par rjes kyang 'jig tan gyi khams spos kyi 'od ces bya ba de sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed cig 'das pa'i pha rol na 'dug pa bzang ba'i thabs kyi
267a3(dkon brtsegs): pa du so// dan po bcom ldan 'das dubazhin gshegs pa gros rab tu 'byeng du'i 'od zar kyis 'drid dag mi spang bar mdzad de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang me snang bar mdzad do// denas rkye ldan
267a4(dkon brtsegs): shen pas ma na med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// tham gyid kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 'angs rgyas shAn+ya thub pa de sngo ma po
267a5(dkon brtsegs): byams smral pa/ brdzun pa 'ad srung chen po de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar nus sam/ de bzhin gshegs pas/ gang dag la gzugs su mthong // gang dag pal sbyang shes pa// log pal spong bar thugs
267a6(dkon brtsegs): paste// skye bod de dag nga mi mdzang // sangs rgyas rnams ni chos nyid blta// 'dren pa rnams ni chos nyid sku// chos nyid shes par byamin pas// de ni rnam pa shes ma nus// zhes sa gsung bas ma/ btsun pa
267a7(dkon brtsegs): da srang chen po gzhan yang bu mo khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
267b1(dkon brtsegs): sngo bdag kris de bzhin gshegs pa mthang rang bya/ 'amig zhes ma ngas te gzugs sum yin no// ltu mig gis ma yin ra bar ma yin do// shes rab kyi mig gis ma len te bdu shes dus yin no// chos kyi
267b2(dkon brtsegs): kes ma len te 'du byed dam yin no// sangs rgyas kyi mig gis ma yin te/ ma byar shes par ma nano// btsun pa 'ad srung chen po gzhan yang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong me/ dper na gnas brtan gyi
267b3(dkon brtsegs): rig pa dang sred pa la srad pa mazang ba bzhin no// btsun pa 'od srung chen po gzhan yang bdag gis bzhin gshegs pa mthong ste/ dper na gnas brtan gyis nga 'dzin pa dang / nga ye 'dzin pa mthong ba bzhin
267b4(dkon brtsegs): ro// gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo 'di ltar ma rig pa dang / srid pa la sred pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / dming 'dzin pa'i chos 'di ga nyis ni med pa yin no// chos gang med pa de ni ngalta bar mi sa
267b5(dkon brtsegs): bu myang ngan med kyis byin pas smras pa/ bdun pa 'od sung chen po de de bzhin no// chos thams cad ni med pa yin te/ de dag ni blta bar mi nus so// 'od su chen pos smras pa/ bum ci sangs rgyas kyi chos
267b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams smras pa/ gnas brtan sangs sa kyi tshas sa ma'i skyem mtshos rnams kya ste/ chos dga' nig yongs sa grub par 'dod pa 'od sring chen po sags pa/ bumal pa/ 
267b7(dkon brtsegs): ban napa/ yon te med pa yin/ 'od bung chen pos smras pa/ bu med pa de dag ni med payinan// bum mo smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen padapa na chos mas cad na med pa nyid do// med pa 'a
268a1(dkon brtsegs): len pa da dag la ni lta ba rnam par spyad par bya ba med do// btsun pa 'od srung chen po rigs kyi bu'am dgas kyi du 'das rgyas la/ 'arnam par spyad par 'dod pasan bdag la blta ba rnam par yang
268a2(dkon brtsegs): pa bya'o// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo bdagal lta ba ji ltar rnam par dag par 'gyug/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po gang gi tshe bdag pa bzhin med pa'i phyir tshor khams cad dang pa
268a3(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid du pos nad ces kyi sa na bdag la balnga ba rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bum bdag gi rang bzhin ci len/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po bdag gi rang shin na
268a4(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid do// bdag gi rang bzhin med pa'i phyir bdag dben pa yang yin no// rang bzhin med pa des bdag draben no// rang bzhin med pa des chos thams cad dben no// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ 
268a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis su mtshar thos na 'di ltar khyod kyi yang dag pa'i lta ba skyes par gyur/ bu mo yang dag pa'i lwa ba skye ba la ni rgyu gnyis dang rkyen gnyis yod de/ gzhan gyi sgra dang bdag nyid kyi tshul banin yid la byed pa la
268a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang gis de sa gsungs so// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od su chen po gang dag lazhan gyi phre yi 'jog pa'i shes rab can de dag ni gzhan gyi ste dang / bdag nyid kyirgyal bzhin du mo song rtog pa las sna
268a7(dkon brtsegs): rje par dag par 'gyur ro// btsun pa 'od srung chen po gang dag gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i shes rab can dag ni gzhan gyi sna ma tshal lo// btsun pa 'od srung chen po ji ltung na dge slong tshul bzhin du 'ug
268a8(dkon brtsegs): / 'di su na pa smras pa/  mag sa na slo na dkyim na sa rtsod napa nye gyin ci byung pa lce dge slong tshul bzhin du thugs pa na//  su chen pos sus
268b1(dkon brtsegs): mo dza ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du zhugs pa len/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun
268b2(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa 'od srung chen po zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad ni sngon gyi mtha' de bzhin nyid dang ldan no// chos thams cad nibye 'i
268b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan no// chos thams cad ni da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan ni zhes btsun pa 'od srung chen po byang chub sems dpa' slong ba de lta bus sbyor bar mi byed na de tsam gyis na byangan pa
268b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin no// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu ma tshes de dag la ji ltar sbyar bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po ji ltar de bzhin nyid la sbyor ba yang med/ mi sbyar ba
268b5(dkon brtsegs): med par mthong ba de bzhin du rgas thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo ji ltar mthong na chos thams cad mthong ba yid/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po chos thams cad la gnyis sa
268b6(dkon brtsegs): med par mthong la mi byed cing 'jig par yang mi byed na de ltar na chos thams cad mthong ba yin no// btsun pa 'od srung chen po thong shes bya ba deni mthong ba ming pa'i tshig bla dgas so// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ 
268b7(dkon brtsegs): 'aso bdag de ltar khar bya/ bumos smras pa/ btsun pa 'di skad chen pos ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du blta bar bya'o// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ na pa zas ni bdag dang bdag gis mod // bcos
268b8(dkon brtsegs): klas pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen pos ji ltar bdag med cing bdag gi med bde bzhin du chos thams cad blta bar bya'o// gta ma do skad brjod pa'i skabs su gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis bu gro ngan med kyis byin pa la
269a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces smras so// ba mo khyod kyis spobs pa 'di 'dra ba rnyed pa ni khyod kyir rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// bum kya ngan med kyis byin pas smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor rnyed pa las na
269a2(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur gyi yang gis ci lang ma da pa de spobs pa dang ldan ning gang gis nang dam phyi ro ba ci yang mi dmigs pa de stobs pa dang ldan pa ldan do// rab 'byor gyis stsa sum gang marnyed na srabs pa dang
269a3(dkon brtsegs): / bu mos smras pa/ gang gis bdag ma rnyed cing gzhan ma yin/ dge ba ma yin/ ming ge ba ma yin/ khan ba thob dang bcas pa ma yin/ kha na ma rdzo ba med pa ma yin/ zag pa dang bcas pa ma yin/ 
269a4(dkon brtsegs): med pa ma yin/ 'dus byas su yin/ 'dus ma byas ma yin/ 'jig rten pam ldan/ bdag tan las 'das pa ma yim/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par khyab mayin te/ 'khor ba dang bya
269a5(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa ma rnyed las soci sde po'i chos mi dmigs shing 'phags pa'i chas kyang mi dmigs te sangs rdzas kyi chos mi dmigs na/ btsun pa rab 'bor de ltar na gang gis ci sangs rnyed pa spobs po dang
269a6(dkon brtsegs): yin// rab byung gyis smras pa/ bca pa 'gyur/ rnams nas pa/ sa ba kyang gyis ma das da bde ba nangs pa / sa da
269a7(dkon brtsegs): sa gnas brtan nyon mongs pa med pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa'i chos kyi de bzhin nyid ci brjod cing kar rung ngam/ na mongs pa med pa ded chos kya bezhan nyid la ma thabs pa ci yang yod ngam/ 
269a8(dkon brtsegs): sa gas pa/ nyan 'angs pa med pa dang / dpa'an nyid ni bstan pa'am ba da pa num sa// thams sbas pa/ btsun parab 'byor chom thams cad ni brjod du med pa lanen khyod kyis bu mo myod sros pa 'di
269b1(dkon brtsegs): bang ldan kyang ches dang legs par da 'ang de lnga bu len/ rabang byung kyis smras pa/  byed ni ngag/ me ba grongs pa don to// 'tshogags pa/ gnas gnangs 'tho rdzas thams
269b2(dkon brtsegs): lta bud mes sam/ rab 'byang kyis smras pa/ bu lams so// bu mas smras pa/ gnas brtan rab 'gyur ci brag chal skabs pa ce yang yod dam/ rab 'byor tes smras pa/ bu mngon med de/ bu mo
269b3(dkon brtsegs): gas pa las sgra 'byung bar zad do// bu mos sbas pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor brten nas sku 'byung ba gang yin pa de la ni rang bzhin gyis grub pa tsa yang med de/ dpa' phyir le na/ 'di ltar gang brten nas 'byung ba de pa ni
269b4(dkon brtsegs): bsi lang med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis smras pa bu mo chos thams cad ni brtan nas 'byeng ba'o// bu mos sbas pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de bas na chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'o// rab 'byor
269b5(dkon brtsegs): klas pa/ bu mo gal te chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis bskyes pa yin na bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gang glang klung gi byed ma sbed ni 'das te gshegs so// de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klang
269b6(dkon brtsegs): be sa snyed na ma 'ongs pa na 'byung bar 'brang ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA 'i klung gi bye ma snyed nad ltar bzhugs sa shes ci'i phyir bstan/ tha mos sbas pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor ma skya ba ni sba bar mi gyu / 
269b7(dkon brtsegs): phyer zhe na/ btsun pa rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings la ni skyab 'ab nub par 'gyur ba'i 'dod pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bra ma myon na 'di ltar skye ba med pa de nadam pa tshig rten to// bu mos smras pa// 
269b8(dkon brtsegs): par 'byung brtan pa thams cad ni bstan du med pa'o// ci'i phyir bstan pa thams cad bstan du med cen/ don bstan pang da / ma bstan kyang ru dnges pa ma yin te/ dngom po yod pa dang brjod de med pa'i ma
270a1(dkon brtsegs): bsems dpa' ma che po na ma pal/ ga nga ka/ sa pa'i
270a2(dkon brtsegs): 'ar ngo // btsun par ba rjo byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa khrod kyis shes sas/ dab 'bor gyis smras pa/ bum khyod kyis shed cig pa'i gros mnyan to// bu mos smras pa/ 'dun par
270a3(dkon brtsegs): ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa chos brgya dang ldan na khyis pa'am ba tu byung bzhes mi bya ste/ spyod lam gang dang gang gis gnas lnga pa 'a namathong med par 'gyur ro// brgyad shi zhen/ 'di lta ste/ btsun par
270a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dil byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin te/ ldag pa'i bsapa pa de gAng blan med pang du dag par rdzogs pa'i bya chub kyasems rnan
270a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mi gtong bar gnas pa'i phyir byams pa la gnas pa lang yid do// 'jig rten pa'i dga' ba dang srid pa dang bral ba'i phyer snying rdzir po la gnas pa lang me na// rgyam sog 'al
270a6(dkon brtsegs): yos la gnas pa yang yin no// yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa shin tu rdzogs pa'i phyir thabs la mkhas pa yang yin no// lta ba thams cad dang bral ba'i phying shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin lalas nges pa
270a7(dkon brtsegs): do// dga'a' rtse 'tshal ba la brjon pas tshag mi shes pa'i phyir btsun 'grus brtsabs pa lang yin no// bzod pa shin du thob pa'i bying sa bstan par shes pa pang yi te/ bdun par 'byor
270b1(dkon brtsegs): bya du namam brgyad bdadag dang lda na kyis pa tsu ba byung zhe bya ste/ stod pa lags/ gags sa ca thams dngu ma da pa //  da ldan bsgrag
270b2(dkon brtsegs): mo myangan myed kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo kyod mal khri gsed kyi nang po can la 'dug cing da shing tum thob la 'dug das nyan thos chen po dag da
270b3(dkon brtsegs): du min par snyan mthon po la 'dug pa la stan dma' bal 'dug pas chos bshad par mi bya ni bya kyi mdzems pa/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshu mya ngan med kyis byin pas tshe dang ldan pa sngags
270b4(dkon brtsegs): na pa 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa sgra gcan zin 'dzag rten na gang dag ni rung ba yin/ 'jig rten dgang dag ni rung ba ma yin pa khyod kyis shes sam/ sgra ga ca chen gyis smras pa/ bu mo kho bos shes/ 
270b5(dkon brtsegs): dag de ltar bcas pa'i bslab pa la sgrub cing bslab pa de las 'gal bar mi byed pa de dag ni rung ba zhes byar// gang dag bslab pa de las 'gal bar byed pa de dag ni rung ba sa yin pa zhes bya'o// 'acom ngan med kyis
270b6(dkon brtsegs): pas smras pa/ btsun pa skragacan zin pong de skad pa rje cig/ btsun pa sgragacan chen gang dag ji ltar bcas pa'i bslab pa la slob pa de dag ni rtsub du len pa'o// de ci'i phyir she na/ 'di ltar de dag rlo
270b7(dkon brtsegs): phyir //  wAg nag ga pa rtog can ga bde du shes bya'o// dzin bkrug ba zhes bya 'di na slong dgra pa ma pacwag pa pa mas cig / 
270b8(dkon brtsegs): yihe/ de dag ni bslas pa'i sa 'gal ba 'i byed// da kyi shes/  ldan das bzhin to nas ni badrab pa las yang dgapang da kyi byi te/ de dad da kyi bang 'aslab pa 'dod pa ma yin pa
271a1(dkon brtsegs): da nga bzhin no// de dag me mas ga byed 'ong ba stes/ de dag ni 'aslab las yang dag pa bya das pa med te/  skrong shes tu'o// du sngun dudag gi bsgrun pan
271a2(dkon brtsegs): 'bas gsum pa bdags pa med shes so// de kyi de dgan dung bzhes bya'o// sgrag can zin kyisu smras pa/ du ma ba dang / rlung ba ma grin pa lam du kyi ci zhig song/ rnams smras pa/ 
271a3(dkon brtsegs): bag sa skye ste sa sa rgyan tha du kyi da //  sa / 
271a4(dkon brtsegs): gcan pa ni de bzhin du rung ba dang / rung ba ma yin pa la yang yi ge'i tha snyad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir tha dad du dbye ba ni yang med do// de ci'i phye zhen/ chos thams cad ni ci dang yang bral ba'i phyir te/ rang ba ni
271a5(dkon brtsegs): kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin no// btsun pa sgrag can zin yang 'di skad du stan shin tu mtho ba la 'dug ste chos nyan tam shes zer ba la byang chub sems dpa' ni rtsa bting ba la 'dug kyang shin tu mtho ba la/ 
271a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dug pa yin no// zla gan pas smras pa/ rnam grangs gang gis byed dgrang sa/ mas smras pa/ btsun pa sgra gcan pan 'dangs ma du sas/ byang chub sems dpas gang yang dugaste bya
271a7(dkon brtsegs): thob par gyur/ sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa/ rtswa bting ba la bzhugs nas byang chub thob bo// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sgrag can zin ci byang chub sems dpal rtsa bting ba la 'dug pa la stong gsum
271a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi stong chen pa'i 'jig rten gyig 'ams natshangs pa'am/ brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ngam/ de las gzhan pa 'og min man chad kyi lha gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyis lus btud de bam mo sbyang nas

271b2(dkon brtsegs): bya chub ses dang 'a sems dpa' chen brje bting ba la 'dug kyang ltad shin tumatha' la 'dug pa yin ci/ nyan thas tshangs pa'i 'dag rten na 'dug pa ni de snya ma yin par rig par bya'o// da nas rnal pom skye
271b3(dkon brtsegs): dgral bu mo myang med kyis byin pa la 'did ces smras so// 'am btsun pa sgrag can chen ni bcom ldan 'das shAs thub pa de nyid kyi sras can te/ bslab pa 'dod pa rnams ci chog ldan gyi
271b4(dkon brtsegs): ngan med kyis byin pas smras pa/ ya yong shig song sheg/ ded kyang rdzun pasdug can pan 'acom ldan 'das shAmya thub par byigs ma rigasas gsung shig/ dgas kyi rgyal thos dge sa pa na
271b5(dkon brtsegs): na btags pa lta du sbed pa byu ma yang gsan tag/ gzigs pab/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bum de ni ma yin no/ sa smrab pa/ zab de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa se ge cal b+hams
271b6(dkon brtsegs): shegs pa dab pa mochos kyi 'khor los nyung ba'i zhabs 'bri bani nan thos mdzes pam lags so// la ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras gang yin zhes yang dag pa'i skabs grang sun byang chub sems dpa
271b7(dkon brtsegs): nyid yin nogs de dag yang dag pa'i ska bas smra'o// ma bde lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su khas len par 'tshal pas blan med pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa bci'o// 
271b8(dkon brtsegs): tam 'di brjod pa'i skabs su cung pas su ladab btsun pa'i ba yonapa sun pon bu lu da pa dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// snyi'i bub kyi tham pas kyang bu moda'i seng ge'i sgra 'dibos nas na/

272a3(dkon brtsegs): nas byam bya ba med kyis byin pa khrigaser kyi nang carnams pa pa ca can po de dag gi rkang pa sa mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / bldag pa dang / bzhib pa dang / myang bar bya
272a4(dkon brtsegs): bsod pa mang po dag gis bkur ste byas te/ dad pa dang gus pas rang gi lag nas nyan thos chen po de dag tshim par byas nas 'di skad du btsun pa dag rang dgar slad du bcom ldan 'das la chos nyan du bzud

272a6(dkon brtsegs): ga la ba dang meng po khye sa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'a'ad do// rgyal po btsun po'i 'khor dang bcas pas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs lam
272a7(dkon brtsegs): bas phrag 'tshal nas gnang ste phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// nyan thos chen po de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dang sgra bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu lan

272b1(dkon brtsegs): salag ma 'das na cag ma nyed du byang chu badron druganyid 'das sa rgya nga zag theg phrag dbu bcud gnyis la dge ba rtse ba dag bskyed do// shAny+dza'i lus gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'dasasa'i phreng du
272b2(dkon brtsegs): da bud med kyi las pa bskur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sam pa/ shA dI'i du 'di snyam du sems/ ngu mo ma na med kyis byin pa ga brud med do snyam du sems de ltar pe bsdu'o// byang chub sems dpa'
272b3(dkon brtsegs): dag ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam gyis bdag nyid bud med kyi gzugs su ston to// de nas de'i tshe ba mo mya ngan med sdes byin pas bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs byas te/ bdun pa'i byin gyi 'drab
272b4(dkon brtsegs): nga gis chos thams cad skyes pa yang ma yin/ bud med kyang ma yin pa ldan bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des bdag skyes pa'i lus su gar cig/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dis kyang mthong bar ga cig
272b5(dkon brtsegs): ga grad ces sras ma thig tu 'a med mtshan pa mi sbeng 'gyu te/ skyes paphye tshar byung ba byud nas sbyang gi bar snang la tal bdun ma ma du 'phags// dpas kyis tshe dang du
272b6(dkon brtsegs): bA 'i du la bka bral ba/ shA sa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang na med kyis byin pasteng gi bar snang ba 'phags pa kyad kyang mthong ngam/ shAr 'brus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma
272b7(dkon brtsegs): lagras sa// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bubyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po kyang nga'i then pa 'dren bsgral bgrangs med pa'i dun gyis 'ang rten me mas drim med pa'i

273a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'anang ngo ro// de'i dge 'dun ni byang chub sems dpa'a'aba' zhig tu 'gyur te/ phyir ma ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bya ba phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis yod do// 'dri
273a2(dkon brtsegs): na gyi khams de lang ba rnyargyalas grub pa den pa che sna bdun gyis bkra bar byas shis me pang sa ris su bris la rin pa cu'i bdas khengs pa dang / ngan sang thams cad ma par spangs pa par gyur ro//

273a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' mya ngan med kyis byin pe'i ma rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i btsun mongam pa/ zla bcan zhes bya ba des thal mo skur ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsor to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis skyes

273a7(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu btsun mo zla ba can 'di khyod kyis mthong ngam/ shA 'bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu Nal
273a8(dkon brtsegs): cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur zhing lha'i bu rin chen mchog ces bya bar 'gyur te/ gang gi tshe byang chub semadapa'
273b1(dkon brtsegs): 'akyang chu ba thob par shar pa de'i tshurgyal po drang nas bya ba de'i durgyal po gzhod na mthong na dga' ba zhes bya ba gu sa de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa sa mchod pa byas te rab tu 'byung bar 'gyu'o// das /

273b3(dkon brtsegs): cung mchod par 'gyung ngo ro// de mthar gyis de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pas byang chub thob pa na la khor los sbyar ba'i rgyal po bu khyud 'dzin ces bya bar 'gyur te/ des de bzhin gshegs pa de la mcho

273b5(dkon brtsegs): de nas rgyal po'i btsun mo zla ba can gyis bdag nyid lung bstan pa thos nas tshim zhing mgu ste ri rangs nas bcom ldan 'das la mu tig gi do shar brgya stong ri ba phul te tshangs par spyod par rgyal pos gas

273b7(dkon brtsegs): denas par snang lus babs te phyog sa gcig tu bdug nas tshig 'di skad du bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis bdag gi byang chub thob pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen pa de dag
273b8(dkon brtsegs): dal kyi ni chos gos dung sreg rtson payin po che'i thadag pa byis mo lung la ba te skye babar byar bstan/ bden pade de ma gdepa de dge slong bzhed pa rdzogs

274b3(dkon brtsegs): 'i rilas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyed chen por dong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shis/ tshangs sheg/

275a7(dkon brtsegs): ba byas pa// phur bor pa/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol pa/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i
275b1(dkon brtsegs): bsgrags/ gang zag gcan sa rdzogs pas deg ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dgu' pa'o// byang chubamams dpa nga phrag pacwa pal chang thams cad kyang kyi grog pa/ skye ba gcagags
275b2(dkon brtsegs): bak+tags pa skyes/ byang chub sems dpa' den chen 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsags dang / kyang rab sams dpa' dpal me nang po dang / byang chub se byas dbab grags ba
275b3(dkon brtsegs): gros dang / spobs pa brtsegs dang / spyan ras gzegs dbang phrag dang / mthu chen thob dang / byams pa dang / rkye na med kyil byin dang / 'jam dar la gzhon nar byung ba dang / gom pa 'dong ba don yod nga
275b4(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba don yod dang / ngan sang srong dang / mya ngan kye mun pa thams cad 'joms pa dang / yon tan na po che'i me tog gis rtag tu brgyan dang / gser kye phreng ba'i 'od kyi dpal can dang / sgrib pa thams cad
275b5(dkon brtsegs): bar spel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems thegs pa med pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' khri dang yang thabs gcig go// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo
275b6(dkon brtsegs): dgal kyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams pa'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa nam gru dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang /

276b2(dkon brtsegs): dang thob par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la lnga ba sgoms par zhugs te grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa nam gus smras pa/ gang gis grang khyer da skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyis ting

277a1(dkon brtsegs): myong bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa khabs bsam par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba don yod kyis smras pa/ ci nas kyang grong khye na sa pa ngan gang dag
