281a7(dkon brtsegs): shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa la gas na/ ci shes rab de 'dus byas legs sam/ 'on te 'dus ma byas lags/ de gal te 'dus byas lags ra de bzhin gshegasa'adus byas
281a8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni brdzun pa sdu ba'i chos can yin ni zhes bka' stsal to// ci ste 'dus ma byas lags na/ dus sa kyil lon skye bas mchis so// gang sa skye bam mchos pa de la ni prad las mchis na sma
281b1(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa'i shes rab kyis ji ltar btsun pa shA 'i mashes na po rnam bkye// denas mdang ldan pa shA // de da ldan pa shA bral 'dan
281b2(dkon brtsegs): sasmrab so// ga tha bas madris pa'i che thob me// shA dus smras pa/  na 'dus byas 'dral 'kho 'i med med pa dras te/ de ni med gdab mi nusas// ded bu ma drim med kyis byin
281b3(dkon brtsegs): / dang ldan pa mau dgas kyi bu chen po la 'dis dacel smras so// 'di ltar btsun pa mau gal gyi bu chen po khyod na bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'dul dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lagasan/ tsaM tshe dang ldan pa
281b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can du 'du shes pa la gnas te rdzu 'phrul ston tam/ 'on te chos su 'du shes pa gnas te rdzu 'phrul ston/ gal te sems can du 'du shes pa la gnas te ston na sems can ni ma mchis pa ste/ de lta bas na
281b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul de yang sa mchis par 'gyur ngo ro// ci ste ches su 'du shes pa la gnas te ston nams nyid ni 'gyur ba ma mchis pa'o// 'gyur ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de la ni rnam par rtog pa ma mchis darnam par
281b6(dkon brtsegs): de/  rgyu nga bya d+d+ha ts+tshe pa ga na pal pa mi m+b+ha /  rgyams pa'i byu ldan po
281b7(dkon brtsegs): bo gal gyi bu chen po bu pos dris pa'i lan thob cig/ mi dag la mi bus smras pa/ bla mo ni 'byung ba mi 'dri'i/ bulas ni 'thur ba med pa dris te/ bgyung ba med pad rnam pa yi ga ni zhin na
281b8(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi byang chub len pas de ni la na gdab par mi rus po// de nas bum drim med kyim byin pa la byam sa 'i'i sa ga pa pa 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa ga man bcom ldan ma
282a1(dkon brtsegs): chom smra pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/  tshe dang ldan pa dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i chos son tam/ 'on ted dmigs pa ma mchis pa'i chos ston// gal te dmigs pa dang bcas pas/ 
282a2(dkon brtsegs): chos snod nas khyod byis pa sam sa skye bo rnams dang mtshungs so// daci'i slad du na na/ byis pa som su po sems cad ni dmigs pa dang cas yi duste/ de lta bas na btsun pa yang byis pa sos 'asdu bam
282a3(dkon brtsegs): da kyi chos rnams dang ma bral ba lags so// ci ste dmigs pa ma mchis pa'i chos stonan ni chos spro ba nyid dngos po ma mchis par 'gyur te mi
282a4(dkon brtsegs): denas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos gang pol 'di skad ces smras so// gang po bumo sa dris pa'i lan rdzob cig/ tshe dang ldan pa gang pas smrab pa/ 'gro ni kun rdzob mi 'dri'i/ bu mon don dam pa dris te/ den
282a5(dkon brtsegs): lan gdang pa'i mi nus so// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ltar btsun pa 'od srung chen po ni rnam par thar pa brgyad la skams pa
282a6(dkon brtsegs): nas kyapa te gzhan dag la chos ston cing gang dag las zan gzung ju ga nam gyi bsod snyoms yongs su blangs pa de dag thams cad mthongs su 'gro bar 'aldir drozhen// de ci btsun pas ma
282a7(dkon brtsegs): paspyod dang/ na ta sems kyis sbyin pa spyod/ gal te lus kyis spyod na lus ni bams po g.yo bam mchis pa byed pas mchis pa ste/ rtswa dang / shing dang / rtsig pa'i chos ste bu mi ga yang dang mtshungs pas sa/ 
282a8(dkon brtsegs): gang spyod par mi nus so// ci ste sems kyis spyod na sems ni spru ma lci bu gnas pa ma mchis pa ste/ des kyang spyod par mi nus so// Ni ste lus dang sems kyi phyoros kyi mi byed na rnam mchis pa
282b1(dkon brtsegs): bus nga ltar spyad par babyed/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po yang cang mi smra par sbya // rab babyung gyis smras pa/ tsha dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po zhums dris pa'i lan thob shig/ 'od srung chen pos smram pa/ 
282b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dra 'i bu mos ni len pa med pa dris shing yang dag pa'i mtha' 'de bas de na lan gdab par mnus so// de nas bu ma dri ma med kyis byin pa la gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces rnams// 'di ltar
282b3(dkon brtsegs): rab na bcom ldan 'das kyis nyon mongs pa med pa gnas pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags ni/  nyin mongs pa med pa de dngos po la rab tu stsal lagams pa/ 'on nyi sa nyid kyis ral/ bye ba lag
282b4(dkon brtsegs): zhal te dngos pas rab rje phye ba lags na ni 'dus byas su 'gyur ro// ci ste mas nyid kyis rab tu phye ba lags nan chos nyid ni skye ba mamachis pa'i mtshan nyid dang / 'gag pa mamachis pa'i mtshan nyid de/ skye ba ma mchim/ 
282b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gag nga la mches pa'i mtsha zhi gang bshes bdon mnam panyid do// mnyam pa nyid 'ang lags pa de de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin ni dag mags pa de ni 'byung ba byamachis pa'o// 'byung sa
282b6(dkon brtsegs): pa gang lags pa de ni tha snyad ma mchis pa'o// tha snyad ma mchis pa gang lags pa don bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang lags pa de ni bstan du ma mchis pa'o// bstan du ma mchis pag
282b7(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// dngos po ma mchis pa gang lags pa de nim byung ba'o// mabyung ba gang lags pa de ni 'phags pa rnams mi ston to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byod kyang rtsa ba'i sla bar gyur to/ 
282b8(dkon brtsegs): dan pa dang ldan pa gru na pas tshungs ldas // na ldan par byo sa ma dres pa'i man sheg/ sa kyi gyi rnam pa/ 'dis mdud ce ya da
283a1(dkon brtsegs): byeng / smras pa med ma pachom 'di dag/ bu mo yongs su 'dri bar byed// nga srid dngos pad+ma yod pa/ de srid spyad kyis gos par 'gyur// rnam cad kyis ni than dadang // 'din nyi pa sa rang
283a2(dkon brtsegs): de nas tha me drim med kyis byin pas tshe dang ldan pa nas supa 'dind ces smras sa// tshedang ldan pa nam gru ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bamam gtan pa rnams kyi'i chog tu bstan pa lags na/ phyimams laganas te
283a3(dkon brtsegs): tan mdzad dam/ bon te lebs ma mchis pa la gnas te bsam gtan badzad/ gal te sems la gnas te bsam gtan mdzad na sems ni brjod du ma mchis shing snyam lta bu ste/ yang dag pa ma yin pa ku
283a4(dkon brtsegs): pa ga'an/  yang dag pa bayin pa kun brtagasapa ma mchis pa la gnas te bsam gtan mang da/ ci ste sa rnams mchis pa sa gnas te thamam gtan mdzadan na rjed de/ shing dang / cig pa dang / de
283a5(dkon brtsegs): pa byung ba dang zhig pa de dag thams cad kyang ting nge 'angan tu 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag ni sems ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// tshe dang ldan pa nam gu yang cang mi smra bar gyur te// de nas tshe dang lnga
283a6(dkon brtsegs): pa 'gags pas tshe dang ldan pa rnam grul 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa ni/ glabu mos dris pa'i lan thob shig/ nam rdzus smras pa/ bu na de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul yongs su 'dra ste/ doni
283a7(dkon brtsegs): dpas kyis bstan par ma nu po// khrims skyes pa/ nga ldan pa na ma rgya chos khyod dbye sa de bzhi gshegs pa rnams kyi yang gzhanapa/ nyan thos rnams kyi yang gzhan lagasas pa/ 
283a8(dkon brtsegs): gag di su lung gad de/  mas da yi ga tan gas na lda can su da mas su pa pa ma hanan ma ma
283b1(dkon brtsegs): ma 'gags pa la 'din de ces smras so// 'di ltar cha dang ldan pam 'gags pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis sgra'i mig ca rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na lha'i mig gis dngos po gzigasas pa/ 'on tu dngos po
283b2(dkon brtsegs): pag shegs/ gal te dngos po gzigs nan rtog par lta bar gyur ro// ci ste dngos po'i mchis pa gzigs ni rnyed par lta bar 'gyur ti yang mi rigs so// ma 'gags pa yang cang mis
283b3(dkon brtsegs): pa kun dga' bos tshe dang ldan pam 'gags pa la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa bu mos dris pa'i lan thob shig/ tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas smras pa/ bu mos na shes rab kun tu 'dzu
283b4(dkon brtsegs): pas na lan gdab par minas so// de nas bu mo drim med kyis byin pas tsho dang ldan pa gud dga' bo 'di nad ces smras so/ 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa gan dpar gro khyod ni bcom ldan 'das kyis mang du thos pa rnam
283b5(dkon brtsegs): chog tu bsten pa lags ni/ tswi mang du thos pa nyid de don du blta sa/ 'od tshig 'byung ba ste/ gal te don du bstan don na brjod du ma mchis shing bsnyed du ma mchis paste/ de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pas shasa?
283b6(dkon brtsegs): bgyi bam lags panapa yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'ad kyis shes par bgyi 'am la zhes pa ste/ rnam pa de ThA bruM gang lags pa deni bstan du ma mchis pa'o// ci ste tshig 'brung bstan ni bcom ldan 'das
283b7(dkon brtsegs): bton pa yin gyi tshig 'brur rten pa ma yin no zhes gsungs pas de bas na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i bang du thos pa nyid ni rton pa ma lags so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yang cang mi lta par gyur to// 
283b8(dkon brtsegs): ngam dpal gzhon du byed pa sa tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di nad ce smras so// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bums dris pa'i lan thob shig/ bran dga' thas smras pa/ bu ngan leg dang thal
284a1(dkon brtsegs): da ni sgramachim par byed par minus so// bum rnamams dang bral ba'i mnyam pa nyid 'driste/ slob pa rnams kyi la me na de ji ltang bstan par bya ste/ chos kyi mnga' bdag de 'di dag
284a2(dkon brtsegs): ma Tu dgos pa'o// de nas pam rlom med ces byin papa lang sa la gzhon du byung bas 'dad sa smras so// 'ang sa dpal spyod de bzhin gshegs pas pa'am la mas pa'i byang chub mas
284a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshig tu bstad pa lags na/ ci rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab pas khyod zab pam/ 'on tong bo nyid zab pas zab/ gal te rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab pas spyod pa par ni rten cing 'brel par 'gyu
284a4(dkon brtsegs): da ldan pa'i chos gang ya sa so// deci'i slad du can/ 'di ltar rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni song bam lags/ 'ong bal lags te/ rten ci 'khris byar byung bani mig gi rnam par shes pas sa
284a5(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba ma lags pa nas pad mi rnam par shes pa mi gyis shes par bgyi ba ga lags shing gnyis sum ma chis sa kun 'byung bas bcos pa'i slad du'o// ci stong pa nyid pabapas paban ni ngo ba nyid sa
284a6(dkon brtsegs): pang sus kyang brtag par minus so// 'angam dpal mi smras pa/ bu mo yang dan pa'i mtha'athab pas kho'i zab po// dus dris med kyis byin pas smras pa/ 'jam dpal yang dag ci dis sa dang
284a7(dkon brtsegs): smra pa shes papa phel bam lags so//  sa kyis smras pa/ 'apo dag pa'i zhes bya ba zhes su med pa'i tshigs thadags so//  mo drim med kyis byin pa
284a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dis dpa la dmigs sum mchis pa ni gang gcig bre dgas kyang milags te/ dmigs su ma mchis pa ni cig pu dgas las yang dag par 'das pa lags so// 'das dpal gyis spas pa
284b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di di ltar gzhan dag la bstan bar bya/ bums snyam pa/ 'das dpal de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang rgya ni bstan pa las par dag par 'das pa lags te/ de ni brjod pas bstan par minasa'o// ma
284b2(dkon brtsegs): lang ma mi bar byur to// dran la yul dum med kyis byin pas byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba don yod ma 'di skad ces smras so// legs kyi ba khyod 'di skad rkyenas kyang srid kyir na skyes pa 'am/ bud med dag
284b3(dkon brtsegs): 2/ bu gang dag la ba'i migs ma na snyed par 'gyur ba dag thams cad kyi sade bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs ma ma bar 'ashang ba rnam pa lta bu'i bas m-i gzo bos bsam par bya'o// nas gsungs pa
284b4(dkon brtsegs): sa kyi ska mthong ba mdzad dag/ sa kyi myong ba pa ma/ sa te gzugs ba bang dun dun sa sunas sde ga'as lags te/ ma ldanas kyis ni
284b5(dkon brtsegs): gang dgang sna gzugs su mthong // gang dag la sgrar shes pa// 'dun pa 'dod chags ldan pa ste// skye bo de dag mi mthong nas gsungs so// ci ste de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sngar mthong bar mdzad na
284b6(dkon brtsegs): deb sdud tu ba dres pa'o// detso slad du nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi sbyi ni mig garnas par shes pa las yang dag par 'das pa ste ba pa nanus pa'i slad du'o// mthong ba don yod kyang ca ma lda
284b7(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' rin po che tog gis smras pa/ mthong ba don yod bu mis dris pa'i lan thob shig/ mthong ba don yod kyis smras pa/ bu mo ni dngos po med pa 'dri ste de ni bstan par mi nus / 
284b8(dkon brtsegs): bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/ bdag ni dngos po'im dngos po ma mchis pa mi 'dri'o// bstan pa slobs la de nas ston cig/ mthong ba den yid kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bu mo dram med kyi
285a1(dkon brtsegs): pas byang chub sems dang 'dzin po tog la 'di skad ces byasaso// shes kyi bu 'od kyis 'di nad du gang gis grong byed na khyim thams cad du ridapo ches gang ba'i gter rnams kyang bar gyur
285a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa de lta bu 'i bsam pa kha bos bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs pa de ci zerang zing dang bcas pa'i sa 'dogs par yang dad ma/ 'on te zang phreng ma mchis pas phan 'dogs par mdzad/ gal te nga zing dang @
285a3(dkon brtsegs): pas pan 'bron sa na ni byis pa so so'i skye bo'i phan 'dogs pa dang bye brag ma mchis par 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi dga' ba ni zung bing dang bcas pa'i slad du'o// 
285a4(dkon brtsegs): zang pa ma mchis pas phan 'dogs par mdzad da rang zing ma mchis pa ni bsgrub tu chis pa lags so// rin pa cha tog snang cang mi smra par gyur to// de nas bu mo drim med kyis byin pas kyi shub
285a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ngan song spong ba 'din de ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di skad dru gang gis grod khyer 'di na sems can rnams kyi las ngan mor myong bar 'gyung ba gang yod par tshe 'di nyid la ya na cur
285a6(dkon brtsegs): song bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pas las ni bsam gyis mi grub pa nyid du bstan pa de ni khyod kyis bas ma par mi spyad do// 
285a7(dkon brtsegs): la te spyod na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro// ci ste bsam par mi spyod na mi mkhyen bzhin du mang po myong bar 'gyur ba'i las tshe 'di nyid g.yang zheng chung ngu myong bar ji ltar mdzad de// 
285a8(dkon brtsegs): dag mamachis pa'i chos rnams la bdag po rnyed par 'gyur ro// gang nyen kyi mdun de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang lags par kru so// dan pang srong gis smras pa/ ma tha ni sngon ma
285b1(dkon brtsegs): dbang gis sang du pyong bar 'byung ba'i las nyung du myong bar 'byung bar byed do// bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi 'chos rnam pa 'i chos nyid ni smon lam gyi dbang gis bsgyur du mi nas lags so// gal na nus par
285b2(dkon brtsegs): semam na thams cad yongasas kya ngan las bzla 'o nas zhin gshegs pa de'i dgongs pa de sngon lam gyi dbang gis de lta ma 'grub ste/ rnam grang sa 'di san srin mim ze dbang gis bsgyur bami nus pa ma
285b3(dkon brtsegs): par bgyi'o// ngan song spong yang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod 'di skad du gas
285b4(dkon brtsegs): gis mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por skye ba'i tshogs thams cad kyi sgrib pa lnga po dag rnam par sel bar 'gyur ba rnam pa da lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs pa de na ting nge 'dzin de bdag la
285b5(dkon brtsegs): ga las pa lags sam/ 'on te gzhan la rag las pa lags/ bral te bdag la rag las pa lags na ni mi 'pho ba'i chos can lags te/ ji ltar khyod snyoms par zhugs pas gzhan dag gi sgrib pa rnams ra
285b6(dkon brtsegs): zhi bar mdzang / tsaM ste gzhan la dgams pa lags nan ting nge 'dzin de khyod kyi pa lags s+ho// gang khyod kyis lags pa des ni gzhan la phan par mdzad par ma spyod do// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa tham
285b7(dkon brtsegs): darnam par sel bas smras pa/ bu kho ba'i sbyor ba 'di ni byams pa ldan du 'gro ba'o// bu mo dram med kyis byin pas smras pa/ rinas kyi bu sa ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyang byams pa la gnas lags
285b8(dkon brtsegs): des pa ca zhing rnams na sems can dag la sgrib pa rnams kyis gnad pa yang ma mchis so// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad nam par sel ba yang cang mi smra bar gyung to// denas bum phra ma
286a1(dkon brtsegs): byin pas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khrod kyis 'di skad du ci nas kyang grong khyer rna sems can gang dag bcings pa
286a2(dkon brtsegs): gsad par bkri ba de dag thar po dang / 'jigs pas nyon pa rnams kyang 'dzags pa med pa thob par 'gyur ba rnam par lta ba'i busam pa kho bas bsam par bya'o nas gsungs pa des
286a3(dkon brtsegs): dang bam pa lags pam/ non tu yin du la ma dzes pa lanas/ gas te sbyong 'di len pa dang bcas pa lagasan ni byas pa mas skye bo rnams kyang len pa dang bcas pa lags te/ byis pam ma
286a4(dkon brtsegs): dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro// de lta bas na de yang mi rigs so// ci ste spyor ba deben pa ma mchis pa lags na ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa lags te/ mngon par 'das ma byas pa la ni nye bar sgrub pa ma ma
286a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sman ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang cang mo smra bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di
286a6(dkon brtsegs): da ces smras so// snyun ras gzigs dbang phyug bu mos dris pa'i man thob shig/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/ bu mo ni skye ba dang 'gag pa mi 'dri snye de ni len gdas
286a7(dkon brtsegs): par banus so// bum dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/ smyan ngas gcigs dbang phyug gang na skye ba ma mchis pa dang 'gag pas mchis padi ni dri ba ma mchis so/ byang chub sems dpa' byung ma ga regs
286a8(dkon brtsegs): dbang phyug gis smras pa/ bumo gang ni skyab med cing 'gag pa med pa na mi ge 'jug pa med do// bums smras pa/ 'dug pa ma mchis pa dang / ye gem mchis pa'i chom thams cad yonam par ban/ 
286b1(dkon brtsegs): be ge dang 'jug pa ma ston te/ yi ga rnams la mi chags so// chags pa mchis can chos kyi dbyings te/ de lar rtogs par bgyi ba'i skad du chags pa ma mchis so// byang chub sems dpa' snyan ras gzugs da
286b2(dkon brtsegs): ga cang dang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bu mo phram med kyis byin pas byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs la 'di skad du so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di nyid du gang gis grong khyer ni skye po'i tshogs pa/ 
286b3(dkon brtsegs): ra phan tshun rigs su bcad pa'i byang sa dang / byams pa'i sems kyis smra bar 'gyur ba dang / spobs pa yang thob par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bas bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs pa'i
286b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi slebs pa nye bar sgrub pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par rtog pas bskyed pa lpags sum/ don tu rgyam mchis pa las byung ba lags/ gal te rnam par rtog pas bskyed pa lags na ni 'dus byas thams / 
286b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang rnam par rtog pas bskyed pa lags te/ de lta bas na rnam par zhi bar mi 'gyur ro// ci ste rgyu ma mchis pa las byung ba lags na ni ma byung ba la sgro 'dogs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' spobs
286b6(dkon brtsegs): ba brtsegs kyis smras pa/ bu mo sems can gang dag kho ba'i mig lamAn snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad spobs pa thob par gyur cig ces bya ba'i kho bo'i slod lal 'di ni dang po sams bskyed pa nas bzung ste ba
286b7(dkon brtsegs): mchis na ni rtag par sna ba lags so// ci ste ma mchis na ni chad par lta ba lags te/ de gsung na ni khyod kyi gsung ba log pa lags so// byang chub sems
287a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i spobs pa rtsegs kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas byang chub sems dpa' gom pa 'dod pa don yod la 'di skad ces smra so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di sa
287a2(dkon brtsegs): ru ri nas kyang grong khyer na sems can gang dag kho bo'i mig lam na snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba rnam pa da lta bu'i
287a3(dkon brtsegs): kho bos bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs pa de ni byang chub de mchis pa zhes brjod par bgyi 'am/ 'on tam mchis pazhes brjod par bsngo/ gal te mchis na ni rtag pa ste yod pa'i mthu' 'dzin pa
287a4(dkon brtsegs): lags so// ci ste ma mchis na ni chad pa ste med pa' mthar 'dzin pa lags so// byang chub sems dpa' gom pa 'dor bden yod kyi pa smras pa/ bu mo byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni ye shes kyi
287a5(dkon brtsegs): bla dgas so// bu mo drim med kyis byin pas smras pa/ ye shes te hU~Mbs rab tu phye ba lags sam/ 'on ta na pas rab tu phye ba lags/ 'on te skyo bas rab tu
287a6(dkon brtsegs): lags na ni tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa las byung ba 'dus byas su 'gyur te/ shes pa de ni byes pa rnams kyi shapa s+ho// ci steni pa pa rab tu bye ba lags na ni la dpag
287a7(dkon brtsegs): pa ma mchis so// glang la dmigs pa ma mchis bde la 'don so so'i spyi bo 'i nas 'am/ nyan thos so sa / rang sangs rgyas po naya?/ byang chub sems 'ona'am/ 
287a8(dkon brtsegs): na/ da med na/  ma na pa nas kyi ma pa'i byas sa byang chub la rnas na
287b1(dkon brtsegs): ga pa'i slad du'o// byang chub sems dpa' gom pa 'dor ba don yod kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byong kyis byang chu sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces sa'o// bsod snyoms kyi phyir grong khyer du'
287b2(dkon brtsegs): mi byi'i slang 'dong // de ci'i phyir zhen/ deng bu ma dri med kyis byin pa las chos thos pa gang ben pa'adi sems pa'o bas yin pa mchog par banyeng pa'i phyir te/ chos kyi bas bza' bar bya'o// de nas bu ma dro ma mi
287b3(dkon brtsegs): byin pas gnas brta rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smra so// btsun parab 'byor gdan sa dag pa med pa dang / gzhag pa med pa de la ci ge khyod kyis brnal par sems/ btsun parab 'byor dge sbyong ba rgyal
287b4(dkon brtsegs): spros pa ma mchis pa lags kyi spros pa la dga' ba'i nimi lags so// btsun pa rab 'byor dge slong gi chos ni gnas pa ma mchis pa/ gnas par mi bgyi ba lags te/ 'phags pa rnams kyi
287b5(dkon brtsegs): thugs pa lags so// bam po gnyis pa sti tham/ de nas nyan thos chen po brgyad po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' brgyang po dag dang / bram ze lnga brgya tsham po de dag dang / bu mo dri ma mid kyis byin
287b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal pogs pa rgyal dang / de las gzhan skye bo phal po che rnams bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dang dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal ta lan gsum bskor ba
287b7(dkon brtsegs): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas bcom ldan 'das la lan stong bskor ba byas te gas phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ @
287b8(dkon brtsegs): / 'das gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ ting nge 'dzin stobs ldan grags pa mtha' yas mngal/ 'jig rten mgon po bdud rtsi dag
288a1(dkon brtsegs): / stsol ba// mtshungs med pa shes bde gshegs da padra/ byang chubasapas dpang ji ltar spyad bskyod/ ji ltang shing dbang drang mchis bdud rnams 'joms// ji lta nga
288a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams gso bar bgyid// grags pa mtha' las ji lta 'ad cing gtod// byang chub de tshul legs par bshad du gsol// sangs rgyas nor gyi gzungs ni ji war 'thog// ting 'dzin ni padam pa'i
288a3(dkon brtsegs): / bsgom// mi yis rdzu 'phrul stobs ni ji ltar 'thob// sems can rin chen rnams kyi spyad pa gsungs/ gang gis dran dang rtog pa dang blo gros 'gyur// spobs pa mdzes dang ldan par gang gis
288a4(dkon brtsegs): gang dang rab tu ldanan 'khor na dang // snyan cing shin tu mdzes pa smra bar bgyid// gang gis mi ni tshe rabs dran par 'gyur// drim ma mchis lnga yi mig kyang 'thob// lhan 'thob cing pha rol sems
288a5(dkon brtsegs): rig/ rdzu 'phrul gyis ni zhing rnams brgyar yang mchi// ji ltar sbyin pa gtong la brtson par 'gyur// rtag tu tshul khrims dag cing bzod la dga'// ji ltar brtson 'grus bsam gtan mtha
288a6(dkon brtsegs): gis pal yang //  snyed du ban+dan// mangs kyi gnos ni de lta nam spang nas// padas la sa t+ta/ tud+has twA!// sangs rgyas rnams kyi stan snang mchis par bgyid/ bdag
288b1(dkon brtsegs): ba spyod// nga pem mchil cur 'chos g.yo ma mchis// ji ltar rdul bral nga rgyal rgyags pa spa// zhe da nga rab tu ni dang shiganas brtso// blo ldan ji ltar ba shes mchog tu 'gyur// chung ma bu nor mang la dag
288b2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur// rtag tu ci yang ma mchis mi rtog lag// mnyam pa nyid bdaga' zhing nam mkha' tshungs// ji ltar rtag tu chos ni spong mi bgyid/ 
288b3(dkon brtsegs): dag tu ston pa'i sems bskyed nas// ji ltar gnas te byang chub 'jug par bgyi// zhing gi bkod pa ji ltar gnas par 'gyur// dge 'dun dag par ji ltar 'gyur ba lags// ji ltar dus gsum du yang cho
288b4(dkon brtsegs): sa shing / ngi sngar tshe ring sems can bde bar 'gyur// rtag tu srid pa 'gog pa'i pha rol son// dgra bcom dul bar bden bzhi ji ltar mthong // sems can brgya dag byang chub 'jog par bgyid// spyod
288b5(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu dga'ayos de ltar 'gyur// gang gis shin tu mdzes ya 'gyug// bajus te ste ba dgang gis 'gyu// longs maud cidang shes rab / kun pa khyen rtogs pa 'od du spyad// gang gsas
288b6(dkon brtsegs): ga/ dpe byang bzang po brgyad cu 'thog// bsod nams kun la mkhas pa lags// slobs pa gang gis skye bar 'gyur// ning ni snang dag 'gyur lags// dge slong dge 'dun phran su
288b7(dkon brtsegs): tshogs// gang du dmas sngon btab pa// de ni de ltar skye 'gyur lags// chi rabs dran par ji ltar 'gyur// de ltar sangs rgyas rnams dang mngal// bskal pa bye ba stong rnams su// ngan 'gro mchi mdzun
289a1(dkon brtsegs): / 5 sa ya/ ga shAn na thug /  'ad na na ma k+Sha/  ga// 8
289a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad spangs nasas// srog chags rnams la chos kyang s+ho// khyod pa yim khyen cang mi mangs// mub car myod ni thams cad ma khyen// byang chub sems dpa'i srid gang lags// 
289a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du bstan du gsal// da ska ces gal par ma nan 'das kyis su sno sa med kyis byin pa la 'did ces thaka ba stsam to// bram migs po lags so//  me bzhin gshegs/ 
289a4(dkon brtsegs): bshA na y-i 'di slob mams can khyod par mags lags pa tud sa da// 
289a5(dkon brtsegs): nas gis sa tibacom ldan 'das kyis kyang can pa dang /  ldan 'as kyis 'din ces paga'anal to//  bas me pa chos pani dang ldanan bdud 'dus ba de nyid
289a6(dkon brtsegs): sheg shAn/ kan kyi rnyed pa la phrug dog med pa dang / tha ma'i tshig yongs su stong bu dang / ste bo yang po dge bya'i rdza ba 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sgrib bya med pa'i byams bskom paste/ 
289b1(dkon brtsegs): sa bas pasas// dudu das nas byang na pa na pa nga / bram byung na pa bas mam pa da nas sa rgyam kyi mtha'ams pa dgag ba byed / brdeg na
289b2(dkon brtsegs): gang smras pa de bden byed pa dang / chos brib ma 'amam pa dang / yod ma la brtan pa dang / skye bsong pa byang chub pang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa s+ho/ tham byang chubasams dpa' chom pam me dag dang na/ 
289b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi ni mtha' las pa dag g.yo bar byed do// de la 'din de ces byaste/ dza~M ska smras pa da bzhin byed/ yangs pa zab ma'i chos la bzod/ yi dmal yang shin tu brta// dkar pa'i chas ma
289b4(dkon brtsegs): bar byed/ rdzogs pa'i byang dub byud pa// skye bye mang po dga' bar byed// de ltar chos pani de dag gis// gling rnams bye ba g.yong byed// bu mo byang chub sems dpa chos pa ni dang ldan na spangs bya
289b5(dkon brtsegs): zhing mtha' yas mu med pa rnams su 'od zeng dag gtong ste/ ni gang zhen/ mar mo sbyin pa dang / dam par chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang / sems can pag med par gyur cing mi khor par gyur pa rnams kyi gan du pong
289b6(dkon brtsegs): chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag la rin popa'i drabs 'gegs pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med pa rnams su 'di zer na/ 
289b7(dkon brtsegs): gtong ngo // des 'di skad ces bya ste/ mang me byin papa 'di rnam pa da / ra pa'i spyan dpa tshas yongs su 'dzini/ bags dgang parnams pa chos sbyin byes/ mtshad da/ ma na na pa 'jul// 
289b8(dkon brtsegs): yas zhing 'grogang // byang chub sems dpa' 'a bar gtong bar byed// dganas sems can pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ mam pa'i byang byab sgra med don du gnyer// ma byang chub sems dpa' chos pa ni
290a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan na gzungs 'thob ste/ bzhig shen/ rgyan sna tshogs gtsang zhing dga' sbyin pa dang / bum rgyan thams cad kyis 'argyan te dod dpa' la sbyin pa dang / rkun rtsi 'chad par de bzhinan
290a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man du gnas pas/ bus byang chub sems dpa' chos pan po dag dang bla na gsungs 'dzub 'o// da la 'od skad ces bya ste/ 
290a3(dkon brtsegs): pas gzungs ni thob par 'gyur // slong ba rnams la bum brgyan te sbyin/ rgan me 'chad par sangs rgyas bsngags pa brjod// rkyal ba'i ye shes don du shes rab bsgom// ches bzhi 'di dag gis nig
290a4(dkon brtsegs): 'thob 'gyur// bskal pa brgyar yang thos pa chud mi ba// phyogs bcur de bzhin gshegs pa gang 'chad pa// de dag thams cad dran pa'i stobs kyis 'dzin// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' tshes byanang
290a5(dkon brtsegs): ldanan ting nge 'dzin 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'khor ba la yid 'byung ba mang ba dang / gcig pur kun tu dga' zhing mgug yos pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / las kyi mtha' shin tu yongs
290a6(dkon brtsegs): byed pa yin te/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ srid pa'i 'gro ba kun la yid kyang 'byung // bse ru lta bur gcig pur spyod
290a7(dkon brtsegs): dkar/ rtag tu shin tu brtson 'grus brnams pa yin// de'i mas ta/ shin tum thar gang phyi// rtag cos bzhi dag la zhugs nas su// byang chubaspyod pa ni ba rgya tshol byed// byang chub sams pa
290a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba rnams kyi spyod sus byang chub rtags// bum byang chub sems dpa' tshal bzhi dang ldan nardzu 'phrul 'thob ste/ bzhig yonan/ lus yang ba dang / sems yang ba dang
290b1(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad pa mngon pa zhen pa med pa dang / khams bzhin la pa'i khams da ma nyal pa nyid du byin gyis rlob pa'i/ ma byang chub sems dpa' chos phyini pa de dag kunan du 'phrul 'thob go// de pa 'das
290b2(dkon brtsegs): ste/ sra yang ba pa de bAni na sepas kyang yang // chos rnams kun la gnas pazod pa nyid// dngupa'i khams dang marnangs shing 'di nyidang // khams ban po dag byin gyis rlob par byed// chos 'di 'di dag pa
290b3(dkon brtsegs): sbyin byas ma/  bAn da pes rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas 'thob// skad cig gcig la zhing rnams stong du 'gro// sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po rnams kyar mthong // bu mo byang chub sems dpa' tshas bzhi dang
290b4(dkon brtsegs): bar 'dar te/ ba ni gang zhes/ khrob med de rtsod pa dang / thab dang / zhe sdang dang bral ba dang / de pazhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'phrag par par btsun par 'gyur ba dang / tshul khrims kyi sdom pas bsdums shing
290b5(dkon brtsegs): rasheg legs par 'ongs po zhes rtag tu smra ba dang / chos smra ba rnams la sro gnyer dang bral zhing / 'bras pa'i sems med pa yin te/ 'pho byang chub sems dpa' chos bani pa de dag dang ldan na mdzes par 'a
290b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ska ces bya ste/ gzhan la khrod yon tu yang ni mi byed// nga rgyal rgyags dang thub ne drang bral// rtsod pa med la dga' zhing snyan par swA// gus par rgyal ba'i mchod rten baphyag par byed// de ni tshul
290b7(dkon brtsegs): a rna ma dag rtag tu spang // de ni rtag tu legs par 'ong zhes smras// chos sgra rnams la de ni za ba med// de yi sems ni rdo re rab mtshungs// bum byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na rdzus te skye bar
290b8(dkon brtsegs): bani gang nan/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs pad ma'i steng na ba tsugs pa byed du 'jug cing me tog ud pal dang / pad ma dang / pad ma dkar podag gis lag pa bkang ste/ 
291a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mngon par 'thor ba dang / ldan pa'i dngos po yong ning yang dag par dga' bar byed pa'i dang tshul ca dang / gzun dag gi spyod ma ngon pa dang / 
291a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsab thams cad sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed pa ste/ bum byang chub sems dpa' chos pa ni pa de dag dang ldanan dus te ste
291a3(dkon brtsegs): ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sangs rgyas sku gzugs pad ma mchog bzhugs byed du 'jug/ tu skyes ma tog lag pa bkang ste 'bul bar byed// pha rol dag la dga' ba skyed pa'i tshig kyang smra/ dga' bar bya
291a4(dkon brtsegs): la mngon par btsun gyi sbyin mi 'dzin// sems can kun la phan phyir bsod nams yongs su ste// thub mchog rnams kyi sangs rgyas byang chub sgrub pa shes// sangs rgyas gsungs pa'i bad// de ni bston
291a5(dkon brtsegs): de// rgyal bu mchog nams drang du rdzus te sa par 'gyur/ bumo byang chub sems dpa' tshas poni dang ldan na longs spyod chen por 'gyur te/ brdeg kyang / brnyas pa med par smin pa'i tshol can dang / chags pa
291a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dngos po yongs su gtong ba dang / mas pa mang ba dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cad dang bral ba yin te/ bu mo byong chub sams dpa' chos ba'i pa dang ga dang ldan na mongs spyod che por 'gyur ro// 
291a7(dkon brtsegs): ska ces bya ste/ nges pa brnas pa med par sbed pa sbyin par byed// de ni dngos po kun la rtag tu 'dzin pa med// rgyal ba'i ye shes mchog la mos pa bskyed pas// don phyir shing yongs /  chen po mo
291a8(dkon brtsegs): nga / da dang dran par 'gyur ni na mid tu lang me / pa bdag gi byed ni 'de pa ma ma byed// zhag pa'i 'ibarapas gang gig 'drang ngag// den de ning mi mchod ma mi sa
291b1(dkon brtsegs): bu po byang chub sems dpa' chos pani dang ldan na shes rab chen por 'gyur te/ bani gung ned/ rlos la ber sna mi byed pa dang / mimathun par mi 'jug pas 'gyod pa sel ba dang / gsol pa 'debs pa la yang dag pa de
291b2(dkon brtsegs): don du gud pas ngag ston pa dang / stong pa nyid bsgom pa la yang du gnas pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' ches bzhi po de dag dang ldan na shes rab chen por 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mkhas pa nam yang
291b3(dkon brtsegs): byed// ri mdun 'dug pa med pas 'khyad pa sel// bang dag sa ldan gdams ngag ston par byed// rgyal ba'i spyod pa gang yin stong nyid sgom// chos pan 'di dgangs par bsten byas na// rgyal ba
291b4(dkon brtsegs): rnye 'i bya chub snang du 'thob// sangs rgyas rjes su bstan das bsgrub byas nas/ nang gnyis dom pa sangs rgyas don gyung // bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bani dang ldan na cir bsu dran par 'acu
291b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na/ lung nod pa dang kha ton la brtsod pa rnams lung nas pa dang gdams ngag brjed nas yun dang du pon te gsal ba 'debs pA la lung 'bog cing dran par byed pa dang / 'di ltar kud dka' ba'i tshig gis gzhan da / 
291b6(dkon brtsegs): dang brke ba sgrubs pa dang / 'dor ba'i sdug bsngal la sa nges par 'byung ba dang / byang na las 'das pa'i bde ba thob par bya ba'i phyir gzhan dag la ches ston pa dang / yongs su bsngo ba la mngon par brtson ni kyi
291b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin gyi mchi pa la mkhas pa ste/ tha mo byang chub sems dpa' rjes pani ba de dag dang bla na mo gas dran par 'gyung ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ lung brdol la ton brji la dran par byed// gzhanas
291b8(dkon brtsegs): skyo ba med par chos kyang rjod par byed// ting 'dzin bsgom pa'i mtshan ma legs par 'dzin// chos bzhi 'di dag nges par bsten byas na// mthu chen ldan pa cha
292a1(dkon brtsegs): / bskal pa stong phrag thalam yas na su dran// rnam par 'dun pa'i mchog nyid ltar du 'thob// bumo byang chub sesas dpa' tshas bzhi dang ldan nasangs rgyas rnams dang dradran
292a2(dkon brtsegs): / bzheg she na/ srog gi phyir yang dam pa'i chol spong ba dang / srog gi phyir yang sdig pa'i grogs po rnams dang mau ldan pa dang / srog gi phyir yang chos smra ba la srung ba 'i 'debs pa dang / sangs rgyas rdzas su
292a3(dkon brtsegs): de pa'i ting nge 'dzin snyam pa 'o// bum byangan pa sems rab chos bzhi po de dag deng ldan na sangs rgyas rnams dang phrad par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces pa ste// sangs rgyas byang chub co tshom spong
292a4(dkon brtsegs): chos smra ba la skur pa yongs mi 'debs// des na sdig pa'i grogs rnams rnam par spong // g.yel ba med par rtag tu sangs rgyas dran// chos bzhi 'di dag nges par bsten byas pa// bde gshegs rnams dang
292a5(dkon brtsegs): blad pa des 'thob bo// bla med byang chub mthob par du yang // 'dren pa gangan bzhugs pa de de ste// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' tshas bzhi dang ldan na skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po dadag
292a6(dkon brtsegs): tsho ste zhigang de zhi gshegs pa dang ba gshegs pa'i mdon rten la rin po che skar gyis 'thor ba dang / 'bumar dri nam po dag gi pad bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'khru bar byed pa dang / me tog dang / 
292a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / bil snyan sna tshogs 'bul ba dang / yid du 'ong ba'i g.yog 'bar gyis mkhar po dang / sleb dpon bstan pa bya bas ram gro byed pas/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dgang
292a8(dkon brtsegs): la bu chen pa'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po dag 'thob bo// dal 'di gad ces bya ste/ mchid rte pa ni srang gyis dbyig rnams 'thor// dri nas 'bum rnams kyis mchod rten 'bru/ spos dang
292b1(dkon brtsegs): sis stan sna tshogs 'bul// yid du 'ong bas mkhan po slob dpon sten// de'i lus sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang ldan// rab tu mngob shing yon tan kun dang ldan// gang zhes shes rab mchog ldan rgyal mdzes pa
292b2(dkon brtsegs): sos de da gagis smras chen ma can du 'gyur// bu lo byang chub sems dpa' ches bzhidang ldanan dpe myed pazang po brgyad na po dag 'thob ste/ bzhig shen/ sman kyus tshugs chos kyi stan du 'byur ba dang / smyan
292b3(dkon brtsegs): ste bang byed pa la po stob dang / chos sgrub pa 'thab ma ma rgol pa dang / sems can rnams byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'dag pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i chos bzhi ba de dag dang ldan no da byed bzang
292b4(dkon brtsegs): tsu bo dag 'thong 'o// de la 'di na ces bya ste/ snyu tu sna tshugs chos kyi stad du bral/ gzhan la ste sdang byed pa 'i smra ba med// chos sgrub la 'thab mo long mi rgol// sems can rnams ni byang chub 'dzin
292b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jug/ 'di banis lus la dpe byad babang po rnams// 'di ni de yis rnyed par dga' ba snyed// yon tan 'di dag rtag tu bsten byasan// byang chub sems dpa' 'din brgyan par 'gyur/ bu mo byang chub sems da
292b6(dkon brtsegs): rjes bani dang ldan na spobs pa 'thob ste/ zhig zhen/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod 'dren pa dang / nyin mtshan du phung po gsum pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs la ton byed pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ad namag/ 
292b7(dkon brtsegs): pa bye na 'ji ga ma pa dang mdzan pa stsu myed 'khrug sa med pa das pa la mchog da dga' bsnga na 'dzin pa dang / lus dang grog dang bya rnams pa mi y-i/ sa kyang rgya mamapa
292b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyas banis dad ga dang ldan thobs pa'i thokho bo// del 'desad ces bya ste/ byang dus sems dpa'i brjod ni// nyin pa naras tu 'ad par byed/ 'di rten pa da mi mdun pa/ lhab med par sa
293a1(dkon brtsegs): lpags// mchog tu dka' ba rnyang gyur nas// sangs rgyas bstan pa 'dzin par byed// lus dang srog la mi lta bar// de ni byang chub lta bar byed// bzhi po 'di dag bsten byas na/ 
293a2(dkon brtsegs): che par 'byung // lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten kun// sna tshogs dreng 'dras tshim par byed// bum byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldanan sangs rgyas ning yangs su dag pa'athab ste/ bsregs
293a3(dkon brtsegs): / drag dog med pa dang / ser sna med pa dang / sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang / 'khor dang 'dra ba med pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi shing
293a4(dkon brtsegs): dag pa 'thob po// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gzhan gyi rnyed la nam yang phrag dag med// mthong nas dga' bar 'gyur te ser sna med// sems can kun la de yi sems kyang snyoms// 'khor dang 'dre ba
293a5(dkon brtsegs): dmi byed// chos bzhi 'dis ni shing gi bkod 'thob cing / myur du byang chub mchog kyang thob par 'gyur/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na dge 'dun phun sum tshogs pa 'thob ste/ 
293a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhe na/ gzhan gyi 'khor mi 'byed pa dang / mi mthun pa rnams kyi sdums byed pa dang / lung nod pa dang kha ton byed du 'jug pas phan 'dogs pa dang / phra ma'i chag yongs su spong ba ste/ bu mo byang chus
293a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chos bzhi po da dag dang ldanan dge 'dun phran sum rdzogs pa 'thob po// da la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gzhan gyi 'thing ni nam yang long mi'i byed// skye bo la mthun pa dag 'dun par byed// lung no la ton gyi
293a8(dkon brtsegs): la lang dag 'dzud// par bdag par byen gyi tshig sa ste// com pan ni dag sa par zhin byal na// dge na gyi nan pa dag thobs pa sag/ da da/ nan pa par byed mi phyi ma
293b1(dkon brtsegs): di rtag tu bsten par bya// bu gro byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang yun sangs rgyas kyi snying gang du sems bskyed pa deng n+de ste/ bzhi ga zhe na/ gzhan dag gi shes gyi khe dang rnyed pa la phrag dog mi skyed pa dang
293b2(dkon brtsegs): lhag pa'i bsam pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug po yongs su dag pa yongs su tshol pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la ston par 'du shes bskyed de thun sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la

293b4(dkon brtsegs): chod pa mthong na phrag dog med// pa ma phyin pa dag pa yongs su 'chom// byang chub sems dpa' ston par rtag tu sems/ shes khe bad pa'i don du tshul 'chos med// yon tan 'di dag sdug tu bsten byas na/ 
293b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rnams dang de phrad 'grer// ning gang dag tu slor mamab tu ga byas pa// 'dod pa bzhin du ning de skye bar krug/  nas bcom ldan 'dis la bu mo drim med kyis byen pas 'di skad ces gsal/ 
293b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis dester ches btigs pa 'di dag bdag gis yang dang / par blad ste gnas pa ma bgyis na bdag gis sa A rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
293b7(dkon brtsegs): zhing gnyis la ches kyi ston pa de dag thams cad bslus par gyur cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bu mo dris med kyis byin pal 'di skad ces smras so// bum khyod de ka smra pan
293b8(dkon brtsegs): rgya' sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i bye pa bsgrub dga' bar mi shesas me// de nas bu ma dri ma med kyis byed pa la gnas brtan mo gal kye bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun
294a1(dkon brtsegs): dgas kyi bu chen po 'den pa dang 'den pa'i tshig gang zhes bdag la 'ongs pa kha dang srung dakhung de bzhin gshegs pa mngon mus du bcug lang bzhed de 'ani gshegs pa dgra com pa nga

299a1(dkon brtsegs): // na chos thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi 'ams nad bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rin chen dpag tu med pa bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi rnal pa
299a2(dkon brtsegs): lta bu nas bya ba zhigang ltang bzhugs te 'tsho shing bzhes pa yod do// bskal pa de ni rgyas pa thams cad kun nas bsdus pa zhes bya'o// der sems can rnams kyi tshe ni dpag tu med do// bcom ldan 'das de'i byang chub sem
299a3(dkon brtsegs): 'thams cad kyi 'khar dpag tu med do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rin chen dpag tu med pa bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po lta bu de
299a4(dkon brtsegs): tshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can ni bskal pa stong phrag drug cu'i 'khor ba snyil bar byed do// che rjes nas kyang sgrib pa med par ston pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas
299a5(dkon brtsegs): khrag cu rnams kyi sang sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis spobs pa nye ba sgrib pang badzad do// chos ston pa na bag tsha ba yang med par 'gyur ro// de ba 'di skad ces bya sa// me gang sangs rgyas mtshan 'di rjod
299a6(dkon brtsegs): la yo can 'di rnams su pa laHpa// de sal de bas skrag pa gzhan yab spang // de'i sde med byang chu ba dga' ba yin// yon tan rin chen po teg kun tu rgyas pago phyogs yod te ni rin rkyen bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams/ 
299a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rin chen dpal bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi hral po lta blan sa bya ba zhig dkar bzhugs te/ 'tshonang gnas pa yod do// bskam sa
299a8(dkon brtsegs): yon tan rgyas pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyal yod tan na na dpal bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po lta bu de'i mtshan 'dze pa'i
299b1(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi gyu pa/ regs sde 'bod pa morjes par du zhes dkyil la ma kye'ab grang ba zhes bya ba'i ti ra ne 'thob par nang // yang rgyas kyi ning gi yon tad pa gan med pa kod pas myos su 'dzid papa kya
299b2(dkon brtsegs): kAgs skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sub cu rtsa gnye 'thab par grar ro// sangs rgyas kyi ning gang dang gang du smon lam 'debs pa'i sa sa chas kyi zhing de dang de skye bar 'byung // skye ra gcig gi logs pas blan med pa yang dag par
299b3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro// spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yang 'thob par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ me gang sangs rgyas mtshan 'di rjod byed pa// de la ting 'dzin bsam pas de sbyin/ 
299b4(dkon brtsegs): su/ cu n+ya gnyis mtshan ldan lus 'thob sa// de ni byang chub skye ba gcig logs 'grupa/ yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa nub phyogasan myang na dang kun pa thabla cad dang bral ba'i 'jig rted kyi mas na de bzhin gshes
299b5(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad la spobs par bkod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te 'tshe nang gzhes pa yod do// bskal pa de ni shAkya mngon par mdzes pa zhes bya'o// @#
299b6(dkon brtsegs): da 'a de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad la spobs pa bkod pa'i dpal de'i batshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu lag/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can ni macord kyis 'chi ba'i dre / 
299b7(dkon brtsegs): par ma 'gyur ro// dug k+ki ma yin// chus ma yin te/ mes kyang 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// rdzas te skye bar yang 'gyur ro// tshe rjes ma thad tu yang shugs brgya ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'thob par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces
299b8(dkon brtsegs): ste/ me gang sangs rgyas mtshan 'dirjod byed pa// 'dis mide'i lus mes mi 'che shi // marjod kyis min chul min dug gis med// don mu te skye g.yon 'gyur / yod tan ri chen me tog kun du rgyas pa byang phyogs
300a1(dkon brtsegs): nis gyur bzhugs te 'a zhing gzhes pa yod de/ bskul pa de ri grags pa chen pa 'dzin pa zhes bya'o/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'a sangs kyis spongs pa dang
300a2(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par spyod pa'i glo nga'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu ma dad pa can ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag bcu mnyes par byed par 'gyu ro// thams cad rjes su song ba na
300a3(dkon brtsegs): so pa /  TIgs pa'i la/ sa pa pa gams sa thab par 'gyur b.ras kun mad pa 'ang dag par rdzogs pa skyed chub ngod par rdzogs pa nga rgyaba'i bang du yang 'a / 
300a4(dkon brtsegs): rjong sum po rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro khyad chub sems dpa'i spyad pa smad pan sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang deng ngan song du skyes pa'i sems par rnams yongs su ra ba
300a5(dkon brtsegs): dmed pa yang dka du rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phying mi ldog par yang 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ me gangs ngas rgyas mtshan 'dirjo byed pa/ de sa yon tan bgrang bar mi nus shig// den bya na
300a6(dkon brtsegs): ma med// del ze sa med par gzengs kyi'o// nga te na che sa teg kun du rgyas pa gang b+ha'amatshams kyi phyogs na she du mangs pa bzhed pa'i 'jig rte gyi mas de bzhin gshegs pa
300a7(dkon brtsegs): la pa kyang shegs/ pa ga na gnas pa dag na san yang
300b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dag 'artsam pa yang dag pa pardzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sun stong bsgrags pa'// skad ci rgyal po de'i mtshan 'jan pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can den tshe rjes ma thag tu mi 'jigs pa bzhi 'thob pa
300b2(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul gyi gang ba bzhi 'thob par 'gyur ro// byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po 'thab par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi rmi pha la 'dres pa bco brgyad 'thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi sangs
300b3(dkon brtsegs): ngani yon tan rjon pa che'an ba des bya 'thob par 'byugyu / nga sa kyi skyes pa'i lus 'thob par gyud po/  na ga steg zhig rgyal ba'i na 'dil du rnyed pal/ rgyang chub
300b4(dkon brtsegs): dpas yon tan 'di dang gzhan// bsam gyis mi khyab rtag tu 'thob par 'gyur// byab pa' sems dpas sangs rgyas mang po mthong // yon tan rin ched me tog kun du rgyas pa lho nub mtshams kyi phyogs na bkod pa dpa
300b5(dkon brtsegs): da pa 'i jig rted rjege 'bas na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser mchog 'od dpal zhes pa ba zhig dkar bzugs te 'tsho nang gzhes pa yod do// bskal bdo chos thams cad kyi
300b6(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser mchog 'od dang me de'i mtshan 'dod pa'i ngag 'i dzi dang nga na de mtshan thos pa des sangs rgyas ba
300b7(dkon brtsegs): na 'das bye ba phrag dkum nyes par 'gyur // mas can thams cad mchog tu 'gro bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin thob par gagyur ro// rgyag du gis ni sems can thams cad chag tu 'gro bar byed ces byashes/ rinas/ 
300b8(dkon brtsegs): bu'ab rigs kyi bu ma gang lal ting 'dzin 'di la gnas nas tshal ston par 'gyur zhing de chos ston pan teng nge 'dzin de'i chos ta po sa stong gsus kyi stod chen po'i 'jig rten ni khams na sems can gang dag la
301a1(dkon brtsegs): / da khams cang ba bdag napa sa / dpar da de bzhi gshegs pa dag brtsod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'asangs rgyas me 'ong gisangs nas cad rnasems cad rnams gcigs pa ra
301a2(dkon brtsegs): zhing sems can ngan song du skyes pa thams cad yangs su thar bar 'gyur te/ de dag de nas yongs su grol nang lha dang mi lus thob pag nya she blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba bzhin no// 
301a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas byaste/ gser mchog 'dod pal rtse ne mtshan 'dzid pa// de la gzi brjod dpa la mdog stobs dbang po// tshe rabs kun du rnyed par dka' ma yan// des pa thugs med pa bza' las 'gyur// yon tan chen
301a4(dkon brtsegs): tog kun du rgyas pa dub kyang mtshams na sdig pa dang bral ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzi brjid kyi rgyal po rnam mang dpal sdang zhes
301a5(dkon brtsegs): ked ltar bzhum+ba te 'tshe zhing gzhes pa yod do// bskal ba de ni khyim rgyal ba zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyal gzi brjid ce rgyal po
301a6(dkon brtsegs): dpal snang de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dang pa car da tsha rjes ma thag tu stobs pa dpag tu med pa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'theb par 'gyur ro// tshogs chung ngus de bzhin gshe
301a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i / med kyi sangs rgyas kyi gang gi yon tan bkod pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i chos snyan pa yang thos par 'gyur/ 'dzan
301a8(dkon brtsegs): // de 'dind ma bye// gang dag rgyal pa sa da tshig dal chug/  sa kyi ngas rgya zhe sa// de pa me na ma gas kya// khya cigathogs pas kyang tu mardzogs
301b1(dkon brtsegs): tshang ma/ yo tan semasatan gan ta rgyas par bang shang mtshams sa phyogs na myang thams cad pas rgyal ba'i 'a ga sti khabs na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bskal pa byed// 
301b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis med pa kyang dab yang dag par ban pa pang zhes bya ba she ltar bzhugs te di zhes pa da // bsal pa sangs pa zhes bya'o// ma ldan 'das de na gshegs pa dag pa yang yeng na
301b3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa kyisangs rgyas bzhal pa bye ba grangs med par byang chub yang dag par bsgrub pa de mtshan 'dzin pa rigs kyi su marigs kyi ba da da de rjes pa dag tu rnam padrug cu dang ldan pa skyeng dbyangs kyi spobs pa
301b4(dkon brtsegs): phyed du mtshogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// ngas rgyas bye ba drug brgyad cu la dag pa'i rtsa ba bskyed pa 'dzin par gyung ngo // de 'du dred ces bya ste/ sgra dbyang su pan lag du/ chu phrin rdzogs ldan// do ni kun du shes pa pa
301b5(dkon brtsegs): rol phyin// rgyal ba bye ba brgyad cu mchod byed pa'i// bsod nams gang yin bsam las des 'thob 'gyur// yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa steng gi phyogs na yon tan dpag tu med pa bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi 'jig
301b6(dkon brtsegs): 'aman de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang po dang / namamakha des par spags pa bsod pa'i 'od ces bya ba zhi ga da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa yod do// 
301b7(dkon brtsegs): skal pa de ni tshad med len ces bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang po dang / nam mkha' nges par sgrogs pa bkod pa'i 'od de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rig
301b8(dkon brtsegs): bu'am/ rigs bye bu mdod pa can ni shul khribs kyi bu po dpag tu med pa yongs su spyod par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dpag tu med pa dang / shes rab kyi phung po dpag tu med pa dang / rnam par grol ba 'phung ba
302a1(dkon brtsegs): / dpag tu med pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dpag tu med pa yongs su spyod par 'gyur ro// gnas sa yang 'thob par 'gyur ro// cig gzung bar bas pa nyid kyang 'thob par 'gyur
302a2(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa bul ba med pa phun su mtshogs pa yang 'thob par 'gyur ro// mang du bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bang chu ba mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// yi ge dang sgra brda yang 'thob par 'gyur // 
302a3(dkon brtsegs): bathon po dang rigs chen po yang 'thob par 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa lnga par 'thab par 'gyur ro// rir byas dran par yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dreb pa bco brgyad kyang 'thob par 'thar // 
302a4(dkon brtsegs): 5ci bya ste/ gang zhig rkyal ba'i mtshan mchog 'dzin byed pa// de ni yan lag brgyad dbya ma phun sub 'thob// de ni sangs rgyas bral bar yang mi skye// mi de mi thogs byang chub 'tshang rlur 'gyur// yon tan rin chen me to
302a5(dkon brtsegs): kun du rgyas pa 'og gi phyogs na/ tha dad pa med pa nyid la dga' ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad kyi tshul la rnam par 'phrul ba'i gtsa
302a6(dkon brtsegs): 'ad ces bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gshes pa yod do// bskal pa de ni ye shes kun nas bkrus pa shes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
302a7(dkon brtsegs): mas cad 'i la la rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzi 'arjed kyi 'od de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dang pa can de'i tshe rjes ma thag tu sangs rgyas yongs su 'grub pa zhes bya ba'i gzung ba 'thob par 'gyur ro// 
302a8(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyur ro// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu'i chos bstan pa yang thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas kyang thams cad
302b1(dkon brtsegs): du'adzi pa 'byung ngo // de la 'did ces kyi ste/ sangs rgyas can 'a na pa sa rgyapa bye ba phrag/ dkrung na rnams kyi chos bdan chos gyur dang / swa bag cig thogs ldan med page/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'gyur/ 
302b2(dkon brtsegs): na byed na sems pa' sems da yon na ge rtag pa da rgyas pa dang byang chu ba ma pa dang 'a bem na na tan ni can yab ca dgran pa'i thom pa pa'i srid kyis ga zu mthob pa tha
302b3(dkon brtsegs): 'a med pa 'bye ba phrag brgyad bcus blan med pa yang dag pa dgas pa'i byang chub la ldog pa'i sa thob pa// ba mi'i sra ga sum khrimani blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
302b4(dkon brtsegs): com ldan 'das kyis nga skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dedang / khwa dang mi dang / lham yin dang / dri bar ba
302b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'jig na pa ngas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon pang bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brdzogs pa chen pa'i nas man mgru me'i skyong drug brgya ba lam/ yon tan rin chen matog
302b6(dkon brtsegs): pasasbas pa'i 'dres bya ste ma smyeN bani brdzogs so// rgyag kyi ma 'an badzin med dang / bradz+nyA bar ba dang / tha can sde le sgrub pa de mi shes drib po dang mis ba sku mthus te gtan gabab pa// 'phagam pa// 
302b7(dkon brtsegs): dko mchog 'ardegs pa rten po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya ba las le 'bram cu rtsa lnga pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yul babam gyi mi khyab pa lung bstan pa/ bam tho dang // phya ga pa nadadu/ 
303a1(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di na bdag gis so mangs bcigs/  sa mang san pod dkyil bu rgya kyang kyi chom mngon med pas phyid kyi na
303a2(dkon brtsegs): dab dang / thang rta rtsod pa das song shed 'dun chen podang / byang chub sems dang 'bred 'bas gas da 'a pa sa dang / gan gang ba'i gleng lung sa dang yang sa
303a3(dkon brtsegs): gcig go// de nas btsam ldan 'das 'khor ba kyi da dums yongs su bskor ta mdun gyis bltas namachos ldan to// ba de'i tshe'ajas dpal gzhan nur krung pa la yang nyid du 'dus par kyar te 'dug go// lha'i bu dpal ba
303a4(dkon brtsegs): nga 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhan dur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpalangs khyod pa bskul gyis// khyod kyis chos dang ldan pa'i gtam las rtsoms te
303a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor 'di dang byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag la spobs par kyis shig/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ci las brtsams te/ spobs par bkyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ba
303a6(dkon brtsegs): la ba/ 'jam dpa' khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi la la las brnams te 'bas par kyis shi ka/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi yul de gang mig gis yul ma lags pa dang / gzugs kyi yul ma
303a7(dkon brtsegs): lags pa dang / rna ba'i yul pa lags pa dang / swa'i yul ma lags pa dang / sA'i yul ma lags pa dang / dri'i yul ma lags pa dang / lce'i yul ma lags pa dang / ro'i yul sa lags pa dang / lus kyi yul
303a8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / reg bya'i yul ma lags pa dang / yid kyi yul ma lags pa dang / chos kyi yul ma lags pa ste/ de sangs rgyas kyi yul zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das yul khyad par ma mchis pa nis
303b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi yul lags/ bcom ldan 'das rags kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bum sangs rgyas kyi lu ga pong du chud par 'tshal bas// kho du da ba ma mchis pa'i tshul dus sems kyi yul de ltar khong du chu bang brgya'o// 
303b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub bsnyes pa'i yul ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal smra bar gyur pa mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir stong pa nyid ni ngas byang chub thob pa'i yul lo// mtshan ma mnyam pa nyid kyi phyi
303b3(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma med pa de yul lo// khams gsul ba mnyam pa rnyed kyi byer smon pa med pa ni yul lo// 'du byed mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir mngan par 'du bya ba med pa ni yul lo// 'dus byas marnam pa nyid kyi phyir skye ba med par
303b4(dkon brtsegs): thung ba med pa dang / 'du byed pa med pa ni yul lo// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma bkyis kyi yul gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal sems med pa ni 'dus ma byas kyi yul lo// gsol pa/ 
303b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das sems ma mchis pa ni sangs rgyas kyi rdul lags te/ de la brjod pam mchis lags so// brjod pa ma mchis pa la bstan pa ma mchis lags so// bstan pa ma mchis pa la mngon par
303b6(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa la bachis lags so// bcom ldan 'das mngon par brjod pa ma mchis pa'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi yul gang du btsal ba/ 
303b7(dkon brtsegs): g+hagasolal bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi yul ni sems can thamam cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams las yong sa su rtsas parab kyi lags so//  ma da gan/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ sems
303b8(dkon brtsegs): cacan thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa yongs su rtogs pa ni tan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul ma lags kyi/ gang 'di sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa yongs su rtogs pa de ni sangs
304a1(dkon brtsegs): pags pa'i srad du'o// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi yul la 'jug pa 'am ldag pa yod dam ched/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi yul sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams
304a2(dkon brtsegs): yob srabatsab/  gsol ba/ bam ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi rul ni 'jug pam ma chis ldog pa ma mchis lags sa// dka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gal te sa ngang rgyas kyi yung 'jug pa med cing ldog pa
304a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi la nga ltang sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams pas yongs su shes/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi yul 'jug pa ma mchis shing ldog pa ma mchis pa de bzhin du/ 
304a4(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa dag gi rang bzhin gang lags pa de yang 'jug pa ma mchis pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'das dpal nyon mongs pa rnams kyi dang bzhin sa Ta/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sangs
304a5(dkon brtsegs): gyi rang brji gang lags pa de nyid don mongs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhi da gas so// bcom ldan 'das gapa te nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin kyang gzhan du chung ba/ sangs rgyas kyi yul byer
304a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'a zhig lags na ni de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas sa nas kyang bstan par mi 'byung bzhig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar to
304a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi rang bzhin gang lags pa de nyid sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rang bzhin lags te/ de'i slad du de bzhin gsheg pa pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
304a8(dkon brtsegs): sa // bka stsal pa/ la mdapas kyad kyas de 'anan gshegs pas rnam ca di gang shes gnas pa shesasas/ gsalag mam ldan 'das tshal lags // ba 'phrul ga'
304b1(dkon brtsegs): ngo ba rjid gshegs pa mnyam pa na gang gis gnas/ gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das byob la pos stong rnams mnyam pa nyid gang la gnas nas/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug kun du byung ba'i mnyam
304b2(dkon brtsegs): dag shegs pas lags/  mag/ 'as das kyi pa mas nyam pa da ga pa gdas 'du gas dang / shes ldan dzu/ 
304b3(dkon brtsegs): lnga mas pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pamanyam pa nyid la gnas pa rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid nges de bzhin gshegs pa gnas pa lags sa// / 'argal pa/ 'jam dpal ni pa nyi la 'ad chags dang / 
304b4(dkon brtsegs): dang gti mug yod dpa/ gsal ba/ bcom ldan 'das mchis pa gang gis stong pa nyid 'ches pa'i mchis padas 'dod chags dang / she sdang dang / gti mug rnams mchis lags sa// bka' stsal pa/ la rtsad
304b5(dkon brtsegs): gang gis stong panyid yod cing yod pa gang gis 'did chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti zhug rnams song/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yi ge dang / nadang / sgra dang / brjod pa'i mchis pam thong ba nyid mchil la
304b6(dkon brtsegs): lige dang / skad dang/ rtswa dang / brjod pa'i mtshas pas 'dod chags dang / zhe 'ang dang / gta drug rnams mchis lags so// gsal ba/ bcom ldan 'das gyis 'di zang du dge sbyong dgam skyes pa dang / ma byung ba ma
304b7(dkon brtsegs): thub bya dang / mngon par 'dubam byas pa dang / mngon par 'dumi byed pan pa dade/ dge slong dag sa skyel ba dang / mthung ba dang / mabyas pa dang / mngangan par 'dus sa byas pa dang / mngon par 'dum byed pan med pa
304b8(dkon brtsegs): thong gags tem byem po dang / mthung ba dang / 'byas pod dang/ mang dpar 'du la byas pa dgo ma na par 'dus byed pa med du ben na/ skyes pa dang / srung ba dang / byas pa dang / mngon par 'dus byas pa dang / mngad pa / 
305a1(dkon brtsegs): bdang / byas pa dang / mngon par 'dus byas pa dang / mngon par 'a byed pa 'di dag las 'byung bar gdagasas zhes pa/ 'phrul ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das gal te snang ba nyid ma mches phu lags

305a4(dkon brtsegs): / gastong pa nyid la gnas pa de dag thams cad 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug la gnas par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor spyod pa gang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug
305a5(dkon brtsegs): klung du stong pa nyid tshol ba de ni rnal 'byor la mi spyod pa lags te/ rnab 'byar ma bags pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'did chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug las gud du stong pa nyid bcal ba sa/ 
305a6(dkon brtsegs): ba ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags dang / zhe sang dang / gti mug nyid stong pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal snod ci 'dod chag sa dang bcas/ zhe sang dang bcas/ gti mug dang brtsa

305b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag mnyas te/ gang mnyam pa nyid de thob pa de ni 'dod chags dang bcas pa yang ma lags/ 'ad chags dang bral ba yang ma lags/ gasdang dang bcas pa yang ma lags/ she sang dang bral ba yang ma lags/

305b3(dkon brtsegs): sa sran zhing sal 'dod gas da bcas pa dang / she dang bcas pa dang / ti ga da pa dag pa san bde ni sra bar byung ba gnyis la chags lags so// gnyis gang pags shen/ 
305b4(dkon brtsegs): da par lta ba dang / rtag par lnga ba lags so// de ci'i srad du zhe na/ gang bdag pa 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / na rdzang dang bral ba dang / gti drug dang bral ba yang dag par rjes su lta ba de ni de dag gi chad par /

306a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i srang du'o// bka' bral pa/ 'jas dpala' 'dus sa byas la grangs gang yang yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma bgyis pa grangs gang yang ma mchis lagasas// sa /

306b8(dkon brtsegs): bshad par dge slong lnga brgya len pa med par bag pa rnams las sems nam pa'agyul lo// lha'i bu brgyad pa rnams sa kyi ga du ma ci drim dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ 'i bu bdun pa
307a1(dkon brtsegs): rung gyur pa 'o thabs pa pab nas 'dod cing lhag pa'i 'as pa pas phran med pa pang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de// yang tshe dang ldan par ba 'gyur gyis 'jas dpal ga/

310a1(dkon brtsegs): da sa rgyas so//  dgas pas rnam pa lanas pa mas kyis ras dpal gan byar bal bag / chog 'di skad du gang dag chos thab mo bstan pa 'dimams pa med pa'
310a2(dkon brtsegs): dpobs yang med/ mngon par rtogs pa yang med do na 'jo// de na tsha dang ldan parab tsu kyis dag sung da dgal 'dag pas skams// tshang ldan padag gis chen gzong cing ci sheshes ngon par gas/

310a5(dkon brtsegs): / dang ldan bdag gis lhag pa'i nga rgyal can rnams shesas ma/ spras pa/ bcom ldan 'das mkhyen pa dang ldan pas mkhyen te/ bdag cag ne re ltar sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid mi shes par bdag gis sdug bsngal lo

310a8(dkon brtsegs): deg gos nyi na shing ga 'a zhematsha cag chos pams cad kyang rnam par bral ba'i mtshan nadang / de 'i gang drug brdzas mjugasas// gang na byung bamed do// gang gag pa yang
310b1(dkon brtsegs): gyis bdas pa 'dis bu da ga / la nyan pa da parnapa sa man pa shes ba ho// ma sa na pa 'disas rjes su bya mthun pa nan// rab
310b2(dkon brtsegs): grangs depa na theg chen po la yang dag par thugs pa rnams ma gtogs pa gang dag pa'i gsung ba 'dir tshas zab mo bstan pa 'di nyan cir thos rab kyang lhag par mas pa de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i
310b3(dkon brtsegs): gsung ba la 'dus pa gsum kyi grangs su gtog par rig par bya'o// gang yang theg pa chen pa la yang dag par nugs pa de ni bzod pa gang yang ru ba 'thob par 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i du dpal bzangs kyis 'das dpal
310b4(dkon brtsegs): rung kyang ba la 'di da ces smras so// la ma dpal khyod rgyun du 'dzam bu'i gling na chos nyon tab/ 'jam dpal dga' ldan gyi gnas su bcud do// de dga' ldan gyings kyis lha rnams chos bstan du gsol/ der lnga'i ru

322b3(dkon brtsegs): bar mdzad do// yang dag par dga' bar mdzad cing yang dag par 'dzin du bcug la yang dag par gzeng ba rjod de/ yang dag pa rab tu dka' bar mdzadams kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la bka' stsal pa/ 
322b4(dkon brtsegs): po dag skyes bu dam pa 'di dag dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes sngon ma 'dzin gyi mngon par shes pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang /  ba rlabs kyi stobs dang / sems can sdud pa
322b5(dkon brtsegs): du srin par byed pa dang / thaba' dang / rigs pa dang / ye shes dang / shes rab kyis rab tu dbye dang rlobs pa la ltos/ thogs po ga byang chub sems dpa 'a dad par bgrangang med pa nas bzung ste/ sa rgya
322b6(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pas sems can rnams lenye bar gnas pa dag go// sems can gang dag gis dbang po drug po dag la skyes bu dam pa 'di dag mngon par 'gyur ba de dag ni phyis bdud kyi phul la gnas par mi 'gyur ro zhes brjod par
322b7(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag kyang chub sams dpa' la shes smin ma 'dzin dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi bded 'dir phyin pa de dag bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la mchos pos nas mi skyes
322b8(dkon brtsegs): sas 'dabaphab par gyur to// ne nas byang chub sams dpa' ba shes sngon ma 'dzin dang lhan cig lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu po dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs las par bya
323a1(dkon brtsegs): / na dang lags na sanas rdzun ma k+Sha ga ga
323a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi mas dang byin to// de nas batsham ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' tshal bas pa/ kun dga' ma pyod kyi ma chos kyi nam grangs 'di bzung shig/ tshas shig/ stsogs shig/ kun chub
323a3(dkon brtsegs): shig/ gzhan dag la yang rgya char rab tu stod cig/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung lags na 'di'i meng je skad pakye bar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun/

323a5(dkon brtsegs): dang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / me dang / lha ma yin dang / dri bar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bshad do// 'phag

323b1(dkon brtsegs): A'i bu sa grobang ba gnas kyi zhus pags pa pa lag san pa' mang// sangs rgyam dang / byab rnam sams dpa' thams cad pa phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad padag gis thos pa dus gcigan bcom ldan 'das rgyal pa'i 'a

323b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang / spobs pa brtsegs dang / gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / lhun po brtsegs pa dang / lhun po'i rgyal mtshan
323b4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mi skul dang / don rab sems dang / legs par bsam pa sems dang / sems dpa' ba dang / sems kyi gro gros dang / sems pabang po dang / nor bu brtsegs dang / re 'jigs rgyal po dang / lag na na pa chadang /

324a1(dkon brtsegs): bzags pa dang / khas pa da dang/ pa' bad / rnam par gnadad/ nyi blas dpa mog so gapor byed pa'i 'od dang / dmigs ma dang / blo gros dpa med/

324a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po dang / byang chub sem pa dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbyangs bab po dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bani khri nyis stong dang babs ga cag tu bzhugs so//

324a5(dkon brtsegs): na po dang / lha'i bu blo gros bzang po dang / de dag la sogs pa thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag pa shugs pa'i lha'i bu bdun khri sum stong dang yang thabs cig/ 
324a6(dkon brtsegs): dbang po sdug can dang / lham yin gyi dbang po ldan po dang / de dag la sogs pa thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' thegs la yang dag par thug sa pa'i blam yin gying dab ba tu med yang babs
324a7(dkon brtsegs): / kwa'i rdul po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal pa phra ba dang / klu'i rgyal ba 'jog pa dang / de dag la sogs pa thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i spu'i rgyal po drug srid pa
324a8(dkon brtsegs): dedag dang gzhan sang kya pa / klu nga gdad sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lham len dang / nam pa pa rdzi dang / ma'am ci dang / lja bye chen po 'bum phrag du ma dang / dge nga / 
324b1(dkon brtsegs): slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bstanas dag dang 'ang thabs gcags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khar bum phrag du mas yongs su bska cang mdun byas bzlas te chos ldan to// dang ngan 'jam dpal gnon du / 
324b2(dkon brtsegs): parang gi gnas na 'dug pa/ gcig pu dben par gyur cing nang du yang dag 'jag la zhugs pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ sems med cing sems dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs sa// de na
324b3(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon dur gyur pa dran zhing shes bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las langs so// 'jam dpal gzhan nur gyur pa lang sa ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi ning dpag tu med pa rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos/ de nas// 
324b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ting nge 'dzin sa langs nas 'du shes kyi rnam par rtog pa yid la byed pa 'di lta bu 'di skyes te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'dzeg/

324b6(dkon brtsegs): med pa/ rtog ge pa dang bral ba/ zab pa/ shes par dka' ba'i chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang brgyal brgyal ma na 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //

325a1(dkon brtsegs): bsam byams khyab pa dag lan mdung bad ring ba tshams dpar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / 'jig tan bya khams mi mdzang 'dab sems can

327a1(dkon brtsegs): gshes pa de le gas la na na gnas par 'dad chags dang / zhe lnga dang / gti mug gis gzir ba'i thams can mi gus pa/ dbang batshul ba/ ngocha shes pa dang / bral med par

327b3(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi su dag snang ba chen po 'jig rten du blang ba 'di'i rgyuni de yin/ rkyed ni de yin no// dargad ces bka' stsal pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dad nal bsnyen bkur 'de dag gis 'di skad ces gson to// 
327b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'a jam dang ma gnon nung gyung ba deting nge 'dzin ga pa sanan sa nas tshag ses su de med pa gagag laga' rgyal pa/ ting de chen kur du 'ang ba brimed pakad pa ste/ byang chu

327b7(dkon brtsegs): rtsu ba sems dpa' bskul ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rtag tu mi 'chad pa'i phyir ro// de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang gA'i klung bye ba'i bye ma snyed dganasangs / 
327b8(dkon brtsegs): bye nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' dmigs phrag bye 'khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam kyis mi khyab pa dag sang sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la ba da dang 9/ 
328a1(dkon brtsegs): / nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gin pas lamag ngos phyag 'tshal te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag pa 'di gad ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das ldan ma mthong ma thos pa
328a2(dkon brtsegs): yon tan dum dang ldan pa'i 'od 'di lta bu dang / snang ba 'dres du dang / 'bar ba 'dilta bu 'di galas mchis su'i 'od lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems
328a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams me mdzad ces bya ba yod de/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa
328a4(dkon brtsegs): cas \u0f7fgrub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang lhan to// de na byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba zhig 'dug pa des 'di lta ste/ phyogs bcu'i byang chubs
328a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams bsdu ba'i phyir 'od 'bar ba 'di lta bu 'di bkye'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag la byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// 
328a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdagacig bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bstan bkur bgyi ba dang / zhu ba dang / 
328a7(dkon brtsegs): khrig pakyi 'dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'ang ma dpal gzhan nu gyur pa de dang / de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa
328a8(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi ba dag de 'dus la bab par shes dang shig/ den ma de'i mngal phyags bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' dmigs phrag bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu me
328b1(dkon brtsegs): mi byang ya ga nad cig pa ga sa sam nyid pa 'ad ltas/ dab na mi stongs pam mnapa pa rnas pa sa nga ba 'am/ 'byung ba las bskum pas mal dang dang gsangs cas can dag nas mi snang ba
328b2(dkon brtsegs): nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lpags par gyur to// de na byang chub sems dpa' la la dag ne me tog gi char dag mngon par rab tu 'bebs shing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
328b3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma rgya thubs gal pa dang lcags/ lal dag ni rjes dang / thug pa dang / matom thang dang chos kyi dag dang / matag ud pa la dang/ d+ma / ba ud dang / bad+hAd/ 
328b4(dkon brtsegs): tsam pa ka dang / a ti mug ta ka dang / s+ya snar dang / d+ha nu skA ri dang / snga pa'i me tog dang / dAr shi ka dang / d+hAr shig chen po dang / man dA ra ba dang / man dA ra ba chen po dang / bA ru sha ka dang / pA ru sha ka chen po dang / ma
328b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / phra mdog chen po dang / bla mdog rab mdzes la sogs pa me tog gi rigs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char dag dang / spos kyi char dag dang / phreng ba'i char dag dang / bye ma'i char dag mngon par rab tu 'bebs
328b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gal ba dang lhags so// byang chub sems dpa' la la dag ni sil stan dbum phrag du ma dag rab
328b7(dkon brtsegs): bsil zhing bco ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba deng lpags so// byang chub sems dpa' la la dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la
328b8(dkon brtsegs): byangs nges kyang spong gsum gyi srong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su spa dbyangs kyis go bar byed cing lpags te/ de lta bu'i bshad pa rnam pa snga chags dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
329a1(dkon brtsegs): rnas pa ma pa yang dag par chags pa'i sangs rgyas ga thub pa sa pa zhugs sa// byang chubasems da'ang dga' na dang na
329a2(dkon brtsegs): tu de nas de'i mad pa del 'byang chub sems dpa' di dag ga mams stong gsam gyi gang chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dpral ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin
329a3(dkon brtsegs): jig rten gyi sems can gang ji snyed yad pa de dag thams cad nya par na par gyur to// sems can gal yang 'dod chags kyis gnod pa 'ad / zhe sdang gis pa yin/ gte mug gis ma yin/ 
329a4(dkon brtsegs): pa yin/ phrag dog gis ma yin/ ser snas ma yin/ 'cha' pas ma yin/ khro d+ha ma yin/ yongs su gdung bas ma yin te/ sems can thams cad byams pa'i sem pa dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i sems pa

329b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas brtan 'od sung can pa'i chos mtsho 'gal chen po ngo mtshar za du blang ba dang / matog na char dang / spos kyi cha dang / bye ma'i char de dag dang / sil snyan 'bum phrag mang / 'byin pa de dag na

329b3(dkon brtsegs): pa yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / me'amaci dang / 'a phyi chen po dang / me dang mi ma yin pa dang /  pan dad yin/ dge nga/ dge bsnyen ma de dag thams cad kyi lus gser kyi bdog lta bur snga sa
329b4(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang mthong ngo // de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen po stan las lang ba te/ chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gang nas pus ma gapas pa'i ldang sa la bcugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gal 'de lon
329b5(dkon brtsegs): bal po sbyang ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// rab dga' bde bstsol pa shin tu dri ma med pa'i zhal// me yi dam pa spobs bcu yon tan
329b6(dkon brtsegs): sa bsags pa// bsam yas gzhal du ma mchis yid gnyis mun bsel ba po// sa bla la yul rnam par chu ba khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis// bskal pa khrag khrig phrag brgyar sbyin dang dul ba lags par
329b7(dkon brtsegs): // bde gshegs khyod kyi tshul khrims mtshungs pa ma mchis gnas ma mchis// bzod stobs shin du stobs dang ldan pa stobs bcu'i
329b8(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul du gsol// sems can sdug bsngal gzigs nas bsngal pa brgyad dag rnam smad kyang // phyi zhing spong ba'i mngad kyis pa gzhal du ma mchis bad+mas// sras dang sras so
330a1(dkon brtsegs): / sngachags gtang/ sman dkyis thams cad gtang ba bdag gsartsam pas la du gsol// gyad kyis yon chad kyibs dang glang tsa shing rta dpu ra bsngal// gtang la dbyas pas dang pa
330a2(dkon brtsegs): sdug khrig bcwal kata// thub pas thal bab snang nan bzhin po thang dag yang bsdus// rkyen dang gtong btag tu gyes pa bad gshegs cad kra// dang po'i chos rnam sangs par bstan ci thugs
330a3(dkon brtsegs): legs dgongs pas// rdul bral sku lus gtubs kyang sdug bsngal 'khrug pa mi mnga' zhing // gsungs shes zhus ra bzod pa gsungs pa'i stobs la brtson pa yi// yon tan mnga' ba rdul dang bral ba khyod la
330a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'atshal// 'dod chags zhe sdang dag gis rab dkrugs rmongs shing kun dkris la// bdag tu 'du shes brtson pa'i sems can sdug bsngal gzigs nas ni// thugs rje bskyed nas bskal pa brgyad me /

330b1(dkon brtsegs): dzamang ba mas pa dug pa // 9gas gnas pa'ang 'o g.yos shing dpung ni bgyur sa// lham pan gyi tshogs kyi gnas mal rgya mas kyung mkhajal gnas shing rgyu ba'i dgung pra dgas sung chung chu
330b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba drang po mdzad pa byad na log pa'i tshig mi gsung // de nas gnas brtan 'di srung chen pos bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod nag bcom ldan 'phrul 'di skad ces gsol to//

330b6(dkon brtsegs): dubashad du gsapa/ de ga nas gsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od sru chen po la 'di skad ces 'a stsal to// 'ad su de'i phyi lags par non pa rab tu yid la zung shig dang bshad pa/

330b8(dkon brtsegs): bkun du blang ba dri med bkod pa shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de'i mthus phyogs btsu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i glang bye ba'i bye ma snyed dag 'ad kyis spang bar byas nas 'od

331b7(dkon brtsegs): lhag par dmigs shing de la rlom sems med pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la lhag par dmigs pa med cing de las me shes yongs su tshol ba dang / sus dang srog kyang yongs su gtong na dngos po gags

332b1(dkon brtsegs): gyu bzhin dang ga dang / da sems da dag te 'dzid de las 'a na du'i 'ogau mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'od srung dam med kyi da nad ting 'dzin rnams kyi gan
332b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de dag spyod la ma ji lta bus gnas pa rtogs shig/ de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag spyod lam de lta bus gnas/
