332b6(dkon brtsegs): dbang gshegs pa shin du mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dang 'dadasha du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par de ltar ni ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgrubs pas kyang de lnga la gas na byang chubs
332b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' gang dag thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pa dag ste smos mang ci 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo ru zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i rtsa chub tu sems bskyed pa
332b8(dkon brtsegs): mi babyed/ bcom ldan 'das gas te byang chub sems dpa' thas pams sa darnas la pa rig pa'i ting nge da da dadon gyi srad du gocha 'chal bar bgyi dang na gachalags pa 'tshas pa lags pas te sa
333a1(dkon brtsegs): 'don dkyus kyang yangasas ba / ma ldan 'das kyis bka' snyam pa/ 'ad brang dang bzhin no// ngan nas du nan te/ 'din tan thos dang / rang sa dang rdza las
333a2(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis yang mayin na sems can gzhan dag gi lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab can rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa yin
333a3(dkon brtsegs): gyib/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag spyod lam je lta bus gnas pa bdag gis brtag par bya'o snyam mo// de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin sum khril snyoms pa
333a4(dkon brtsegs): zhugs shing rnam par langs kyang de dag gi 'tshan ma yang shes par menus sa// de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta bar bya'o snyam mo// de nas sa
333a5(dkon brtsegs): brtan rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang gi stobs bskyed pas ting nge 'dzin pa ni khri la snyoms par zhugs shing dam par langs kyang de dag gis 'ong ba dang / 
333a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba yang ma shes/ 'greng ba yang ma mthong / 'chag pa yang ma mthong / 'dug pa yang ma mthong / nyal bar yang ma mthong ste/ de dag blta bar ma nus so// de nas gnas btan rab 'byor gyis
333a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag na de bzhin gshegs pas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa la gnas pa rnam
333a8(dkon brtsegs): ce mchog tu bstan te/ bdag ge ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams thob pa lags pas bcom ldan padas par gagal te kle chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnga bo che'i sbubs gcig tu tur cing dri
333b1(dkon brtsegs): 'i gcagags kyang skabs gcag tu gyu la/ da pal lazhig bya sa nas da sa/ da nam snyoms pa zhums pa mdun
333b2(dkon brtsegs): sa gzhan mi bgyid par bskal pa'i bar du rkun mi 'chad par rnga ba chad gnas brdungs par gyur kyang bcom ldan 'das bdag nyon mongs pa ma mchis par gnas pa'i slad du de ltar bsgrubs te/ nye ba'i ting nge 'dzin
333b3(dkon brtsegs): dma' thab la zhig brnal pa 'das par gnas pa'i rje ma che gnyis kyi su dben pa'i rnam par reg pa nam du yang grags par me 'thur na des te nge 'dzin de la pa sungs pa la sus la te/ de nig
333b4(dkon brtsegs): mamachig lagasan bcom ldan 'das bdag nyon mongs pas mchis par gnas pa de lta bu dang rnga zhing la shes de lta du dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag balnga ba'i slad du ting nge 'dzin pazhi lel snyoms par
333b5(dkon brtsegs): zhugs shing rnam par yangs kyang dngag 'asong ze/ de dag gi gnas kyang mtsham lags so// bcom ldan 'das gas te byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis la shes de sa bu yongs su tshol banasems na
333b6(dkon brtsegs): bskas pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sems can dmyal ba can par sreg par gyur kyang spo bar ba ci zhing bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa de lta bu yongs sus
333b7(dkon brtsegs): bar mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag len pa ma mchis par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol bar ma gyur na mi bdag smad pa'i mtha'i mur thug par 'khor bar myod cing
333b8(dkon brtsegs): lta bu'i theg pa chen po lang yongs su spong bar mi bgyid do// de nas bco ma ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan papa 'byor ga legs so zhes bya ba byerd te/ rab 'byob khyod kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa da mam

339b5(dkon brtsegs): so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lnga'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de yang 'di lta ste/ nam mkha' khams yin no// de ci'i phyir nan/ chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i phyi nam mkha' je lta bu yin pa de/ 
339b6(dkon brtsegs): bu yang de bzhin gshegs pa yang de lu bu yin pas mam mkha' dang de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bud lta bas na khyod de bzhin gshegs pa lta bar 'dod dam
339b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di khong ba chu dpang ba zhing cung zad kyang rnam par brtag par mi bya'o// de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe khang pa brtsegs pagru bzhi lham pa/ ka ba bzhi pa/ cha mnyam pa/ shin du mdzes pa/ 
339b8(dkon brtsegs): ma gyi ni slong mngon par sprul to// khang pa brtsegs pa de dag tu rin po che'i khri stan lnga'i dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos kyis bshams pa dag kyang sprul cing khri lhan re re la yang byang
340a1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' las gzugs sras brdzun pa'i mtshan sum brgya rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa dgasas to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhan nung gyur pas ngal bu'i byin gyi brlabs rgya
340a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis brlabs na 'di la bur gyur pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis rkyen gyis brlabs pas// sang gsum gyi sang chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khamapa 'di ni rnam par srid pa'i pad ma gang dag yin pa de dka dang / 
340a3(dkon brtsegs): rtsegs pa de dag bzhin gshegs pa gal ba dang da lta lhags nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dag 'dun dang bcas pa la lan gsum badrong ba byas te/ steng gi bar snang la bcom ldan 'das thal
340a4(dkon brtsegs): dkyil 'khor la snang bar byed cing phyogs bzhi kun nas 'khor bar 'khod do// de nas pad ma dag la 'khad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa gang dag yin pa dadag dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dag na 'khod pa'i byang / 
340a5(dkon brtsegs): napa sems dpa' gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la spa dbyangs 'thun par tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// gang gA'i bye snyeng bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// sangs
340a6(dkon brtsegs): tras bye ba phrags khyod kyis mchod// byang chub mchog gi srud pa btsal mdzad pas// de slad mi mchog khyod ni mdzes pa lags// thub pa mtshan gyis yongs su sras gyur pa// sumachog srid pa gsum na sa / 
340a7(dkon brtsegs): // 'dran pa gang la mi dang srog dang ni// gang mag ma mchi mchos ni 'grol snyan// rnam par 'dren pa sbyin dang tshul khams spyad// bzod pa brtson 'grus de bzhin bsam gtan bstan// khyed gyi shes rab
340a8(dkon brtsegs): gramamis yi la// lagasas pa kyan paphrag 'tshal lo// kha shin ma da kyil na pa'i// 'jig tan danapa lani 'du bgyu ya // nga zhing la mam pa babyed pa'o/ 
340b1(dkon brtsegs): tan dgag 'dran pa 5// gang dag pang byang bzhin gshegs pa dang // ga ga phyogs rnams pazhugs pa'i 'dren pa dag/ rangagagis na can med ston pa 'chos// rang bzhin mtshan da ma mchis rtan
340b2(dkon brtsegs): bsgoms// 'dis rang bzhin sems can gang yang na// skye nga 'che ba dmigs su ma mchis shing // 'ong ba ma mchis 'gro ba ma mchis te// chos rnams thams cad namama'a'aji bzhin no// ji ltar mi yis sgyum sa
340b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa// sdang yang de bzhin nyid du ma mchis ltar// de bzhin chos rnams sgyum 'dra ba dang // rmil ma lta bur bde bar gshegs pas bstan// gang zag la las gang gA'i bye snyed kyi// 'jig rten khams rnams 'di na
340b4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba dang // 'dus byas stong par bzod pa gang lags pa// bzod pa de ni sbyin las khyad par 'phags// byang chub 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yis// bskal pa bye ba gang gA'i bye snyed du// ma tog spos dang de bzhin/ 
340b5(dkon brtsegs): ba lom da// duca na mi mchog mchod papas// ga shil gapa la ming thog so// gang bsam kyis da tshu la 'didag/ thos nas de la 'a nas la btsad stobapa// mam kyi rnams dam mchos
340b6(dkon brtsegs): / lags// gang lami dang yang zag 'du shes mchis// bskal pa bye ba mang por zas skem pang// shing rta dpung chung khri stan sbyin bgyis kyang // des ni 'di la grol ba mi 'thob po// mi mchog gang dag mya ngan 'das pa dang / 
340b7(dkon brtsegs): de dag gis kyang sems can mang ba kram pa// mkha rnams rang bzhin 'odagapa la stong pa yi// chos rnams da ltar mkhyen pas rnam par grol// sangs rgyas 'byung dang yul du gnas pa dang // de bzhin bsta la dang
340b8(dkon brtsegs): ba dka'// mi yi srid pa'ang rnyed par dka' bas na// rgyal ba rnams kyi bstan la legs brtson gyis// mi 'om brgyad po thams cad rnam spangs shing // khom pa phun sum rnyed dka' thob stsar la/ ba ga sheg sa
341a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dad brda gu pa'o// mkhas pa rnams kyis rags pa'i ral 'byang spyod// bral 'dun par ma byed pa marnas nang nas rtag tun tan gyis// kyang kyis pa/ 
341a2(dkon brtsegs): dgon pa'i gnas bsnyen la// das nis rnams dam par 'gyur bar bya'o// chos su'i dge ba stes gang yid bsnyen gyis la// sdig pa'i grogs la lan 'ga'ang ma bsun cig/ sem sa can kun lasams na
341a3(dkon brtsegs): mnyam gyis la// sems can dal nam yang ma rlom shig/ tshul khrims ldan dang mang du thos kyis la// rtag tu phyag dang khrod dang bsod snyom pa spod // g.yel ba med par shing drung srin gyis la// bkus te song
341a4(dkon brtsegs): pa mchog la ma srid cig/ 'dus byas 'di dag thams cad 'dus byas min// mtshan nyid gcig cing smrig chu 'dra ba yin// dam pa'i don gyi mu gcig shes kyis pa// myur du gzhas yas byang chub reg par
341a5(dkon brtsegs): phung po lnga rnams skam bzhin du ltos// nang gi skye mched drug dang phyi yi drug/ de dag grang stong 'dra bar gsungs pas na// dal nam yang bsten par ma byed cig/ 'dod chags de sang rang bzhin stong panyid// 
341a6(dkon brtsegs): sugang rgyal yongs su rtog pas bskyed// rtog pa de pang ma byung 'byung med par// de ltar shas na 'den pa rnams su 'gyur// de nas sprul pa de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras pa na 'khor dal srog chags
341a7(dkon brtsegs): tes kri nis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// dge slong lnga brgya ni len pa med par bag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// dge slong sum bcu ni chos rnams la chos kyi ma
341a8(dkon brtsegs): sa pas par ga go// dag tha ma ma mang sa mam ma yo ngas pa pas la /  na sas rnas da

341b4(dkon brtsegs): panyid dag na mchis pa 'di rnams chos zab ma 'di lta bu snyan par bgyid pa dang / 'khor 'di yang snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur pa dang / lha'i bu bye ba phrag 'di ltar 'dus pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye
341b5(dkon brtsegs): mang po 'dus pa 'di dag su'i mthu lags/ de sang ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan shA ri'i bul 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhan nur gyur pa'amathu
341b6(dkon brtsegs): te/ nges bkod pa 'di lta bu 'di dag kun du blang ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar deng de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa lnga'i bu bla gros rang gnas dang lhan cig bya sangs
341b7(dkon brtsegs): chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangam 'u zhing ru blag byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// dkang ces
341b8(dkon brtsegs): sbal pa dang bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa na rol bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de 'khor 'dus par 'di na mi gda'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
342a1(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ shi bkyong shig sdud cig dang / 'jam dpal gzhan du thar pa dang 'ang bdud kya kyil 'khang thams cad dang / bdud kyi gnas thams ca dang / 
342a2(dkon brtsegs): zil gyis gnon cing bkod pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa gal ba deng 'ong bar 'ayang de// de nasa'ang ma dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bdud byed dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa che
342a3(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// 'jam dpal gson nur gur pa bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tud nas de'i mod la
342a4(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na bdud kyi gnas phye ba brgya phrag de skad pa dadag thams cad mog mog por gyur te// bdud sdig can de dag kyang rang rang gi lus nas shing gtugs la la
342a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dgur nas lag pa 'khar pal rten cing 'gro bar gyur to// de dag gis lha'i bu mo rnams kyang nas shing gtu gsal 'khogs par gyur pa dang yang po gzhal mad khang dag kyang rnyings shing rag tu 'jig pa
342a6(dkon brtsegs): mun pa dun nag tu gyur par mthong nga// de nas bdud sdig can de dag skrag cang dang ngas la yi chad cing mying lug ste/ snga'i khung bu rin nas byed par gyur nas 'di snyam du ram par rtog ste/ gang shes pa ma
342a7(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyi gnas rnams 'di lta bu'i gnas skabs su gur pa 'di'i chu ni gang yin/ rkyen ni gang yin/ bdag cag 'di nas 'chi 'pho shing med pa 'am gcig tu mi 'gur grang snyam mo// bdu de dag gi ma pa
342a8(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa dalta bu dgyes ma thag tu de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lha'i bu sprul pa thar 'bum skul te/ bdud dag gi mdun du bkod do// de nas lha'i bu rdul pa dang ga gis bdud sdig can dang
342b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa 'jam dpal bzhin dung skur pa nas bya ba da da ltar bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa zhes bya ba
342b2(dkon brtsegs): nge 'dzin la stoms par zhugs pa de'i ma 'a yin te/ khyed la 'tshe ba 'ga' yang 'thung bar me 'gyur gyes ma skrag shig/ lha'i bu dul pa de dag gi mchis de skad ces sus ma thag tu/ gnas bdud ldeg can po
342b3(dkon brtsegs): gis sra de lang thos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i ming yang thos nas yang rgya cher dngangs shing skrag ste/ bdud kyi gnas de dag thams cad kyang rab tu g.yos so// de nas bdud sdig can de dag gis lha'i bu
342b4(dkon brtsegs): bde dag la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs pa dang yongs sa skyabs shig/ grogs po dag yongs su srabs shig/ de nas lha'i bu stsal pang dag gis bdud sdig cand dag la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs
342b5(dkon brtsegs): dag ma 'jigs shig/ grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig/ khade cag dang la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gal ba dang pong shig dang / dra ba
342b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa thugs rnga dang ldan pa de ni sems can 'jigs par gyur pa rnams la mi 'jigs pa stsal par mdzad do// ba nas lha'i bu stsal pa de dag gis mig da skad ces smras nas pa nyid du mi sdang bar gyur to// de na
342b7(dkon brtsegs): bdud rig can 'khor bdud sdig can 'bum phrag zer 'bum du ma dang bcas pa de dag thams cad nas shing 'khogs nas gsor cing lag pa mkhar bal rten bzhin du 'ding shing skang cig yung tsam cig la ba

343a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bye ba khrag 'bus gyi mtshan yongs su bsgrag pa pa ma mi mngon lags kyi/ 'jas dpal gzhon nung gyur pa gcig pu ming ni de ltam lags so// da ci'i slad dugan/ 'dam dpa la gnon nur gyur ba'i yid thos/ 
343a3(dkon brtsegs): na bdag cag 'jigs shing dang la thug par 'gyur te/ 'che po bskam du 'tshal ci ma mchis par 'gyur ba skam du 'tshal ba'i srad du'o// danas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can de dag la 'dis

344b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin de 'thob ste// bzhi gang lags she na/ lug pa'i bsam pa la yang dag par 'jug pa dang / g.yo ba ma mchis pa dang / zab pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba
344b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin de 'thob po// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang
345a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chas bzhi po de dag dang ldan na ting 'dzin de 'thob po// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byeng chub sems dpa' chos pa ni dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin de 'phob ste/ ba ni gang lags she na/ dge ba'i rtsa
345a2(dkon brtsegs): gnyen pa bsnyen pa dang / sdig pa'i grogs pa spong ba dang / blangs pa dang / tshul khrims dang / yo byad bsrungs pa dang ldan pa dang / bdu'i mamaches par spyod pa/ bcom ldan 'das bya bcub sems dpa' tshes ni/ 
345a3(dkon brtsegs): po de dag dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin de thob po// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin de 'thob ste/ bzhi gang lags she na/ tshul khrims ma rkamA pa dang / tshul khrims ma/ 
345a4(dkon brtsegs): dral ba dang / tshul khrims mi rten pa dang / tshul khrims na gnogs mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin de 'thob po// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang / 
345a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldanan ting nge 'dzin de 'thob ste/ bzhig lags shen/ nyan thos kyi sems yongs su spong ba dang / rang sa sa rgyam gyi sems la lhag par mi dmigs pa dang / 
345a6(dkon brtsegs): la gnas pa dang / sems can sems ma mchis paste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub thams dpa' chos 'ani po dadag dang ldanan te 'dzin de 'thob bo// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub mas
345a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chos bzhi dang ldadan ting nge 'dzin de 'gro za ste/ bzhi ga lags zhen/ stong pa nyid kyi chos sgom zhing gang bag la rlom sems ma mchis pa dang / mtshan ma mchis pa sgom ming mtshan mtsha
345b1(dkon brtsegs): phreng ba dang / smon pa ma mchis pasgom zhing smon pa'i sems yongs su spong ba dang / cho ga 'tshal cing dngos po thams cad yongs su gtor ba dang bzhi ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa de dag dang cho
345b2(dkon brtsegs): dag dang ldan na bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa'i ting nge 'dzin de 'thob po/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa me tog man dA nga'i dris ting nge 'dzinang sgrub pa de rab tu bstan te/ 
345b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de las ting nge 'dzin bsgrub pa de thos shing bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog man dA ra'i dri de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dang
345b4(dkon brtsegs): ba rdzogs pa'i sangs can no dang / rin po che dang / glog dang / nyi zla thams cid dazil gyis gnon pa'i 'od ces bgyi bzung bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spyan sngar ting nge
